-----title
绍兴
-----detail

id='poem_sentence_10_1375570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1375570'>是人甘言，将欲相聋。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1375570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1375570'>下或誇我，秋毫必睹。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1375570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1375570'>是人甘言，将欲相瞽。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1375570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1375570'>长如欲战，莫舍强弩。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1375570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1375570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1375570'>如彼五味，有甘有辛。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1375570_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=844')">844年</a>　年初在故乡为裴氏姊及侄女寄寄等营葬。作品：祭处士房叔父文。祭裴氏姊文。祭小姪女寄寄文。为王从事妻万俟氏祭先舅司徒文。为王秀才妻苏氏祭先舅司徒文。祭外舅赠司徒公文。大卤平后移家到永乐县居书怀十韵寄刘韦二前辈二公尝于此县寄居。<div id='poem_1375641' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375641' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375641?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭处士十二房叔父文<span class='inlineComment2'>（谨按房字上应有十二二字）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（844年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375641'>某爰在童蒙。最承教诱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375641_comment'></div>违诀虽久。音旨长存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375641_comment'></div>近者以檀山旧茔。忽罹风水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375641_comment'></div>寿堂圮坏。冢树凋倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375641_comment'></div>虽崩则不修。闻诸前哲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375641_comment'></div>但坠而罔治。那俟他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375641_comment'></div>况隐德贻芳。鸿儒著美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375641_comment'></div>岂可令赵岐之表。垫彼元扃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375641_comment'></div>郭泰之碑。沦于夜壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375641_comment'></div>载惟瑊顼。藐尔孤冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375641_comment'></div>诚叫号之不停。顾营办之无素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375641_comment'></div>某等辄考诸蓍筮。别卜邱封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375641_comment'></div>使羲叟以令日吉时。奉移神寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375641_comment'></div>奢无僭缛。俭免亏疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375641_comment'></div>是期永閟尊灵。长安幽穸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375641_comment'></div>眠牛有庆。自及于诸孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375641_comment'></div>白马垂祥。岂均于犹子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375641_comment'></div>追怀莫及。感切徒深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375641_comment'></div>更思平昔之时。兼预生徒之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375641_comment'></div>陆公赐杖。念荣益以何成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375641_comment'></div>殷氏著文。愧献酬而早屈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375641_comment'></div>引进之恩方极。祸凶之感俄钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375641_comment'></div>谁言一纪之馀。又奉再迁之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375641_comment'></div>哀深永往。情极初闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375641_comment'></div>矧宗绪衰微。簪缨殆歇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375641_comment'></div>五服之内。一身有官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375641_comment'></div>将使泽底名家。翻同单系。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375641_comment'></div>山东旧族。不及寒门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375641_comment'></div>静思肯构之文。敢怠成书之托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375641_comment'></div>瑊等既幽明无累。年志渐成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375641_comment'></div>则当授以诗书。谕其婚宦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375641_comment'></div>使烝尝有奉。名教无亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375641_comment'></div>灵其鉴此微忱。助夫至愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375641_comment'></div>敢以求于必大。庶免叹于忽诸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375641_comment'></div>迫以哀忧。兼之瘵恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375641_comment'></div>曾非遐远。不获躬亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375641_comment'></div>沥血裁词。叩心写恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375641_comment'></div>长风破浪。敢忘昔日之规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375641_comment'></div>南巷齐名。永绝今生之望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375641_comment'></div>冀因薄奠。少降明辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375641_comment'></div>延慕酸伤。不能堪处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375641_comment'></div>苦痛至深。永痛至深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375641_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1375641_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375645' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375645' class='poemTitle href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375645")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375645_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375645'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375645'>呜呼哀哉。灵有行于元和之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375645_comment'></div>返葬于会昌之岁。光阴迭代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375645_comment'></div>三十馀秋。得不以既笄阙庙见之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375645_comment'></div>故卜吉举归宗之礼。不幸不佑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375645_comment'></div>天实为之。椎心泣血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375645_comment'></div>孰知所诉。恭惟先德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375645_comment'></div>实绍元风。良时不来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375645_comment'></div>百里为政。爱女二九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375645_comment'></div>思托贤豪。谁为行媒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375645_comment'></div>来荐之子。虽琴瑟而著咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375645_comment'></div>终天壤以兴悲。谓之何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375645_comment'></div>继以沈恙。祷祠无冀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375645_comment'></div>奄忽凋违。时先君子以交辟员来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375645_comment'></div>南辕已辖。接旧阴于桃李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375645_comment'></div>寄暂殡之松楸。此际兄弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375645_comment'></div>尚皆乳抱。空惊啼于不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375645_comment'></div>未识会于沈冤。浙水东西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375645_comment'></div>半纪漂泊。某年方就傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375645_comment'></div>家难旋臻。躬奉板舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375645_comment'></div>以引丹旐。四海无可归之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375645_comment'></div>九族无可倚之亲。既祔故邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375645_comment'></div>便同逋骇。生人穷困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375645_comment'></div>闻见所无。及衣裳外除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375645_comment'></div>旨甘是急。乃占数东甸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375645_comment'></div>佣书贩舂。日就月将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375645_comment'></div>渐立门构。清白之训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375645_comment'></div>幸无辱焉。既登太常之第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375645_comment'></div>复忝天官之选。免迹县正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375645_comment'></div>刊书秘邱。荣养之志才通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375645_comment'></div>启动之期有渐。而天神降罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375645_comment'></div>艰棘再丁。弱弟幼妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375645_comment'></div>未笄未冠。允绪犹阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375645_comment'></div>家徒屡空。载惟家长之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375645_comment'></div>偷存晷刻之命。号天叫地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375645_comment'></div>五内崩摧。然亦以灵寓殡获嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375645_comment'></div>向经三纪。归祔之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375645_comment'></div>阙然未修。是冀苟全。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375645_comment'></div>得终前限。属刘孽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1375645", 1375645, "Clauses/75/Comments/0")'>叛换</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375645_comment'></div>逼近怀城。惧罹焚发之灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375645_comment'></div>永抱幽明之累。遂以前月初吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375645_comment'></div>摄缞告灵。号步东郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375645_comment'></div>访诸耆旧。孤魂何托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375645_comment'></div>旅榇奚依。垂兴欲堕之悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375645_comment'></div>几有将平之恨。断手解体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375645_comment'></div>何痛如之。洒血荒墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375645_comment'></div>飞走同感。伏惟朝夕二奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375645_comment'></div>不敢久离。遂遣羲叟一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375645_comment'></div>主张启奉。抱头拊背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375645_comment'></div>戒以信诚。附身附棺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375645_comment'></div>庶无遗阙。檀山荥水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375645_comment'></div>实惟我家。灵其永归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375645_comment'></div>无或栖寓。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375645_comment'></div>灵沈绵之际。殂背之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375645_comment'></div>某初解扶床。犹能记面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375645_comment'></div>长成之后。岂忘迁移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375645_comment'></div>顷者以先妣年高。兼之多恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375645_comment'></div>每欲咨画。即动悲感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375645_comment'></div>涕泣既繁。寝膳稍减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375645_comment'></div>虽云通礼。亦所难言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375645_comment'></div>荏苒于斯。非敢怠忽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375645_comment'></div>今则南望显考。东望严君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375645_comment'></div>伯姊在前。犹女在后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375645_comment'></div>克当寓邸。归养幽都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375645_comment'></div>虽殁者之宅兆永安。而存者之追攀莫及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375645_comment'></div>又以十二房旧域。风水为灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375645_comment'></div>胡子彭儿。藐焉孤小。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375645_comment'></div>虽古无修墓。著在典经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375645_comment'></div>而忘礼约情。亦许通变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375645_comment'></div>今则已于左坎。别卜鲜原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375645_comment'></div>重具棺衾。再立封树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375645_comment'></div>通年难遇。同月异辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375645_comment'></div>兼小侄寄儿。亦来自济邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375645_comment'></div>騃魂稚魄。依托尊灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375645_comment'></div>远想先域之旁。累累相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375645_comment'></div>重沟叠陌。万古千秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375645_comment'></div>临穴既乖。饮痛何极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375645_comment'></div>唯安阳祖妣未祔。仍世遗忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375645_comment'></div>昨本卜孟春。便谋启合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375645_comment'></div>会雍店东下。逼近行营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375645_comment'></div>烽火朝然。鼓鼙夜动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375645_comment'></div>虽徒步举榇。古有其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375645_comment'></div>用之于今。或为简率。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375645_comment'></div>潞寇朝弭。则此礼夕行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375645_comment'></div>首夏已来。亦有通吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375645_comment'></div>傥天鉴孤藐。神听至诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375645_comment'></div>获以全兹。免负遗托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375645_comment'></div>即五服之内。更无流寓之魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375645_comment'></div>一门之中。悉共归全之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375645_comment'></div>今交亲馈遗。朝暮饘糊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375645_comment'></div>收合盈馀。节省费耗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375645_comment'></div>所望克终远事。岂敢温饱微生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375645_comment'></div>苟言斯不诚。亦神明诛责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375645_comment'></div>老旧仆使。才馀两人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375645_comment'></div>灵之组绣馀工。翰墨遗迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375645_comment'></div>并收藏箧笥。用寄哀伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375645_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。蕣夭当年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375645_comment'></div>骨还旧土。箕帚寻移于继室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375645_comment'></div>兄弟空哭于归魂。终天衔冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375645_comment'></div>心骨分裂。胞胎气类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375645_comment'></div>宁有旧新。叫号不闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375645_comment'></div>精灵何去。寓词寄奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375645_comment'></div>血滴缄封。灵其归来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375645_comment'></div>省此哀殒。伤痛苍天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375645_comment'></div>孤苦苍天。伏惟尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375645_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_104_1375645_comment'></div></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375646'>正月二十五日。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_1375646", 1375646, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>伯伯</span>以果子弄物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375646_comment'></div>招送寄寄体魂。归大茔之旁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375646_comment'></div>哀哉。尔生四年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375646_comment'></div>方复本族。既复数月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375646_comment'></div>奄然归无。于鞠育而未深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375646_comment'></div>结悲伤而何极。来也何故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375646_comment'></div>去也何缘。念当稚戏之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375646_comment'></div>孰测死生之位。时吾赴调京下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375646_comment'></div>移家关中。事故纷纶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375646_comment'></div>光阴迁贸。寄瘗尔骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375646_comment'></div>五年于兹。白草枯荄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375646_comment'></div>荒涂古陌。朝饥谁饱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375646_comment'></div>夜渴谁怜。尔之栖栖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375646_comment'></div>吾有罪矣。今吾仲姊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375646_comment'></div>返葬有期。遂迁尔灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375646_comment'></div>来复先域。平原卜穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375646_comment'></div>刊石书铭。明知过礼之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375646_comment'></div>何忍深情所属。自尔没后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375646_comment'></div>侄辈数人。竹马玉环。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375646_comment'></div>绣襜文褓。堂前阶下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375646_comment'></div>日里风中。弄药争花。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375646_comment'></div>纷吾左右。独尔精诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375646_comment'></div>不知何之。况吾别娶已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375646_comment'></div>嗣绪未立。犹子之谊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375646_comment'></div>倍切他人。念往抚存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375646_comment'></div>五情空热。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375646_comment'></div>荥水之上。檀山之侧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375646_comment'></div>汝乃曾乃祖。松槚森行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375646_comment'></div>伯姑仲姑。冢坟相接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375646_comment'></div>汝来往于此。勿怖勿惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375646_comment'></div>华䌽衣裳。甘香饮食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375646_comment'></div>汝来受此。无少无多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375646_comment'></div>汝伯祭汝。汝父哭汝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375646_comment'></div>哀哀寄寄。汝知之耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375646_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1375646_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375632' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375632' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375632?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为王从事妻万俟氏祭先舅司徒文</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375632'>新妇舋咎所招。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375632_comment'></div>重罹天谪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375632_comment'></div>始释缞而就吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375632_comment'></div>俄解帨以闻凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375632_comment'></div>衰祸所延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375632_comment'></div>或深诸妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375632_comment'></div>冤号之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375632_comment'></div>良异他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375632_comment'></div>爰在高堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375632_comment'></div>尝依诸舅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375632_comment'></div>聿来我族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375632_comment'></div>实号儒门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375632_comment'></div>虽传业于诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375632_comment'></div>冀同光于轩冕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375632_comment'></div>羽书铜印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375632_comment'></div>东泛西浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375632_comment'></div>及世难旋臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375632_comment'></div>家徒壁立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375632_comment'></div>望萍蓬而结欷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375632_comment'></div>指沟壑以贻忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375632_comment'></div>竟蒙念切诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375632_comment'></div>言忧幼女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375632_comment'></div>卜云其吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375632_comment'></div>天也来仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375632_comment'></div>莲幕高华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375632_comment'></div>兰阶秀异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375632_comment'></div>尊卑共感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375632_comment'></div>里巷同欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375632_comment'></div>岂谓百两才归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375632_comment'></div>双旌遽改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375632_comment'></div>虽在途称妇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375632_comment'></div>已蒙羔雁之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375632_comment'></div>而辞家适人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375632_comment'></div>未具箴鞶之敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375632_comment'></div>讵言不日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375632_comment'></div>奄背深慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375632_comment'></div>永痛长号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375632_comment'></div>五情分裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375632_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375632_comment'></div>远国千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375632_comment'></div>夜泉九重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375632_comment'></div>侧闻龟筮之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375632_comment'></div>将备涂刍之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375632_comment'></div>今以干戈未息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375632_comment'></div>途路多虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375632_comment'></div>清贫昭艰食之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375632_comment'></div>遐阻难举家而往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375632_comment'></div>不获躬随绛旐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375632_comment'></div>亲诣松扃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375632_comment'></div>抚行引以伤摧。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1375633_comment'></div>追攀莫及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375633_comment'></div>号毒无任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375633_comment'></div>恭惟尊灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375633_comment'></div>好是懿德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375633_comment'></div>其修身克己之规矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375633_comment'></div>誓心奉国之忠诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375633_comment'></div>武略文经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375633_comment'></div>官方政术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375633_comment'></div>既外言不入于中壸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375633_comment'></div>故殊勋无预于斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375633_comment'></div>今沥血写诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375633_comment'></div>叩心寄酷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375633_comment'></div>祇欲以闺庭见闻之事。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1375633_comment'></div>五情先溃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375633_comment'></div>呜呼不祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375633_comment'></div>天实为之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375633_comment'></div>昔我门外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375633_comment'></div>首启侯服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375633_comment'></div>传鼎铭于百代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375633_comment'></div>称玉润于十家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375633_comment'></div>新妇之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375633_comment'></div>实继儒德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375633_comment'></div>羔雁克光于宋子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375633_comment'></div>丹青远比于瀛州<span class='inlineComment2'>（秦府学士之后）</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375633_comment'></div>三纪以前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375633_comment'></div>六姻推最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375633_comment'></div>俄已吉凶相反。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375633_comment'></div>中外贻悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375633_comment'></div>蕞尔羁孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375633_comment'></div>邈无依怙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375633_comment'></div>严室而悔过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375633_comment'></div>面授刀尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375633_comment'></div>躬传织纴。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1375639_comment'></div>谨遣家僮赍疏薄之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375639_comment'></div>昭祭于故河阳节度使赠司徒之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375639_comment'></div>惟昔积德卜年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375639_comment'></div>源长庆延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375639_comment'></div>岐山之走马胥宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375639_comment'></div>嵩邱之控鹤寻仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375639_comment'></div>重叠规矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375639_comment'></div>蕃昌亿千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375639_comment'></div>邂逅中代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375639_comment'></div>支离数贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375639_comment'></div>豆藿失君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375639_comment'></div>随庾谢而南度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375639_comment'></div>桃叶兴咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375639_comment'></div>弃江徐而北旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375639_comment'></div>已失晋阳之菜地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375639_comment'></div>因开濮水之松阡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375639_comment'></div>时非得已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375639_comment'></div>吾宁固然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375639_comment'></div>王殷别祁县之居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375639_comment'></div>未伤于教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375639_comment'></div>王浚占宏农之籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375639_comment'></div>果振其先。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1375639_comment'></div>赤羽若日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1375639_comment'></div>金印如斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1375639_comment'></div>赐衣干袭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1375639_comment'></div>罢加寒暑之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1375639_comment'></div>宸翰万重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1375639_comment'></div>誓在河山之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1375639_comment'></div>重以夷门下士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1375639_comment'></div>楚馆求才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1375639_comment'></div>御车表敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1375639_comment'></div>比饭除猜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1375639_comment'></div>道通无著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1375639_comment'></div>水月观定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1375639_comment'></div>春台寄乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1375639_comment'></div>赤髭疏主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1375639_comment'></div>掷麈尾以无言。<div 东平

-----title
西安
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='8cb430f666fe4c0e9a4cc014ee4233bd_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("8cb430f666fe4c0e9a4cc014ee4233bd");'><span id='8cb430f666fe4c0e9a4cc014ee4233bd_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年</a>，20岁</div><div id='8cb430f666fe4c0e9a4cc014ee4233bd' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=831&endYear=831')">831年</a>　正月，在长安。得令狐楚资助参与进士科考试，不第。作诗委婉拒绝宇文鼎的举荐帮助。作品：赠宇文中丞。<span class='inlineComment2'>（关于李商隐到底参加了几次进士考试的问题，在此参考毕宝魁《李商隐参加科举考试始末考》观点：认为李商隐共参加5次科考，首次始于太和五年。）</span><div id='poem_28776' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28776' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>，25岁</div><div id='19fd0c72e38b465a8113452412ab87ac' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　春夏在长安，于令狐绹、李肱等交往令狐楚聘为幕，未及赴任。作品：别令狐拾遗书。<div id='poem_1375447' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375447' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375447?labeling=true' target='_blank'>别令狐拾遗书</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375447")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375447_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375447'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375447'>子直足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375447_comment'></div>行日巳定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375447_comment'></div>昨幸得少展写。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375447_comment'></div>足下去后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375447_comment'></div>怃然不怡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375447_comment'></div>今早垂致葛衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375447_comment'></div>书辞委曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375447_comment'></div>恻恻无巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375447_comment'></div>自昔非有故旧援拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375447_comment'></div>卒然于稠人中相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375447_comment'></div>见其表得所以类君子者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375447_comment'></div>一日相从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375447_comment'></div>百年见肺肝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375447_comment'></div>尔来足下仕益达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375447_comment'></div>仆困不动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375447_comment'></div>固不能有常合而有常离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375447_comment'></div>足下观人与物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375447_comment'></div>共此天地耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375447_comment'></div>错行杂居蛰蛰哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375447_comment'></div>不幸天能恣物之生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375447_comment'></div>而不能与物慨然量其欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375447_comment'></div>牙齿者恨不得翅羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375447_comment'></div>角者又恨不得牙齿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375447_comment'></div>此意人与物略同耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375447_comment'></div>有所趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375447_comment'></div>故不能无争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375447_comment'></div>有所争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375447_comment'></div>故不能不于同中而有各异耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375447_comment'></div>足下观此世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375447_comment'></div>其同异如何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375447_comment'></div>儿冠出门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375447_comment'></div>父翁不知其枉正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375447_comment'></div>女笄上车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375447_comment'></div>夫人不保其贞污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375447_comment'></div>此于亲亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375447_comment'></div>不能无异势也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375447_comment'></div>亲者尚尔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375447_comment'></div>则不亲者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375447_comment'></div>恶望其无隙哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375447_comment'></div>故近世交道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375447_comment'></div>几丧欲尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375447_comment'></div>足下与仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375447_comment'></div>于天独何禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375447_comment'></div>当此世生而不同此世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375447_comment'></div>每一会面一分散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375447_comment'></div>至于慨然相执手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375447_comment'></div>嚬然相戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375447_comment'></div>泫然相泣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375447_comment'></div>岂于此世有他事哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375447_comment'></div>惜此世之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375447_comment'></div>率不能如吾之所乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375447_comment'></div>而又甚惧吾之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375447_comment'></div>孑立寡处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375447_comment'></div>而与此世者蹄尾纷然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375447_comment'></div>蛆吾之白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375447_comment'></div>摈置讥诽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375447_comment'></div>袭出不意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375447_comment'></div>使后日有希吾者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375447_comment'></div>且惩吾困。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375447_comment'></div>而不能坚其守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375447_comment'></div>乃舍吾而之他耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375447_comment'></div>足下知与此世者居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375447_comment'></div>常绐于其党何语哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375447_comment'></div>必曰吾恶市道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375447_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375447_comment'></div>此辈真手搔鼻皻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375447_comment'></div>而喉哕人之灼㡾为癞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375447_comment'></div>市道何肯如此辈邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375447_comment'></div>今一大贾坐墆货中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375447_comment'></div>人人往须之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375447_comment'></div>甲得若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375447_comment'></div>曰其赢若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375447_comment'></div>丙曰吾索之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375447_comment'></div>乙得若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375447_comment'></div>曰其赢若干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375447_comment'></div>戊曰吾索之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375447_comment'></div>既与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375447_comment'></div>则欲其蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375447_comment'></div>不愿其亡失口舌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375447_comment'></div>拜父母。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375447_comment'></div>出妻子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375447_comment'></div>伏腊相见有贽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375447_comment'></div>男女嫁娶有问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375447_comment'></div>不幸丧死有致馈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375447_comment'></div>葬有临送吊哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375447_comment'></div>是何长者大人哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375447_comment'></div>他日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375447_comment'></div>甲乙俱入之不欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375447_comment'></div>则又愈得其所欲矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375447_comment'></div>回环出入如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375447_comment'></div>是终身欲其蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375447_comment'></div>不愿其亡失口舌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375447_comment'></div>拜父母益严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375447_comment'></div>出妻子益敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375447_comment'></div>伏腊相见贽益厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375447_comment'></div>男女嫁娶问益丰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375447_comment'></div>不幸丧死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375447_comment'></div>馈赠临送吊哭情益悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375447_comment'></div>是又何长者大人哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375447_comment'></div>惟是于信誓有大期漫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375447_comment'></div>然后骂而绝之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375447_comment'></div>击而逐之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375447_comment'></div>讫身而勿与通也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375447_comment'></div>故一市人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375447_comment'></div>率少于大贾而不信者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1375447_comment'></div>此岂可与此世交者等耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1375447_comment'></div>今日赤肝脑相怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1375447_comment'></div>明日众相唾辱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1375447_comment'></div>皆自其时之与势耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1375447_comment'></div>时之不在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1375447_comment'></div>势之移去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1375447_comment'></div>虽百仁义我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1375447_comment'></div>百忠信我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1375447_comment'></div>我尚不顾矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1375447_comment'></div>岂不顾巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1375447_comment'></div>而又唾之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1375447_comment'></div>足下果谓市道何如哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1375447_comment'></div>今人娶妇入门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1375447_comment'></div>母姑必祝之曰善相宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1375447_comment'></div>则祝曰蕃息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1375447_comment'></div>后日生女子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1375447_comment'></div>贮之幽房密寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1375447_comment'></div>四邻不得识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1375447_comment'></div>兄弟以时见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1375447_comment'></div>欲其好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1375447_comment'></div>不顾性命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1375447_comment'></div>即一日可嫁去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1375447_comment'></div>是宜择何如男子者属之邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1375447_comment'></div>今山东大姓家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1375447_comment'></div>非能违摘天性而不如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1375447_comment'></div>至其羔鹜在门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1375447_comment'></div>有不问贤不肖健病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1375447_comment'></div>而但论财货。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1375447_comment'></div>恣求取为事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1375447_comment'></div>当其为女子时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1375447_comment'></div>谁不恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1375447_comment'></div>及为母妇则亦然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1375447_comment'></div>彼父子男女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1375447_comment'></div>天性岂有大于此者耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1375447_comment'></div>今尚如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1375447_comment'></div>况他舍外人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1375447_comment'></div>燕生越养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1375447_comment'></div>而相望相救。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1375447_comment'></div>抵死不相贩卖哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1375447_comment'></div>细而绎之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1375447_comment'></div>真令人不爱此世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1375447_comment'></div>而欲往走远飏耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1375447_comment'></div>果不知足下与仆之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1375447_comment'></div>是耶非耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1375447_comment'></div>首阳之二士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1375447_comment'></div>岂蕲盟津之八百。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1375447_comment'></div>吾又何悔焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1375447_comment'></div>千百年下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1375447_comment'></div>生人之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1375447_comment'></div>不在富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1375447_comment'></div>而在直笔者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1375447_comment'></div>得有此人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1375447_comment'></div>足下与仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1375447_comment'></div>当有所用意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1375447_comment'></div>其他复何云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1375447_comment'></div>但当誓不羞市道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1375447_comment'></div>而又不为忘其素恨之母妇耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1375447_comment'></div>商隐再拜。</div><div id='poem_sentence_162_1375447_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='c8ff9514111a446b8ec67b0a3ef481f0_label'><a href='javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年</a>，26岁</div><div id='c8ff9514111a446b8ec67b0a3ef481f0' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年1月11～24</a>　长安进士及第，上崔华州书。作品：上崔华州书。<span class='inlineComment2'>（关于李商隐到底参加了几次进士考试的问题，在此参考毕宝魁《李商隐参加科举考试始末考》观点：认为李商隐共参加5次科考，首次始于太和五年。）</span><div id='poem_1375446' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375446' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375446?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上崔华州书</a><span class='authorDate'>（837年1月11～24）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375446")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375446_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375446'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375446'>中丞閤下。愚生二十五年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375446_comment'></div>五年读经书。七年弄笔砚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375446_comment'></div>始闻长老言。学道必求古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375446_comment'></div>为文必有师法。常悒悒不快。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375446_comment'></div>退自思曰。夫所谓道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375446_comment'></div>岂古所谓周公孔子者独能邪。盖愚与周孔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375446_comment'></div>俱身之耳。以是有行道不系今古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375446_comment'></div>直挥笔为文。不能攘取经史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375446_comment'></div>讳忌时世。百经万书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375446_comment'></div>异品殊流。又岂能意分出其下哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375446_comment'></div>凡为进士者五年。始为故贾相国所憎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375446_comment'></div>明年病不试。又明年复为今崔宣州所不取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375446_comment'></div>居五年间。未曾衣袖文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375446_comment'></div>谒人求知。必待其恐不得识其面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375446_comment'></div>恐不得读其书。然后乃出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375446_comment'></div>呜呼。愚之道可谓强矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375446_comment'></div>可谓穷矣。宁济其魂魄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375446_comment'></div>安养其气志。成其强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375446_comment'></div>拂其穷。惟閤下可望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375446_comment'></div>辄尽以旧所为发露左右。恐其意犹未宣泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375446_comment'></div>故复有是说。某再拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375446_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1375446_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年1月24日后</a>　长安进士及第，写状上令狐楚。作品：上令狐相公状五。<span class='inlineComment2'>（关于李商隐到底参加了几次进士考试的问题，在此参考毕宝魁《李商隐参加科举考试始末考》观点：认为李商隐共参加5次科考，首次始于太和五年。）</span><div id='poem_1375404' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375404' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375404?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上令狐相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（837年1月24日后）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375404")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375404_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375404'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375404'>前月七日过关试讫。伏以经年滞留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375404_comment'></div>自春宴集。虽怀归若无其长道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375404_comment'></div>而适远方俟于聚粮。即以今月二十七日东下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375404_comment'></div>伏思自依门馆。行将十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375404_comment'></div>久负梯媒。方沾一第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375404_comment'></div>仍世之徽音免坠。平生之志业无亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375404_comment'></div>信其自强。亦未臻此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375404_comment'></div>愿言丹慊。实誓朝暾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375404_comment'></div>虽济上汉中。风烟特异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375404_comment'></div>而恩门故国。道里斯同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375404_comment'></div>北堂之恋方深。东阁之知未谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375404_comment'></div>夙宵感激。去住彷徨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375404_comment'></div>彼谢掾辞归。系情于皋壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375404_comment'></div>杨朱下泣。结念于路歧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375404_comment'></div>以方兹辰。未偕卑素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375404_comment'></div>况自今岁。累蒙荣示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375404_comment'></div>轸其飘泊。务以慰安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375404_comment'></div>促曳裾之期。问改辕之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375404_comment'></div>五交辟而未盛。十从事而非贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375404_comment'></div>仰望辉光。不胜负荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375404_comment'></div>至中秋方遂专往起居未间。瞻望旌旄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375404_comment'></div>如阔天地。伏惟俯赐照察。<div class='inline' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375624?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代李元为崔京兆祭萧侍郎文</a><span class='authorDate'>（837年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375624")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375624_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375624'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375624'>年月日。惟灵传芳华冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375624_comment'></div>禀庆灵源。汉朝辅相之流辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375624_comment'></div>梁室帝王之遗懿。克生俊德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375624_comment'></div>彰我休期。高表百寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375624_comment'></div>澄波万顷。及春闱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1375624", 1375624, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>献艺</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375624_comment'></div>会府试才。骐骥出尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375624_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1375624", 1375624, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>蛟龙得水</span>。顿缨而驽骀尽丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375624_comment'></div>乘风而鳖蜃皆空。凭陵远天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375624_comment'></div>躞蹀长道。是将筮仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375624_comment'></div>光乎缙绅。侯国从知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375624_comment'></div>大朝就选。秘宝宜陈于东序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375624_comment'></div>朱绂必降于上元。锦幔而居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375624_comment'></div>青缣以覆。建礼推尽瘁之绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375624_comment'></div>明光多伏奏之勤。亦既迁荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375624_comment'></div>乃司论驳。高居青琐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375624_comment'></div>封还紫泥。使明时无失政之机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375624_comment'></div>大邦无不便之诏。暂辞朝籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375624_comment'></div>往分郡符。借寇莫从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375624_comment'></div>徵黄甚急。方将启乎良友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375624_comment'></div>进彼令人。志岂爱身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375624_comment'></div>誓将许国。不谓疏网犹漏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375624_comment'></div>斯民未康。作砺为盐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375624_comment'></div>正俟理平之运。依城凭社。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375624_comment'></div>深怀剪灭之虞。上蔽聪明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375624_comment'></div>内求媟近。故鸿猷不得而协赞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375624_comment'></div>睿化莫可以辅成。藐是流离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375624_comment'></div>有窘阴雨。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375624_comment'></div>令惟逐客。谁复上书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375624_comment'></div>狱以党人。但求俱死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375624_comment'></div>衔冤遽往。吞恨孤居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375624_comment'></div>目断而不见长安。形留而远托异国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375624_comment'></div>屈平忠而获罪。贾谊寿之不长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375624_comment'></div>才易炎凉。遂分今昔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375624_comment'></div>粤自东蜀。言旋上京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375624_comment'></div>郭泰墓边。空多会葬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375624_comment'></div>邓攸身后。不见遗孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375624_comment'></div>信阴骘之莫知。亦生人之极痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375624_comment'></div>某等顷同班列。获奉周旋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375624_comment'></div>分结死生。地兼族类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375624_comment'></div>依仁既切。慕德方深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375624_comment'></div>始惊南浦之悲。俄轸下泉之讣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375624_comment'></div>今则年良月吉。筮协龟从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375624_comment'></div>顾埋玉之难追。叹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_1375624", 1375624, "Clauses/85/Comments/0")'>焚芝</span>之何及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375624_comment'></div>牲牢粗洁。酒醴非多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375624_comment'></div>聊写丹忱。以伸永诀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375624_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1375624_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>返回长安，病中早访招国李十将军遇挈家游曲江。<div id='poem_28709' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28709' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/28709?labeling=true' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_29108", 29108, "Clauses/0/Comments/0")'>蛇年</span>建午月，我自梁还秦。<div id='poem_sentence_0_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_29108'>草木半舒坼，不类冰雪晨。<div id='poem_sentence_2_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_29108'>又若夏苦热，<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_4_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_29108'>农具弃道旁，饥牛死空墩。<div id='poem_sentence_5_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_29108'>依依过村落，十室无一存。<div id='poem_sentence_6_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_29108'>存者皆面啼，无衣可迎宾。<div id='poem_sentence_7_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_29108'>始若畏人问，及门还具陈。<div id='poem_sentence_8_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_29108'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_29108", 29108, "Clauses/18/Comments/0")'>右辅</span>田畴薄，斯民常苦贫。<div id='poem_sentence_9_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_29108'>伊昔称乐土，所赖牧伯仁。<div id='poem_sentence_10_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_29108'>浊酒盈<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_29108", 29108, id='poem_sentence_15_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_29108'>例以贤牧伯，徵人司陶钧。<div id='poem_sentence_16_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_29108'>因令猛毅辈，杂牧升平民。<div id='poem_sentence_19_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_98_29108", 29108, "Clauses/196/Comments/1")'>使<span class='inlineComment2'>（一云史）</span>典</span>作尚书，厮养为将军。<div id='poem_sentence_98_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_99_29108'>慎勿道此言，此言未忍闻。<div id='poem_sentence_99_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_100_29108'></div><div id='poem_sentence_100_29108_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_29108'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(29108)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年12月</a>　返回长安，为令狐博士绪补阙绹谢宣祭表。<div id='poem_1375281' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375281' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375281?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为令狐博士绪补阙绹谢宣祭表</a><span class='authorDate'>（837年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375281")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375281_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375281'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375281'>草土臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375281_comment'></div>今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375281_comment'></div>中使某至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375281_comment'></div>奉宣恩旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375281_comment'></div>致祭臣亡父赠司空臣某者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375281_comment'></div>存没愿终。<div id='poem_sentence_30_1375336_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=840&endYear=840')">840年</a>　移家长安。作品：为濮阳公上淮南李相公状一。为濮阳公与蕲州李郎中状。为侍郎汝南公华州谢加階状。为濮阳公祭太常崔丞文。为弘农公上虢州后上中书状。为弘农公虢州上后上三相公状。上华州周侍郎状。酬别令狐补阙。送千牛李将军赴阙五十韵。为濮阳公上淮南李相公状二。为濮阳公上淮南李相公状三。与陶进士书。上河阳李大夫状一。上河阳李大夫状二。上李尚书状。献舍人河东公启。献华州周大夫十三丈启。为濮阳公陈许奏韩琮等四人充判官状。为濮阳公许州请判官上中书状。为濮阳公上宾客李相公状一。为濮阳公陈许谢上表。为濮阳公陈许举人自代状。为濮阳公上宾客李相公状二。为司徒濮阳公祭忠武都押衙张士隐文。为濮阳公陈许补王琛衙前兵马使牒。为濮阳公补卢处恭牒。为濮阳公补仇坦牒。为濮阳公补顾思言牒。为濮阳公上四相贺正启。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1375620_comment'></div>玉将攻而遽毁。闻问之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375620_comment'></div>叹悼何已。惟我承乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375620_comment'></div>受命南征。一言相许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375620_comment'></div>携手同行。夐绝万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375620_comment'></div>飘泊双旌。念两婢之价倍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375620_comment'></div>愧五羖之酬轻。地接殊邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375620_comment'></div>风移中土。五岭三江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375620_comment'></div>炎风瘴雨。钓犀之潭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375620_comment'></div>跕鸢之渚。席上从容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375620_comment'></div>幕中宴语。先防载苡之谤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375620_comment'></div>更示投香之所。因使庸虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375620_comment'></div>不罹罪罟。越井之酋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375620_comment'></div>甘绥之女。时清则铜镝纳厨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375620_comment'></div>岁稔则银簪叩鼓。岂我之自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375620_comment'></div>惟子是与。相从来觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375620_comment'></div>又往于泾。风埃古戍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375620_comment'></div>霜雪孤亭。偏裻之服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375620_comment'></div>缦胡之缨。塞迥而晨严刁斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375620_comment'></div>沙平而夜警兜零。指吾以虏隙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375620_comment'></div>勉吾以武经。正慰穷边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375620_comment'></div>俄还京邑。北庭减价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375620_comment'></div>南辕雪泣。章台辟掾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375620_comment'></div>方喜赵嘉之来。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1375620", 1375620, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>棘署</span>选丞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375620_comment'></div>仍见谯元之入。是焉践历。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375620_comment'></div>更俟飞翻。况乎凤沼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375620_comment'></div>又接鸰原。何衅成乎燥湿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375620_comment'></div>而厉结乎寒暄。未及西山之药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375620_comment'></div>旋为东岳之魂。忆昔旧许员归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375620_comment'></div>青门出饯。乐作而叹起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375620_comment'></div>杯行而泪泫。但容与于风波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375620_comment'></div>共沈吟于钟箭。挥袂如昨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375620_comment'></div>邮书甚频。虽遥道里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375620_comment'></div>未阔声尘。孰谓念归之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375620_comment'></div>翻为有恸之晨。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375620_comment'></div>髣髴荒阡。依稀古陌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375620_comment'></div>徐动丹旐。永归元宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375620_comment'></div>愿执绋而身远。想移舟而莫及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375620_comment'></div>迥夜秋思。群山暮色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375620_comment'></div>恨白发之衰翁。哭青云之旧客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375620_comment'></div>聊兹寄奠。莫写西悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375620_comment'></div>巳乎崔子。为吾歆之。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375394?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为宏农公上虢州后上中书状</a><span class='authorDate'>（840年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375394")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375394_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375394'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375394'>右。某伏奉某日制书出守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375394_comment'></div>以某日到任上讫。伏以境临东雍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375394_comment'></div>地带上阳。为匪沃饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375394_comment'></div>外繁传置。遘骄阳积潦之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375394_comment'></div>困苗螟叶蠈之灾。将活齐人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375394_comment'></div>在择良牧。某因缘儒术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375394_comment'></div>尘污郡符。皆由相公假以羽毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375394_comment'></div>饰之丹雘。隼飞旟上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375394_comment'></div>惧失于颁条。熊伏轼前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375394_comment'></div>恐乖于求瘼。唯当夙宵罔懈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375394_comment'></div>深薄为虞。冀劳来而有成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375394_comment'></div>庶疲羸而获泰。下情无任云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375394_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1375394_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375395' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375395' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_1_1375395_comment'></div>邹衍文辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375395_comment'></div>敢逃怪忤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375395_comment'></div>扬雄铅椠。<div id='poem_sentence_12_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_29065'>何时绝刁斗，不夜见欃枪。<div id='poem_sentence_13_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence'
