class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_29065'>世情休念乱，物议笑轻生。<div id='poem_sentence_15_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_29065'>大卤思龙跃，苍梧失象耕。<div id='poem_sentence_16_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_29065'>灵衣沾<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_29065", 29065, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>愧汗</span>，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_29065", 29065, "Clauses/35/Comments/0")'>仪马</span>困阴兵。<div id='poem_sentence_17_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_29065'>别馆兰薰酷，深宫蜡燄明。<div id='poem_sentence_18_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_29065'>黄山遮舞态，黑水断歌声。<div id='poem_sentence_19_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_29065'>纵未移周鼎，何辞免<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1345, "poem_sentence_20_29065")'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_29065", 29065, "Clauses/41/Comments/1")'>赵坑</span></span>。<div id='poem_sentence_20_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_29065'>空拳<span class='inlineComment2'>（当作弮）</span>转斗地，数板不沈城。<div id='poem_sentence_21_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_29065'>且欲凭神算，无因计力争。<div id='poem_sentence_22_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_29065'>幽囚<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(257, "poem_sentence_23_29065")'>苏武节</span>，弃市<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10745, "poem_sentence_23_29065")'>仲由缨</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_23_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_29065'>下殿言终验，增埤事早萌<span class='inlineComment2'>（原注：先时桑道茂请修奉天城）</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_24_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_29065'><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10594, "poem_sentence_25_29065")'>蒸鸡</span>殊减膳，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9308, "poem_sentence_25_29065")'>屑曲</span>异和羹。<div id='poem_sentence_25_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_29065'>否极时还泰，屯馀运果亨。<div id='poem_sentence_26_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_29065'>流离几南渡，仓卒得西平。<div id='poem_sentence_27_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_29065'>神鬼收昏黑，奸凶首<span class='inlineComment2'>（去声）</span>满盈。<div id='poem_sentence_28_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_29065'>官非督护贵，师以丈人贞。<div id='poem_sentence_29_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_29065'>覆载还高下，寒暄急<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_29065", 29065, "Clauses/61/Comments/0")'>改更</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_30_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_29065'>马前烹莽卓，坛上揖韩彭。<div id='poem_sentence_31_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_29065'>扈跸三才正，回军六合晴。<div id='poem_sentence_32_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_29065'>此时惟短剑，仍世尽双旌。<div id='poem_sentence_33_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_29065'>顾我由群从，逢君叹老成。<div id='poem_sentence_34_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_29065'>庆流归嫡长，贻厥在名卿。<div id='poem_sentence_35_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_29065'>隼击须当要，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(11, "poem_sentence_36_29065")'>鹏抟</span>莫问程。<div id='poem_sentence_36_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_37_29065'>趋朝排玉座，出位泣金茎。<div id='poem_sentence_37_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_38_29065'>幸藉梁园赋，叨蒙<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(2169, "poem_sentence_38_29065")'>许氏评</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_38_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_39_29065'>中郎推贵婿，<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(438, "poem_sentence_39_29065")'>定远</span>重时英。<div id='poem_sentence_39_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_40_29065'>政已标三尚，人今伫一鸣。<div id='poem_sentence_40_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_41_29065'>长刀悬月魄，快马骇星精。<div id='poem_sentence_41_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_42_29065'>披豁惭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_42_29065", 29065, "Clauses/84/Comments/0")'>深眷</span>，暌离动素诚。<div id='poem_sentence_42_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_43_29065'>蕙留春晼晚，松待岁峥嵘。<div id='poem_sentence_43_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_44_29065'>异县期回雁，登时已饭鲭。<div id='poem_sentence_44_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_45_29065'>去程风刺刺，别夜漏丁丁。<div id='poem_sentence_45_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_46_29065'>庾信生多感，杨朱死有情。<div id='poem_sentence_46_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_47_29065'>弦危中妇瑟，甲冷想夫筝。<div id='poem_sentence_47_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_48_29065'>会与<span class='inlineComment2'>（去声）</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1565, "poem_sentence_48_29065")'>秦楼</span>凤，俱听汉苑莺。<div id='poem_sentence_48_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_49_29065'>洛川迷曲沼，烟月两心倾。<div id='poem_sentence_49_29065_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_50_29065'></div><div id='poem_sentence_50_29065_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375448' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375448' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375448?labeling=true' target='_blank'>与陶进士书</a><span class='authorDate'>（840年9月3日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375448")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375448_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375448'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375448'>去一月多故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375448_comment'></div>不常在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375448_comment'></div>故屡辱吾子之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375448_comment'></div>皆不睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375448_comment'></div>昨又垂示东冈记等数篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375448_comment'></div>不惟其辞彩奥大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375448_comment'></div>不宜为冗慢无势者所窥见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375448_comment'></div>且又厚纸谨字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375448_comment'></div>如贡大诸侯卿士及前达有文章积学者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375448_comment'></div>何其礼甚厚而所与之甚下耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375448_comment'></div>始仆小时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375448_comment'></div>得刘氏六说读之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375448_comment'></div>尝得其语曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375448_comment'></div>是非系于褒贬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375448_comment'></div>不系于赏罚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375448_comment'></div>礼乐系于有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375448_comment'></div>不系于有司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375448_comment'></div>密记之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375448_comment'></div>盖尝于春秋法度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375448_comment'></div>圣人纲纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375448_comment'></div>久羡怀藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375448_comment'></div>不敢薄贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375448_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1375448", 1375448, "Clauses/22/Comments/0")'>联缀</span>比次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375448_comment'></div>手书口咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375448_comment'></div>非惟求以为已而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375448_comment'></div>亦祈以为后来随行者之所师禀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375448_comment'></div>已而被乡曲所荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375448_comment'></div>入来京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375448_comment'></div>久亦思前辈达者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375448_comment'></div>固已有是人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375448_comment'></div>有则吾将依之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375448_comment'></div>系鞋出门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375448_comment'></div>寂寞往返其间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375448_comment'></div>数年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375448_comment'></div>卒无所得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375448_comment'></div>私怪之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375448_comment'></div>而比有相亲者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375448_comment'></div>子之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375448_comment'></div>宜贡于某氏某氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375448_comment'></div>可以为子之依归矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375448_comment'></div>即走往贡之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375448_comment'></div>出其书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375448_comment'></div>乃复有置之而不暇读者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375448_comment'></div>又有默而视之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375448_comment'></div>不暇<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_44_1375448", 1375448, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>朗读</span>者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375448_comment'></div>又有始<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_45_1375448", 1375448, "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>朗读</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375448_comment'></div>而终有失字坏句不见本义者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375448_comment'></div>进不敢问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375448_comment'></div>退不能解。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375448_comment'></div>默默已已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375448_comment'></div>不复咨叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375448_comment'></div>故自大和七年后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375448_comment'></div>虽尚应举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375448_comment'></div>除吉凶书及人凭倩作笺启铭表之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375448_comment'></div>不复作文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375448_comment'></div>文尚不复作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375448_comment'></div>况复能学人<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1375448", 1375448, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>行卷</span>耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375448_comment'></div>时独令狐补阙最相厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375448_comment'></div>岁岁为写出旧文纳贡院。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375448_comment'></div>既得引试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375448_comment'></div>会故人夏口主举人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375448_comment'></div>时素重令狐贤明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375448_comment'></div>一日见之于朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375448_comment'></div>揖曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375448_comment'></div>八郎之交谁最善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375448_comment'></div>绹直进曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375448_comment'></div>李商隐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375448_comment'></div>三道而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375448_comment'></div>亦不为荐托之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375448_comment'></div>故夏口与及第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375448_comment'></div>然此时实于文章懈退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375448_comment'></div>不复细意经营述作。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375448_comment'></div>乃命合为夏口门人之一数耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375448_comment'></div>尔后雨应科目者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375448_comment'></div>又以应举时与一裴生者善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375448_comment'></div>复与其挽泄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375448_comment'></div>不得巳而入耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375448_comment'></div>前年乃为吏部上之中书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375448_comment'></div>归自惊笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375448_comment'></div>又复懊恨周李二学士以大法加我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375448_comment'></div>夫所谓博学宏辞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375448_comment'></div>岂容易哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375448_comment'></div>天地之灾变尽解矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375448_comment'></div>人事之兴废尽究矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375448_comment'></div>皇王之道尽识矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375448_comment'></div>圣贤之文尽知矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375448_comment'></div>而又下及虫豸草木鬼神精魅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375448_comment'></div>一物巳上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375448_comment'></div>莫不开会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375448_comment'></div>此其可以当博学宏辞者邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375448_comment'></div>恐犹未也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375448_comment'></div>设他日或朝廷或持权衡大臣宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375448_comment'></div>问一事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375448_comment'></div>诘一物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375448_comment'></div>小若毛甲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375448_comment'></div>而时脱有尽不能知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375448_comment'></div>则号博学宏辞者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375448_comment'></div>当有罪矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375448_comment'></div>私自恐惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375448_comment'></div>忧若囚械。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375448_comment'></div>后幸有中书长者曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375448_comment'></div>此人不堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375448_comment'></div>抹去之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375448_comment'></div>乃大快乐曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375448_comment'></div>此后不能知东西左右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1375448_comment'></div>亦不畏矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1375448_comment'></div>去年入南场作判。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1375448_comment'></div>比于江淮选人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1375448_comment'></div>正得不忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1375448_comment'></div>长名放耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1375448_comment'></div>寻复启与曹主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1375448_comment'></div>求尉于虢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1375448_comment'></div>实以太夫人年高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1375448_comment'></div>乐近地有山水者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1375448_comment'></div>而又其家穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1375448_comment'></div>弟妹细累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1375448_comment'></div>喜得贱薪菜处相养活耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1375448_comment'></div>始至官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1375448_comment'></div>以活狱不合人意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1375448_comment'></div>辄退去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1375448_comment'></div>将遂脱衣置笏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1375448_comment'></div>永夷农牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1375448_comment'></div>会今太守怜之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1375448_comment'></div>催去复任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1375448_comment'></div>径使不为升斗汲汲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1375448_comment'></div>疲瘁低傫耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1375448_comment'></div>然至于文字章句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1375448_comment'></div>愈帖息不敢惊张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1375448_comment'></div>尝自咒愿得时人曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1375448_comment'></div>此物不识字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1375448_comment'></div>此物不知书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1375448_comment'></div>是吾生获忠肃之谥也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1375448_comment'></div>而吾子反殷勤如此者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1375448_comment'></div>岂不知耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1375448_comment'></div>岂有意耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1375448_comment'></div>不知则可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1375448_comment'></div>有意则巳虚矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1375448_comment'></div>然所以拳拳而不能忘者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1375448_comment'></div>正以往年爱华山之为山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1375448_comment'></div>而有三得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1375448_comment'></div>始得其卑者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1375448_comment'></div>朝高者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1375448_comment'></div>复得其揭然无附著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1375448_comment'></div>而又得其近而能远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1375448_comment'></div>思欲穷搜极讨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1375448_comment'></div>洒豁襟抱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1375448_comment'></div>始以往来番番。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1375448_comment'></div>不遂其愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1375448_comment'></div>间者得李生于华邮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1375448_comment'></div>为我指引岩谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1375448_comment'></div>列视生植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1375448_comment'></div>仅得其半。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1375448_comment'></div>又得谢生于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_152_1375448", 1375448, "Clauses/152/Comments/0")'>云台观</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1375448_comment'></div>暮留止宿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1375448_comment'></div>旦相与去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1375448_comment'></div>愈复记熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1375448_comment'></div>后又复得吾子于邑中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1375448_comment'></div>至其所不至者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1375448_comment'></div>于华之山无恨矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1375448_comment'></div>三人力耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1375448_comment'></div>今李生巳得第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1375448_comment'></div>而又为老贵人从事云台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1375448_comment'></div>生亦显然有闻于诸公间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1375448_comment'></div>吾子之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1375448_comment'></div>粲然成就如是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1375448_comment'></div>我不负华之山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1375448_comment'></div>而华之山亦将不负吾子之三人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1375448_comment'></div>以是思得聚会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1375448_comment'></div>话既往探历之胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1375448_comment'></div>至于切磋善恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1375448_comment'></div>分擘进趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1375448_comment'></div>仆此世固不待学奴婢下人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1375448_comment'></div>指誓神佛而后巳耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1375448_comment'></div>吾子何所用意耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1375448_comment'></div>明日东去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1375448_comment'></div>既不得面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1375448_comment'></div>寓书惘惘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1375448_comment'></div>九月三日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1375448_comment'></div>宏农尉李某顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_178_1375448_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375421' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375421' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375421?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上河阳李大夫状</a><span class='authorDate'>（840年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375421")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375421_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375421'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375421'>不审自拜违后尊体何如。二十五翁尚书挺生公族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375421_comment'></div>作范儒流。践履道义之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375421_comment'></div>优游名教之乐。伏计颐卫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375421_comment'></div>无爽康宁。此盖人所祷祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375421_comment'></div>神保正直。下情伏增忭贺之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375421_comment'></div>富平重镇。成皋巨防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375421_comment'></div>自顷太守非魏尚之才。司马失穰苴之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375421_comment'></div>坐隳戎律。乾没军租。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375421_comment'></div>谁谓殷若长城。翻见尽为敌国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375421_comment'></div>二十五翁允膺宸眷。出总藩条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375421_comment'></div>心作灵台。潜运黄公之略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375421_comment'></div>手为天马。暗开元女之符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375421_comment'></div>单车以驰。杖节而入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375421_comment'></div>尽羁骇兽。先殪捷猿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375421_comment'></div>然后苏彼疲羸。惠此鳏寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375421_comment'></div>免飞刍挽粟之弊。除横征擅赋之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375421_comment'></div>昨者故侯。实有逆子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375421_comment'></div>敢因微策。密有他图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375421_comment'></div>人得而诛。天夺之魄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375421_comment'></div>尽穷馀党。半在中权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375421_comment'></div>此际诚合绝洹水之波。腥长平之草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375421_comment'></div>二十五翁曲分兰艾。大别淄渑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375421_comment'></div>飞魂不冤。枯骨犹愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375421_comment'></div>此真所谓仁者之勇无敌。丈人之师以贞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375421_comment'></div>名冠百城。功高一代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375421_comment'></div>而又梁园竹苑。素多词赋之宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375421_comment'></div>淮浦桂丛。广集神仙之客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375421_comment'></div>以思柔之旨酒。用顺气之和声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375421_comment'></div>初筵有仪。一石不乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375421_comment'></div>某才非掷地。辩乏谈天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375421_comment'></div>著撰不工。王隐文宁逮意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375421_comment'></div>懒慢相会。嵇康志有所安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375421_comment'></div>而早预宗盟。又连姻媾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375421_comment'></div>曲蒙赏会。略过辈流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375421_comment'></div>况拔自州人。升为座客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375421_comment'></div>将何以咏歌盛德。祗奉深恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375421_comment'></div>腼冒不容。顾瞻自失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375421_comment'></div>伏以仍世羁宦。厥家屡迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375421_comment'></div>占数为民。莫寻乔木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375421_comment'></div>画宫受吊。曾乏毙庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375421_comment'></div>近以亲族相依。友朋见处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375421_comment'></div>卜邻上国。移贯长安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375421_comment'></div>始议聚粮。俄沾厚赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375421_comment'></div>衣裾轻楚。疋帛珍华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375421_comment'></div>负荷不胜。推让何及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375421_comment'></div>虽娄公说汉。不问乎褐衣帛衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375421_comment'></div>而孔子观周。亦资于一车二竖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375421_comment'></div>策微往哲。事过前修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375421_comment'></div>倘非因不失亲。爱忘其丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375421_comment'></div>退惟蹇薄。安所克堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375421_comment'></div>白露初凝。朱门渐远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375421_comment'></div>西园公子恨轩盖之难攀。东道主人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375421_comment'></div>仰馆谷而犹在。丹霄不泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375421_comment'></div>白首知归。伏惟终始怜察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375421_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1375421_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375412' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375412' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375412?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上李尚书状</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375412'>昨者伏蒙恩造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375412_comment'></div>重有沾赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375412_comment'></div>兼假长行人乘等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375412_comment'></div>以今月十日到上都讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375412_comment'></div>既获安居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375412_comment'></div>便从常调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375412_comment'></div>成兹志愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375412_comment'></div>皆自知怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375412_comment'></div>伏以无褐无车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375412_comment'></div>古人屡有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375412_comment'></div>馈飧受馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375412_comment'></div>诸侯不常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375412_comment'></div>皆才可持危扶颠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375412_comment'></div>辩或离坚合异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375412_comment'></div>尚有历七十国而不遇其主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375412_comment'></div>旷五百岁而方希一贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375412_comment'></div>道之难行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375412_comment'></div>运不常会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375412_comment'></div>苟至于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375412_comment'></div>知如之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375412_comment'></div>某始在弱龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375412_comment'></div>志惟绝俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375412_comment'></div>每北窗风至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375412_comment'></div>东皋暮归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375412_comment'></div>彭泽无弦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375412_comment'></div>不从繁手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375412_comment'></div>汉阴抱瓮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375412_comment'></div>宁取机心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375412_comment'></div>岩桂长寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375412_comment'></div>岭云镇在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375412_comment'></div>誓将适此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375412_comment'></div>实欲终焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375412_comment'></div>其后以婚嫁相萦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375412_comment'></div>弟兄未立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375412_comment'></div>阳货有迷邦之诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375412_comment'></div>王华生处世之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375412_comment'></div>靡顾移文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375412_comment'></div>言从初服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375412_comment'></div>幸李公之阍者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375412_comment'></div>不拒孔融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375412_comment'></div>读蔡氏之家书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375412_comment'></div>未归王粲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375412_comment'></div>粗闻六蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375412_comment'></div>聊玩九流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375412_comment'></div>行与时违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375412_comment'></div>言将俗背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375412_comment'></div>方朔虽彊于自举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375412_comment'></div>匡衡竟中于丙科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375412_comment'></div>驾鼓未休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375412_comment'></div>抢榆而止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375412_comment'></div>然窃观古昔之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375412_comment'></div>遐听上下之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375412_comment'></div>有合自一言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375412_comment'></div>奖因片善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375412_comment'></div>不以齿序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375412_comment'></div>不以位骄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375412_comment'></div>想见其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375412_comment'></div>可与为友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375412_comment'></div>近古以降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375412_comment'></div>斯风顿微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375412_comment'></div>处贵有隔品之严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375412_comment'></div>于道绝忘形之契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375412_comment'></div>中间柳澹年犹乳抱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375412_comment'></div>李北海因与结交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375412_comment'></div>裴逖迹困泥涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375412_comment'></div>王右丞常所前席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375412_comment'></div>时之不可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375412_comment'></div>人以为悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375412_comment'></div>愚虽甚微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375412_comment'></div>颇向斯义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375412_comment'></div>自顷升名贡籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375412_comment'></div>厕足人流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375412_comment'></div>未尝辄慕权豪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375412_comment'></div>切求绍介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375412_comment'></div>用胁肩謟笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375412_comment'></div>以竞媚取容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375412_comment'></div>袁生之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375412_comment'></div>但闻有雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375412_comment'></div>墨子之突。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375412_comment'></div>曾是无烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375412_comment'></div>每虞三揖之轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375412_comment'></div>略以千钧自重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375412_comment'></div>閤下念先市骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375412_comment'></div>志在采葑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375412_comment'></div>引以从游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375412_comment'></div>寄之风兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375412_comment'></div>玳筵高敞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375412_comment'></div>画舸徐牵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375412_comment'></div>分越加笾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375412_comment'></div>事殊设醴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375412_comment'></div>怜贾生之少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375412_comment'></div>恕祢衡之狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375412_comment'></div>此际举觞而恨异漏卮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375412_comment'></div>对案而惭非巨壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375412_comment'></div>谢家东土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375412_comment'></div>延宾而别待车公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375412_comment'></div>王令临邛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375412_comment'></div>为客而先言犬子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375412_comment'></div>彼之荣重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375412_comment'></div>殊谓寂寥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375412_comment'></div>伏闻声尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375412_comment'></div>已移弦晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375412_comment'></div>隋王朱邸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375412_comment'></div>方同故掾之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375412_comment'></div>燕地黄金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1375412_comment'></div>更落他人之手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1375412_comment'></div>追攀未及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1375412_comment'></div>结恋无任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1375412_comment'></div>瞻望门墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1375412_comment'></div>若在霄汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1375412_comment'></div>伏惟始终识察。</div><div id='poem_sentence_110_1375412_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375522' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375522' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375522?labeling=true' target='_blank'>献舍人河东公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（840年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375522")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375522_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375522'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375522'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375522_comment'></div>前月十日辄以旧文一轴上献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375522_comment'></div>即日补阙令狐子直至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375522_comment'></div>伏知猥赐披阅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375522_comment'></div>今日重于令狐君处伏奉二十三日荣示。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375522_comment'></div>特迂尊严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375522_comment'></div>曲加褒饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375522_comment'></div>捧缄伸纸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375522_comment'></div>终惭且惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375522_comment'></div>某本乏英华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375522_comment'></div>且无声采。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375522_comment'></div>虽成书有托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375522_comment'></div>而为裘未工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375522_comment'></div>重以迫于世资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375522_comment'></div>窘此家素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375522_comment'></div>管宁木榻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375522_comment'></div>坐巳膝穿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375522_comment'></div>孔伋缊袍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375522_comment'></div>行而肘见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375522_comment'></div>然犹开卷独得。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375522_comment'></div>悬头自强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375522_comment'></div>韦编铁挝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375522_comment'></div>屡闻断折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375522_comment'></div>亡书坠册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375522_comment'></div>粗识篇题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375522_comment'></div>而投足多难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375522_comment'></div>写诚无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375522_comment'></div>举非高第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375522_comment'></div>仕怯上农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375522_comment'></div>虞寄为官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375522_comment'></div>何尝满秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375522_comment'></div>王华处世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375522_comment'></div>宁愿异人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375522_comment'></div>况在下寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375522_comment'></div>独无谁语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375522_comment'></div>一至于此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375522_comment'></div>欲罢不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375522_comment'></div>每念大汉之兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375522_comment'></div>好文为最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375522_comment'></div>悦洞箫之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375522_comment'></div>则讽在后庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375522_comment'></div>美子虚之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375522_comment'></div>则恨不同世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375522_comment'></div>然犹扬雄以草元见诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375522_comment'></div>马卿亦用赀为郎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375522_comment'></div>何宾实之纷纶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375522_comment'></div>而名义之乖爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375522_comment'></div>况乎志异数子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375522_comment'></div>事非当时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375522_comment'></div>司寇栖栖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375522_comment'></div>反叹为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375522_comment'></div>啬夫喋喋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375522_comment'></div>谁为非贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375522_comment'></div>又安可坐荣于寒谷之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375522_comment'></div>自致于刚气之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375522_comment'></div>矧灰籥难驻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375522_comment'></div>圭管无停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375522_comment'></div>若使蜀臣之九考不移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375522_comment'></div>汉郎之三朝莫过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375522_comment'></div>人嘲染鬓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375522_comment'></div>带愤减围。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375522_comment'></div>即葛洪命迍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375522_comment'></div>永处跛驴之伍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375522_comment'></div>田光精竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375522_comment'></div>必为驽马所先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375522_comment'></div>伊秀锐之既衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375522_comment'></div>亦铓㯋之都尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375522_comment'></div>方今外无战伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375522_comment'></div>内富英贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375522_comment'></div>閤下文为世师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375522_comment'></div>行为人范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375522_comment'></div>廓至公之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375522_comment'></div>优接下之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375522_comment'></div>是愿窃望门闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375522_comment'></div>仰干阍侍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375522_comment'></div>果蒙旌异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375522_comment'></div>特损缄题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375522_comment'></div>夫收掌上之妍者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375522_comment'></div>在假之长袖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375522_comment'></div>骋枥中之骏者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375522_comment'></div>必资于坦涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375522_comment'></div>然后可求其宛转之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375522_comment'></div>责其灭没之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375522_comment'></div>是当延望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375522_comment'></div>实在深诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375522_comment'></div>倘蒙一使御车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375522_comment'></div>与之下座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375522_comment'></div>虽不足丹青时辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375522_comment'></div>领袖诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375522_comment'></div>冀获预于游谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375522_comment'></div>庶少贤于博奕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375522_comment'></div>伏惟念录。<div class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375519?labeling=true' target='_blank'>献华州周大夫十三丈启</a><span class='authorDate'>（840年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375519")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375519_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375519'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375519'>大夫以南阳惠化。为东雍先声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375519_comment'></div>旬日之来。讴歌巳洽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375519_comment'></div>今者北诛杂虏。西却诸戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375519_comment'></div>莲岳分忧。虽期于河润。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375519_comment'></div>云台伫议。终动于天慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375519_comment'></div>伏料即时。必降徵诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375519_comment'></div>某方从羁宦。遽远深恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375519_comment'></div>昔日及门。预三千之弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375519_comment'></div>今晨即路。隔百二之关河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375519_comment'></div>瞻望清光。不任攀结。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375333'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375333'>韩琮段环裴蘧夏侯曈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375333_comment'></div>右件官等或断金旧友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375333_comment'></div>或倾盖新知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375333_comment'></div>既有藉于宾荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375333_comment'></div>敢自轻于主择。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375333_comment'></div>辄以具状奏请讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375333_comment'></div>伏乞相公曲赞殊恩。<div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375269'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375269_comment'></div>臣伏奉去月八日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375269_comment'></div>授臣前件官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375269_comment'></div>臣即以某月日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375269_comment'></div>当时集军州官吏僧道耆老等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375269_comment'></div>揄扬王化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375269_comment'></div>宣布<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1375269", 1375269, "Clauses/6/Comments/0")'>睿慈</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375269_comment'></div>连营咸鼓于巽风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375269_comment'></div>阖境均沾于兑泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375269_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375269_comment'></div>臣才谢汉飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375269_comment'></div>义惭燕使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375269_comment'></div>献书求试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375269_comment'></div>学剑邀勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375269_comment'></div>大舸千艘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375269_comment'></div>早窃楼船之任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375269_comment'></div>胜兵万数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375269_comment'></div>晚兼车骑之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375269_comment'></div>虽任在启行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375269_comment'></div>而时当柔远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375269_comment'></div>珠崖铜柱。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1375269_comment'></div>莫能恢复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375269_comment'></div>旋属皇帝陛下荆枝协庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375269_comment'></div>棣萼传辉。<div id='poem_sentence_27_1375269_comment'></div>兰台假号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375269_comment'></div>署参荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375269_comment'></div>奉汉后之园陵。<div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375267'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375267'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375267_comment'></div>臣得本州进奏院状报。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375267_comment'></div>公羊纪时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375267_comment'></div>春者为一岁之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375267_comment'></div>载稽故实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375267_comment'></div>抑有典章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375267_comment'></div>近岁以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375267_comment'></div>此礼多阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375267_comment'></div>或事因惜费。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375267_comment'></div>或时属告休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375267_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下道被无垠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375267_comment'></div>政敷有截。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375267_comment'></div>全取发生之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375267_comment'></div>无非䜣合之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375267_comment'></div>苍昊降符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375267_comment'></div>黄舆告瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375267_comment'></div>石碑既见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375267_comment'></div>文作太平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375267_comment'></div>银瓮旋臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375267_comment'></div>字成万岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375267_comment'></div>而又忧勤不辍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375267_comment'></div>刻责方深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375267_comment'></div>精诚旁达于八纮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375267_comment'></div>恳恻上通于九庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375267_comment'></div>仙厨撤味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375267_comment'></div>兽馆休畋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375267_comment'></div>遂使化妖宿为寿星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375267_comment'></div>变小饥为酺饮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375267_comment'></div>庆由圣感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375267_comment'></div>令属神行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375267_comment'></div>爰在新正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375267_comment'></div>式修阙典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375267_comment'></div>彤庭列位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375267_comment'></div>丹陛陈仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375267_comment'></div>凝旒而天启其门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375267_comment'></div>服衮而日升于观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375267_comment'></div>巽风发越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375267_comment'></div>解泽滂沱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375267_comment'></div>左右贤臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375267_comment'></div>骏奔多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375267_comment'></div>国无谀佞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375267_comment'></div>擢灵草而不摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375267_comment'></div>朝绝奸邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375267_comment'></div>俨神羊而莫动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375267_comment'></div>礼成而退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375267_comment'></div>物有其容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375267_comment'></div>足以光耀瑶图。<div id='poem_sentence_56_1375267_comment'></div>迈五登三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375267_comment'></div>臣窃访硕儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375267_comment'></div>远徵旧典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375267_comment'></div>帝尧华封之祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375267_comment'></div>惟止匹夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375267_comment'></div>神禹涂山之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375267_comment'></div>且非元会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375267_comment'></div>然犹尧有多忧之戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375267_comment'></div>禹存后至之诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375267_comment'></div>在和平而尚乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375267_comment'></div>孰欢呼之可致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375267_comment'></div>岂与兹日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375267_comment'></div>而得同年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375267_comment'></div>臣方守河潼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375267_comment'></div>正分符竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375267_comment'></div>不获躬承玉帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375267_comment'></div>首率梯航。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375267_comment'></div>况又尝以艺文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375267_comment'></div>叨居禁密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375267_comment'></div>虽远离天上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375267_comment'></div>犹近关西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375267_comment'></div>忭贺空深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375267_comment'></div>就望无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375267_comment'></div>心驰紫闼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375267_comment'></div>非梦寐而不通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375267_comment'></div>魂绕皇闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375267_comment'></div>羡归飞而莫及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375267_comment'></div>无任荷恩祝寿恋阙屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_84_1375267_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_29026' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_29026' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/29026?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠子直花下<span class='inlineComment2'>（令狐绹字子直）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_29026")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_29026_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_29026'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_29026'>池光忽隐墙，花气乱侵房。<div id='poem_sentence_0_29026_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_29026'>屏缘蝶留粉，窗油蜂印黄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_29026_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_29026'>官书推小吏，侍史从清郎。<div id='poem_sentence_2_29026_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_29026'>并马更吟去，寻思有底忙。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375293' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375293?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为汝南公贺元日朝会上中书状</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年4月24日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375293")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375293_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375293'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375293'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375293_comment'></div>得本道进奏院状报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375293_comment'></div>今月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375293_comment'></div>皇帝御宣政殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375293_comment'></div>受册尊号为仁圣文武至神大孝皇帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375293_comment'></div>礼毕御丹凤楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375293_comment'></div>大赦天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375293_comment'></div>当时集军州官吏等丁宁宣示讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375293_comment'></div>鸿名有赫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375293_comment'></div>庆泽无偏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375293_comment'></div>上光宗庙之明灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375293_comment'></div>下慰蒸黎之钦属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375293_comment'></div>功劳必表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375293_comment'></div>逋负咸蠲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375293_comment'></div>出缧系于狴牢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375293_comment'></div>复流窜于魑魅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375293_comment'></div>抚安鳏寡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375293_comment'></div>存省耄期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375293_comment'></div>有国之阙政咸修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375293_comment'></div>前代之遗文必举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375293_comment'></div>此皆相公富皋夔之事业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375293_comment'></div>秉伊说之材谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375293_comment'></div>协赞神功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375293_comment'></div>导宣睿化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375293_comment'></div>符瑞沓至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375293_comment'></div>天人允咸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375293_comment'></div>庆云非烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375293_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1375293", 1375293, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>浪井</span>不凿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375293_comment'></div>然后率多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375293_comment'></div>陈大仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375293_comment'></div>致君于尧舜之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375293_comment'></div>驱俗于勋轩之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375293_comment'></div>四维仰化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375293_comment'></div>万国承流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375293_comment'></div>况某忝典州兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375293_comment'></div>尝闻庙算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375293_comment'></div>虽阻陪班列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375293_comment'></div>亦远接欢呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375293_comment'></div>凤阙双标。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375293_comment'></div>应开天上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375293_comment'></div>鸡竿百尺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375293_comment'></div>想在日边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375293_comment'></div>顾奋飞而不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375293_comment'></div>亦攀望而何及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375293_comment'></div>无任抃跃之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1375293_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375627' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375627' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375627?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为李郎中祭舅窦端州文</a><span class='authorDate'>（842年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375627")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375627_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375627'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375627'>始虞命夏。暴于元穹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375627_comment'></div>功垂刊木。德协堙洪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375627_comment'></div>洎帝相之难作。诞少康于窦中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375627_comment'></div>由屯获吉。因生受封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375627_comment'></div>降及后代。传勋继庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375627_comment'></div>西京则婴为外戚。东汉则融居上公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375627_comment'></div>悯阳城之不享。始移籍于扶风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375627_comment'></div>源远更清。基高自峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375627_comment'></div>有焯明灵。霭然休问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375627_comment'></div>陋巷不忧。坦途方进。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375627_comment'></div>月远标仪。霞高映论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375627_comment'></div>玉宁韫椟。锥安处囊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375627_comment'></div>宜伸尚屈。将集犹翔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375627_comment'></div>潜师大易。谦尊以光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375627_comment'></div>誓安老氏。债少易偿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375627_comment'></div>爰纡铜墨。是宰濠梁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375627_comment'></div>宓琴时奏。潘树逾芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375627_comment'></div>入赞朝仪。言扬事举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375627_comment'></div>圭璧蛮夷。弁冕文武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375627_comment'></div>吐辞含韵。知今博古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375627_comment'></div>进抑退扬。从规合矩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375627_comment'></div>复陶启位。殿省承荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375627_comment'></div>孔门之束带无忝。叔孙之绵蕝难更。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375627_comment'></div>君子信谗。小人道长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375627_comment'></div>未暇闭关。难期税鞅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375627_comment'></div>暂持竹符。远出罗网。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375627_comment'></div>谁识卑飞。因成利往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375627_comment'></div>铜梁改秩。锦里经时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375627_comment'></div>人去而琴台坏栋。文移而石室摧基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375627_comment'></div>刘宏之重铭葛庙。王商之更立严祠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375627_comment'></div>陇首云归。端溪遽逐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375627_comment'></div>角岂触藩。臀终困木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375627_comment'></div>海阔天尽。山深雾毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375627_comment'></div>许靖他乡。有名无禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375627_comment'></div>马超正色。宜歌反哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375627_comment'></div>何为善之无凭。而降灾之甚速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375627_comment'></div>某钦惟教义。夙所依因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375627_comment'></div>在昔家世。勤王实殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375627_comment'></div>高旌大旆。结驷飞轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375627_comment'></div>庆岂遗于自出。荣实萃于外姻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375627_comment'></div>一纪以来。艰凶遄及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375627_comment'></div>嗟宅相以无取。惧堂构之不集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375627_comment'></div>讵言渭水之乖离。竟绝西川之出入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375627_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。违京背阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375627_comment'></div>古陌荒阡。松门积霭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375627_comment'></div>陇首停烟。祖庭是日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375627_comment'></div>乞墅何年。泪有眦而皆裂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375627_comment'></div>愤无膺而可填。况玕剖郡符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375627_comment'></div>璟持使节。塞远城迥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375627_comment'></div>河穷路绝。顾后瞻前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375627_comment'></div>形孤影孑。长号出次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375627_comment'></div>重拜临穴。酒醴清浓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375627_comment'></div>肴羞罗列。庶有鉴于斯文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375627_comment'></div>冀不同于虚设。呜呼尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375627_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1375627_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年</a>　在京居母丧。作品：赠别前蔚州契芘使君。<div id='poem_29032' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_29032' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a class='inlineComment2'>（一作三）</span>世勤王国史称。<div id='poem_sentence_0_29032_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_29032'>夜捲牙旗千帐雪，朝飞羽骑<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_29032", 29032, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>一河</span>冰。<div id='poem_sentence_1_29032_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_29032'>蕃儿襁负来青冢，狄女壶浆出白登。<div id='poem_sentence_2_29032_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_29032'>日晚鸊鹈泉畔猎，路人遥识<span "Clauses/7/Comments/2")'>郅都鹰</span></span>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_29032_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_29032'></div><div class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年</a>　在京居母丧，诗作姑系于此年。作品：灞岸。<div id='poem_28781' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28781' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/28781?labeling=true' target='_blank'>灞岸</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span
