id='poem_title_28781_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_28781'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_28781'>山东今岁点行频，几处冤魂哭虏尘。<div id='poem_sentence_0_28781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_28781'>灞水桥边倚华表，平时二月有东巡。<div id='poem_sentence_1_28781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_28781'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_28781_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_28781'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(28781)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年</a>　在京居母丧。作品：为濮阳公与刘稹书。为马懿公郡夫人王氏黄箓斋第三文。行次昭应县道上送户部李郎中充昭义攻讨。赋得鸡。<div id='poem_1375565' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375565' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375565?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公檄刘稹文</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375565")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375565_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375565'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375565'>足下前以肺肝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375565_comment'></div>布诸简素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375565_comment'></div>仰承复命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375565_comment'></div>犹事<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1375565", 1375565, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>枝辞</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375565_comment'></div>夫岂告者之不忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375565_comment'></div>抑乃听之而未审。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375565_comment'></div>择福莫若重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375565_comment'></div>择祸莫若轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375565_comment'></div>一去不回者良时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375565_comment'></div>一失不复者机事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375565_comment'></div>噫嘻执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375565_comment'></div>谁与为谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375565_comment'></div>延首北风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375565_comment'></div>心焉如灼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375565_comment'></div>是以再陈祸福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375565_comment'></div>用释危疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375565_comment'></div>言不避烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375565_comment'></div>理在易了。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375565_comment'></div>丁宁恳款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375565_comment'></div>至于再三者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375565_comment'></div>诚以某与先太傅相国俱沐天光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375565_comment'></div>并为藩后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375565_comment'></div>昔云与国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375565_comment'></div>今则亲邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375565_comment'></div>而大年不登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375565_comment'></div>同盟未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375565_comment'></div>饭贝才毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375565_comment'></div>襚衣莫陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375565_comment'></div>乃眷后生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375565_comment'></div>遽乖先训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375565_comment'></div>迁延朝命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375565_comment'></div>迷失臣职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375565_comment'></div>不思先縠之忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375565_comment'></div>将覆栾书之族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375565_comment'></div>此仆隶之所共惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375565_comment'></div>儿女之所同悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375565_comment'></div>况某拥节临戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375565_comment'></div>援旗誓众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375565_comment'></div>封疆甚迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375565_comment'></div>音旨犹存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375565_comment'></div>忍欲卖之以为巳功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375565_comment'></div>间之以开戎役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375565_comment'></div>将祛未寤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375565_comment'></div>欲罢不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375565_comment'></div>愿思苦口之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375565_comment'></div>以定束身之计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375565_comment'></div>昔先太尉相公常蹈乱邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375565_comment'></div>不从逆命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375565_comment'></div>翻身归国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375565_comment'></div>全家受封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375565_comment'></div>居韩之西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375565_comment'></div>为国之屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375565_comment'></div>弃代之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375565_comment'></div>人情帖然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375565_comment'></div>太傅相公以早副军牙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375565_comment'></div>久从征旆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375565_comment'></div>事君之节巳著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375565_comment'></div>居丧之礼又彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375565_comment'></div>故乃奖其象贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375565_comment'></div>仍以旧服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375565_comment'></div>纳职贡赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375565_comment'></div>五十馀年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375565_comment'></div>于我唐为忠臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375565_comment'></div>于刘氏为孝子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375565_comment'></div>人之不幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375565_comment'></div>天亦难忱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375565_comment'></div>才加壮室之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375565_comment'></div>奄有坏梁之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375565_comment'></div>主上深固义烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375565_comment'></div>是降优恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375565_comment'></div>盖将显足下之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375565_comment'></div>为列藩之式。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375565_comment'></div>不欲刘氏有自立之帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375565_comment'></div>上党为辜恩之军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375565_comment'></div>俾之还朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375565_comment'></div>以听后命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375565_comment'></div>其义甚著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375565_comment'></div>其恩莫偕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375565_comment'></div>昨者秘不发丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375565_comment'></div>巳逾一月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375565_comment'></div>安而拒诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375565_comment'></div>又历数旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375565_comment'></div>秘丧则于孝子未闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375565_comment'></div>拒诏则于忠臣巳失。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375565_comment'></div>失忠于国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375565_comment'></div>失孝于家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375565_comment'></div>望此用人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375565_comment'></div>由兹保族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375565_comment'></div>是亦坐薪言泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375565_comment'></div>巢幕云安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375565_comment'></div>智士之所寒心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375565_comment'></div>谋夫之所齰舌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375565_comment'></div>矧于仆者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375565_comment'></div>得不动心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375565_comment'></div>窃计足下之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375565_comment'></div>执事之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375565_comment'></div>当以赵氏传子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375565_comment'></div>魏氏袭侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375565_comment'></div>欲以逡巡希恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375565_comment'></div>顾望谋立耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375565_comment'></div>夫事殊者趣异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375565_comment'></div>势别者迹暌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375565_comment'></div>故度其始而议其终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375565_comment'></div>搴其华而寻其实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375565_comment'></div>愿为足下一一而陈之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1375565_comment'></div>夫赵魏二侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1375565_comment'></div>于其先也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1375565_comment'></div>亲则父子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1375565_comment'></div>于其人也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1375565_comment'></div>职则副戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1375565_comment'></div>赏罚得以相参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1375565_comment'></div>恩威得以相抗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1375565_comment'></div>义显事顺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1375565_comment'></div>故朝廷推而与之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1375565_comment'></div>今足下之于太傅也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1375565_comment'></div>地则相近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1375565_comment'></div>职非副戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1375565_comment'></div>赏罚未尝相参。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1375565_comment'></div>恩威未尝相抗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1375565_comment'></div>秘丧则于义爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1375565_comment'></div>拒诏则于事乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1375565_comment'></div>比赵魏二侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1375565_comment'></div>信事殊而势别矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1375565_comment'></div>此施之于太傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1375565_comment'></div>赵魏则为继代象贤之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1375565_comment'></div>施之于足下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1375565_comment'></div>足下则为自立擅命之尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1375565_comment'></div>得失之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1375565_comment'></div>其理甚白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1375565_comment'></div>又计足下未必不恃太傅之好贤下士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1375565_comment'></div>重义轻财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1375565_comment'></div>吴国之钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1375565_comment'></div>往往而有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1375565_comment'></div>梁园之客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1375565_comment'></div>比比而来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1375565_comment'></div>将倚以为墙藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1375565_comment'></div>托以为羽翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1375565_comment'></div>使之谋取。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1375565_comment'></div>使之数求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1375565_comment'></div>细而思之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1375565_comment'></div>此又非计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1375565_comment'></div>山高则祈羊自至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1375565_comment'></div>泉深则沈玉自来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1375565_comment'></div>巳立然后人归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1375565_comment'></div>身正然后士附。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1375565_comment'></div>语有之曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1375565_comment'></div>政乱则勇者不为斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1375565_comment'></div>德薄则贤者不为谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1375565_comment'></div>故吴濞有奸而邹阳去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1375565_comment'></div>燕哙无德而乐生奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1375565_comment'></div>晋宠大夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1375565_comment'></div>卒成分国之祸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1375565_comment'></div>卫多君子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1375565_comment'></div>孰救渡河之灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1375565_comment'></div>此之前车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1375565_comment'></div>得不深镜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1375565_comment'></div>代宪四祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1375565_comment'></div>文明继兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1375565_comment'></div>当时燕赵中山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1375565_comment'></div>淮阳齐鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1375565_comment'></div>连结者几姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_160_1375565_comment'></div>旅拒者几侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_161_1375565_comment'></div>咸逆天用人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_162_1375565_comment'></div>背惠忘德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_163_1375565_comment'></div>据指掌之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_164_1375565_comment'></div>谓可逃刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_165_1375565_comment'></div>倚亲戚之私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_166_1375565_comment'></div>谓能取信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_167_1375565_comment'></div>一旦地空家破。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_168_1375565_comment'></div>首裂支分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_169_1375565_comment'></div>闇者不能为谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_170_1375565_comment'></div>明者固以先去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_171_1375565_comment'></div>悔而莫及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_172_1375565_comment'></div>末如之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_173_1375565_comment'></div>先太尉与李洧尚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_174_1375565_comment'></div>齐之密戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_175_1375565_comment'></div>杨太保与苏肇给事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_176_1375565_comment'></div>蔡之懿亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_177_1375565_comment'></div>并据要地方州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_178_1375565_comment'></div>领精甲锐卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_179_1375565_comment'></div>及其王师戾止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_180_1375565_comment'></div>我武维扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_181_1375565_comment'></div>则割地驱人以降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_182_1375565_comment'></div>送款输忠以入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_183_1375565_comment'></div>非不顾密戚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_184_1375565_comment'></div>非不念懿亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_185_1375565_comment'></div>非不思恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_186_1375565_comment'></div>非不怀惠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_187_1375565_comment'></div>直以逆顺是逼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_188_1375565_comment'></div>死生实难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_189_1375565_comment'></div>能与其同休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_190_1375565_comment'></div>不能与其共戚故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_191_1375565_comment'></div>况足下大未侔齐蔡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_192_1375565_comment'></div>久未及李吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_193_1375565_comment'></div>将以其人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_194_1375565_comment'></div>动于不义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_195_1375565_comment'></div>仆恐夙沙之国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_196_1375565_comment'></div>縳主之卒重生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_197_1375565_comment'></div>彭宠之家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_198_1375565_comment'></div>不义之侯更出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_199_1375565_comment'></div>又计足下当恃太行九折之险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_200_1375565_comment'></div>部内数州之饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_201_1375565_comment'></div>兵士尚强。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_202_1375565_comment'></div>仓储且足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_203_1375565_comment'></div>谓得支久谋而使安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_204_1375565_comment'></div>危哉此心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_205_1375565_comment'></div>自弃何速。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_206_1375565_comment'></div>昔李抱真相国用彼州之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_207_1375565_comment'></div>破朱滔于燕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_208_1375565_comment'></div>困田悦于魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_209_1375565_comment'></div>连兵转战。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_210_1375565_comment'></div>绵岁经时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_211_1375565_comment'></div>而潞人子死不敢悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_212_1375565_comment'></div>夫死不敢哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_213_1375565_comment'></div>何者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_214_1375565_comment'></div>李相国奉讨逆之命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_215_1375565_comment'></div>为勤王之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_216_1375565_comment'></div>义著而诚顺故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_217_1375565_comment'></div>及卢从史释丧就位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_218_1375565_comment'></div>卖降冀功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_219_1375565_comment'></div>将乘讨伐之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_220_1375565_comment'></div>欲肆凶邪之性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_221_1375565_comment'></div>计未就而人神巳怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_222_1375565_comment'></div>事未立而兵众巳离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_223_1375565_comment'></div>以万夫之长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_224_1375565_comment'></div>困一卒之手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_225_1375565_comment'></div>驱槛北阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_226_1375565_comment'></div>弃尸南荒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_227_1375565_comment'></div>而潞之人犹老者扪胸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_228_1375565_comment'></div>少者扼腕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_229_1375565_comment'></div>谓朝廷不即显戮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_230_1375565_comment'></div>深为失刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_231_1375565_comment'></div>其故何哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_232_1375565_comment'></div>以从史不义不昵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_233_1375565_comment'></div>去安就危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_234_1375565_comment'></div>众黜其谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_235_1375565_comment'></div>下不为用故也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_236_1375565_comment'></div>二帅去就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_237_1375565_comment'></div>非因传闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_238_1375565_comment'></div>鸠杖之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_239_1375565_comment'></div>鲐背之叟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_240_1375565_comment'></div>知其本末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_241_1375565_comment'></div>尚能言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_242_1375565_comment'></div>则太行之险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_243_1375565_comment'></div>固不为悖者之守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_244_1375565_comment'></div>数州之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_245_1375565_comment'></div>固不为邪者之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_246_1375565_comment'></div>此又不足恃也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_247_1375565_comment'></div>由此言之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_248_1375565_comment'></div>则以何名隳家声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_249_1375565_comment'></div>何事舍君命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_250_1375565_comment'></div>何道求死士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_251_1375565_comment'></div>何计得人心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_252_1375565_comment'></div>此仆者所以对案忘飧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_253_1375565_comment'></div>推枕不寝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_254_1375565_comment'></div>为足下惜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_255_1375565_comment'></div>为足下危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_256_1375565_comment'></div>而不知其所以然也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_257_1375565_comment'></div>况太傅比者养牛添卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_258_1375565_comment'></div>畜马训兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_259_1375565_comment'></div>旁招武干之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_260_1375565_comment'></div>中举将军之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_261_1375565_comment'></div>然而听于远近。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_262_1375565_comment'></div>颇有是非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1375565_comment'></div>虽朝廷推赤心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1375565_comment'></div>宏大度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1375565_comment'></div>然而不逞者巳有乖异之说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1375565_comment'></div>横议者屡兴悖恶之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1375565_comment'></div>人之多言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1375565_comment'></div>亦可畏也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1375565_comment'></div>谁为来者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1375565_comment'></div>宜其弭之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1375565_comment'></div>今足下背季父引进之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1375565_comment'></div>失大朝文诰之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1375565_comment'></div>则是实先太傅之浮议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1375565_comment'></div>彰昭义军之有谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1375565_comment'></div>为人侄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1375565_comment'></div>则致叔父于不忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1375565_comment'></div>为人孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1375565_comment'></div>则败乃祖于无后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1375565_comment'></div>亦何以对燕赵之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_280_1375565_comment'></div>见齐鲁之人耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_281_1375565_comment'></div>又计足下旬日之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_282_1375565_comment'></div>造次为虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_283_1375565_comment'></div>今兹追改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_284_1375565_comment'></div>惧有后艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_285_1375565_comment'></div>此左右者不明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_286_1375565_comment'></div>而咨询之未尽也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_287_1375565_comment'></div>近者李尚书祐董常侍重华之辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_288_1375565_comment'></div>并亲为贼将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_289_1375565_comment'></div>拒我官军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_290_1375565_comment'></div>纳质于匪人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_291_1375565_comment'></div>效用于戎首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1375565_comment'></div>久乃来复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1375565_comment'></div>尚蒙殊恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1375565_comment'></div>皆受郡符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1375565_comment'></div>咸领旗鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1375565_comment'></div>不能悉数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1375565_comment'></div>厥徒实繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_298_1375565_comment'></div>岂有足下藉两代之馀资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_299_1375565_comment'></div>委数万之旧旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_300_1375565_comment'></div>俛首听命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_301_1375565_comment'></div>举宗效诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_302_1375565_comment'></div>则朝廷又岂以一凵之稽迟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_303_1375565_comment'></div>片辞之疑异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_304_1375565_comment'></div>而致足下于不测。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_305_1375565_comment'></div>沮足下于后至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_306_1375565_comment'></div>故事具存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_307_1375565_comment'></div>可以明验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_308_1375565_comment'></div>幸请自求多福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_309_1375565_comment'></div>无辱前人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_310_1375565_comment'></div>护龙旐以归洛师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_311_1375565_comment'></div>秉象笏而朝魏阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_312_1375565_comment'></div>必当勋庸继代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_313_1375565_comment'></div>富贵通身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_314_1375565_comment'></div>无为邻道所资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_315_1375565_comment'></div>使作他人之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_316_1375565_comment'></div>倘尚淹归款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_317_1375565_comment'></div>未整来轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_318_1375565_comment'></div>戎臣鼓勇以争先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_319_1375565_comment'></div>天子赫斯而降怒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_320_1375565_comment'></div>金玦一受。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_321_1375565_comment'></div>牙璋四驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_322_1375565_comment'></div>魏卫压其东南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_323_1375565_comment'></div>晋赵出其西北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_324_1375565_comment'></div>拔距投石者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_325_1375565_comment'></div>数逾万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_326_1375565_comment'></div>科头戟手者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_327_1375565_comment'></div>动以千群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_328_1375565_comment'></div>兼驱扼虎之材官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_329_1375565_comment'></div>仍率射雕之都督。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_330_1375565_comment'></div>感义则日月能驻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_331_1375565_comment'></div>拗愤则沙石可吞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_332_1375565_comment'></div>使兵用火焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_333_1375565_comment'></div>城将水灌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_334_1375565_comment'></div>魏趣邢郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_335_1375565_comment'></div>赵出洛州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_336_1375565_comment'></div>分二大都之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_337_1375565_comment'></div>是古平原之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_338_1375565_comment'></div>车甲尽输于此境。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_339_1375565_comment'></div>糗粮反聚于他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_340_1375565_comment'></div>恃河北而河北无储。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_341_1375565_comment'></div>倚山东而山东不守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_342_1375565_comment'></div>以数州之残殍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_343_1375565_comment'></div>抗百道之奇兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_344_1375565_comment'></div>比累卵而未危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_345_1375565_comment'></div>寄孤根于何所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_346_1375565_comment'></div>则老夫不佞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_347_1375565_comment'></div>亦有志焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_348_1375565_comment'></div>愿驱敢死之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_349_1375565_comment'></div>以从诸侯之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_350_1375565_comment'></div>下飞狐之口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_351_1375565_comment'></div>入天井之关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_352_1375565_comment'></div>巨浪难防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_353_1375565_comment'></div>长飙易扇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_354_1375565_comment'></div>此际必当惊地底之鼓角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_355_1375565_comment'></div>骇楼上之梯冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_356_1375565_comment'></div>丧贝跻陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_357_1375565_comment'></div>飞走之期既绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_358_1375565_comment'></div>投戈散地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_359_1375565_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_360_1375565", 1375565, "Clauses/360/Comments/0")'>灰钉</span>之望斯穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_360_1375565_comment'></div>自然麾下平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_361_1375565_comment'></div>尽忘旧爱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_362_1375565_comment'></div>帐中亲信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_363_1375565_comment'></div>即起他谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_364_1375565_comment'></div>辱先祖之神灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_365_1375565_comment'></div>为明时之哂笑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_366_1375565_comment'></div>静言其渐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_367_1375565_comment'></div>良以惊魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_368_1375565_comment'></div>今故再遣使车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_369_1375565_comment'></div>重申丹素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_370_1375565_comment'></div>惟鉴前代之成败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_371_1375565_comment'></div>访历事之宾僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_372_1375565_comment'></div>思反道败德之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_373_1375565_comment'></div>念顺令畏威之易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_374_1375565_comment'></div>时以吉日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_375_1375565_comment'></div>蹈兹坦途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_376_1375565_comment'></div>勿馁刘氏之魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_377_1375565_comment'></div>勿污潞人之俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_378_1375565_comment'></div>封帛增欷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_379_1375565_comment'></div>含毫益酸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_380_1375565_comment'></div>延望还章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_381_1375565_comment'></div>用以上表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_382_1375565_comment'></div>成败之举。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_383_1375565_comment'></div>慎惟图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_384_1375565_comment'></div>不宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_385_1375565_comment'></div>河阳三城节度使王茂元顿首。</div><div id='poem_sentence_386_1375565_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375591' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375591' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375591?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为马懿公郡夫人王氏黄箓斋第三文</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年7月15日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1375591_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375591'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375591'>妾以微生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375591_comment'></div>幸蒙嘉运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375591_comment'></div>得因师友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375591_comment'></div>奉佩符图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375591_comment'></div>品在高真。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375591_comment'></div>文参上法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375591_comment'></div>而尘泥贱质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375591_comment'></div>肉血微躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375591_comment'></div>未能绝迹人寰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375591_comment'></div>栖心物外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375591_comment'></div>永怀真格。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375591_comment'></div>有负元科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375591_comment'></div>然至于澡雪身心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375591_comment'></div>修勤香火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375591_comment'></div>五腊二直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375591_comment'></div>八节三元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375591_comment'></div>誓以严持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375591_comment'></div>不敢怠志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375591_comment'></div>然恐举措之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375591_comment'></div>未合元机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375591_comment'></div>过咎之来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375591_comment'></div>积于酆部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375591_comment'></div>年深月远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375591_comment'></div>衅重责深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375591_comment'></div>罹寒灵考治之科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375591_comment'></div>辱大道兴隆之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375591_comment'></div>夙夜自念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375591_comment'></div>冰炭交怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375591_comment'></div>今谨因中元大庆之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375591_comment'></div>地官校箓之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375591_comment'></div>辄于灵地。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375591_comment'></div>曲流元泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375591_comment'></div>大降慈恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375591_comment'></div>录一念之清心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375591_comment'></div>赦亿劫之重罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375591_comment'></div>使元功克就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375591_comment'></div>良愿大成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375591_comment'></div>君王长享于万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375591_comment'></div>臣庶咸离于五苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375591_comment'></div>上自云鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375591_comment'></div>下及泉鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375591_comment'></div>凡曰生灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375591_comment'></div>皆蒙覆护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375591_comment'></div>然后及于私室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375591_comment'></div>资彼幽魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375591_comment'></div>见存名上于南宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375591_comment'></div>过往神离于北部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375591_comment'></div>河源滞爽。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375591_comment'></div>即仰荷大道罔极之恩。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1375591_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_28854' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28854' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/28854?labeling=true' target='_blank'>行次昭应县道上送户部李郎中充昭义攻讨<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（843年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_28854")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div id='poem_sentence_0_28745'>稻粱犹足活诸雏，<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_0_28745", 28745, "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>妒敌</span>专场好自娱。<div id='poem_sentence_0_28745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_28745'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_28745", 28745, "Clauses/2/Comments/0")'>可要</span>五更惊晓梦，不辞风雪为阳乌。<div id='poem_sentence_1_28745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_28745'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_28745_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_28745'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(28745)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=843&endYear=843')">843年</a>　在京居母丧。期间因岳父王茂元卒及裴氏还葬等事，曾至洛阳、河阳、怀州、郑州。作品：祭徐姊夫文。祭徐氏姊夫。代僕射濮阳公遗表。为王侍御瓘谢宣吊并赙赠表。为马懿公郡夫人王氏黄箓斋文。为马懿公郡夫人王氏黄箓斋第二文。为怀州李中丞谢上表。为怀州刺史上后上门下状。为怀州刺史举人自代状。为怀州李使君祭城隍神文。为李怀州祭太行山神文。上易定李尚书状。请卢尚书撰故处士姑藏李某志文状。请卢尚书撰曾祖妣志文状。请卢尚书撰李氏仲姊河东裴氏夫人志文状。和刘评事永乐闲居见寄。和韦潘前辈七月十二日夜泊池州城下先寄上李使君。<div id='poem_1375643' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375643' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375643?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭徐姊夫文</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375643")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375643_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375643'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375643'>呜呼。以君之文学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375643_comment'></div>以君之政术。幼以自立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375643_comment'></div>老而不倦。亦可以为君子人矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375643_comment'></div>君子人欤。而不即清途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375643_comment'></div>不阶贵仕。此其命也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375643_comment'></div>夫何慊焉。始者仲姊有行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375643_comment'></div>获托<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_1375643", 1375643, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>贵族</span>。半产以资于外姓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375643_comment'></div>阖门寄托于仁人。将以衰微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375643_comment'></div>倚为藩援。不图薄佑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375643_comment'></div>天夺初心。仲姊凋殂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375643_comment'></div>诸甥不育。以亲以懿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375643_comment'></div>翻为路人。再号再呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375643_comment'></div>莫诉苍昊。尚以君子存伉俪之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375643_comment'></div>敦行李之私。二十年以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375643_comment'></div>虽事暌而意通。迹遥而诚密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375643_comment'></div>神当赐鉴。愚岂敢忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375643_comment'></div>逮愚不天。再丁凶衅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375643_comment'></div>泣血偷息。馀生几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375643_comment'></div>君方赤绂银章。浙东从务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375643_comment'></div>道途悠邈。时序徂迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375643_comment'></div>讶吊缄之不来。忽讣书之俱至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375643_comment'></div>感旧怀分。情如之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375643_comment'></div>埋玉焚芝。固未可喻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375643_comment'></div>呜呼。今来古往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375643_comment'></div>人谁不亡。于君之亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375643_comment'></div>其酷斯甚。藐然一女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375643_comment'></div>才已数龄。乞后旁宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375643_comment'></div>又未能立。贤弟扶服东路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375643_comment'></div>遇疾洛师。徘徊十旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375643_comment'></div>淹不得进。浮泛水陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375643_comment'></div>厥途四千。建旐云归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375643_comment'></div>旷然无主。尼姑居宗老之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375643_comment'></div>驺奴总家相之权。获及故阡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375643_comment'></div>信为馀庆。其所以为附身附棺之具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375643_comment'></div>又岂碍平生之旷达邪。日月次迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375643_comment'></div>卜筮斯协。幽明之异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375643_comment'></div>始于今辰。愚方缠哀忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375643_comment'></div>瘵恙縻寝。不及一攀冢树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375643_comment'></div>一恸荒阡。谢澹成之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375643_comment'></div>申永诀之礼。矧余仲姊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375643_comment'></div>君其与归。抚心骨以皆惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375643_comment'></div>抆血泪而无算。呜呼已哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375643_comment'></div>其何言耶。襚衣非华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375643_comment'></div>奠物殊薄。灵其鉴此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375643_comment'></div>慰我哀心。呜呼尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375643_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1375643_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375274' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375274' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375274?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代仆射濮阳公遗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年9月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375274")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375274_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375274'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375274'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375274_comment'></div>臣闻蝼蚁知雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375274_comment'></div>虽通感于元天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375274_comment'></div>蒲柳望秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375274_comment'></div>必凋华于厚夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375274_comment'></div>况臣摄生寡要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375274_comment'></div>将命无方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375274_comment'></div>寒暑顿侵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375274_comment'></div>精神坐竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375274_comment'></div>灶乏传薪之火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375274_comment'></div>馀焰几何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375274_comment'></div>隙无留影之驹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375274_comment'></div>残光即尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375274_comment'></div>叩心恋阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375274_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1375274", 1375274, "Clauses/14/Comments/0")'>忍死</span>封章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375274_comment'></div>叫白日而不回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375274_comment'></div>望青天而永诀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375274_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375274_comment'></div>臣虽忝望族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375274_comment'></div>本实将家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375274_comment'></div>自先臣出总郊圻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375274_comment'></div>遇大国静无师旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375274_comment'></div>被服元化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375274_comment'></div>翱翔盛时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375274_comment'></div>遂与季弟参元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375274_comment'></div>俱以词场就贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375274_comment'></div>久而不调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375274_comment'></div>因以上书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375274_comment'></div>自荐求通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375274_comment'></div>干时预试。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375274_comment'></div>芸香作吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375274_comment'></div>始筮仕于德宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375274_comment'></div>瑞节临戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375274_comment'></div>复分忧于陛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375274_comment'></div>虽性分有限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375274_comment'></div>而忠诚不移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375274_comment'></div>固无韩彭为将之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375274_comment'></div>实慕赵窦散财之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375274_comment'></div>两踰岭峤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375274_comment'></div>四建牙旗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375274_comment'></div>约已洁身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375274_comment'></div>绝甘分少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375274_comment'></div>良田五顷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375274_comment'></div>虑莫及于子孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375274_comment'></div>厚禄万钟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375274_comment'></div>惠颇沾于宾客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375274_comment'></div>恭承诏命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375274_comment'></div>以守藩条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375274_comment'></div>而掌事者徒以元和中吕元膺留守东都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375274_comment'></div>李师道潜谋洛邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375274_comment'></div>托以郡邸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375274_comment'></div>入之甲兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375274_comment'></div>臣当时为元膺宾僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375274_comment'></div>值师道窃发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375274_comment'></div>蓝衫不脱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375274_comment'></div>竹简仍持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375274_comment'></div>因为麾兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375274_comment'></div>虏其元帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375274_comment'></div>遂以将材相许。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375274_comment'></div>戎统见期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375274_comment'></div>颉颃遐途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375274_comment'></div>纂修旧服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375274_comment'></div>光阴荏苒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375274_comment'></div>迁授频仍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375274_comment'></div>昨者分领许昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375274_comment'></div>兼临河内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375274_comment'></div>当上党阻兵之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375274_comment'></div>是孽童拒诏之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375274_comment'></div>臣方将奋励疲驽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375274_comment'></div>指挥精锐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375274_comment'></div>所冀解鞍赤狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375274_comment'></div>息驾晋城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375274_comment'></div>大攘蜂虿之群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375274_comment'></div>以雪人神之愤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375274_comment'></div>自前月某日后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375274_comment'></div>军声大振。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375274_comment'></div>贼势少衰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375274_comment'></div>人一其心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375274_comment'></div>士百其勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375274_comment'></div>燕颔有相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375274_comment'></div>曾无定远之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375274_comment'></div>马革裹尸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375274_comment'></div>实负伏波之愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375274_comment'></div>而精诚靡著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375274_comment'></div>志望见违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375274_comment'></div>援桴之意方坚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375274_comment'></div>就木之期俄及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375274_comment'></div>忽自今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375274_comment'></div>疾生腹脏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375274_comment'></div>弊及筋骸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375274_comment'></div>药剂之攻击愈深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375274_comment'></div>神祗之祷祠无益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375274_comment'></div>固巳腾名鬼录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375274_comment'></div>收气人寰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375274_comment'></div>复然无望于死灰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375274_comment'></div>更起难同于仆树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375274_comment'></div>然臣素窥长者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375274_comment'></div>曾慕达人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375274_comment'></div>省知变化之端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375274_comment'></div>粗识死生之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375274_comment'></div>岂其有贪富贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375274_comment'></div>敢冀长延。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375274_comment'></div>但以未报国恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375274_comment'></div>未诛贼党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375274_comment'></div>视冑长免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1375274_comment'></div>对弓莫弯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1375274_comment'></div>思犬马以自悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1375274_comment'></div>悼钟漏之先迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1375274_comment'></div>志有所在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1375274_comment'></div>伤如之何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1375274_comment'></div>抚节而乏泪可流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1375274_comment'></div>伏韬而无血可喀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1375274_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1375274_comment'></div>其行营三军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1375274_comment'></div>巳举牒差某官某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1375274_comment'></div>河阳留务差某官某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1375274_comment'></div>怀州留务差某官某讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1375274_comment'></div>并皆授之方略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1375274_comment'></div>各有司存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1375274_comment'></div>窃计旬日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1375274_comment'></div>必无逗挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1375274_comment'></div>臣又伏思任司农大卿之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1375274_comment'></div>授忠武统帅之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1375274_comment'></div>紫殿承恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1375274_comment'></div>彤庭入对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1375274_comment'></div>躬瞻尧日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1375274_comment'></div>亲沐舜风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1375274_comment'></div>获睹陛下神武之姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1375274_comment'></div>获闻陛下忧勤之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1375274_comment'></div>即北藩小寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1375274_comment'></div>东土微妖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1375274_comment'></div>亦何足烦陛下之甲兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1375274_comment'></div>污陛下之鈇锧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1375274_comment'></div>伏愿时推明略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1375274_comment'></div>光启睿图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1375274_comment'></div>内则收德裕让夷绅铉之嘉谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1375274_comment'></div>外则任彦佐元逵宰沔之威力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1375274_comment'></div>廓清华夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1375274_comment'></div>昭荐祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1375274_comment'></div>然后瘗玉勒成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1375274_comment'></div>镂金垂烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1375274_comment'></div>臣虽百死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1375274_comment'></div>复何恨焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1375274_comment'></div>臣精爽已亏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1375274_comment'></div>言辞失次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_144_1375274_comment'></div>气无复续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_145_1375274_comment'></div>蒙以纩而莫胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_146_1375274_comment'></div>口不能言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_147_1375274_comment'></div>饭用贝而何益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_148_1375274_comment'></div>故国千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_149_1375274_comment'></div>明君万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_150_1375274_comment'></div>永捐覆载之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_151_1375274_comment'></div>长入幽冥之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_152_1375274_comment'></div>残魂不昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_153_1375274_comment'></div>虽温序之思归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_154_1375274_comment'></div>枯骨有知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_155_1375274_comment'></div>遇杜回而必亢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_156_1375274_comment'></div>回望昭代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_157_1375274_comment'></div>哀号不能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_158_1375274_comment'></div>无任荒惙攀恋之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_159_1375274_comment'></div>谨奉表代辞以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_160_1375274_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375284' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375284' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375284?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为王侍御瓘谢宣吊并赙赠表</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375284")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375284_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375284'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375284'>草土臣瓘言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375284_comment'></div>今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375284_comment'></div>某官吕述某官任畴等至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375284_comment'></div>奉将圣旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375284_comment'></div>以臣父某官某亡殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375284_comment'></div>赐吊臣等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375284_comment'></div>并赙赠臣亡父布帛三百匹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375284_comment'></div>米粟三百石者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375284_comment'></div>大夜衔辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375284_comment'></div>穷泉漏泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375284_comment'></div>以陨以越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375284_comment'></div>终哀且荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375284_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375284_comment'></div>臣先臣某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375284_comment'></div>托体元侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375284_comment'></div>荣名任子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375284_comment'></div>象贤传剑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375284_comment'></div>馀力攻书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375284_comment'></div>历七庙而在公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375284_comment'></div>秉二道而非坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375284_comment'></div>一昨氛兴赤狄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375284_comment'></div>兵聚晋城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375284_comment'></div>先臣受律临戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375284_comment'></div>忘家徇众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375284_comment'></div>士卒均食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375284_comment'></div>罔愧于前修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375284_comment'></div>廊庑散金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375284_comment'></div>远齐乎旧说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375284_comment'></div>上凭玉略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375284_comment'></div>下振军威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375284_comment'></div>旬月之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375284_comment'></div>庆捷相继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375284_comment'></div>并亲桴三鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375284_comment'></div>躬运九章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375284_comment'></div>如臣弟兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375284_comment'></div>皆冒矢石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375284_comment'></div>岂意奇功垂立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375284_comment'></div>大愿莫从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375284_comment'></div>传餐失时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375284_comment'></div>喀血成疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375284_comment'></div>奄至凋落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375284_comment'></div>长违盛明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375284_comment'></div>此皆由臣等抱衅既深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375284_comment'></div>就养无素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375284_comment'></div>遂延家难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375284_comment'></div>仰恻宸襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375284_comment'></div>止偷生于晷刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375284_comment'></div>亦何颜于天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375284_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下悼深抚几。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375284_comment'></div>悲轸闻鞞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375284_comment'></div>降悯恻于上公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375284_comment'></div>厚赙礼于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_51_1375284", 1375284, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>遗体</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375284_comment'></div>昔魏优死事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375284_comment'></div>止分食邑之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375284_comment'></div>汉养孤儿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375284_comment'></div>但有羽林之聚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375284_comment'></div>方于今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375284_comment'></div>惟愧推恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375284_comment'></div>叫号失容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375284_comment'></div>戴履无所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375284_comment'></div>军前结草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375284_comment'></div>必自于幽灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375284_comment'></div>石上浇松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375284_comment'></div>敢忘于遗训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375284_comment'></div>无任感恩荒殒之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_64_1375284_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375589' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375589' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375589?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为马懿公郡夫人王氏黄箓斋文</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375589")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375589_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375589'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375589'>唐某年月日朔。上清大洞三境弟子妾某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375589_comment'></div>本命某年若干岁。某月日生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375589_comment'></div>属北斗某星。住河南府河南县正平坊安国观内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375589_comment'></div>今谨携私属弟子某等。诣京兆府万年县永崇坊龙兴观内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375589_comment'></div>奉谒受上法师东岳先生邓君。奉依科仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375589_comment'></div>于三圣会仙堂内。修建黄箓妙斋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375589_comment'></div>三日三夜。转经行道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375589_comment'></div>奉为先受法尊师并道场男女官众及九元七祖弟子门徒等忏罪拔苦祈恩。辞上谒虚无元始自然天尊太上大道君太上老君金阙后圣李君十方灵真三界官属三十六部尊经元中大法师天地水三官北斗尊神本命星尊神洞天林谷一切栖隐诸灵仙等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375589_comment'></div>妾夙值师尊。钦闻教旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375589_comment'></div>伏以元皇布气。时播群生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375589_comment'></div>太一传形。肇流品庶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375589_comment'></div>皆陶无始。成彼自然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375589_comment'></div>及三古已还。九皇秘迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375589_comment'></div>群妖众孽。黩乱真元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375589_comment'></div>鬼道尸邪。干迷至正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375589_comment'></div>于是大分治化。广辟章符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375589_comment'></div>金板玉绳。载演修存之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375589_comment'></div>河源酆部。重明考治之科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375589_comment'></div>故得三灵无垫坏之虞。万物被生成之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375589_comment'></div>妾内惟幼騃。晚遂修持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375589_comment'></div>爰在童蒙。被诸僭咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375589_comment'></div>去元和某年。获托于故户部尚书赠左仆射臣马总。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375589_comment'></div>极纷华于少壮。结胎血之因缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375589_comment'></div>况臣总被沐君恩。久居藩镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375589_comment'></div>受专征之寄。擅外阃之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375589_comment'></div>殄寇下城。所伤者不记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375589_comment'></div>用刑持法。所坐者至多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375589_comment'></div>虽事上之心。诚无顾避。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375589_comment'></div>而奉行之际。或爽重轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375589_comment'></div>故臣总平生之时。许妾以虚无为念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375589_comment'></div>冀因晚节。同结良缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375589_comment'></div>及臣总捐家。妾终丧纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375589_comment'></div>婚姻粗毕。门户如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375589_comment'></div>故东都某观道士南岳先生符君。哀妾香火之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375589_comment'></div>成妾巾褐之愿。爰从披度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375589_comment'></div>骤历年光。虽积秽行尸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375589_comment'></div>感通莫冀。而三虫六贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375589_comment'></div>制伏无亏。流辈之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375589_comment'></div>吹嘘骤至。谓可以奉三洞之尊法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375589_comment'></div>稽七真之异闻。劝请殷勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375589_comment'></div>推许重叠。妾虽荣从非望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375589_comment'></div>亦念切良时。遂于某年于某处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375589_comment'></div>奉诣大洞师东岳先生邓君。奉受上法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375589_comment'></div>回车毕道。交带紫纹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375589_comment'></div>负荷元科。叨忝真位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375589_comment'></div>妾夙宵感励。寝食惭惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375589_comment'></div>于今五年。益勤一志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375589_comment'></div>兼誓除俗累。渐慕清修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375589_comment'></div>休绝巳来。志念愈洁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375589_comment'></div>所希稍存真气。可降众灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375589_comment'></div>又按仙记云。师与弟子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375589_comment'></div>能相保七年法者当得道。况今国家奉元元之裔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375589_comment'></div>圣上崇清净之风。妾师奉为君亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375589_comment'></div>广存济度。妾又筋骸非病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375589_comment'></div>齿发未衰。仰佩元恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375589_comment'></div>实为罔极。是敢重投灵地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375589_comment'></div>再献微诚。遂有同学男女官某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375589_comment'></div>嘉妾至心。勉妾上路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375589_comment'></div>即以今夕。再次仙都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375589_comment'></div>庆百生有幸之辰。登三圣会真之室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375589_comment'></div>修崇始毕。朝礼云初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375589_comment'></div>何必银台。远居东海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375589_comment'></div>讵资瑶阙。近到西昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375589_comment'></div>窥观而羽翼疑生。行列而云霓交映。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375589_comment'></div>欣荣过极。感泣不胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375589_comment'></div>谨用上按仙仪。旁徵斋法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375589_comment'></div>特延清众。重请本师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375589_comment'></div>伏乞太上三尊。十方众圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375589_comment'></div>曲流元泽。大降鸿私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375589_comment'></div>录妾一念之清心。赦妾亿劫之重罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375589_comment'></div>伏愿善缘益长。丹恳获申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375589_comment'></div>君王冀保于千龄。辅弼永绥于百福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375589_comment'></div>五谷丰稔。四方乂宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375589_comment'></div>先授道师。迁洞天之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375589_comment'></div>今传法主。享龟鹤之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375589_comment'></div>道俗二缘。咸蒙覆露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375589_comment'></div>幽明两代。并洗𠌤尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375589_comment'></div>先魂无冢讼之辜。同志绝干城之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375589_comment'></div>阴幽滞爽。狴犴穷冤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375589_comment'></div>皆获迁升。尽从宽释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375589_comment'></div>妾誓持女弱。永奉元微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375589_comment'></div>苟负盟文。冀当冥考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375589_comment'></div>妾某无任恳恻祈恩之至。谨辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375589_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_83_1375589_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375590' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375590' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375590?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为马懿公郡夫人王氏黄箓斋第二文</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年10月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375590")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375590_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375590'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375590'>唐会昌三年太岁癸亥十月丙辰朔十五日庚午。上清大洞三境弟子中岳先生黄帝真人张抱元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375590_comment'></div>于所居宫内。奉依科仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375590_comment'></div>修建下元黄箓妙斋。两日两夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375590_comment'></div>转经行道。忏罪乞恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375590_comment'></div>拜上诸虚无自然元始天尊太上大道君太上老君十方众圣三界灵官三十六部尊经元中大法师崇岳山诸灵官等。妾闻至极含虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375590_comment'></div>真人在巳。陶混元于无始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375590_comment'></div>禀灵性于自然。莫不庞赘有为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375590_comment'></div>秕糠非道。摽北门而高视。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375590_comment'></div>泛虚舟而不羁。及夫淳化渐离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375590_comment'></div>真元稍秘。于是教垂三洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375590_comment'></div>文演九辰。地纪天元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375590_comment'></div>因斯立极。北酆南霍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375590_comment'></div>自此分区。犹以修崇之旨未宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375590_comment'></div>忏援之科尚昧。故七神五藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375590_comment'></div>降虚黄之上经。三日元时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375590_comment'></div>开青女之秘诀。事踰元象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375590_comment'></div>道介希夷。正一真人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375590_comment'></div>馀文具在。三天教主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375590_comment'></div>遗法斯存。妾庆自多生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375590_comment'></div>时丁休运。永惟女弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375590_comment'></div>早服师门。佩秘箓于上清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375590_comment'></div>阶众真之高位。虽限存性分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375590_comment'></div>而事系因缘。丁宁汤谷之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375590_comment'></div>髣髴朱陵之会。贪叨斯极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375590_comment'></div>负荷不胜。故八庆三元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375590_comment'></div>良时吉日。莫不广开龟座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375590_comment'></div>大辟龙山。耀衔烛于幽都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375590_comment'></div>稽歘驾于元路。况所居观宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375590_comment'></div>乃肇于贵主。创自平时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375590_comment'></div>绛馆清宫。居惟帝女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375590_comment'></div>珠囊锦帙。来自天家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375590_comment'></div>通仙之象设可凭。大国之庆灵无泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375590_comment'></div>自开元厥后。天步攸艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375590_comment'></div>阆苑融台。倒遘郁攸之毒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375590_comment'></div>霓旌绛节。咸罹窃发之灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375590_comment'></div>而斯观栋宇无亏。图书不蠹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375590_comment'></div>䌽扎如旧。灵文若新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375590_comment'></div>况镇我神州。正当午位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375590_comment'></div>北瞻翔凤。自倾臣子之丹诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375590_comment'></div>南眺凿龙。宛是神仙之福地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375590_comment'></div>虽浮邱尚阻。而佳气遥通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375590_comment'></div>先皇帝重振元风。今天子广明至道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375590_comment'></div>恬神姑射。系志崆峒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375590_comment'></div>银瓮告存。非假华山之出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375590_comment'></div>珠胎展瑞。不因赤水之遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375590_comment'></div>平阳之绛鬣时来。昆岳之白环屡入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375590_comment'></div>故二京法众。四海名流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375590_comment'></div>咸得荫蔼天光。晞沾睿泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375590_comment'></div>云灶尽期于九转。灵阶毕慕于三清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375590_comment'></div>高功臣抱元。捧日降精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375590_comment'></div>因星命氏。骨鸣金锁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375590_comment'></div>响振琼钟。昔自绮纨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375590_comment'></div>遂辞禄仕。倦蓟子之都尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375590_comment'></div>厌东方之侍郎。固已名列紫书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375590_comment'></div>位通丹岳。调三关而自适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375590_comment'></div>通九馆以忘忧。顷以台峤名游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375590_comment'></div>云台高迈。清溪万仞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375590_comment'></div>丹桂八重。爰以金慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375590_comment'></div>忽闻至止。故妾及男女官等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375590_comment'></div>因下元大庆之日。水官校籍之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375590_comment'></div>稽首求哀。摽心奉请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375590_comment'></div>愿携清众。为按元科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375590_comment'></div>将有望于感通。冀必闻于御彻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375590_comment'></div>今则元冥司候。阴魄将圆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375590_comment'></div>鱼钥开簧。麟厨备味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375590_comment'></div>列炬而房名流电。燎炉而馆号明霞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375590_comment'></div>伏乞太上三尊。十方众圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375590_comment'></div>曲垂鉴映。大降优恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375590_comment'></div>使妾等斋功克成。道分增益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375590_comment'></div>圣君万寿。良辅千秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375590_comment'></div>凡在生灵。悉蒙休祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375590_comment'></div>上通清汉。下及幽渊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375590_comment'></div>长育咸绝于夭伤。穷滞皆蒙于开释。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375590_comment'></div>又伏以山东逆竖。代北饥戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375590_comment'></div>负义背恩。兴兵动众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375590_comment'></div>亦愿元恶面缚而归罪。群校倒戈而显忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375590_comment'></div>污俗惟新。迷涂复正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375590_comment'></div>溥天之下。率土之滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375590_comment'></div>永无草扰之虞。长保升平之福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375590_comment'></div>妾幽明两代。道俗二缘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375590_comment'></div>在位者长简于帝心。求道者早升于仙籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375590_comment'></div>誓尽躯命。钦奉香灯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375590_comment'></div>苟违斯言。分当冥考。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375590_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_83_1375590_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375282' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375282' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375282?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为怀州李中丞谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375282")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375282_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375282'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375282'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375282_comment'></div>臣伏奉某月日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375282_comment'></div>授臣某官者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375282_comment'></div>天旨下临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375282_comment'></div>星言东骛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375282_comment'></div>即以今月某日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375282_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375282_comment'></div>臣闻汉分剌举之条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375282_comment'></div>三河最重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375282_comment'></div>唐制郊圻之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375282_comment'></div>二宅惟均。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375282_comment'></div>况苏公旧田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375282_comment'></div>怀侯故邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375282_comment'></div>太行会险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375282_comment'></div>德水通津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375282_comment'></div>在申画之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375282_comment'></div>素为清地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375282_comment'></div>语翕张之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375282_comment'></div>号曰要区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375282_comment'></div>自河上置军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375282_comment'></div>以幕中分理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375282_comment'></div>地虽密迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375282_comment'></div>事异躬亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375282_comment'></div>伏惟神圣文武至仁大孝皇帝陛下神以运机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375282_comment'></div>圣而制变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375282_comment'></div>将镇顽梗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375282_comment'></div>更务恢张。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375282_comment'></div>由是开三垒之新规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375282_comment'></div>复数朝之故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375282_comment'></div>斋坛将节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375282_comment'></div>重加廉郡之雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375282_comment'></div>皂盖朱轓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375282_comment'></div>各有为州之贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375282_comment'></div>遥徵三纪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375282_comment'></div>间有两人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375282_comment'></div>陶某以吏理当财。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375282_comment'></div>郑某以名家正授。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375282_comment'></div>清尘不远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375282_comment'></div>馀烈犹存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375282_comment'></div>颁条之寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375282_comment'></div>继组为难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375282_comment'></div>若臣者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375282_comment'></div>品以勋升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375282_comment'></div>官由赏达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375282_comment'></div>徒慕益恭之美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375282_comment'></div>以承犹宥之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375282_comment'></div>过奖在朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375282_comment'></div>承乏充使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375282_comment'></div>将圣代怀柔之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375282_comment'></div>率昆夷畏慕之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375282_comment'></div>万里以遥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375282_comment'></div>三时而复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375282_comment'></div>副介不离于痼疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375282_comment'></div>故人免叹于凋零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375282_comment'></div>敢矜跋涉之劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375282_comment'></div>自被生成之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_1375397' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375397' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375397?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为怀州剌史上后上门下状</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375397'>右。某伏奉月日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375397_comment'></div>授持节怀州诸军事守怀州剌史兼御史中丞者。以今月日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375397_comment'></div>某特以门资。早登朝选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375397_comment'></div>尝奉出疆之任。曾非泛驾之材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375397_comment'></div>直以扬大国之棱威。奉良相之成算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375397_comment'></div>幸无挫屈。兼免滞留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375397_comment'></div>业官未多。无罪为幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375397_comment'></div>岂意相公上引睿旨。下念勋家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375397_comment'></div>既假宠于中司。又颁条于名部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375397_comment'></div>去神州二百里而近。无正守三十年已来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375397_comment'></div>记室参军。代司符印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375397_comment'></div>中兵祭酒。分理城池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375397_comment'></div>今各额更新。官司复旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375397_comment'></div>用威寇敌。兼壮郊圻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375397_comment'></div>当此之时。授任尤重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375397_comment'></div>岂伊庸懦。可以指令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375397_comment'></div>唯当非忧人之不思。非利物之不念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375397_comment'></div>罄忠武在行之众。奉盟津揽辔之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375397_comment'></div>冀无后艰。以答殊奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375397_comment'></div>伏惟俯赐恩察。谨录状上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375397_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1375397_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375319' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375319' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_0_1375319_comment'></div>内外文武官到任三日举一人自代者。臣伏见前件官汾阳启冑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375319_comment'></div>沙麓遗芳。佩觿之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375319_comment'></div>平居不戏。加冠巳后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375319_comment'></div>出言成章。本以诗书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375319_comment'></div>绰有机断。奉阴郭之良躅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375319_comment'></div>御马邓之成规。臣与其祖祢以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375319_comment'></div>蕃宣相接。云台高议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375319_comment'></div>同承钟鼎之馀。麟阁旧图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375319_comment'></div>共著河山之誓。交深志见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375319_comment'></div>年齐道均。今河内名邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375319_comment'></div>覃怀巨郡。南蕃凤阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375319_comment'></div>平分晋郑之交。北控羊肠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375319_comment'></div>方有干戈之役。推让虽循于故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375319_comment'></div>荐闻实切于私诚。伏乞圣恩。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375596'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375596'>年月日。致祭于城隍之神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375596_comment'></div>某谬蒙朝奖。叨领藩条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375596_comment'></div>熊轼初临。虎符适至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375596_comment'></div>敢资灵于水土。冀同固于金汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375596_comment'></div>况彼潞人。实逆天理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375596_comment'></div>因承平之地。以作巢窠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375596_comment'></div>驱康乐之民。以为蟊贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375596_comment'></div>一至于此。其能久乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375596_comment'></div>惟神广扇威灵。划开声势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375596_comment'></div>俾犯境者。望飞乌而自遁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375596_comment'></div>此滔天者。听唳鹤以虚声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375596_comment'></div>崇墉载严。巨堑无壅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375594_comment'></div>险虽天设。灵则神依。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375594_comment'></div>岂可步武之间。便容孽竖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375594_comment'></div>磅礡之内。久贮妖氛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375594_comment'></div>今忠武全师。河桥锐卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375594_comment'></div>使旌旗电耀。桴鼓雷奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375594_comment'></div>一麾开天井之关。再举复金微之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375594_comment'></div>然后气通作限。云出降祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375594_comment'></div>长崇望日之标。永作倚天之柱。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375414'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375414'>某疾秽馀生。偶存晷刻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375414_comment'></div>岂期妻族。亦搆祸凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375414_comment'></div>故司徒公内行政声。郁为人杰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375414_comment'></div>一昨奉辞伐罪。克壮其猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375414_comment'></div>躬节鼓旗。亲临矢石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375414_comment'></div>家财给于公用。子弟散于行间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375414_comment'></div>始退舍以致师。终设奇而覆寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375414_comment'></div>敢问古之名将。何以加焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375414_comment'></div>安知垂立大功。遽兹薨落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375414_comment'></div>伏弦抚敛。实有遗音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375414_comment'></div>行路之人。莫不相吊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375414_comment'></div>某穷辱之地。早受深知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375414_comment'></div>抚归旐以兴怀。吊病妻而增叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375414_comment'></div>酸伤怨咽。敢类他人。<div class='inline'
