/><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375576_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375576'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375576'>曾祖讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375576_comment'></div>皇美原令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375576_comment'></div>祖讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375576_comment'></div>皇安阳县尉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375576_comment'></div>父讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375576_comment'></div>皇郊社令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375576_comment'></div>处士讳某字某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375576_comment'></div>郊社令第二子也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375576_comment'></div>年十八。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375576_comment'></div>能通五经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375576_comment'></div>始就乡里赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375576_comment'></div>咸著别疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375576_comment'></div>遗略章句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375576_comment'></div>故时人莫得而知也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375576_comment'></div>注撰之暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375576_comment'></div>联为赋论歌诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375576_comment'></div>合数百首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375576_comment'></div>莫不鼓吹经实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375576_comment'></div>根本化源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375576_comment'></div>味醇道正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375576_comment'></div>词古义奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375576_comment'></div>自弱冠至于梦奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375576_comment'></div>未尝一为今体诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375576_comment'></div>小学通石鼓篆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375576_comment'></div>与钟蔡八分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375576_comment'></div>正楷散隶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375576_comment'></div>咸造其妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375576_comment'></div>然与人书疏往复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375576_comment'></div>未尝下笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375576_comment'></div>悉皆口占。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375576_comment'></div>惟曾为郊社君造福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375576_comment'></div>于墅南书佛经一通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375576_comment'></div>勒于贞石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375576_comment'></div>后摹写稍盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375576_comment'></div>且非本意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375576_comment'></div>遂以鹿车一乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375576_comment'></div>载至于香谷佛寺之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375576_comment'></div>藏诸古篆众经之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375576_comment'></div>其晦迹隐德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375576_comment'></div>率多此类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375576_comment'></div>长庆中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375576_comment'></div>来由淮海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375576_comment'></div>涂出徐州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375576_comment'></div>时有人谓徐帅王侍中曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375576_comment'></div>李某真处士也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375576_comment'></div>遂以宾礼延于逆旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375576_comment'></div>愿枉上介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375576_comment'></div>与为是邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375576_comment'></div>处士谓徐帅曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375576_comment'></div>从公非难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375576_comment'></div>但事人匪易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375576_comment'></div>长揖不拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375576_comment'></div>拂衣而归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375576_comment'></div>其词盖讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375576_comment'></div>其崔相国事也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375576_comment'></div>复归荥上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375576_comment'></div>讲道如初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375576_comment'></div>享年四十有三。<div id='poem_sentence_78_1375576_comment'></div>望于先域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375576_comment'></div>夫人荥阳郑氏合焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375576_comment'></div>二男瑊顼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375576_comment'></div>时甚幼孺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375576_comment'></div>犹子思晦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375576_comment'></div>寔尸其礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375576_comment'></div>至会昌三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375576_comment'></div>以风水为患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375576_comment'></div>松楸不立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375576_comment'></div>二子号叫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375576_comment'></div>愿更蓍龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375576_comment'></div>商隐与仲弟羲叟再从弟宣岳等亲授经典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375576_comment'></div>教为文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375576_comment'></div>生徒之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375576_comment'></div>叨称达者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375576_comment'></div>引进之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375576_comment'></div>胡宁忘诸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375576_comment'></div>愿襄改卜之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375576_comment'></div>敢遗撰美之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375576_comment'></div>阁下独执文律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375576_comment'></div>首冠明时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375576_comment'></div>顷于篇翰之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375576_comment'></div>惠以交游之契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375576_comment'></div>窃书遗事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375576_comment'></div>敢请刊铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375576_comment'></div>冀推族类之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1375576_comment'></div>用永隐沦之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1375576_comment'></div>伏纸酸哽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1375576_comment'></div>十不存一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1375576_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_108_1375576_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375577' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375577' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375577?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请卢尚书撰曾祖妣志文状<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>①</sup></a><span class='authorDate'>（843年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375577")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375577_comment'></div><div class='titleComment'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_title_1375577_0'>① （故相州安阳县姑臧李公夫人范阳卢氏）。（北祖大房）</div></div></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375577'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375577'>夫人姓卢氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375577_comment'></div>曾祖讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375577_comment'></div>某官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375577_comment'></div>父讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375577_comment'></div>兵部侍郎东都留守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375577_comment'></div>夫人兵部第三女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375577_comment'></div>年十七。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375577_comment'></div>归于安阳君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375577_comment'></div>讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375577_comment'></div>字叔洪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375577_comment'></div>姑臧李成宪荥阳郑钦说等十人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375577_comment'></div>皆僚婿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375577_comment'></div>安阳君年十九。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375577_comment'></div>一举中进士第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375577_comment'></div>与彭城刘长卿中山刘慎虚清河张楚金齐名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375577_comment'></div>始命于安阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375577_comment'></div>年二十九弃代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375577_comment'></div>祔葬于怀州雍店之东原先大夫故美原令之左次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375577_comment'></div>美原讳某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375577_comment'></div>字既济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375577_comment'></div>其墓长乐贾至为之铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375577_comment'></div>一子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375577_comment'></div>邢州录事参军讳某字叔卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375577_comment'></div>始夫人既孀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375577_comment'></div>教邢州君以经业得禄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375577_comment'></div>寓居于荥阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375577_comment'></div>不幸邢州君亦以疾早世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375577_comment'></div>夫人忍昼夜之哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375577_comment'></div>抚视孤孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375577_comment'></div>家惟屡空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375577_comment'></div>不克以邢州归祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375577_comment'></div>故卜葬于荥阳坛山之原上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375577_comment'></div>俾自我为祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375577_comment'></div>百世不迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375577_comment'></div>后十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375577_comment'></div>夫人始以寿殁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375577_comment'></div>诸孤且幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375577_comment'></div>亦未克以夫人之柩合于安阳君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375577_comment'></div>怀郑相望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375577_comment'></div>二百里而远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375577_comment'></div>仍世多故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375577_comment'></div>茔兆尚离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375577_comment'></div>日月遄移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375577_comment'></div>将逾百岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375577_comment'></div>曾孙商隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375577_comment'></div>以会昌二年由进士第判入等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375577_comment'></div>授秘书省正字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375577_comment'></div>所以称家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375577_comment'></div>尅谋启合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375577_comment'></div>罪戾增积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375577_comment'></div>降罚于天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375577_comment'></div>卜吉之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375577_comment'></div>再丁凶舋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375577_comment'></div>永唯残喘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375577_comment'></div>寄在朝夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375577_comment'></div>惧泉阡乖隔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375577_comment'></div>松槚摧残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375577_comment'></div>衔哀抆血。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375577_comment'></div>尽力襄事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375577_comment'></div>尅以来年正月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375577_comment'></div>启夫人之榇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375577_comment'></div>归合于怀之东原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375577_comment'></div>永瞻贻厥之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375577_comment'></div>讵忘论撰之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375577_comment'></div>閤下我祖妣之族子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375577_comment'></div>今天下之文宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375577_comment'></div>深惟托分之重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375577_comment'></div>实仰锡类之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375577_comment'></div>敢祈刊勒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375577_comment'></div>荐慰尊灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375577_comment'></div>叩心献状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375577_comment'></div>辞不宣德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375577_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_72_1375577_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375578' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375578' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375578?labeling=true' target='_blank'>请卢尚书撰李氏仲姊河东裴氏夫人志文状</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375578")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375578_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375578'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375578'>昔我先君姑臧公以让弟受封。故子孙代继德礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375578_comment'></div>蝉联之盛。著于史谍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375578_comment'></div>王考糺曹君。以隐德不耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375578_comment'></div>俛仰于州县。烈考殿中君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375578_comment'></div>以知命不挠。从容于宾介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375578_comment'></div>惟我仲姊。实渐清训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375578_comment'></div>年十有八。归于河东裴允元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375578_comment'></div>故侍中耀卿之孙也。既归逢病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375578_comment'></div>未克入庙。实历周岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375578_comment'></div>奄归下泉。时先君子罢宰获嘉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375578_comment'></div>将从他辟。遂寓殡于获嘉之东。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375578_comment'></div>厥弟不天。旋失所怙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375578_comment'></div>返葬之礼。阙然不修。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375578_comment'></div>至会昌三年。商隐受选天官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375578_comment'></div>正书秘阁。将谋龟兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375578_comment'></div>用释永恨。会允元同谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375578_comment'></div>又出宰获嘉。距仲姊之殂已三十一年矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375578_comment'></div>神符夙志。卜有远期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375578_comment'></div>而罪舋贯盈。再丁艰故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375578_comment'></div>且兼疾瘵。遂改日时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375578_comment'></div>明年冬。以潞寇凭陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375578_comment'></div>扰我河内。惧惟樊发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375578_comment'></div>载轸肝心。遂泣血告灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375578_comment'></div>摄缞襄事。卜以明年正月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375578_comment'></div>归我祖考之次荥阳之坛山。仲姊生禀至性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375578_comment'></div>幼挺柔范。潜心经史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375578_comment'></div>尽妙织纴。钟曹礼法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375578_comment'></div>刘谢文采。顾此兼美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375578_comment'></div>自平生知。而上天赋寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375578_comment'></div>不及二纪。此盖群弟不肖之所延累也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375578_comment'></div>铭表之托。本于文人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375578_comment'></div>将慰归来之魂。实在不刊之笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375578_comment'></div>衔哀摧咽。五情已崩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375578_comment'></div>孤苦苍天。永痛苍天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375578_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1375578_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_28890' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28890' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/28890?labeling=true' target='_blank'>和刘评事永乐闲居见寄</a><span class='authorDate'>（843年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a "Clauses/1/Comments/0")'>器业</span>我全疏。<div id='poem_sentence_0_28890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_28890'>看封谏草归鸾掖，尚贲衡门待鹤书。<div id='poem_sentence_1_28890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_28890'>莲耸碧峰关路近，荷翻翠扇水堂虚。<div id='poem_sentence_2_28890_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1375419_comment'></div>岱北清夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375419_comment'></div>山东静谧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375419_comment'></div>虽神谋独运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375419_comment'></div>首开樽俎之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375419_comment'></div>而国用取资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375419_comment'></div>终赖江湘之入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375419_comment'></div>今者方体三革。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375419_comment'></div>欲铸五兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375419_comment'></div>燧火庖牺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375419_comment'></div>鸿名肇建。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375419_comment'></div>明台衢室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375419_comment'></div>凤历将新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375419_comment'></div>固当繁省以正幽明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375419_comment'></div>更中外而化劳逸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375419_comment'></div>有周室分陜之相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375419_comment'></div>有汉庭就国之侯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375419_comment'></div>则必梦想外藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375419_comment'></div>东来群后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375419_comment'></div>以文武兼资者持政柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375419_comment'></div>以理行尤异者讲化原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375419_comment'></div>实惟明公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375419_comment'></div>合首列辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375419_comment'></div>伏惟为国自重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375419_comment'></div>某叨蒙恩顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375419_comment'></div>颇渐岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375419_comment'></div>瞻赖之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375419_comment'></div>造次于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375419_comment'></div>伏惟特赐信察。</div><div id='poem_content_1375415'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375415'>不审跋涉道路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375415_comment'></div>尊候何似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375415_comment'></div>伏计不失调护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375415_comment'></div>先皇以倦勤厌代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375415_comment'></div>圣上以睿哲受图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375415_comment'></div>系万国之往居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375415_comment'></div>集兆人之悲庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375415_comment'></div>况二十五翁尚书望兼勋旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375415_comment'></div>地属亲贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375415_comment'></div>绩久著于藩垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375415_comment'></div>任合归于陶冶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375415_comment'></div>今者果应急召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375415_comment'></div>咸副佥谐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375415_comment'></div>凡在有心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375415_comment'></div>莫不延颈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375415_comment'></div>窃料皇闱入谒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375415_comment'></div>紫殿承恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375415_comment'></div>睹山邱之端容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375415_comment'></div>眷鼎角之殊相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375415_comment'></div>便当讲惟新之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375415_comment'></div>备爰立之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375415_comment'></div>伏惟促动前驺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375415_comment'></div>速光后命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375415_comment'></div>发仲父新柴之井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375415_comment'></div>运留侯前箸之筹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375415_comment'></div>允赞昌图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375415_comment'></div>亟登寿域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375415_comment'></div>天下幸甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375415_comment'></div>某猥以庸薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375415_comment'></div>厚沐恩怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375415_comment'></div>荏苒光阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375415_comment'></div>缠绵词旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375415_comment'></div>难屯少裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375415_comment'></div>违奉淹时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375415_comment'></div>家艰频臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375415_comment'></div>人理中绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375415_comment'></div>未经殒诉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375415_comment'></div>莫获祈迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375415_comment'></div>仰望清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375415_comment'></div>实动丹款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375415_comment'></div>伏惟特赐恩照。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1375415_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=846&endYear=846')">846年</a>　在秘书省，子衮师生。作品：上河南卢给事状。上李舍人状六。为尚书渤海公举人自代状。上李舍人状七。为贺拔员外上李相公启。汉宫。<div id='poem_1375440' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375440' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375440?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上河南卢给事状</a><span class='authorDate'>（846年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375440")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375440_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375440'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375440'>不审近日尊体何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375440_comment'></div>考履纳祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375440_comment'></div>为善降福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375440_comment'></div>伏料寝味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375440_comment'></div>常保康宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375440_comment'></div>给事显自璅闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375440_comment'></div>出临鼎邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375440_comment'></div>登兹周甸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375440_comment'></div>训此殷顽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375440_comment'></div>锋芒不钝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375440_comment'></div>而䏿肯自分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375440_comment'></div>桴鼓稀鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375440_comment'></div>而囊橐辄露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375440_comment'></div>方今惟新庶政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375440_comment'></div>允伫嘉谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375440_comment'></div>载考前人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375440_comment'></div>聿求往躅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375440_comment'></div>袁司徒入膺论道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375440_comment'></div>杜镇南出授专征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375440_comment'></div>并资尹正之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375440_comment'></div>适致超升之拜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375440_comment'></div>伏惟特为休运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375440_comment'></div>善保起居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375440_comment'></div>下情所望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375440_comment'></div>某顽鲁无堪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375440_comment'></div>退缩有素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375440_comment'></div>赋成谁荐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375440_comment'></div>食绝唯歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375440_comment'></div>上累门墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375440_comment'></div>颇淹星律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375440_comment'></div>属人生之坎坷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375440_comment'></div>逢世路之推迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375440_comment'></div>浮泛常多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375440_comment'></div>违离盖数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375440_comment'></div>临风仰德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375440_comment'></div>伏纸含诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375440_comment'></div>缅洛方清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375440_comment'></div>瞻嵩比峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375440_comment'></div>敢同上客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375440_comment'></div>曾疑乐广之弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375440_comment'></div>惟羡小民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375440_comment'></div>惭倚庾云之碣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375440_comment'></div>下情无任瞻恋感激之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1375440_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375437' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375437' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375437?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上李舍人状</a><span class='authorDate'>（846年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375437'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375437'>不审至今来尊体何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375437_comment'></div>伏以冬年例寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375437_comment'></div>不并常岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375437_comment'></div>伏惟善加摄护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375437_comment'></div>下情所望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375437_comment'></div>十七郎文华质气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375437_comment'></div>掩轸辈流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375437_comment'></div>便当一鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375437_comment'></div>以赴众望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375437_comment'></div>舍弟介特好退。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375437_comment'></div>龙钟寡徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375437_comment'></div>获依彊宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375437_comment'></div>顿见荣路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375437_comment'></div>忻慰之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375437_comment'></div>远难咨陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375437_comment'></div>伏计亦赐鉴察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375437_comment'></div>十二叔淹留伊洛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375437_comment'></div>巳变炎凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375437_comment'></div>龙蛰存神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375437_comment'></div>凤翔鉴德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375437_comment'></div>贤人事术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375437_comment'></div>益以彰明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375437_comment'></div>忝预生徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375437_comment'></div>敢用为贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375437_comment'></div>某羁官书阁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375437_comment'></div>业贫京都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375437_comment'></div>徒成拜远门阑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375437_comment'></div>违奉恩教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375437_comment'></div>东望结恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375437_comment'></div>夙宵匪宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375437_comment'></div>至来岁专欲求假起居未间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375437_comment'></div>伏惟特赐荣诲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375437_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1375437_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375477' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375477' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375477?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为贺拔员外上李相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（846年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375477")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375477_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375477'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375477'>某启。某闻被彩饰于无用之姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375477_comment'></div>斯须或可。垂休光于不报之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375477_comment'></div>始卒攸难。至有马疲而尚服轻轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375477_comment'></div>席敝而犹存华幄。怀仁则极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375477_comment'></div>备用无闻。虽有切于恋思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375477_comment'></div>宜自量其涯分。呜呼某者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375477_comment'></div>今甚类焉。翰柔莫申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375477_comment'></div>语苦难听。聊凭<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_7_1375477", 1375477, "Clauses/15/Comments/0")'>笺素</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375477_comment'></div>用写肺肠。伏惟少霁尊严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375477_comment'></div>猥赐披省。某伏思早岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375477_comment'></div>仰累深知。龙尾贻讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375477_comment'></div>敢通交契。牛心前啖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375477_comment'></div>实愧时才。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1375477", 1375477, "Clauses/25/Comments/0")'>世故</span>推迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375477_comment'></div>年华荏苒。葭灰檀火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375477_comment'></div>屡变于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_14_1375477", 1375477, "Clauses/28/Comments/0")'>寒暄</span>。灵济泥泾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375477_comment'></div>遂分于清浊。羁离管劄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375477_comment'></div>僶俛弦歌。名污柳营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375477_comment'></div>颜惭花县。竟以千金乏产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375477_comment'></div>三径无归。初服莫从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375477_comment'></div>迷津亟问。属者伏幸相公羹梅调味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375477_comment'></div>川楫济时。起塌翼于冲风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375477_comment'></div>活枯鳞于涸辙。登诸兰署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375477_comment'></div>辖彼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1375477", 1375477, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>芸签</span>。台阁移文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375477_comment'></div>语薛夏而无取。东南才子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375477_comment'></div>并张率以何能。未报前叨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375477_comment'></div>旋承后顾。版图被召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375477_comment'></div>花幕分荣。收驽骀于皂栈之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375477_comment'></div>刻蚣蝑于乐悬之上。势高足跌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375477_comment'></div>道泰身屯。未竭私诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375477_comment'></div>巳婴沈痼。况某素无灵气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375477_comment'></div>夙昧摄生。乏单豹养内之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375477_comment'></div>阙王吉实下之效。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_31_1375477", 1375477, "Clauses/63/Comments/0")'>湫底</span>莫适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375477_comment'></div>节宣失中。然犹深愿待年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375477_comment'></div>少酬厚德。三医毕访。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375477_comment'></div>百药皆投。竟非旡妄之灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375477_comment'></div>莫见有瘳之候。滨于九死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375477_comment'></div>夐彼十旬。取煖则烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375477_comment'></div>加寒必痢。发宁支弁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375477_comment'></div>带不成围。谢述心虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375477_comment'></div>方兹未逮。田光精竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375477_comment'></div>比此犹强。岂可尚占职员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375477_comment'></div>但尸俸入。久尘物议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375477_comment'></div>且速残骸。况相公职统薄违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375477_comment'></div>时登众寡。任崇按比。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375477_comment'></div>务系孤终。职是宾僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375477_comment'></div>岂宜虚旷。固不可下私微物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375477_comment'></div>曲降深慈。悯将尽于桑榆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375477_comment'></div>妨得材于梓。是以推枕兴感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375477_comment'></div>摄衾占辞。愿申敛迹之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375477_comment'></div>以赎旷官之咎。祇听裁旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375477_comment'></div>用息兢惶。必也旧履流恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375477_comment'></div>遗簪结念。恤以孀孤非少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375477_comment'></div>婚嫁未终。不使衰羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375477_comment'></div>便辞禄仕。致乎<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1375477", 1375477, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>外地</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375477_comment'></div>晞以末光。未乖念录之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375477_comment'></div>稍减忧惭之累。亚尹诸府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375477_comment'></div>别乘近郊。负荷无羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375477_comment'></div>饘糊有继。则犹冀逢十全之艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375477_comment'></div>延一日之生。重登门墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375477_comment'></div>再就埏埴。是所愿也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375477_comment'></div>非所望也。词多力殆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375477_comment'></div>感极涕繁。避席承言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375477_comment'></div>未卜曾参之侍。封函抒款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375477_comment'></div>畏遗殷浩之书。瞻望清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375477_comment'></div>实动魂守。伏惟特赐优察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_29028'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_29028_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=849&endYear=849')">849年</a>　在长安，留假参军事，专奏章。作品：李卫公。子直晋昌李花（得分字）即日。流莺。柳。送郑大台文南觐。令狐舍人说昨夜西掖玩月因戏赠。街西池馆。过郑广文旧居。韩翃舍人即事。漫成五章。漫成三首。九日。野菊。白云夫旧居。过伊仆射旧宅。哭刘贲。哭刘司户贲。哭刘司户二首。丹丘。谢座主魏相公启。谢宗卿启。<div id='poem_28646' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28646' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/28646?labeling=true' target='_blank'>李卫公<span class='inlineComment2'>（德裕）</span></a><span ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年</a>，40岁</div><div id='f53515983a064cf09f0e9c9709adedd4' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>卢弘止卒，李商隐罢徐州幕，到长安，以文章干令狐绹。作品：上时相启。<div id='poem_1375507' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375507' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375507?labeling=true' "poem_title_1375507")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375507_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375507'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375507'>商隐启。暮春之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375507_comment'></div>甘泽承降。既闻沾足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375507_comment'></div>又欲开晴。实关燮和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375507_comment'></div>克致丰阜。繁阴初合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375507_comment'></div>则傅说为霖。媚景将开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375507_comment'></div>则赵衰呈日。获依恩养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375507_comment'></div>定见升平。绝路左之喘牛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375507_comment'></div>用惊丙吉。无厩中之恶马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375507_comment'></div>以役任安。偃仰兴居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375507_comment'></div>惟有歌咏。瞻仰闱闼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375507_comment'></div>不胜肺肝。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375507_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1375507_comment'></div></div></div><br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>春夏间，在长安，以文章干令狐绹，补太学博士。作品：上兵部相公启。为同州任侍御上崔相国启。房中曲。相思。青陵台。代越公房妓嘲徐公主。代贵公主。咏怀寄秘阁旧僚二十六韵。<div id='poem_1375505' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375505' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375505?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上兵部相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375505")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375505_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375505'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375505'>商隐启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375505_comment'></div>伏奉指命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375505_comment'></div>令书元和中太清宫寄张相公旧诗上石者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375505_comment'></div>昨一日书讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375505_comment'></div>伏以赋旷代之清词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375505_comment'></div>宣当时之重德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375505_comment'></div>昔以道均稷契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375505_comment'></div>始染江毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375505_comment'></div>今幸庆袭韦平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375505_comment'></div>仍镌宋石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375505_comment'></div>依于桧井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375505_comment'></div>蹈彼椒墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375505_comment'></div>扶持固在于神明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375505_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1375505", 1375505, "Clauses/13/Comments/0")'>悠久</span>必同于天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375505_comment'></div>况惟菲陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375505_comment'></div>早预生徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375505_comment'></div>仰夫子之文章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375505_comment'></div>曾无具体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375505_comment'></div>辱郎君之谦下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375505_comment'></div>尚遣濡翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375505_comment'></div>空尘寡和之音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375505_comment'></div>素乏入神之妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375505_comment'></div>恩长感集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375505_comment'></div>格钝惭深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375505_comment'></div>但恐涕洟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375505_comment'></div>终斑琬炎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375505_comment'></div>下情无任战汗之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1375505_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375476' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375476' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375476?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为同州任侍御上崔相国启</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375476")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375476_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375476'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375476'>宪启。宪质异楚材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375476_comment'></div>宝同燕石。重以羁丱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375476_comment'></div>即定悯凶。瞻遗构以阙然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375476_comment'></div>不堪多难。奉成书而未就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375476_comment'></div>无处求生。藐视流离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375476_comment'></div>屡经寒暑。逮于既冠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375476_comment'></div>犹恤无家。叨承师友之规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375476_comment'></div>获忝簪缨之列。此皆相公推孔李之素分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375476_comment'></div>念高国之旧家。锼朴雕顽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375476_comment'></div>披聋抉瞆。沐膏雨以令植。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375476_comment'></div>假顺风而使飞。不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375476_comment'></div>则安得获骊龙之珠。假獬豸之角。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375476_comment'></div>荣皆过望。感岂胜言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375476_comment'></div>而犹怅望下风。徘徊高义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375476_comment'></div>望贺燕以难去。抚栖乌而不安者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375476_comment'></div>盖以相公以伊皋之事业佐大君。以扬马之文章辅昌运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375476_comment'></div>一登宣室。遂借前筹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375476_comment'></div>以有征无战之方。彰明下武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375476_comment'></div>以永逸暂劳之势。恢拓中华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375476_comment'></div>不舞梯䡴。不鸣金鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375476_comment'></div>复数千里之沃野。刷十五圣之包羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375476_comment'></div>彼围谷而谷人不知。入郑而郑陴皆哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375476_comment'></div>方兹决胜。彼有多惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375476_comment'></div>今百职聿修。九功咸叙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375476_comment'></div>万国伫登封之礼。五山倾望幸之祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375476_comment'></div>鲽至鹣来。茅归楛入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375476_comment'></div>驰汤骤夏。轹汉陵周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375476_comment'></div>若宪者。虽不能行舞舜戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375476_comment'></div>坐耕尧壤。至于献千载河清之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375476_comment'></div>裁二王助祭之诗。歌咏相庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375476_comment'></div>发辉帝载。则其志愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375476_comment'></div>亦或庶几。伏希孙閤时开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375476_comment'></div>丙茵多恕。克懋山公之德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375476_comment'></div>终全赵氏之孤。拥彗瞻门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375476_comment'></div>封函即路。苑沙宫树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375476_comment'></div>虽吟左辅之风烟。良夜庆霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375476_comment'></div>唯望中台之晷度。感恩抚巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375476_comment'></div>誓志<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_37_1375476", 1375476, "Clauses/74/Comments/0")'>投诚</span>。仰惟辉光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375476_comment'></div>终赐埏埴。下情无任感激攀倚惶恋之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375476_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_39_1375476_comment'></div></div></div><div -----title
太原
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='7dfff0ab443e4b1f96ca6b7bff22a9b6_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("7dfff0ab443e4b1f96ca6b7bff22a9b6");'><span id='7dfff0ab443e4b1f96ca6b7bff22a9b6_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=832&endYear=832')">832年</a>，21岁</div><div id='7dfff0ab443e4b1f96ca6b7bff22a9b6' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>二月，令狐楚为太原尹、北都留守、河东节度使，李商隐随之入太原幕。作品：上令狐相公状一。<br /><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>入太原令狐楚幕，有诗赠赵皙。作品：赠赵协律皙。<div id='poem_29036' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_29036' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/29036?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赠赵协律晰</a><span class='authorDate'>（832年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_29036")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_29036_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_allusion_29036'><span class='label'>引用典故：</span><span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(93, "poem_allusion_29036")'>安石妓</span></div><div id='poem_allusion_29036_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_29036'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_title_1375593_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375593'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375593'>年月日。郑州刺史李某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375593_comment'></div>谨请茅山道士冯角。祷请于水府真官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375593_comment'></div>伏以旱魃为虐。应龙不兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375593_comment'></div>困杲日于诗人。苦密云于易象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375593_comment'></div>生物斯瘁。民食攸艰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375593_comment'></div>某叨此分忧。俯惭无政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375593_comment'></div>爰求真侣。虔祷阴灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375593_comment'></div>减哺表勤。褰帷引咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375593_comment'></div>伏乞下通荥播。上达天潢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375593_comment'></div>合为膏泽之原。用息蕴隆之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375593_comment'></div>其于效信。或敢逡巡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375593_comment'></div>暴露托词。焦劳结虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375593_comment'></div>泉间候气。树杪占风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375593_comment'></div>惟望玉女之披衣。敢骇商羊之鼓舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375593_comment'></div>窃希元感。听察丹诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375593_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1375593_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375482' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375482' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_20_1375482_comment'></div>圭律未遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375482_comment'></div>铭镂斯在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375482_comment'></div>相公盐梅调味。<div id='poem_sentence_25_1375482_comment'></div>韩都荡梗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375482_comment'></div>以不刚不柔贞百度。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375482_comment'></div>以无偏无党定九流。<div id='poem_sentence_100_1375482_comment'></div>下情无任感激攀恋之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375482_comment'></div>谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_102_1375482_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375431' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375431' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375431?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上李舍人状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span id='poem_sentence_2_1375431_comment'></div>已托从者附状起居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375431_comment'></div>及二十三叔归阙之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375431_comment'></div>某适有私故。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1375431_comment'></div>自春又为郑州李舍人邀留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375431_comment'></div>比月方还洛下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375431_comment'></div>以此久阙附状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375431_comment'></div>用抒下情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375431_comment'></div>顷者二十三叔固辞内廷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375431_comment'></div>屈典外郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375431_comment'></div>避荣之心有素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375431_comment'></div>颁条之绩又彰。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1375431_comment'></div>孰不欢忻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375431_comment'></div>况某早奉辉光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375431_comment'></div>猥至成立。<div -----title
华州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ce86386d73694129912ce891b093ba46_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ce86386d73694129912ce891b093ba46");'><span id='ce86386d73694129912ce891b093ba46_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=834')">833-834年</a>，22-23岁</div><div id='ce86386d73694129912ce891b093ba46' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=833&endYear=833')">833年</a>　前往华州，依重表叔、华洲刺史崔戎，受厚遇。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年</a>　在华州，依重表叔、华洲刺史崔戎，戎送其习业南山。作品：代安平公华州贺圣躬痊复表。为大夫安平公华州进贺皇躬痊复物状。为安平公贺皇躬痊复上门下状。为安平公谢除兗海观察使表。为安平公兗州奏杜胜等四人充判官状。<div id='poem_1375262' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375262' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375262?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代安平公华州贺圣躬痊复表</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年1月14日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375262")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375262_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375262'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375262'>臣某言。今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375262_comment'></div>得本道进奏院报。以圣躬痊和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375262_comment'></div>右仆射平章事臣涯等奉见圣躬讫。社稷殊祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375262_comment'></div>生灵大庆。臣忝分朝寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375262_comment'></div>四奉国恩。无任抃舞踊跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375262_comment'></div>臣闻天普覆也。应运而健若龙行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375262_comment'></div>日至明焉。有时而气如虹贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375262_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下道超普覆。迹迈至明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375262_comment'></div>思社稷之灵。惟德是辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375262_comment'></div>念蒸黎之广。以位为忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375262_comment'></div>求衣未明。观书乙夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375262_comment'></div>寿域既臻于跻俗。大庭微阙于怡神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375262_comment'></div>是以自北陆送寒。暂停禹会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375262_comment'></div>及东郊迎气。爰复尧咨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375262_comment'></div>四海方来。百辟咸在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375262_comment'></div>六幽雷动。万寿山呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375262_comment'></div>惟臣独以一麾。载离双阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375262_comment'></div>犬马之微诚徒切。鹓鸿之旧列难阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375262_comment'></div>提郡印而通宵九惊。对使符而一食三起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375262_comment'></div>今幸巳俗臻殷富。年比顺成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375262_comment'></div>伏惟稍简万几。以迎百福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375262_comment'></div>托调燮于彼相。责绥抚于列藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375262_comment'></div>承九庙之降祥。副兆人之允望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375262_comment'></div>臣某不胜慺慺慊慊之至。谨差某奉表陈贺以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375262_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1375262_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1375286_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375326' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375326' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375326?labeling=true' "李商隐", "poem_title_1375326")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375326_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375326'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375326'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375326_comment'></div>今月得本州进奏官状报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375326_comment'></div>今月十二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375326_comment'></div>皇躬痊复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375326_comment'></div>相公躬率百寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375326_comment'></div>奉见奉贺讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375326_comment'></div>伏以圣上祇膺大宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375326_comment'></div>虔奉睿图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375326_comment'></div>务此忧勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375326_comment'></div>稍亏颐摄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375326_comment'></div>相公辅宣元首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375326_comment'></div>翊赞灵猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375326_comment'></div>戴宗庙之垂休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375326_comment'></div>慰黔黎之允望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375326_comment'></div>金縢玉检。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375326_comment'></div>恶藏请代之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375326_comment'></div>黄屋丹墀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375326_comment'></div>每进先尝之药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375326_comment'></div>至诚斯著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375326_comment'></div>休问旋臻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375326_comment'></div>然后率百辟以云趋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375326_comment'></div>导九重之日朗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375326_comment'></div>百蛮倾耳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375326_comment'></div>万国企心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375326_comment'></div>某愧守关河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375326_comment'></div>忝分符竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375326_comment'></div>不得少尘班列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375326_comment'></div>共展欢呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375326_comment'></div>对熊轼以自悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375326_comment'></div>泪如雨坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375326_comment'></div>望凤池而结恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375326_comment'></div>心逐云飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375326_comment'></div>无任抃贺攀恋之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1375326_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375260' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375260' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375260?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为安平公谢除兖海观察使表</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年3月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375260")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375260_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375260'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375260'>臣某言。今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375260_comment'></div>中使王士岌至。奉宣恩旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375260_comment'></div>改授臣某官。并赐臣前件告身一通者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375260_comment'></div>宠命天临。恩光春煦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375260_comment'></div>兢惶无措。抃蹈失容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375260_comment'></div>臣某中谢。臣幸逢昭代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375260_comment'></div>本自诸生。文以饰身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375260_comment'></div>学实为已。宁韫玉而待贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375260_comment'></div>窃运甓以私劳。春闱再中于明经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375260_comment'></div>天官一升于判第。阶级甚薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375260_comment'></div>际会则多。芸阁雠书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375260_comment'></div>蓝田作吏。中间因依知巳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375260_comment'></div>契阔从军。其后超属宪司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375260_comment'></div>骤登郎署。埋轮而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375260_comment'></div>高悬八使之威。起草以居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375260_comment'></div>远谢三台之妙。每含香而自叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375260_comment'></div>常襆被而待行。伏惟皇帝陛下钧陶庶汇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375260_comment'></div>亭毒万方。忧心同尧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375260_comment'></div>好谏若禹。东掖垣内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375260_comment'></div>封章何有于日闻。青门前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375260_comment'></div>列位徒参于夕拜。摆波涛而鲲鳞才变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375260_comment'></div>望烟霄而鸾翮初高。誓将竭诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375260_comment'></div>非敢养望。然虚受难处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375260_comment'></div>忝据非安。忽拥隼旟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375260_comment'></div>竟辞龙阙。犹赖<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_24_1375260", 1375260, "Clauses/49/Comments/0")'>云日</span>未远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375260_comment'></div>关城不遥。虔奉国章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375260_comment'></div>粗免官谤。岂意便升亚相之班秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375260_comment'></div>复委大藩之廉问。鱼笺帝语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375260_comment'></div>象轴神工。拜受而若捧千钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375260_comment'></div>伏读而如听九奏。诚虽深于负荷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375260_comment'></div>恋实切于违离。况曲阜遗封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375260_comment'></div>导河旧壤。列九州之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375260_comment'></div>带五岳之雄。古为诗书俎豆之乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375260_comment'></div>今兼鱼盐兵革之地。训整合资于武干。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375260_comment'></div>抚循宜属于柔良。岂伊孱微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375260_comment'></div>堪此委寄。谨当冰霜励志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375260_comment'></div>金石贯诚。驽马奋十驾之勤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375260_comment'></div>铅刀淬一割之用。即以今月二日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375260_comment'></div>雪泣西拜。星驰东下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375260_comment'></div>帝城思入。虽有类于陈咸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375260_comment'></div>关外耻居。安敢同于杨仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375260_comment'></div>无任瞻天恋阙之至。谨附中使某奉表陈谢以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375260_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1375260_comment'></div></div></div><br ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=841&endYear=841')">841年</a>　离弘农尉，在华州周墀幕。作品：为汝南公华州贺赦表。为京兆公陕州贺南郊赦表。祭张书记文。华州周大夫宴席。淮阳路。上刘舍人状。献舍人彭城公启。为李兵曹祭兄濠州刺史文约。为盐州刺史奏举李孚判官状。为汝南公以妖星见贺德音表。为汝南公贺彗星不见复正殿表。<div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375264'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375264_comment'></div>伏奉正月九日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375264_comment'></div>南郊礼毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375264_comment'></div>改元为某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375264_comment'></div>大赦天下者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375264_comment'></div>奉郊禋以定天位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375264_comment'></div>新历象以授人时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375264_comment'></div>乾健离明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375264_comment'></div>震动兑悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375264_comment'></div>跂行喙息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375264_comment'></div>罔不庆幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375264_comment'></div>臣某中贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375264_comment'></div>臣闻禋昊天而旅上帝者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375264_comment'></div>圣王之重事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375264_comment'></div>覃殊休而发大号者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375264_comment'></div>哲后之宏猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375264_comment'></div>故必致四圭以达诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375264_comment'></div>制六器而伸敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375264_comment'></div>将崇严配。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375264_comment'></div>必在元旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375264_comment'></div>先之以苍璧骍牲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375264_comment'></div>重之以云门大吕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375264_comment'></div>然后王犹有阙于荐敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375264_comment'></div>爽彼告虔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375264_comment'></div>周官三代之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375264_comment'></div>绝而不续。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375264_comment'></div>汉氏万灵之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375264_comment'></div>失而莫寻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375264_comment'></div>岂若皇帝陛下以大道遂群生。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375264_comment'></div>黜幽陟明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375264_comment'></div>兴废继绝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375264_comment'></div>灵芝甘露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375264_comment'></div>鄙之而不告史官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375264_comment'></div>赤雁白麟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375264_comment'></div>陋之而不编瑞牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375264_comment'></div>然后因孟月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375264_comment'></div>卜上辛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375264_comment'></div>率于国南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375264_comment'></div>式是岁首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375264_comment'></div>且天以陛下为子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375264_comment'></div>故必飨明诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375264_comment'></div>人以陛下为天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375264_comment'></div>故必流睿泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375264_comment'></div>踰千越万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375264_comment'></div>迈五登三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375264_comment'></div>何则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375264_comment'></div>取直言之科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375264_comment'></div>则听舆论者不足算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375264_comment'></div>设宥过之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375264_comment'></div>则除乡议者未可俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375264_comment'></div>延赏推恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375264_comment'></div>用以劝御灾捍患之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375264_comment'></div>减租<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_55_1375264", 1375264, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>退责</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375264_comment'></div>将以矜火耕水耨之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375264_comment'></div>养庶老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375264_comment'></div>颁淖糜暖帛之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375264_comment'></div>走群望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375264_comment'></div>洁刳牲瘗币之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375264_comment'></div>古不睹者复睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375264_comment'></div>古不闻者复闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375264_comment'></div>万蛰苏而六幽尽开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375264_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_64_1375264", 1375264, "Clauses/64/Comments/0")'>五刃</span>藏而九土咸辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375264_comment'></div>臣当时集军州官吏等丁宁告示讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375264_comment'></div>况臣尝备论思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375264_comment'></div>获叨侍从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375264_comment'></div>当时仙禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375264_comment'></div>惭视草以无能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375264_comment'></div>此日泰坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375264_comment'></div>望给薪而靡及。<div id='poem_sentence_73_1375264_comment'></div>虽有庆于文明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375264_comment'></div>竟无阶于奔走。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375264_comment'></div>司马谈阙陪盛礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375264_comment'></div>没齿难忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375264_comment'></div>萧望之愿立本朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_1375268' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375268' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375268?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为京兆公陜州贺南郊赦表</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375268")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375268_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375268'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375268'>臣某言。臣伏奉正月九日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375268_comment'></div>郊禋礼毕。改元为某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375268_comment'></div>大赦天下者。既事虞郊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375268_comment'></div>复新尧历。天潢<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_1375268", 1375268, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>泻润</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375268_comment'></div>日观扬辉。普天率土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375268_comment'></div>罔不庆幸。臣某中贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375268_comment'></div>臣闻君人之孝。莫大于尊祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375268_comment'></div>王者之敬。孰踰干事天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375268_comment'></div>故必用因高之仪。伸严配之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375268_comment'></div>百神攸序。万灵昭苏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375268_comment'></div>乃可覃殊泽。涣大号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375268_comment'></div>礼成而德备。惠敷而庆宏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375268_comment'></div>然而秦尚武功。先祈禳之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375268_comment'></div>故柴燎萧芗未必飨。汉称文物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375268_comment'></div>重神仙之道。故云门太蔟未必和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375268_comment'></div>既不讲于礼官。终致讥于儒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375268_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下与春生育。并日照临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375268_comment'></div>究三代之质文。酌百王之损益。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375268_comment'></div>定午位。卜上辛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375268_comment'></div>洁斋之诚。先扫除而遐达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375268_comment'></div>孝思之志。协气臭以升闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375268_comment'></div>然后推作解之恩。降惟新之令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375268_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_22_1375268", 1375268, "Clauses/44/Comments/0")'>设科</span>以招谏诤。宥过以务哀矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375268_comment'></div>巳责既恤于三农。录勋无遗于十代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375268_comment'></div>颁粟帛而养耆老。走牲币而遍山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375268_comment'></div>举皇王之废官。尽古今之能事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375268_comment'></div>臣当时集军州官吏丁宁告示讫。况臣尝奉恩光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375268_comment'></div>叨居华显。当太史撰日之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375268_comment'></div>犹立汉庭。及宗伯相仪之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375268_comment'></div>巳辞魏阙。怊怅郡印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375268_comment'></div>徘徊使车。徒深倾藿之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375268_comment'></div>实积悬匏之叹。召公邑内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375268_comment'></div>敢思棠树以追踪。尹喜宅中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375268_comment'></div>惟望灵符之复出。臣不胜庆幸踊跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375268_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_34_1375268_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375638' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375638' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375638?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭张书记文</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年4月20日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375638")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375638_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375638'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375638'>维会昌元年岁次辛酉四月辛丑朔二十日庚申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375638_comment'></div>陇西公荥阳郑某陇西李某安定张某昌黎韩某樊南李某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375638_comment'></div>谨以清酌之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375638_comment'></div>敬祭于故朔方书记张五审礼之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375638_comment'></div>呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375638_comment'></div>古有不重千金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375638_comment'></div>殊轻尺璧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375638_comment'></div>或号百夫之防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375638_comment'></div>或作万人之敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375638_comment'></div>虽争雄角秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375638_comment'></div>殊途异迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375638_comment'></div>念阅水于千龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375638_comment'></div>若冲飙之一息。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375638_comment'></div>吁嗟审礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375638_comment'></div>宁或免之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375638_comment'></div>瞭眸巨鼻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375638_comment'></div>方口疏髭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375638_comment'></div>始自渚宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375638_comment'></div>来游帝里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375638_comment'></div>论激悬河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375638_comment'></div>文酬散绮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375638_comment'></div>体物称最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375638_comment'></div>登高擅美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375638_comment'></div>良时不来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375638_comment'></div>躁进为耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375638_comment'></div>门巷蓬高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375638_comment'></div>荒凉如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375638_comment'></div>藩溷笔砚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375638_comment'></div>寂寥而已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375638_comment'></div>梁多文士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375638_comment'></div>汉有贤王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375638_comment'></div>犹市骏骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375638_comment'></div>肯惊夜光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375638_comment'></div>长裾既曳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375638_comment'></div>健笔谁当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375638_comment'></div>职高莲幕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375638_comment'></div>官带芸香。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375638_comment'></div>青袍如草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375638_comment'></div>白简如霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375638_comment'></div>东阁朝暖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375638_comment'></div>西园夜凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375638_comment'></div>震岂杀公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375638_comment'></div>谌惟故吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375638_comment'></div>渭滨回流马之运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375638_comment'></div>岘首奉辞曹之讳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375638_comment'></div>松筠不改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375638_comment'></div>琴樽有寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375638_comment'></div>三径方营。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375638_comment'></div>一亩乏地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375638_comment'></div>文多为富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375638_comment'></div>无事当贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375638_comment'></div>亦解客嘲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375638_comment'></div>还答宾戏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375638_comment'></div>回翔逸轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375638_comment'></div>傲睨重霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375638_comment'></div>将期晚节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375638_comment'></div>更峻清标。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375638_comment'></div>悬蛇结衅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375638_comment'></div>斗蚁成妖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375638_comment'></div>回生乏<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1375638", 1375638, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>祖洲</span>之草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375638_comment'></div>续断无弱水之胶。<div
