id='poem_sentence_14_1375426_comment'></div>免至颠殒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375426_comment'></div>伏以士之营道抱器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375426_comment'></div>处世立名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375426_comment'></div>诚宜俟彼时来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375426_comment'></div>亦在申于知者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375426_comment'></div>内惟庸薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375426_comment'></div>切有比方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375426_comment'></div>陈蕃甚贫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375426_comment'></div>未欲扫除一室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375426_comment'></div>孟光虽丑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375426_comment'></div>已尝偃蹇数夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375426_comment'></div>倚望光辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375426_comment'></div>实在造次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375426_comment'></div>伏惟终始念察。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1375426_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375521' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375521' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375521?labeling=true' target='_blank'>献舍人彭城公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375521")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375521_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375521'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375521'>某启。即日补阙令狐子直顾及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375521_comment'></div>伏话恩怜。猥加庸陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375521_comment'></div>惶惕所至。感结仍深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375521_comment'></div>某长于邱樊。早惭师友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375521_comment'></div>虽乏许靖干时之材具实怀殷浩当世之心机。而运与愿乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375521_comment'></div>言将俗背。一邱一壑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375521_comment'></div>远愧于幽栖。十辟二徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375521_comment'></div>近惭于籍甚。巳迫地势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375521_comment'></div>属此门衰。藐念流离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375521_comment'></div>莫或遑息。乔木空在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375521_comment'></div>弊庐巳颓。遂与时人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375521_comment'></div>俱为岁贡。三试于宗伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375521_comment'></div>始忝一名。三选于天官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375521_comment'></div>方阶九品。俸微五斗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375521_comment'></div>病满十旬。李陵空弮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375521_comment'></div>勇而无益。陈平裸体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375521_comment'></div>美亦何为。方今圣政维新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375521_comment'></div>朝纲大举。徵伊皋为辅佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375521_comment'></div>用褒向以论思。大窒浇风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375521_comment'></div>廓开雅道。缧囚为学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375521_comment'></div>重见程生。掌囿受经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375521_comment'></div>复开晁子。沉沦者延颈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375521_comment'></div>逃散者动心。是敢窃假菲词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375521_comment'></div>仰干哲匠。果蒙咳唾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375521_comment'></div>以及泥涂。王逊之遥举董聪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375521_comment'></div>方斯未逮。蔡邕之出迎王粲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375521_comment'></div>与此非同。得水可期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375521_comment'></div>搏风有望。坐生羽翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375521_comment'></div>平视烟霄。傥或不吝铸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375521_comment'></div>必令附骥。虽不足深窥阃奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375521_comment'></div>远及几微。然比于鼠识吉凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375521_comment'></div>燕知戊己。既殊异类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375521_comment'></div>盖有深诚。延望光云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375521_comment'></div>尚隔仙路。伏纸魂动。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375521_comment'></div>濡毫气增。伏愿始终念察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375521_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1375521_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375322' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375322' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375322?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为盐州剌史奏举李孚判官状<span class='inlineComment2'>（某官李孚）</span></a><span class='authorDate'>（841年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375322")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375322_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375322'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375322'>右件官克生公族。早履宦途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375322_comment'></div>器实干时。辩能专对。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375322_comment'></div>加之夙明韬略。久逐旌旃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375322_comment'></div>顷为知巳。屈从吏议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375322_comment'></div>许文休之流浪。万里非赊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375322_comment'></div>王仲宣之播迁。三年未遇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375322_comment'></div>俭而不怼。困且能通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375322_comment'></div>虽何恤于无家。良可悲其绝籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375322_comment'></div>去岁以维新之命。大洽鸿私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375322_comment'></div>亦既旋还。合从叙用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375322_comment'></div>开成五年十一月十三日。吏曹巳注右威卫仓曹参军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375322_comment'></div>授官未谢。又蒙挟名除替。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375322_comment'></div>初云牵复。仍迫屡空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375322_comment'></div>京口刘生。方思<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1375322", 1375322, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>鹅炙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375322_comment'></div>洛阳苏子。巳弊貂裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375322_comment'></div>方今崇帝尧敦厚之恩。推魏文荣乐之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375322_comment'></div>岂令弃良材于散地。化王孙为旅人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375322_comment'></div>臣素乏器能。叨膺任使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375322_comment'></div>控绿池之要地。守清泽之坚城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375322_comment'></div>将以宣布威灵。弹压氛祲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375322_comment'></div>苟咨谋失所。佐理非材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375322_comment'></div>岂惟衄此军声。兼且伤于朝寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375322_comment'></div>臣深自计。孚实当仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375322_comment'></div>况又得于诸宗。且兼通旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375322_comment'></div>诸葛均有因依之分。庞士元多鉴裁之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375322_comment'></div>是敢辄黩<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1375322", 1375322, "Clauses/50/Comments/0")'>宸阶</span>。乞荣宾席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375322_comment'></div>使得尽其风力。佐彼边陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375322_comment'></div>锥处平原之囊。必将脱㯋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375322_comment'></div>剑拭华阴之土。粗雪幽沈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375322_comment'></div>请依资赐授一官。充臣防御判官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375322_comment'></div>干冒宸旒。无任战越。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375322_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_31_1375322_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375265' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375265' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375265?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为汝南公以妖星见贺德音表</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年11月16日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375265")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375265_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375265'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375265'>臣某言。臣伏奉某月日德音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375265_comment'></div>以妖星谪见。思答天戒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375265_comment'></div>臣当时集军州官吏丁宁宣示讫。仁深覆载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375265_comment'></div>恩极照临。究祖宗之令图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375265_comment'></div>极皇王之盛事。圆首方足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375265_comment'></div>罔不欣庆。臣某中贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375265_comment'></div>臣闻覆载莫大于天地。而升降之气或不接。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375265_comment'></div>照临莫大于日月。而薄蚀之度或有差。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375265_comment'></div>岂惟休咎之徵。自是阴阳之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375265_comment'></div>旋观彗孛。载考策书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375265_comment'></div>虽欲为灾。曷尝胜德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375265_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下荆枝载茂。棣萼重辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375265_comment'></div>既居正以体元。亦观文而察变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375265_comment'></div>仰观星彩。稍越天常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375265_comment'></div>于是深轸皇情。重回宸眷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375265_comment'></div>省躬之惧。洞感于幽明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375265_comment'></div>及物之恩。毕沾于华夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375265_comment'></div>戒田游则成汤祝网之意。释冤滞乃大禹泣辜之慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375265_comment'></div>罢去修营。惜汉氏十家之产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375265_comment'></div>劝课耘耔。复周邦九岁之储。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375265_comment'></div>德巳厚矣。仁巳极矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375265_comment'></div>然犹<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_21_1375265", 1375265, "Clauses/42/Comments/0")'>避寝</span>自责。撤膳贻忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375265_comment'></div>以此延休。何休不至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375265_comment'></div>以兹备患。何患能为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375265_comment'></div>足以高步三王。平窥百古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375265_comment'></div>鞭挞守成之主。秕糠中代之君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375265_comment'></div>抑臣又闻之。昔贞观之理也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375265_comment'></div>太宗文皇帝吞蝗而灾沴息。泰岱之封也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375265_comment'></div>玄宗明皇帝露坐而风雨消。炯戒犹存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375265_comment'></div>神灵未远。陛下永怀贻厥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375265_comment'></div>有切钦承。为其所不为。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375265_comment'></div>至其所不至。伫见地泉流醴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375265_comment'></div>天酒凝甘。人知朱草之祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375265_comment'></div>家识白麟之瑞。又岂芒角足惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375265_comment'></div>晷度可忧者哉。臣素乏器能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375265_comment'></div>谬当任使。东雍西岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375265_comment'></div>虽首化于百城。日远天高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375265_comment'></div>但心存于双阙。听金石而惭殊舞兽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375265_comment'></div>无羽翼而恨异冥鸿。惟当虔奉诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375265_comment'></div>颁宣德泽。成陛下无偏之道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375265_comment'></div>毕微臣尽瘁之勤。所冀不寘简书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375265_comment'></div>免拘司败。如其礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375265_comment'></div>非臣所能。无任感恩恋阙恳悃屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375265_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_43_1375265_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375266' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375266' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375266?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为汝南公贺彗星不见表</a><span class='authorDate'>（841年12月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375266")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375266_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375266'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375266'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375266_comment'></div>得本州进奏院状报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375266_comment'></div>今月某日夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375266_comment'></div>彗星不见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375266_comment'></div>宰臣某等奉表称贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375266_comment'></div>请御正殿复常膳者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375266_comment'></div>天道甚密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375266_comment'></div>圣心不遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375266_comment'></div>感极而灾亦为祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375266_comment'></div>诚至而妖宁胜德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375266_comment'></div>臣某中贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375266_comment'></div>臣闻殷汤以六事责躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375266_comment'></div>止七年之旱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375266_comment'></div>宋景以一言修德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375266_comment'></div>退三舍之星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375266_comment'></div>历代以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375266_comment'></div>咎徵常有。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375266_comment'></div>苟君能克已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375266_comment'></div>则祸不移人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375266_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下寅奉丕图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375266_comment'></div>恭临大宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375266_comment'></div>遵符列圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375266_comment'></div>酌宪前王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375266_comment'></div>昨者天象之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375266_comment'></div>星文稍异。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375266_comment'></div>载深归咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375266_comment'></div>爰用覃恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375266_comment'></div>仓箱毕复于九年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375266_comment'></div>罗网并开其三面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375266_comment'></div>去营缮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375266_comment'></div>绝荡心之巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375266_comment'></div>申冤结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375266_comment'></div>除灭耳之俘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375266_comment'></div>而又正殿不居。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375266_comment'></div>大庖尽减。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375266_comment'></div>精诚昭达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375266_comment'></div>恳恻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1375266", 1375266, "Clauses/36/Comments/0")'>敷闻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375266_comment'></div>芒焰遽销。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375266_comment'></div>晷度如旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375266_comment'></div>况蕞尔戎羯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375266_comment'></div>正犯疆场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375266_comment'></div>载思星见之徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375266_comment'></div>恐是虏亡之兆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375266_comment'></div>伏惟稍宽圣虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375266_comment'></div>以拥皇休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375266_comment'></div>遵九庙之降祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375266_comment'></div>副兆人之钦属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375266_comment'></div>臣又闻皇王之事天也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375266_comment'></div>虽至理之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375266_comment'></div>不遗于忧畏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375266_comment'></div>虽至和之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375266_comment'></div>不忘于将迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375266_comment'></div>是故神农焦劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375266_comment'></div>轩帝憔悴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375266_comment'></div>尧既癯瘠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375266_comment'></div>舜亦胼胝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375266_comment'></div>此四主侧身于昔时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375266_comment'></div>陛下用心于今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375266_comment'></div>千载符契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375266_comment'></div>万方怀柔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375266_comment'></div>臣常忝内朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375266_comment'></div>今居近甸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375266_comment'></div>拱辰不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375266_comment'></div>空瞻北极之尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375266_comment'></div>就日无因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375266_comment'></div>忽觉长安之远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375266_comment'></div>惟知忭蹈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375266_comment'></div>莫可奋飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375266_comment'></div>况时及初正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375266_comment'></div>礼当元会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375266_comment'></div>华夷毕至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375266_comment'></div>玉帛皆陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375266_comment'></div>小国行人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375266_comment'></div>外藩下士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375266_comment'></div>皆得入趋凤阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375266_comment'></div>仰望兽樽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375266_comment'></div>臣独限关河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375266_comment'></div>坐萦符竹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375266_comment'></div>恋既深而词恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375266_comment'></div>庆巳极而涕零。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375266_comment'></div>无任感恩贺圣郁恋屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_80_1375266_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end



-----title
兖州
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='aeda5f8295944e358a261fe9b48a87f7_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("aeda5f8295944e358a261fe9b48a87f7");'><span id='aeda5f8295944e358a261fe9b48a87f7_link' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=834&endYear=834')">834年4月</a>　四月，随崔戎自华洲至兖州，掌奏章。五月初抵达。作品：为安平公兗州谢上表。<div id='poem_1375261' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375261' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375261?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为安平公兖州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（834年4月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375261")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375261_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375261'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375261'>臣某言。臣自承明诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375261_comment'></div>移镇东藩。望阙而雪涕以辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375261_comment'></div>戒途而星奔不息。即以今月五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375261_comment'></div>到任上讫。当时集军州官吏等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375261_comment'></div>宣布皇风。阐扬元造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375261_comment'></div>欢声雷动。喜气云高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375261_comment'></div>臣某中谢。臣本由儒业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375261_comment'></div>获厕朝荣。粤自乌台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375261_comment'></div>至于青琐。累更近地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375261_comment'></div>皆奉休期。用尽心以书绅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375261_comment'></div>长忧福过。取知足而铭座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375261_comment'></div>敢傲时来。旋属皇帝陛下垂意关城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375261_comment'></div>推心甸服。俾之防遏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375261_comment'></div>兼使缉绥。横被天波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375261_comment'></div>未移星琯。岂期非次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375261_comment'></div>忽致殊迁。察俗雄藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375261_comment'></div>分荣大宪。地滨河济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375261_comment'></div>山奄龟蒙。本孔里周封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375261_comment'></div>有尧祠舜泽。九州之名数甚古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375261_comment'></div>三代之礼乐旧传。退省何人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375261_comment'></div>合安兹地。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1375261", 1375261, "Clauses/41/Comments/0")'>抚躬</span>而浃背汗下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375261_comment'></div>仰恩而溢眦泪流。况所部骁雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375261_comment'></div>素兼节制。为于当代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375261_comment'></div>便属文臣。画武聚萤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375261_comment'></div>昔惟久事笔砚。佩鞬带鹖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375261_comment'></div>今宁能执干戈。幸臣前在华州日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375261_comment'></div>虔奉诏条。克宣戎律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375261_comment'></div>检下而羊无九牧。驭黠而犬用左牵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375261_comment'></div>用令去任之时。大有遮留之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375261_comment'></div>尽三属县。至万馀人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375261_comment'></div>不放即途。皆来卧辙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375261_comment'></div>竟稽朝发。遂致宵奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375261_comment'></div>请于兹时。亦因前政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375261_comment'></div>冀渐令苏息。长使谧宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375261_comment'></div>然后远访云亭。高寻日观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375261_comment'></div>备万乘登封之所。设诸侯朝宿之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375261_comment'></div>盛礼获窥。微愿斯毕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375261_comment'></div>过此以往。不知所图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375261_comment'></div>无任戴恩陨越之至。谨差某官某奉表陈谢以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375285_comment'></div>恩生望外。荣积惧中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375285_comment'></div>臣巳当时宣布给散讫。伏以正阳令月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375285_comment'></div>端午佳辰。渥泽合止于勋贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375285_comment'></div>锡赉宜先于戚属。臣远临东鲁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375285_comment'></div>伏读而不啻千钧。一袭轻衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375285_comment'></div>跪捧而若无三伏。况又䌽缕出仙蚕之茧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375285_comment'></div>在列校不遗。华楚成行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375285_comment'></div>永愿千春而奉圣。绵长共保。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375285_comment'></div>常期五日以沾恩。臣与大将等无任感激恳悃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375285_comment'></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375263'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375263_comment'></div>臣闻风叶露华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375263_comment'></div>荣落之姿何定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375263_comment'></div>夏朝冬日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375263_comment'></div>短长之数难移。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375263_comment'></div>臣幸属昌期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375263_comment'></div>谬登贵仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375263_comment'></div>行年五十五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375263_comment'></div>历官二十三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375263_comment'></div>念犬马之常期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375263_comment'></div>死亦非夭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375263_comment'></div>奈君亲之厚施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375263_comment'></div>生以无酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375263_comment'></div>是以时及含珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375263_comment'></div>命馀属纩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375263_comment'></div>心犹向阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375263_comment'></div>手尚封章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375263_comment'></div>抚躬而气息奄然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375263_comment'></div>恋主而方寸乱矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375263_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375263_comment'></div>臣少而羁绁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375263_comment'></div>长乃遭逢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375263_comment'></div>常将直道而行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375263_comment'></div>实以明经入仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375263_comment'></div>王畿作吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375263_comment'></div>非州府之职徒劳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375263_comment'></div>侯国从知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375263_comment'></div>愧军旅之事未学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375263_comment'></div>宪宗皇帝谓臣刚决。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375263_comment'></div>擢以宪司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375263_comment'></div>穆宗皇帝谓臣才能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375263_comment'></div>登之郎选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375263_comment'></div>忝霜威而无所摧拉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375263_comment'></div>历星纪而有紊次躔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375263_comment'></div>旋属皇帝陛下大明御宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375263_comment'></div>至道承乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375263_comment'></div>澄汰之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375263_comment'></div>臣不居有过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375263_comment'></div>超擢之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375263_comment'></div>臣独出常伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375263_comment'></div>高选掖垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375263_comment'></div>箴规未效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375263_comment'></div>入居琐闼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375263_comment'></div>论驳无闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375263_comment'></div>自去年秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375263_comment'></div>来典河关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375263_comment'></div>兼临甸服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375263_comment'></div>惟当静而阜俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375263_comment'></div>清以绳奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375263_comment'></div>粗致丰穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375263_comment'></div>幸逃逋责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375263_comment'></div>岂意陛下谓臣奄有三县。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375263_comment'></div>未称其能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375263_comment'></div>谓臣出以一麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375263_comment'></div>未足为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375263_comment'></div>爰降纶綍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375263_comment'></div>移之藩方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375263_comment'></div>锡以海隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375263_comment'></div>与之岳镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375263_comment'></div>将吾君之骁果万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375263_comment'></div>使得总齐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375263_comment'></div>联吾君之牧伯三人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375263_comment'></div>以居巡属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375263_comment'></div>时虽相羡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375263_comment'></div>臣实深忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375263_comment'></div>既属圣恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375263_comment'></div>果遭鬼瞰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375263_comment'></div>况臣素无微恙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375263_comment'></div>未及大年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375263_comment'></div>方思高挂馈鱼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375263_comment'></div>不然官烛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375263_comment'></div>成陛下比屋可封之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375263_comment'></div>分陛下一夫不获之忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375263_comment'></div>志愿未伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375263_comment'></div>大期俄迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375263_comment'></div>忽至今月十日夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375263_comment'></div>暴染霍乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375263_comment'></div>并两肋气注。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375263_comment'></div>当时检验方书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375263_comment'></div>煎和药物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375263_comment'></div>百计疗理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375263_comment'></div>一无痊除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375263_comment'></div>至十一日辰时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375263_comment'></div>转加困剧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375263_comment'></div>渐不支持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375263_comment'></div>想彼孤魂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375263_comment'></div>已游岱岳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375263_comment'></div>念兹二竖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375263_comment'></div>徒访秦医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375263_comment'></div>对印执符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375263_comment'></div>碎心殒首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375263_comment'></div>人之到此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375263_comment'></div>命也如何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375263_comment'></div>恋深而乏力以言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375263_comment'></div>泣尽而无血可继。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375263_comment'></div>臣某诚哀诚恋顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375263_comment'></div>臣当道三军将士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375263_comment'></div>准前使李文悦例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375263_comment'></div>差监军使元顺通勾当讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375263_comment'></div>臣与顺通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375263_comment'></div>近同王事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375263_comment'></div>备见公才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375263_comment'></div>假之统临。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375263_comment'></div>必能和协。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375263_comment'></div>其团练观察两使事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1375263_comment'></div>差都团练巡官卢泾勾当讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1375263_comment'></div>臣亦授之方略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1375263_comment'></div>示以规模。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1375263_comment'></div>伏惟圣明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1375263_comment'></div>不致忧轸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1375263_comment'></div>臣精神危促。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1375263_comment'></div>言词失错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1375263_comment'></div>行当穷尘埋骨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1375263_comment'></div>枯木容身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1375263_comment'></div>蝼蚁卜邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1375263_comment'></div>乌鸢食祭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1375263_comment'></div>黄河两曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1375263_comment'></div>长安几千。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1375263_comment'></div>生入旧关。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1375263_comment'></div>望绝班超之请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1375263_comment'></div>力封遗奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1375263_comment'></div>痛深来歙之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1375263_comment'></div>回望昭代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1375263_comment'></div>不胜荒惙眷恋之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1375263_comment'></div>谨差某奉表代辞以闻。</div><div id='poem_sentence_124_1375263_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>，24岁</div><div id='0a96e69e3df7466fb493591feaf8e044' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=835&endYear=835')">835年</a>　往郑州，途经洛阳，结识里娘柳枝，有诗。作品：柳枝五首。<div id='poem_28686' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28686' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/28686?labeling=true' target='_blank'>柳枝五首<span style='margin: 0 0.5em'> 其一 </span></a><span class='authorDate'>（835年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_28686")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言绝句</div></div><div id='poem_title_28686_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_28686'>柳枝，洛中里娘也。父饶好贾，风波死湖上。其母不念他儿子，独念柳枝。生十七年，涂妆绾髻，未尝竟，已复起去。吹叶嚼蕊，调丝擪管，作天海风涛之曲，幽忆怨断之音。居其傍，与其家接（与其家揖）。故往来者，闻十年尚相与，疑其醉眠，梦断不娉（梦物断不娉）。余从昆让山比柳枝居为近。他日春，曾阴，让山下马柳枝南柳下，咏余燕台诗。柳枝惊问：「谁人有此？谁人为是？」让山谓曰：「此吾里中少年叔耳。」柳枝手断长带，结让山为赠叔乞诗。明日，余比马出其巷。柳枝丫鬟毕妆，抱立扇下，风障一袖，指曰：「若叔是（若叔句）？后三日，邻当去溅裙水上，以博山香待，与郎俱过。」余诺之。会所友有偕当诣京师者，戏盗余卧装以先，不果留。雪中让山至，且曰：「东诸侯取去矣。」明年，让山复东，相背于戏上，因寓诗以墨其故处云。</div><div id='poem_preface_28686_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_28686'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_28686'>花房与蜜脾，蜂雄蛱蝶雌。<div id='poem_sentence_0_28686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_28686'>同时不同类，那复更相思。<div id='poem_sentence_1_28686_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=836&endYear=836')">836年</a>　在洛阳，令狐楚聘为幕，未及赴任。作品：故番禺侯以赃罪致不辜事觉母者他日过其门。李肱所遗画松诗书两纸得四十韵。送从翁从东川弘农尚书幕。令狐八拾遗绹见招送裴十四归华州。和友人戏赠二首。题二首后重有戏赠任秀才。<div id='poem_28918' id='poem_sentence_33_29109_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_29109'>忆昔谢四骑，学仙玉阳东。<div id='poem_sentence_34_29109_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_1375400' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375400' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375400?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上令狐相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（836年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375400")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375400_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375400'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375400'>伏蒙仁恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375400_comment'></div>赐借太原日所著歌诗等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375400_comment'></div>伏以四丈翊戴大君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375400_comment'></div>仪刑多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375400_comment'></div>郁为邦彦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375400_comment'></div>早司国钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375400_comment'></div>盛烈殊勋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375400_comment'></div>已光于帝载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375400_comment'></div>徽音清论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375400_comment'></div>复播于仁谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375400_comment'></div>尚或研美二南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375400_comment'></div>留情四始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375400_comment'></div>峻标格而山联太华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375400_comment'></div>鼓洪涛而河到三门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375400_comment'></div>望绝攀跻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375400_comment'></div>理无揭厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375400_comment'></div>足使清风知愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375400_comment'></div>白雪怀羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375400_comment'></div>纵金悬而谁得求瑕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375400_comment'></div>但纸贵而莫不传写。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375400_comment'></div>某者顷虽有志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375400_comment'></div>晚无成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375400_comment'></div>雅当画虎之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375400_comment'></div>徒有登龙之忝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375400_comment'></div>淮邸夙叨于词客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375400_comment'></div>梁园早厕于文人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375400_comment'></div>每至因事寄情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375400_comment'></div>寓物成命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375400_comment'></div>无不搦管兴叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375400_comment'></div>伏纸多惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375400_comment'></div>思迟已过于马卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375400_comment'></div>体弱复踰于王粲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375400_comment'></div>岂可思当作赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375400_comment'></div>任窃言诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375400_comment'></div>空怀博我之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375400_comment'></div>宁发启予之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375400_comment'></div>谨当附于经史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375400_comment'></div>寘彼缣缃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375400_comment'></div>永观大匠之宏规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375400_comment'></div>长作私门之秘宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375400_comment'></div>伏惟特赐照察。</div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1375400_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='aed0f6c5082241ddb7ff8af2c99b5994_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("aed0f6c5082241ddb7ff8af2c99b5994");'><span id='aed0f6c5082241ddb7ff8af2c99b5994_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>，34岁</div><div id='aed0f6c5082241ddb7ff8af2c99b5994' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　与家人居洛阳。作品：上座主李相公状。为绛郡公上李相公启。为弘农公上两考官状。上李舍人状一。为相国陇西公黄箓斋文。为绛郡公祭宣武王尚书文。上郑州李舍人状二。<div id='poem_1375406' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375406' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375406?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上座主李相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年5月19日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375406")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375406_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375406'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375406'>伏见恩制。相公以五月十九日登庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375406_comment'></div>清庙降灵。苍生受福。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375406_comment'></div>动植之内。欢呼毕同。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375406_comment'></div>某下情不任忭贺踊跃之至。相公禀润咸池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375406_comment'></div>承光太极。业传殷相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375406_comment'></div>族预周盟。为群生之司南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375406_comment'></div>作九流之华盖。自顷文场鞠旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375406_comment'></div>册府扬镳。坐奋英词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375406_comment'></div>折班马之方驾。入陈嘉话。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375406_comment'></div>纳晁董之降旗。百家无抗礼之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375406_comment'></div>六艺绝措词之士。一昨秋官分宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375406_comment'></div>风宪兼司。克扬典刑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375406_comment'></div>肃整严裁。重以潞潜逆孽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375406_comment'></div>帝命遄征。贲赫之告变虽来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375406_comment'></div>蒯彻之说词未巳。人怀顾望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375406_comment'></div>师有逗留。相公敛笏忘家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375406_comment'></div>单车就路。明宣朝旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375406_comment'></div>密授兵机。谋穷遁甲之精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375406_comment'></div>辩得钤经之要。遽使戎臣释位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375406_comment'></div>谋士资忠。凶渠计尽而就诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375406_comment'></div>逆党死前而知悔。太行九折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375406_comment'></div>复连洛宅之封疆。启圣千门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375406_comment'></div>更降明皇之叹息。宁闻伐善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375406_comment'></div>愈恐书勋。鲁司寇三日之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375406_comment'></div>戮正卯于两观之下。汉司隶一旬之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375406_comment'></div>取张朔于合柱之中。并罪得匹夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375406_comment'></div>功非方面。苟将拟议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375406_comment'></div>良匪同途。而又代朔旧戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375406_comment'></div>沙陲小梗。既谋元帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375406_comment'></div>果在贤王。相公复以全谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375406_comment'></div>副司戎重。远扬威画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375406_comment'></div>寻以怀柔。笺函屡献于懿宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375406_comment'></div>毡罽亟征于内府。虽西京哲辅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375406_comment'></div>例有重封。东晋元僚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375406_comment'></div>率多兼领。亦罕有下鞲必中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375406_comment'></div>投刃皆虚。旷百代以求人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375406_comment'></div>谁一日而争长。今果允扶下武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375406_comment'></div>显践中枢。赞光宅之大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375406_comment'></div>调复古之元气。往者傅岩伫相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375406_comment'></div>唯升版筑之夫。渭水载占。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375406_comment'></div>正获竿缗之叟。又岂若相公本枝分庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375406_comment'></div>出自<span class='inlineComment2'>（疑）</span>流辉。袭康叔之亲贤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375406_comment'></div>禀太邱之道德。萧何家谍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375406_comment'></div>不闻代有鼎司。邓禹外门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375406_comment'></div>讵是族传宰匠。苟非君子之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375406_comment'></div>宁光史氏之书。伫见扶祐休期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375406_comment'></div>修明盛礼。南鹣东鲽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375406_comment'></div>徒颁飨帝之羞。鲁甸梁山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375406_comment'></div>待瘗事天之检。某尝因薄伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375406_comment'></div>猥奉深知。麟角何成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375406_comment'></div>牛心早啖。及兹沈滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375406_comment'></div>获荫燮调。瞻绛帐以增怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375406_comment'></div>望台星而兴叹。昔吴公荐贾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375406_comment'></div>非宜铨管之司。孔子铸颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375406_comment'></div>未是陶钧之力。比谊恩重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375406_comment'></div>方渊感深。嗟睹奥以未期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375406_comment'></div>但濡毫而抒恳。崔氏之乃心紫阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375406_comment'></div>陈生之思入京城。千古揆怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375406_comment'></div>一时均虑。临风托使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375406_comment'></div>指景依人。柱础成润于兴云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375406_comment'></div>辙鲋何阶于泛海。下情无任忭贺踊跃攀恋感激之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375406_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_61_1375406_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375480' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375480' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375480?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为绛郡公上李相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年5月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375480")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375480_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375480'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375480'>某少悲羁绁。不承师友之亲规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375480_comment'></div>晚学文章。粗致乡曲之名誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375480_comment'></div>谬污官秩。遂彯华缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375480_comment'></div>握兰清曹。视草禁掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375480_comment'></div>贪叨过极。忧责非宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375480_comment'></div>蚤为寒暑所侵。颇染肺肠之疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375480_comment'></div>自顷以庆云结荫。宸极系心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375480_comment'></div>当就望以推诚。于煎调而寡裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375480_comment'></div>前岁伏蒙任使。奉远承明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375480_comment'></div>值朝廷兴问罪之师。原野有宿兵之馈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375480_comment'></div>绛城甚苦。郑驲非完。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375480_comment'></div>加之以降虏移乡。仍之以贵臣衔命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375480_comment'></div>飞挽之外。将迎实繁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375480_comment'></div>旁奉庙谟。上尊诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375480_comment'></div>动繁调发。居劳抚安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375480_comment'></div>抱疾以临。为日斯久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375480_comment'></div>伏幸奸凶克乂。濡泽横流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375480_comment'></div>是大朝黜陟之初。良冶埏镕之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375480_comment'></div>此郡路通四境。名冠六雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375480_comment'></div>轩盖以来。原野交错。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375480_comment'></div>萑蒲有聚。武吏贻忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375480_comment'></div>虽清时无杼柚之虞。而常日有逋悬之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375480_comment'></div>必在假之贤守。属以强材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375480_comment'></div>然后谣咏克兴。公私不废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375480_comment'></div>岂可使某素兼疴恙。本乏良能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375480_comment'></div>久于是邦。以主东道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375480_comment'></div>馈飧将药瓯并进。假牒与公案相随。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375480_comment'></div>含意不言。贪荣是罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375480_comment'></div>相公汉筹始运。殷鼎将调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375480_comment'></div>度材任官。归于至当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375480_comment'></div>存诚爱物。决在无颇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375480_comment'></div>窃敢自托缄封。远干樽俎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375480_comment'></div>俯期恩意。以保衰微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375480_comment'></div>且某运偶昌期。年初知命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375480_comment'></div>岂不愿临剧郡。稍冀荣途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375480_comment'></div>但以力有所不任。心有所不逮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375480_comment'></div>虽欲勉强。实忧倾败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375480_comment'></div>彼吴楚偏乡。非舟车要路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375480_comment'></div>永言凋瘵。亦藉缉绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375480_comment'></div>傥特降优容。遥闻拟议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375480_comment'></div>则朽质有报恩之所。羸躯收旷位之讥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375480_comment'></div>宿疢或痊。理剧未晚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375480_comment'></div>伏惟试赐裁度。向风披恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375480_comment'></div>服义陈词。仰台耀以瞻辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375480_comment'></div>望洪钧而伫惠。干冒尊听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375480_comment'></div>伏积兢惕。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375480_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_46_1375480_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375396' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375396' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375396?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为宏农公上两考官状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375396")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375396_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375396'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375396'>伏见前月十九日恩制。座主相公登庸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375396_comment'></div>某科等受恩。伏增荣抃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375396_comment'></div>閤下同德比义。契重交深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375396_comment'></div>载惟爰立之荣。伫见汇征之吉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375396_comment'></div>下情不任迎贺踊跃之至。伏惟照察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375396_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_5_1375396_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375588' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375588' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375588?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为相国陇西公黄箓斋文</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375588")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375588_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375588'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375588'>臣忝系仙枝。获蒙道荫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375588_comment'></div>早佩相印。屡登斋坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375588_comment'></div>虽八景三清。粗闻科戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375588_comment'></div>而七情五贼。未勉修持。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375588_comment'></div>入辅出征。绵时历岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375588_comment'></div>伏虑政刑非当。赏罚或乖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375588_comment'></div>积𠌤咎于元司。负委寄于皇渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375588_comment'></div>今谨赍薄具。仰献微诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375588_comment'></div>伏乞太上三尊。十方众圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375588_comment'></div>曲垂保祐。大赐涤除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375588_comment'></div>俾善业克成。良愿无拥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375588_comment'></div>金柯玉叶。奉圣祖于千秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375588_comment'></div>黄屋丹墀。戴吾君于亿载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375588_comment'></div>百蛮康乐。万国乂安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375588_comment'></div>然后散及冥涂。沾诸酆部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375588_comment'></div>寒灵罢对。滞爽腾辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375588_comment'></div>俱升仁寿之方。共奉太平之化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375588_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1375588_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375625' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375625' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375625?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为绛郡公祭宣武王尚书文</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375625")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375625_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375625'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375625'>伏惟曾构高基。往修峻址。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375625_comment'></div>俯为明时。载生奇士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375625_comment'></div>杜林舅族。本富文理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375625_comment'></div>杨恽外孙。素多图史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375625_comment'></div>朱槛有裕。括羽成美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375625_comment'></div>逸足轻从东之道。巨背狭图南之水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375625_comment'></div>匡生明习。董氏精专。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375625_comment'></div>鲁壁坠简。汲冢遗编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375625_comment'></div>坐忘流麦。出记怀铅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375625_comment'></div>淹中莫敌。稷下谁先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375625_comment'></div>朝有曲台。时推奥学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375625_comment'></div>明博士之高选。资众儒之先觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375625_comment'></div>殷周损益。夔夷礼乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375625_comment'></div>既得根源。尽除舛驳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375625_comment'></div>粉闱假道。谏署扬辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375625_comment'></div>吾宁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_15_1375625", 1375625, "Clauses/30/Comments/0")'>讦讪</span>。时好依违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375625_comment'></div>周举上章。惟求主悟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375625_comment'></div>贾生草疏。岂畏人非。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375625_comment'></div>用之则至。舍之则归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375625_comment'></div>旋领藩符。俄司国计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375625_comment'></div>锄革烦冗。修明课第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375625_comment'></div>鄙晋室之鬻綀。小汉朝之造币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375625_comment'></div>前筹未借。敛笏还家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375625_comment'></div>再北非罪。三黜何嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375625_comment'></div>淮阳劲兵。颍水豪族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375625_comment'></div>既佩新印。仍推旧毂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375625_comment'></div>杜当阳何尝跨马。雄士争推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375625_comment'></div>祭征虏不废投壶。师人自睦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375625_comment'></div>夷门地古。梁苑藩雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375625_comment'></div>双旌大旆。二矛重弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375625_comment'></div>无忌御车。惟求隐者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375625_comment'></div>相如谢病。乃慕高风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375625_comment'></div>方将副帝注心。从时大愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375625_comment'></div>率周庙之奔走。总汉庭之议论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375625_comment'></div>人之不幸。今也则亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375625_comment'></div>庄子孰分其魍魉。秦医莫救其膏肓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375625_comment'></div>雁沼波澜。空闻悲咽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375625_comment'></div>兔园台榭。祇见荒凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375625_comment'></div>某获顾尤深。蒙知甚早。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375625_comment'></div>公昔分茅。愚尝视草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375625_comment'></div>于刘向论思之时。赞孟舒长者之号。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375625_comment'></div>及兹出守。实介亲邻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375625_comment'></div>音徽继好。寤寐依仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375625_comment'></div>常期异日。克奉清尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375625_comment'></div>林薄莽苍。川原隐辚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375625_comment'></div>想诸葛之旗鼓。空还旧垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375625_comment'></div>念伯喈之书籍。已付何人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375625_comment'></div>候馆攸开。丹幡遽至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375625_comment'></div>瞻望卫幕。连绵秦畤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375625_comment'></div>寄奠申诀。缄词写意。<div class='inline' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375408?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上李太尉状</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年10月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375408")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375408_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375408'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375408'>伏奉别纸荣示。伏承以所撰武宗一朝册书诰命并奏议等一十五轴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375408_comment'></div>编次已成。爰命庸虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375408_comment'></div>俾之序引。捧缄汗下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375408_comment'></div>揣已魂飞。久自安排。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375408_comment'></div>方见髣髴。作春秋而救乱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375408_comment'></div>由有素臣。删风雅以刺时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375408_comment'></div>宁遗小序。式蒙善诱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375408_comment'></div>安敢固辞。伏惟武宗皇帝英断无疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375408_comment'></div>睿姿不测。绿畴缉美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375408_comment'></div>瑞鼎刊规。太尉妙简宸襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375408_comment'></div>式光洪祚。有大手笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375408_comment'></div>居第一功。在古有夙搆之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375408_comment'></div>食时之敏。片辞相炫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375408_comment'></div>小道可嗤。将以拟人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375408_comment'></div>固不同日。荣示中所引国朝文字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375408_comment'></div>实炳儒林。然其间有行实非优。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375408_comment'></div>附会成累。终衰凤德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375408_comment'></div>或露圭瑕。岂若世显华宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375408_comment'></div>代光相座。洁随武之家事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375408_comment'></div>纂邓傅之门风。庙战之权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375408_comment'></div>风行于万里。国俭之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375408_comment'></div>日闻于四方。言不失诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375408_comment'></div>事皆传信。固合藏于中禁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375408_comment'></div>付在有司。居微诰说命之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375408_comment'></div>为帝典皇坟之式。某更祈旬月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375408_comment'></div>庶立纪纲。先深鄙陋之惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375408_comment'></div>已望优容之德。甘瓜苦蒂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375408_comment'></div>必兴叹于墨子。羔裘豹袖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375408_comment'></div>足贻刺于诗人。荷戴之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375408_comment'></div>兢惕又积。伏惟特赐照察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375408_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1375408_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='556fac2253ca4bd5a023dae1d2983edf_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("556fac2253ca4bd5a023dae1d2983edf");'><span id='556fac2253ca4bd5a023dae1d2983edf_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年</a>，40岁</div><div id='556fac2253ca4bd5a023dae1d2983edf' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=851&endYear=851')">851年</a>　梓州辟后由京返洛料理琐事。作品：辛未七夕。崇让宅东亭醉后沔然有作。昨夜。夜冷。西亭。临发崇让宅紫薇。王十二兄与畏之员外相访见招小饮时予以悼亡日近不去因寄。上河东公谢辟启。上河东公谢聘钱启。为东川崔从事谢辟启。为东川崔从事谢聘钱启。为举人献韩郎中琮启。为故鄜坊李尚书夫人王炼师黄箓斋文疑。陈宁摄公井令牒。七月二十八日夜与王郑二秀才听雨后梦作。七月二十九日崇让宅宴作。<div id='poem_28879' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28879' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/28879?labeling=true' target='_blank'>辛未七夕</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年）</span><span class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375512?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上河东公谢辟启</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375512")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375512_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375512'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375512'>商隐启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375512_comment'></div>伏奉手笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375512_comment'></div>猥赐奏署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375512_comment'></div>某少而孱薾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375512_comment'></div>长则艰屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375512_comment'></div>有志为文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375512_comment'></div>无资就学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375512_comment'></div>虽杂赋八首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375512_comment'></div>或庶于马迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375512_comment'></div>而读书五车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375512_comment'></div>远惭于惠子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375512_comment'></div>契阔湖岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375512_comment'></div>凄凉路岐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375512_comment'></div>罕遇心知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375512_comment'></div>多逢皮相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375512_comment'></div>昔鲁人以仲尼为佞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375512_comment'></div>淮阴以韩信为怯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375512_comment'></div>圣哲且犹如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375512_comment'></div>寻常安能免乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375512_comment'></div>是以艮背却行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375512_comment'></div>冰心自处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375512_comment'></div>罗含兰菊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375512_comment'></div>仲蔚蓬蒿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375512_comment'></div>见芳草则怨王孙之不归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375512_comment'></div>抚高松则叹大夫之虚位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375512_comment'></div>不可终否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375512_comment'></div>属于高明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375512_comment'></div>伏惟尚书春日<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1375512", 1375512, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>同和</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375512_comment'></div>秋霜共烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375512_comment'></div>叔子则九代清德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375512_comment'></div>稚春则七叶素儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375512_comment'></div>君子立言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375512_comment'></div>永为周礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375512_comment'></div>正人得位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375512_comment'></div>长作岁星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375512_comment'></div>今者初陟将坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375512_comment'></div>始敷宾席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375512_comment'></div>射洪奥壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375512_comment'></div>潼水名都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375512_comment'></div>俗擅繁华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375512_comment'></div>地多材隽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375512_comment'></div>指巴西则民皆谯秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375512_comment'></div>访临邛则客有相如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375512_comment'></div>举纤缴以下冥鸿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375512_comment'></div>执定镜而求西子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375512_comment'></div>惟所指命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375512_comment'></div>便为丹青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375512_comment'></div>若某者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375512_comment'></div>又安可眩露短材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375512_comment'></div>叨尘记室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375512_comment'></div>盐车款段。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375512_comment'></div>徒逢伯乐而鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375512_comment'></div>土鼓迂疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375512_comment'></div>恐致文侯之卧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375512_comment'></div>承命知忝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375512_comment'></div>抚怀自惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375512_comment'></div>终无喻蜀之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375512_comment'></div>但誓依刘之愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375512_comment'></div>未获谒谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375512_comment'></div>下情无任感激攀恋之至。<div class='inline' showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375513?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上河东公谢聘钱启</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年7月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375513_comment'></div>谨依荣示捧领讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375513_comment'></div>伏以古求良材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375513_comment'></div>必有礼币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375513_comment'></div>一束刍皆堪贶美。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375513_comment'></div>五羖皮未曰轻赍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375513_comment'></div>悬之莫竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375513_comment'></div>遇河间之姹女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375513_comment'></div>数且难穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375513_comment'></div>未草檄以愈风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375513_comment'></div>不执鞭而获富。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375513_comment'></div>敢将润屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375513_comment'></div>且以腾装。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375513_comment'></div>戴荷之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375513_comment'></div>寄喻无地。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1375513_comment'></div></div></div><div onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_1375486", 1375486, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>梯媒</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375486_comment'></div>获沾科第。吴公之荐贾谊。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375487_comment'></div>青凫受聘。磨文难灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375487_comment'></div>校贯知多。陆贾方验于<span class='link' id='poem_1375499' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375499' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375499?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为举人献韩郎中琮启</a><span id='poem_sentence_1_1375499_comment'></div>未尝关虑。论都之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375499_comment'></div>颇亦留神。徒以不授彩毫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375499_comment'></div>未吞瑞鸟。驰名江左。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375499_comment'></div>陆机莫及于才多。擅誉邺中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375499_comment'></div>王粲终闻于体弱。上下群士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375499_comment'></div>差池累年。顷者辄露疏芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375499_comment'></div>不思狂简。捧爝火以干日御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375499_comment'></div>动已光销。抱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1375499", 1375499, "Clauses/19/Comments/0")'>布鼓</span>以诣雷门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375499_comment'></div>忽然声寝。不谓郎中授材路广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375499_comment'></div>曲赐丹青。旋属荥嶓从行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375499_comment'></div>神州视膳。同孟阳之觐蜀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375499_comment'></div>比孝若之归齐。虽佩恩私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375499_comment'></div>竟乖陈谢。光阴荏苒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375499_comment'></div>诚抱勤拳。今此秋期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375499_comment'></div>遂有天幸。更奉祢衡之刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375499_comment'></div>敢无鬷蔑之言。某在京多时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375499_comment'></div>自夏有疾。失外郡荐名之限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375499_comment'></div>俯神皋试士之期。物情既集于宗师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375499_comment'></div>公选果归于令季。怀材者皆云道泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375499_comment'></div>抱器者自谓时来。以卞和为玉人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375499_comment'></div>无不收之琼玖。得蹇修为媒氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375499_comment'></div>无不嫁之娉婷。是以愿托一拳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375499_comment'></div>潜布百两。顾方流而有托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375499_comment'></div>虑良会之犹赊。伏惟郎中与先辈贤弟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375499_comment'></div>价重两刘。誉高二陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375499_comment'></div>比李膺则仙舟对棹。方马融则绛帐双褰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375499_comment'></div>若某者。虽陋若左思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375499_comment'></div>瘦同沈约。无庾信之腰腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375499_comment'></div>乏崔炎之须眉。然至于感分识归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375499_comment'></div>衔诚议报。将酬杨宝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375499_comment'></div>则就雀求环。欲答孔愉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375499_comment'></div>则从龟觅印。推其异类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375499_comment'></div>不后他人。谨复轴新文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375499_comment'></div>重干清鉴。马卿室迩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375499_comment'></div>孔子墙高。迟面莫由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375499_comment'></div>隳肝无所。任重道远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375499_comment'></div>方怀骥坂之长鸣。一日三秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_1375592' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375592' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375592?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为故麟坊李尚书夫人王鍊师黄箓斋文</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375592'>以妾某所佩图箓。先经遗坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375592_comment'></div>今复寻获。乞恩归罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375592_comment'></div>据辞上诣虚无自然元始天尊太上大道君太上老君太上丈人三十六部尊经元中大法师所佩箓中灵官将吏三界官属。一切灵化嵩洛名山众真高隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375592_comment'></div>妾运从往业。庆及今生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375592_comment'></div>获以愚蒙。早佩经法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375592_comment'></div>而注念不谨。修奉多违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375592_comment'></div>殃与时增。善随日削。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375592_comment'></div>莫忘尘累。备极艰虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375592_comment'></div>儿息凋零。孙侄孤藐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375592_comment'></div>一辞西雍。久寓东周。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375592_comment'></div>五迁家居。十变年序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375592_comment'></div>昨者以所授宝箓。盛以雕奁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375592_comment'></div>既忘诲盗之资。果有担囊之酷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375592_comment'></div>遂使金科玉篆。见辱于宵人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375592_comment'></div>神将灵官。久凌于暴客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375592_comment'></div>寻求未获。披露无因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375592_comment'></div>分已名系幽官。位标黑籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375592_comment'></div>万劫永沈于狴犴。九元同役于河源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375592_comment'></div>而罪重忧深。诚专感达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375592_comment'></div>始闻寻索。旋得踪由。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375592_comment'></div>爰以吉辰。迎归静曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375592_comment'></div>修存香火。拂拭尘埃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375592_comment'></div>今辄请高真。仰陈薄具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375592_comment'></div>负荆泥首。引剑投躯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375592_comment'></div>伏乞太上三尊。十方众圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375592_comment'></div>曲流殊渥。旁敕元司。<div class='inline' class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_29037'>逡巡又过潇湘雨，雨打<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>湘灵五十弦。<div id='poem_sentence_3_29037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_29037'>瞥见<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(3032, "poem_sentence_4_29037")'>冯夷</span>殊怅望，鲛绡休卖海为田。<div id='poem_sentence_4_29037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_29037'>亦逢<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(6210, "poem_sentence_5_29037")'>毛女</span>无憀极，龙伯擎将华岳莲。<div id='poem_sentence_5_29037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_29037'>恍惚<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_6_29037", 29037, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>无倪</span>明又暗，低迷不已断还连。<div id='poem_sentence_6_29037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_29037'>觉来正是平阶雨，独<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作未）</span>背寒灯枕手眠。<div id='poem_sentence_7_29037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_29037'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_29037_comment'></div></div><div class='poemNote' id='poem_note_29037'><div class='inline1'><div id='poem_sentence_3_29037_0'>⑴ 都领切，又都历切</div></div></div><div id='poem_note_29037_comment'></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_29037'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(29037)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><div id='poem_28784' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28784' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/28784?labeling=true' target='_blank'>七月二十九日崇让宅宴作</a><span class='authorDate'>（851年7月29日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_28784")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>七言律诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_28784_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_28784'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_28784'>露如微霰下前池，月<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作风）</span>过回塘万竹悲。<div id='poem_sentence_0_28784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_28784'>浮世本来多聚散，红蕖何事亦离披。<div id='poem_sentence_1_28784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_28784'>悠扬归梦惟灯见，濩落生涯独酒知。<div id='poem_sentence_2_28784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_28784'>岂到白头长只尔，嵩阳松雪有心期。<div id='poem_sentence_3_28784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_28784'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_28784_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_28784'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(28784)'>评注</a><span id='poem_sentence_2_28861'>新蒲似笔思投日，芳草如茵忆吐时。<div id='poem_sentence_2_28861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_28861'>山下祗<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作只）</span>今<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(1192, "poem_sentence_3_28861")'>黄绢字</span>，泪痕犹堕<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_3_28861", 28861, "Clauses/7/Comments/0")'>六州</span>儿。<div id='poem_sentence_3_28861_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_28861'></div><div
