-----title
汉中
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='ee34135012b740419876441d6b3cccff_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("ee34135012b740419876441d6b3cccff");'><span id='ee34135012b740419876441d6b3cccff_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年</a>，26岁</div><div id='ee34135012b740419876441d6b3cccff' class='detail'><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=837&endYear=837')">837年</a>　因令狐楚病，自长安赴兴元府，代拟遗表。作品：为彭阳公兴元请寻医表。代彭阳公遗表。<div id='poem_1375258' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375258' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375258?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为彭阳公兴元请寻医表</a><span class='authorDate'>（837年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375258")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375258_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375258'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375258'>臣某言。臣闻长育之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375258_comment'></div>允归于天地。疾痛所迫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375258_comment'></div>必告于君亲。是以今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375258_comment'></div>窃献表章。上干旒扆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375258_comment'></div>备陈旧恙。当此颓龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375258_comment'></div>乞解藩维。一归京辇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375258_comment'></div>衰羸则甚。战灼犹深。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375258_comment'></div>臣某中谢。臣早以庸虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375258_comment'></div>久尘恩渥。四朝受任。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375258_comment'></div>二纪叨荣。华省黄枢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375258_comment'></div>皆惊窃位。专征处守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375258_comment'></div>每愧非才。岂不愿竭蝼蚁之微生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375258_comment'></div>尽桑榆之暮景。靡敢言病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375258_comment'></div>罔或告劳。然事有不可因循。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375258_comment'></div>力有不堪勉疆。苟怀情不尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375258_comment'></div>则事主非忠。且汉上雄藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375258_comment'></div>褒中重镇。统临至广。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375258_comment'></div>控压非轻。以臣昔年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375258_comment'></div>尚忧不理。在臣今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375258_comment'></div>其何敢安。亦既揣量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375258_comment'></div>岂容缄默。固合即时离镇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375258_comment'></div>随表归朝。伏料睿慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375258_comment'></div>必从丹款。拜魏阙而获伸积恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375258_comment'></div>访秦医而冀愈沉疴。乏绝之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375258_comment'></div>驰驱未晚。臣巳决取今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375258_comment'></div>离本道东上。无任祈恩危迫之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375258_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1375258_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375259' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375259' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375259?labeling=true' target='_blank'>代彭阳公遗表</a><span class='authorDate'>（837年11月12日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375259")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375259_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375259'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375259'>臣某言臣闻达士格言。以生为逆旅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375259_comment'></div>古者垂训。谓死为归人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375259_comment'></div>苟得其终。何怛于化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375259_comment'></div>臣永惟际会。获遇升平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375259_comment'></div>钟鼎之勋莫彰。风露之姿先尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375259_comment'></div>虽无逃大数。亦有负清朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375259_comment'></div>今则举纩陈词。对棺忍死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375259_comment'></div>白日无分。元夜何长。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375259_comment'></div>泪兼血垂。目与魂断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375259_comment'></div>臣某中谢。臣早缘儒学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375259_comment'></div>得厕人曹。克绍家声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375259_comment'></div>不亏士行。词赋贡名于宗伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375259_comment'></div>书檄应聘于诸侯。东汎西浮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375259_comment'></div>南登北走。时推倚马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375259_comment'></div>人或荐雄。西掖承荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375259_comment'></div>得以言之无罪。曲台备位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375259_comment'></div>粗明物有其容。永谓才难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375259_comment'></div>便叨郎选。振衣华省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375259_comment'></div>历履名曹。高步内庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375259_comment'></div>光扬密命。宪宗皇帝以臣行多馀力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375259_comment'></div>忠绝它肠。进无所因。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375259_comment'></div>静以有立。过蒙顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375259_comment'></div>深降褒称。乃于同列之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375259_comment'></div>独许非常之拜。殊恩既浃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375259_comment'></div>当路相排。旅翮未高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375259_comment'></div>孤根巳动。河潼为郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375259_comment'></div>盟津统师。溺以待援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375259_comment'></div>痿而念起。宪宗旁求辅相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375259_comment'></div>即记姓名。果遣急徵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375259_comment'></div>仍加大用。戴君之力虽弱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375259_comment'></div>许国之诚在兹。实有微衷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375259_comment'></div>可裨元化。况初诛背叛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375259_comment'></div>务活疲羸。方伏奏于凤扆之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375259_comment'></div>忽庀徒于鸟耘之次。小吏抵罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375259_comment'></div>邪臣结谋。指之有名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375259_comment'></div>嘿不得诉。空甘罪戾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375259_comment'></div>仰托圣明。粗得生还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375259_comment'></div>几临死所。其后官移督护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375259_comment'></div>四年不谒于承华。任改察廉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375259_comment'></div>一日暂留于分陜。欲举而坠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375259_comment'></div>将安更危。赖敬宗皇帝缵乃丕图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375259_comment'></div>是思求旧。振于洛宅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375259_comment'></div>荣彼夷门。自兹以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375259_comment'></div>敢虚其遇。周旋五纪镇守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375259_comment'></div>惟切分忧。前后两归阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375259_comment'></div>皆非久次。拙直不同于众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375259_comment'></div>谗毁每集其躬。含意未宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375259_comment'></div>救过不暇。伏思自长庆厥后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375259_comment'></div>开成之前。凡几忝迁升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375259_comment'></div>几遭退斥。若非不欺天地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375259_comment'></div>不负君亲。至于几微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375259_comment'></div>寻合颠陨。伏惟皇帝陛下道超覆载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375259_comment'></div>仁极照临。既委盐铁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375259_comment'></div>又分端揆。逮今控压。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375259_comment'></div>亦在重镇。陛下之恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375259_comment'></div>微臣何益。微臣之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375259_comment'></div>陛下方知。兴言及斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375259_comment'></div>碎首殊晚。然臣从心之年巳至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375259_comment'></div>致政之礼宜遵。寻欲拜章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375259_comment'></div>以求归老。伏以诸道节制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375259_comment'></div>频岁更移。其于送迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375259_comment'></div>例多积累。臣在此虽无一毫侵损。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375259_comment'></div>亦无纤介诛求。帑藏甚殷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375259_comment'></div>仓储可羡。特缘行李。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375259_comment'></div>忍过秋冬。而江山之气候难常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375259_comment'></div>蒲柳之萧衰易见。自夏则膝胫无力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375259_comment'></div>入冬则肠胃不调。对冠冕而始讶傥来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375259_comment'></div>指墓坟而巳知息处。今月八日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375259_comment'></div>臣巳召男国子博士绪左补阙绹左武卫兵曹参军纶等。示以殁期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375259_comment'></div>遗之理命。使内则雍和私室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375259_comment'></div>外则竭尽公家。兼约其送终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375259_comment'></div>务遵俭约。勿为从容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375259_comment'></div>以致虑居。至十二日夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375259_comment'></div>有仆夫告臣云。大星陨地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375259_comment'></div>雅当正室。洞照一庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375259_comment'></div>臣即端坐俟时。正辞无挠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375259_comment'></div>臣之年亦极矣。臣之荣亦足矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375259_comment'></div>以祖以父。皆蒙褒宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375259_comment'></div>有弟有子。并列班行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375259_comment'></div>全腰领以从前人。归体魄以事先帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375259_comment'></div>此不自达。诚为甚愚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375259_comment'></div>但以将掩泉扃。不得重辞云陛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375259_comment'></div>更陈尸谏。犹进瞽言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375259_comment'></div>虽叫呼而不能。岂诚明之敢忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375259_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下春秋鼎盛。华夏镜清。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375259_comment'></div>是修教化之初。当复理安之始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375259_comment'></div>然自前年夏秋以来。贬谴者至多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375259_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_87_1375259", 1375259, "Clauses/174/Comments/0")'>诛僇</span>者不少。伏望普加鸿造。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375259_comment'></div>稍霁皇威。殁者昭雪以云雷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375259_comment'></div>存者沾濡以雨露。使五稼嘉熟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375259_comment'></div>兆人乐康。用臣将尽之苦言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375259_comment'></div>慰臣永蛰之幽魄。臣某云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375259_comment'></div>臣当道兵马。巳差监军使窦千乘勾当。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375259_comment'></div>其节度留务。差行军司马赵祝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375259_comment'></div>观察留务。差节度判官杜胜讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375259_comment'></div>有旧规模。无新革易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375259_comment'></div>悉当辑睦。决无諠惊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375259_comment'></div>臣心虽澄定。气已危促。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375259_comment'></div>辞多逾切。鸣急更哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375259_comment'></div>升屋而三号岂来。赴壑而一去无返。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375259_comment'></div>忠诚直道。竟埋没于外藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375259_comment'></div>腐骨枯骸。空归全于故国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375259_comment'></div>回望昭代。无任攀恋永诀之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375259_comment'></div>谨奉表代辞以闻。臣某诚号诚咽顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375259_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_104_1375259_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

泾川

id='poem_sentence_15_1375497_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=838&endYear=838')">838年</a>　在泾原，王茂元幕，有文。作品：为尚书濮阳公泾原让加兵部尚书表。为濮阳公附送官告中使回状。为濮阳公官后上中书门下状。为濮阳公上杨相公状一。为濮阳公上李相公状一。为濮阳公上郑相公状。为濮阳公上陈相公状二。<div id='poem_1375272' target='_blank'>为濮阳公附送官告申使回状</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375296")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375296_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375296'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375296'>右。今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375296_comment'></div>中使某至。奉宣恩旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375296_comment'></div>赐臣前件敕书手诏官告者。巳准诏旨示军吏僧道耆老等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375296_comment'></div>其官告巳差押衙某奉表陈让讫。臣才谢适时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375296_comment'></div>知非周物。承私门有后之庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375296_comment'></div>当大朝犹宥之恩。颉颃渐高。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375296_comment'></div>腾凌必远。雕虫可耻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375296_comment'></div>扬子云不以为文。跨马莫能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375296_comment'></div>杜元凯于何称武。遂叨旗鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375296_comment'></div>及建麾幢。南犯瘴烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375296_comment'></div>远提龙户。西当爟火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375296_comment'></div>密控犬戎。临长万人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375296_comment'></div>董齐千乘。可以专杀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375296_comment'></div>未尝负租。况又荣假冬卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375296_comment'></div>显分霜宪。军前列秦时御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375296_comment'></div>幕下辟汉日郎官。碧落仰瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375296_comment'></div>巳参星象。丹霄回望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375296_comment'></div>了别尘泥。满盈之戒是虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375296_comment'></div>富贵之愿斯足。而九国未至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375296_comment'></div>六戎尚存。阙悬稿街。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375296_comment'></div>阻作饮器。碍白环之贡献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375296_comment'></div>隔青鸟之神仙。阅军实而眦裂兵符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375296_comment'></div>视战格而发冲武弁。苟拘司败。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375296_comment'></div>巳漏严科。岂可授列五兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375296_comment'></div>任兼八座。诏开垂露。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375296_comment'></div>降自天家。中使飞星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375296_comment'></div>来从日域。紫泥犹湿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375296_comment'></div>黄纸未乾。宣传而谁则懦夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375296_comment'></div>感激而孰非死士。固不合更稽成命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375296_comment'></div>重旷殊恩。窃以君人者在度材而命官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375296_comment'></div>臣下者宜论功而受赏。易忧且乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375296_comment'></div>诗戒斯亡。上斁彝伦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375296_comment'></div>下招颠陨。实关国柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375296_comment'></div>非止臣身。是敢辄黩冕旒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375296_comment'></div>亟陈章疏。言之必可。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375296_comment'></div>颛孙宁忘于书绅。汗出而收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375296_comment'></div>汉祖何妨于销印。伏惟皇帝陛下深回睿鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375296_comment'></div>曲被鸿慈。从国侨让邑之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375296_comment'></div>奖成季辞卿之志。俾无赏<span class='inlineComment2'>（疑）</span>僭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375296_comment'></div>以激当官。倘粗得扬威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375296_comment'></div>稍能陈力。恢复河右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375296_comment'></div>收禹贡之地图。荡定陇西。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375296_comment'></div>雪皇唐之祖业。则亦不敢更辞竹帛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375296_comment'></div>复拒鼎彝。明神所知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375296_comment'></div>丹慊具在。臣不胜感恩陈乞悃款屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375296_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_45_1375296_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375332' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375332' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375332?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公官后上中书门下状</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375332")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375332_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375332'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375332'>右。今月日当道押衙刘石回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375332_comment'></div>伏蒙天恩重赐。加授检校兵部尚书官告。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375332_comment'></div>不许更陈让者。某幸承馀庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375332_comment'></div>遂会昌期。早慕修途。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375332_comment'></div>献书试吏。晚存远略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375332_comment'></div>传剑论兵。自拥节旄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375332_comment'></div>频移星岁。常虞尸旷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375332_comment'></div>或抵彝章。往在番禺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375332_comment'></div>巳分风宪。及临安定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375332_comment'></div>又假冬卿。善政蔑闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375332_comment'></div>奇勋莫建。而有不循阶陛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375332_comment'></div>超授班资。且周礼设官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375332_comment'></div>邦政莫先乎司马。汉史解诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375332_comment'></div>士贵无过于尚书。外顾辈流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375332_comment'></div>内量涯分。逊而不免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375332_comment'></div>居亦何安。蔡氏历迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375332_comment'></div>杨公累代。方兹尊显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375332_comment'></div>殊曰寂寥。此皆相公假借军声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375332_comment'></div>赞扬圣泽。感而益惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375332_comment'></div>荣以宏忧。谨当切诫满盈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375332_comment'></div>遥加率励。古者不辞于三仕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375332_comment'></div>必愿致身。昔人虽取于十官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375332_comment'></div>终期无罪。粗申报效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375332_comment'></div>以谢贪叨。苟遗此言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375332_comment'></div>是不能享。镇守有限。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375332_comment'></div>不获奔走陈谢。伏增惶悚之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375332_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_26_1375332_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375335' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375335' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375335?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公上杨相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375335")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375335_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375335'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375335'>伏见今月某日制书。伏承相公由大司徒之率属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375335_comment'></div>掌中秘书之枢务。宠延注意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375335_comment'></div>荣叶沃心。凡备生灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375335_comment'></div>莫非陶冶。伊昔帝赉良弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375335_comment'></div>岳降名神。梦出傅岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375335_comment'></div>高宗才得于胥靡。卜从渭水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375335_comment'></div>西伯止逢于钓翁。岂若相公涵泳天池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375335_comment'></div>翱翔云路。然后光膺爰立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375335_comment'></div>显副佥谐。接庾亮之分曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375335_comment'></div>必资孔演。列王濛之对掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375335_comment'></div>宜属刘恢。允契同升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375335_comment'></div>果闻并命。祇神塞望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375335_comment'></div>华夏式瞻。某夙奉恩光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375335_comment'></div>今叨任使。守朝那之右地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375335_comment'></div>镇安定之遗封。不获趋贺黑轓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375335_comment'></div>拜伏金印。空知踊跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375335_comment'></div>莫可奋飞。下情云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375335_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1375335_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为尚书濮阳公贺郑相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375340")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375340_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375340'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375340'>右。伏见今月某日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375340_comment'></div>以相公累请退閒。特从休浣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375340_comment'></div>式崇阶级。无废平章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375340_comment'></div>元老道尊。必用三王之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375340_comment'></div>中枢务重。犹当五日为期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375340_comment'></div>伏惟相公德契昭融。言成启沃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375340_comment'></div>太邱家法。若守官司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375340_comment'></div>京兆门风。宜书甲令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375340_comment'></div>仰攀日月。高拱星辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375340_comment'></div>为尧辟四聪。禹来五谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375340_comment'></div>始者以舋生鼎饪。祸接藩维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375340_comment'></div>前殿朝回。莫收金印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375340_comment'></div>凶门师出。空委油幢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375340_comment'></div>当是非扰攘之间。即内外危疑之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375340_comment'></div>相公克凝庶绩。显执大权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375340_comment'></div>为易于难。制动以静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375340_comment'></div>皂襜斯入。无闻鲍永之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375340_comment'></div>黄阁洞开。例醉曹参之酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375340_comment'></div>然后澄清流品。提挈纪纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375340_comment'></div>补吏尽去刻深。用人不由党援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375340_comment'></div>咸有一德。于今三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375340_comment'></div>深惟逃责之规。载切避荣之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375340_comment'></div>削稿章数。免冠请频。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375340_comment'></div>张良却粒之怀。锱铢轩冕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375340_comment'></div>范蠡扁舟之志。梦想江湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375340_comment'></div>异代结交。殊时合志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375340_comment'></div>果当渥泽。爰峻等威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375340_comment'></div>祇奉青宫。监临东观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375340_comment'></div>教温文于汉字。总端揆于秦官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375340_comment'></div>百辟之剑佩以随。六馆之生徒是属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375340_comment'></div>手扶帝座。身带天光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375340_comment'></div>何澄阙朝。宁妨理事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375340_comment'></div>杜夷就第。无旷执经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375340_comment'></div>焕发丹青。光昭简素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375340_comment'></div>乾惕无咎。谦尊以光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375340_comment'></div>某谬奉诏条。尝承庙算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375340_comment'></div>惭指踪而未曾获兔。仰仪刑而徒叹登龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375340_comment'></div>亦冀终遂息肩。永当褫带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375340_comment'></div>地游蒙谷。更趋方外之神人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375340_comment'></div>洞入华阳。犹诏山中之宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375340_comment'></div>羁牵尚尔。抃贺无期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375340_comment'></div>瞻望辉光。伏增攀恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375340_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1375340_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375339' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375339' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375339?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公上陈相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375339")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375339_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375339'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375339'>某当道行军司马崔珰朝奏在城。今月十七日得状云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375339_comment'></div>今月十二日于太清宫斋宿处获谒见相公。伏承首座相公特论某所请不许吐番交马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375339_comment'></div>事合大体。当时魏谟起居备录其事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375339_comment'></div>伏以本道与凤翔。节制虽殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375339_comment'></div>封疆相接。俱当料敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375339_comment'></div>同切成谋。蕞尔寇戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375339_comment'></div>不循盟誓。稽留重使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375339_comment'></div>侮易大朝。既以非时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375339_comment'></div>又称继好。深虑得请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375339_comment'></div>便有乘机。遂敢窃献情诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375339_comment'></div>屡陈笺疏。言虽当病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375339_comment'></div>事且侵官。加以思惟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375339_comment'></div>方忧罪责。不谓相公更因敷奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375339_comment'></div>深赐褒称。使贾谊上书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375339_comment'></div>达于天听。山涛立论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375339_comment'></div>著在史官。荣冠一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375339_comment'></div>名留百古。顾兹非望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375339_comment'></div>皆有所因。仰戴恩辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375339_comment'></div>略踰涯分。谨当坐以待旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375339_comment'></div>居无求安。垦叔子之田畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375339_comment'></div>修李兴之政具。忽承后命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375339_comment'></div>有以先登。粗异驱驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375339_comment'></div>用为报效。伏惟始终恩赐知察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375339_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1375339_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375635'>戊午岁丁未朔乙亥晦。弟子玉溪李商隐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375635_comment'></div>叩头哭奠故相国赠司空彭阳公。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375635_comment'></div>昔梦飞尘。从公车轮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375635_comment'></div>今梦山阿。送公哀歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375635_comment'></div>古有从死。今无柰何。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375635_comment'></div>天平之年。大刀长戟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375635_comment'></div>将军樽旁。一人衣白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375635_comment'></div>十年忽然。蜩宣甲化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375635_comment'></div>人誉公怜。人谮公骂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375635_comment'></div>公高如天。愚卑如地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375635_comment'></div>脱蟺如蛇。如气之易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375635_comment'></div>愚调京下。公病梁山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375635_comment'></div>绝崖飞梁山行一千。草奏天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375635_comment'></div>镌辞墓门。临绝丁宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375635_comment'></div>托尔而存。公此去耶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375635_comment'></div>禁不时归。凤栖原上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375635_comment'></div>新旧衮衣<span class='inlineComment2'>（公先人亦赠司空）</span>。有泉者路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375635_comment'></div>有夜者台。昔之去者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375635_comment'></div>宜其在哉。圣有夫子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375635_comment'></div>廉有伯夷。浮魂沈魄。<div class='inline' id='poem_1375335' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375335' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375335?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公上杨相公状</a><span id='poem_sentence_0_1375335'>伏见今月某日制书。伏承相公由大司徒之率属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375335_comment'></div>掌中秘书之枢务。宠延注意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375335_comment'></div>荣叶沃心。凡备生灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375335_comment'></div>莫非陶冶。伊昔帝赉良弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375335_comment'></div>岳降名神。梦出傅岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375335_comment'></div>高宗才得于胥靡。卜从渭水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375335_comment'></div>西伯止逢于钓翁。岂若相公涵泳天池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375335_comment'></div>翱翔云路。然后光膺爰立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375335_comment'></div>显副佥谐。接庾亮之分曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375335_comment'></div>必资孔演。列王濛之对掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375335_comment'></div>宜属刘恢。允契同升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375335_comment'></div>果闻并命。祇神塞望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375335_comment'></div>华夏式瞻。某夙奉恩光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375335_comment'></div>今叨任使。守朝那之右地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375335_comment'></div>镇安定之遗封。不获趋贺黑轓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375335_comment'></div>拜伏金印。空知踊跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375335_comment'></div>莫可奋飞。下情云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375335_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1375335_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375451' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375451' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375451?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公贺丁学士启</a><span href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=838&endYear=838')">838年</a>　泾原，王茂元幕。秋，代拟《为濮阳公上汉南李相公状》<div id='poem_1375342' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375342' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375342?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公上宾客李相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375342'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375342'>不审近日尊体何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375342_comment'></div>此方地控淮徐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375342_comment'></div>气连荆楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375342_comment'></div>不惟土薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375342_comment'></div>兼亦冬温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375342_comment'></div>维扬居万国之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375342_comment'></div>得四方之正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375342_comment'></div>或闻今岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375342_comment'></div>亦不甚寒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375342_comment'></div>相公百禄所绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375342_comment'></div>五福攸集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375342_comment'></div>伏料调护。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375342_comment'></div>常保康宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375342_comment'></div>从古以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375342_comment'></div>大贤所处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375342_comment'></div>未有不功高而去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375342_comment'></div>德盛而谦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375342_comment'></div>以烟水为归涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375342_comment'></div>指神仙而投分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375342_comment'></div>名高百古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375342_comment'></div>事冠一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375342_comment'></div>然而内难外忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375342_comment'></div>不常而起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375342_comment'></div>深谋密画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375342_comment'></div>须有所归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375342_comment'></div>则吕望老于渭滨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375342_comment'></div>始持兵柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375342_comment'></div>周公还于洛邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375342_comment'></div>复秉国钧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375342_comment'></div>亦不草芥轩车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375342_comment'></div>埃尘禄位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375342_comment'></div>不关通介。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375342_comment'></div>盖属安危。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375342_comment'></div>相公昔在先朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375342_comment'></div>实康大政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375342_comment'></div>当君子信谗之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375342_comment'></div>禀达人大观之规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375342_comment'></div>据梧但歌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375342_comment'></div>反袂无叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375342_comment'></div>及为宾望苑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375342_comment'></div>分务洛师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375342_comment'></div>徐勉园中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375342_comment'></div>唯馀卉木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375342_comment'></div>陶公岭上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375342_comment'></div>空有白云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375342_comment'></div>小竹帛之所传。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375342_comment'></div>鄙鼎彝而不问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375342_comment'></div>夫以行藏定分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375342_comment'></div>用舍通方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375342_comment'></div>当遭时复生之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375342_comment'></div>立功立业者甚易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375342_comment'></div>及受简被疑之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375342_comment'></div>不怨不怒者至难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375342_comment'></div>远则狼畏跋胡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375342_comment'></div>鸱忧毁室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375342_comment'></div>近则越蠡扁舟而独往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375342_comment'></div>汉良却粒以辞荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375342_comment'></div>虽同畏危机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375342_comment'></div>亦不得中道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375342_comment'></div>仰惟阃奥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375342_comment'></div>实冠品流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375342_comment'></div>今宝历既初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375342_comment'></div>圣政兹始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375342_comment'></div>将安丕祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375342_comment'></div>必属宗臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375342_comment'></div>凡在隐微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375342_comment'></div>莫不祠祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375342_comment'></div>某早蒙奖拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375342_comment'></div>得被宠荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375342_comment'></div>番禺将去之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375342_comment'></div>获醉上樽之酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375342_comment'></div>许下出征之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375342_comment'></div>犹蒙尺素之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375342_comment'></div>便道是拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375342_comment'></div>登门莫遂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375342_comment'></div>向风弭节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375342_comment'></div>掩泣裁笺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375342_comment'></div>思幄恋轩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375342_comment'></div>不胜丹款。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375342_comment'></div>伏惟终始恩照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375342_comment'></div>谨状。</div><div id='poem_sentence_80_1375342_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=838&endYear=838')">838年9月</a>　泾原，王茂元幕，九月上旬末，代拟《为濮阳公论皇太子表》<div id='poem_1375271' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375271' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375271?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公论皇太子表</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375271")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375271_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375271'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375271'>臣某言。今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375271_comment'></div>得本道进奏院状报。今月六日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375271_comment'></div>宰臣郑某等率三省官属入论皇太子事者。褫魄疆场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375271_comment'></div>驰魂辇毂。莫知本末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375271_comment'></div>伏用惊惶。臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375271_comment'></div>臣闻礼赞元良。易标明两。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375271_comment'></div>是司匕鬯。以奉宗祧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375271_comment'></div>华夏式瞻。邦家大本。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375271_comment'></div>自昔质文或异。步骤虽殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375271_comment'></div>既立之以贤。则辅之有道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375271_comment'></div>北宫养德。东序承荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375271_comment'></div>务近正人。用光继体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375271_comment'></div>周则周公为太傅。太公为太师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375271_comment'></div>汉则疏氏二贤。商山四老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375271_comment'></div>内扬孝道。外尽忠规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375271_comment'></div>犹在去彼嫌猜。辨其疑似。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375271_comment'></div>不由微细。轻致动摇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375271_comment'></div>乃得守三十代之丕图。延四百年之景祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375271_comment'></div>著于史册。焕若丹青。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375271_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下道冠百王。功高三古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375271_comment'></div>事窥化本。谋洞几先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375271_comment'></div>皇太子自正位春坊。傅辉望苑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375271_comment'></div>陛下旁延隽乂。以赞温文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375271_comment'></div>并学探泉源。气压浮竞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375271_comment'></div>嗜鱼不进。求玦莫从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375271_comment'></div>有王褒之献箴。无卞兰之奏赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375271_comment'></div>今纵粗乖睿旨。微嗛圣心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375271_comment'></div>当以犹属妙龄。未加元服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375271_comment'></div>或携徒御。时纵逸游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375271_comment'></div>乐野夏储。亦常观舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375271_comment'></div>南皮魏副。屡见飞觞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375271_comment'></div>陛下睿发慈仁。殷勤指教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375271_comment'></div>稍踰规戒。即震威灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375271_comment'></div>虽伐木析薪。必循其理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375271_comment'></div>而逝梁发笱。亦有可虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375271_comment'></div>抑臣又闻父之于子也。有严训而无责善。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375271_comment'></div>君之于臣也。有掩恶而复录功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375271_comment'></div>故得各务日新。并从夕改。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375271_comment'></div>同寘于道。不伤其慈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375271_comment'></div>傥犯在斯须。便遗天性。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375271_comment'></div>过当造次。遽抵国章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375271_comment'></div>则以古以今。孰为令子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375271_comment'></div>在朝在野。谁曰全臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375271_comment'></div>虚牵复之微言。失不贰之深旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375271_comment'></div>伏惟陛下侔覆育于天地。霁赫怒于雷霆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375271_comment'></div>复许省励宫闱。卑谢师傅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375271_comment'></div>蹈殊休于列圣。慰钦瞩于兆人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375271_comment'></div>臣才则荒凉。志惟朴騃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375271_comment'></div>因缘代业。蒙被官荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375271_comment'></div>窃诸侯之土田。领大将之旗鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375271_comment'></div>当车折槛。合首他人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375271_comment'></div>沥胆剌心。正当今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375271_comment'></div>而名非朝籍。务切军机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375271_comment'></div>道阻且修。伫立以泣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375271_comment'></div>龙楼献直。戴逵之词翰莫闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375271_comment'></div>凤阙拜章。张俨之精诚未泯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375271_comment'></div>干冒宸极。无任陨涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375271_comment'></div>祈恩之至。谨遣某官某奉表陈论以闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375271_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1375271_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=838&endYear=838')">838年9月</a>　在泾原，王茂元幕，有文。作品：为濮阳公上杨相公状。为濮阳公上李相公状二。为濮阳公上陈相公状一。为濮阳公贺陈相公送土物状。为濮阳公贺杨相公送土物状。为濮阳公贺李相公送土物状。为濮阳公奏临泾平涼等镇准式十月一日起烧贼路野草状。为濮阳公贺牛相公状。<div id='poem_1375335' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375335' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375335?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公上杨相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375335")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375335_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375335'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375335'>伏见今月某日制书。伏承相公由大司徒之率属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375335_comment'></div>掌中秘书之枢务。宠延注意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375335_comment'></div>荣叶沃心。凡备生灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375335_comment'></div>莫非陶冶。伊昔帝赉良弼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375335_comment'></div>岳降名神。梦出傅岩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375335_comment'></div>高宗才得于胥靡。卜从渭水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375335_comment'></div>西伯止逢于钓翁。岂若相公涵泳天池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375335_comment'></div>翱翔云路。然后光膺爰立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375335_comment'></div>显副佥谐。接庾亮之分曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375335_comment'></div>必资孔演。列王濛之对掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375335_comment'></div>宜属刘恢。允契同升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375335_comment'></div>果闻并命。祇神塞望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375335_comment'></div>华夏式瞻。某夙奉恩光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375335_comment'></div>今叨任使。守朝那之右地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375335_comment'></div>镇安定之遗封。不获趋贺黑轓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375335_comment'></div>拜伏金印。空知踊跃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375335_comment'></div>莫可奋飞。下情云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375335_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_17_1375335_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375339' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375339' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375339?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公上陈相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375339")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375339_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375339'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375339'>某当道行军司马崔珰朝奏在城。今月十七日得状云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375339_comment'></div>今月十二日于太清宫斋宿处获谒见相公。伏承首座相公特论某所请不许吐番交马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375339_comment'></div>事合大体。当时魏谟起居备录其事者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375339_comment'></div>伏以本道与凤翔。节制虽殊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375339_comment'></div>封疆相接。俱当料敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375339_comment'></div>同切成谋。蕞尔寇戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375339_comment'></div>不循盟誓。稽留重使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375339_comment'></div>侮易大朝。既以非时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375339_comment'></div>又称继好。深虑得请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375339_comment'></div>便有乘机。遂敢窃献情诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375339_comment'></div>屡陈笺疏。言虽当病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375339_comment'></div>事且侵官。加以思惟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375339_comment'></div>方忧罪责。不谓相公更因敷奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375339_comment'></div>深赐褒称。使贾谊上书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375339_comment'></div>达于天听。山涛立论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375339_comment'></div>著在史官。荣冠一时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375339_comment'></div>名留百古。顾兹非望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375339_comment'></div>皆有所因。仰戴恩辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375339_comment'></div>略踰涯分。谨当坐以待旦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375339_comment'></div>居无求安。垦叔子之田畴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375339_comment'></div>修李兴之政具。忽承后命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375339_comment'></div>有以先登。粗异驱驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375339_comment'></div>用为报效。伏惟始终恩赐知察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375339_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1375339_comment'></div></div></div><div "poem_title_1375297")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375297_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375297'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375297'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375297_comment'></div>臣当道最近寇戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375297_comment'></div>实多蹊隧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375297_comment'></div>每当寒冻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375297_comment'></div>须有堤防。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375297_comment'></div>今才毕秋收。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375297_comment'></div>未甚霜降。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375297_comment'></div>井泉不合。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375297_comment'></div>草木犹滋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375297_comment'></div>虽巳及时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375297_comment'></div>未宜纵火。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375297_comment'></div>臣巳散帖诸镇讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375297_comment'></div>候皆黄落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375297_comment'></div>即议焚除。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375297_comment'></div>稍越旧规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375297_comment'></div>不敢不奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375297_comment'></div>谨录状奏。</div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1375297_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为尚书濮阳公贺郑相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375340")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375340_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375340'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375340'>右。伏见今月某日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375340_comment'></div>以相公累请退閒。特从休浣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375340_comment'></div>式崇阶级。无废平章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375340_comment'></div>元老道尊。必用三王之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375340_comment'></div>中枢务重。犹当五日为期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375340_comment'></div>伏惟相公德契昭融。言成启沃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375340_comment'></div>太邱家法。若守官司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375340_comment'></div>京兆门风。宜书甲令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375340_comment'></div>仰攀日月。高拱星辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375340_comment'></div>为尧辟四聪。禹来五谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375340_comment'></div>始者以舋生鼎饪。祸接藩维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375340_comment'></div>前殿朝回。莫收金印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375340_comment'></div>凶门师出。空委油幢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375340_comment'></div>当是非扰攘之间。即内外危疑之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375340_comment'></div>相公克凝庶绩。显执大权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375340_comment'></div>为易于难。制动以静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375340_comment'></div>皂襜斯入。无闻鲍永之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375340_comment'></div>黄阁洞开。例醉曹参之酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375340_comment'></div>然后澄清流品。提挈纪纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375340_comment'></div>补吏尽去刻深。用人不由党援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375340_comment'></div>咸有一德。于今三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375340_comment'></div>深惟逃责之规。载切避荣之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375340_comment'></div>削稿章数。免冠请频。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375340_comment'></div>张良却粒之怀。锱铢轩冕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375340_comment'></div>范蠡扁舟之志。梦想江湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375340_comment'></div>异代结交。殊时合志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375340_comment'></div>果当渥泽。爰峻等威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375340_comment'></div>祇奉青宫。监临东观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375340_comment'></div>教温文于汉字。总端揆于秦官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375340_comment'></div>百辟之剑佩以随。六馆之生徒是属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375340_comment'></div>手扶帝座。身带天光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375340_comment'></div>何澄阙朝。宁妨理事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375340_comment'></div>杜夷就第。无旷执经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375340_comment'></div>焕发丹青。光昭简素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375340_comment'></div>乾惕无咎。谦尊以光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375340_comment'></div>某谬奉诏条。尝承庙算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375340_comment'></div>惭指踪而未曾获兔。仰仪刑而徒叹登龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375340_comment'></div>亦冀终遂息肩。永当褫带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375340_comment'></div>地游蒙谷。更趋方外之神人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375340_comment'></div>洞入华阳。犹诏山中之宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375340_comment'></div>羁牵尚尔。抃贺无期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375340_comment'></div>瞻望辉光。伏增攀恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375340_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1375340_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=838&endYear=838')">838年</a>　泾原，王茂元幕。秋冬间，拟《为张周封上杨相公启》<div id='poem_1375495' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375495' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375495'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375495'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375495_comment'></div>某闻不祥之金。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375495_comment'></div>大冶所恶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375495_comment'></div>自衒之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375495_comment'></div>明时不容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375495_comment'></div>斯实格言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375495_comment'></div>足为垂训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375495_comment'></div>然或顾逢伯乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375495_comment'></div>但伏盐车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375495_comment'></div>听属钟期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375495_comment'></div>不调绿绮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375495_comment'></div>皋壤摇落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375495_comment'></div>老大伤悲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375495_comment'></div>同刘胜之寒蝉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375495_comment'></div>效子綦之枯木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375495_comment'></div>则亦迹归弃世。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375495_comment'></div>行阙扬名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375495_comment'></div>某价乏琳琅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375495_comment'></div>誉轻乡曲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375495_comment'></div>粗沾科第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375495_comment'></div>薄涉艺文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375495_comment'></div>锥不颖于囊中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375495_comment'></div>水竟深于山上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375495_comment'></div>淹留侯国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375495_comment'></div>祗事戎麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375495_comment'></div>插羽佩鞬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375495_comment'></div>从相公于关右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375495_comment'></div>束书载笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375495_comment'></div>随校尉于河源。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375495_comment'></div>自北徂南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375495_comment'></div>巳秋复夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375495_comment'></div>心惊于急。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375495_comment'></div>弦劲矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375495_comment'></div>目断于高足要津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375495_comment'></div>而又永念敝庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375495_comment'></div>空馀乔木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375495_comment'></div>山中桂树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375495_comment'></div>远愧于幽人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375495_comment'></div>日暮柴车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375495_comment'></div>莫追于傲吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375495_comment'></div>捋须理鬓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375495_comment'></div>霜雪呈姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375495_comment'></div>吊影飏音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375495_comment'></div>烟霞绝想。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375495_comment'></div>徒以相公远敦世故。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375495_comment'></div>容在恩门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375495_comment'></div>存赵氏之孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375495_comment'></div>受梁王之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375495_comment'></div>竽将滥吹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375495_comment'></div>石有参琼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375495_comment'></div>咳唾随风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375495_comment'></div>眄睐成饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375495_comment'></div>追维畴曩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375495_comment'></div>曾是逢迎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375495_comment'></div>蜀郡登文翁之堂。<div id='poem_sentence_64_1375495_comment'></div>不越岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375495_comment'></div>今则节迈白藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375495_comment'></div>候临元律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375495_comment'></div>宁<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1375495", 1375495, "Clauses/73/Comments/0")'>爽约</span>于虞人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375495_comment'></div>苟四时之信是孚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375495_comment'></div>亦一诺之恩斯及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375495_comment'></div>况自元和以后。<div id='poem_sentence_117_1375495_comment'></div>梦结边城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1375495_comment'></div>寓尺牍而畏达空函。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1375495_comment'></div>下情无任攀恋感激惶惧之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_122_1375495_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=838&endYear=838')">838年10月</a>　在泾原，王茂元幕，有文。作品：为濮阳公奉慰皇太子薨表。为濮阳公皇太子薨慰宰相状。<div id='poem_1375273' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375273' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375273?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公奉慰皇太子薨表</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375273")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375273_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375273'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375273'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375273_comment'></div>今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375273_comment'></div>得本道进奏院状报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375273_comment'></div>今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375273_comment'></div>以皇太子奄谢东宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375273_comment'></div>辍今月十三日至来月一日朝参者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375273_comment'></div>前星失色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375273_comment'></div>少海惊波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375273_comment'></div>欷结一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375273_comment'></div>悲缠万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375273_comment'></div>臣某诚涕诚咽顿首顿首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375273_comment'></div>伏以皇太子地当守器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375273_comment'></div>贤可承祧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375273_comment'></div>金马铜羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375273_comment'></div>早开正位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375273_comment'></div>鸾旌鸡戟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375273_comment'></div>方庆脩龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375273_comment'></div>岂谓舋属黄离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375273_comment'></div>祸生苍震。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375273_comment'></div>宣猷庭内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375273_comment'></div>秋冬之学空存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375273_comment'></div>博望苑中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375273_comment'></div>监抚之仪莫睹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375273_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下悼深伊将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375273_comment'></div>念切瑶山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375273_comment'></div>嗟上宾之不留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375273_comment'></div>惜外阳而无验。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375273_comment'></div>青宫掩涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375273_comment'></div>元圃酸心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375273_comment'></div>臣限守边隅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375273_comment'></div>久违京阙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375273_comment'></div>不获奔走奉慰阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375273_comment'></div>无任悲咽惶慕之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_32_1375273_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375331' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375331' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375331?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为濮阳公皇太子薨慰宰相状</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年10月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375331")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375331_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375331'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375331'>右。今月日得本道进奏院状报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375331_comment'></div>今月日皇太子奄违储贰。伏以皇太子道著武闱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375331_comment'></div>位高象辂。方将传辉兰殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375331_comment'></div>积庆桂宫。花枕画轓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375331_comment'></div>永绥福履。铜扉银榜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375331_comment'></div>克懋温文。岂谓衅结荐雷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375331_comment'></div>祸缠重海。商山羽翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375331_comment'></div>嗟绮季之俱还。缑岭云霞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375331_comment'></div>与浮邱而莫返。相公恩深铭釜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375331_comment'></div>地属持衡。攀东序以心伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375331_comment'></div>望春坊而目断。某忝蒙委寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375331_comment'></div>常窃宠荣。不获齿列班行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375331_comment'></div>奔波慰叙。下情无任悲咽遑迫之至。<div class='inline' ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=838&endYear=838')">838年11月16日</a>　在泾原，王茂元幕，有文。作品：为濮阳公与周学士状。<div id='poem_1375343' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375343' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375343")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375343_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375343'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375343'>近频附状。伏计相次达上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375343_comment'></div>自学士罢领南台。复还内署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375343_comment'></div>朝委攸重。时论愈归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375343_comment'></div>夫一时效功。逐恶者鹰隼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375343_comment'></div>千年呈瑞。应圣者鸾皇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375343_comment'></div>击搏殊能。翱翔异品。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375343_comment'></div>当在紫庭无事。应韶濩以来仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375343_comment'></div>岂复白野有求。与云罗而并出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375343_comment'></div>唯听后命。爰副具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375343_comment'></div>某才谢适时。仕无明略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375343_comment'></div>久乘亭障。长奉鼓鼙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375343_comment'></div>猿臂渐衰。燕颔相误。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375343_comment'></div>弊庐仍在。白首未归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375343_comment'></div>顾皋壤以兴嗟。念路歧而增叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375343_comment'></div>当依馀眷。庶惬后图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375343_comment'></div>仰望音徽。不胜丹赤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375298_comment'></div>始顾孱微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375298_comment'></div>深惧不胜冠带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375298_comment'></div>旋蒙被服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375298_comment'></div>便如能执干戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375298_comment'></div>遍逮军前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375298_comment'></div>历沾麾下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375298_comment'></div>达喜气而陈根复秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375298_comment'></div>动欢声而蛰户潜开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375298_comment'></div>华楚成行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375298_comment'></div>曳娄塞路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375298_comment'></div>其山南宣歙三道大将等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375298_comment'></div>虽久居炎燠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375298_comment'></div>不惯严凝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375298_comment'></div>亦既更衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375298_comment'></div>皆忘易地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375298_comment'></div>贾馀勇而例思尽敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375298_comment'></div>感鸿私而咸愿杀身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375298_comment'></div>各限征行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375298_comment'></div>不获陈谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375298_comment'></div>臣与大将等无任瞻天恋阙感恩屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_54_1375298_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=838&endYear=838')">838年</a>　在泾原，王茂元幕。作品：为尚书濮阳公贺郑相公状。为濮阳公上陈相公状三。<div id='poem_1375340' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375340' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375340?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为尚书濮阳公贺郑相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（838年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375340")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375340_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375340'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375340'>右。伏见今月某日制书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375340_comment'></div>以相公累请退閒。特从休浣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375340_comment'></div>式崇阶级。无废平章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375340_comment'></div>元老道尊。必用三王之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375340_comment'></div>中枢务重。犹当五日为期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375340_comment'></div>伏惟相公德契昭融。言成启沃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375340_comment'></div>太邱家法。若守官司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375340_comment'></div>京兆门风。宜书甲令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375340_comment'></div>仰攀日月。高拱星辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375340_comment'></div>为尧辟四聪。禹来五谏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375340_comment'></div>始者以舋生鼎饪。祸接藩维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375340_comment'></div>前殿朝回。莫收金印。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375340_comment'></div>凶门师出。空委油幢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375340_comment'></div>当是非扰攘之间。即内外危疑之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375340_comment'></div>相公克凝庶绩。显执大权。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375340_comment'></div>为易于难。制动以静。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375340_comment'></div>皂襜斯入。无闻鲍永之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375340_comment'></div>黄阁洞开。例醉曹参之酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375340_comment'></div>然后澄清流品。提挈纪纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375340_comment'></div>补吏尽去刻深。用人不由党援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375340_comment'></div>咸有一德。于今三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375340_comment'></div>深惟逃责之规。载切避荣之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375340_comment'></div>削稿章数。免冠请频。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375340_comment'></div>张良却粒之怀。锱铢轩冕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375340_comment'></div>范蠡扁舟之志。梦想江湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375340_comment'></div>异代结交。殊时合志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375340_comment'></div>果当渥泽。爰峻等威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375340_comment'></div>祇奉青宫。监临东观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375340_comment'></div>教温文于汉字。总端揆于秦官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375340_comment'></div>百辟之剑佩以随。六馆之生徒是属。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375340_comment'></div>手扶帝座。身带天光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375340_comment'></div>何澄阙朝。宁妨理事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375340_comment'></div>杜夷就第。无旷执经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375340_comment'></div>焕发丹青。光昭简素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375340_comment'></div>乾惕无咎。谦尊以光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375340_comment'></div>某谬奉诏条。尝承庙算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375340_comment'></div>惭指踪而未曾获兔。仰仪刑而徒叹登龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375340_comment'></div>亦冀终遂息肩。永当褫带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375340_comment'></div>地游蒙谷。更趋方外之神人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375340_comment'></div>洞入华阳。犹诏山中之宰相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375340_comment'></div>羁牵尚尔。抃贺无期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375340_comment'></div>瞻望辉光。伏增攀恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375340_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1375340_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_13_1375343_comment'></div>当依馀眷。庶惬后图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375343_comment'></div>仰望音徽。不胜丹赤。<div class='inline' 灵宝

class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375270_comment'></div>盈于留邸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375270_comment'></div>臣此时尚持白简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375270_comment'></div>犹著青袍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375270_comment'></div>元膺知臣传剑论兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375270_comment'></div>本于仁信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375270_comment'></div>佩鞬插羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375270_comment'></div>亦识孤虚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375270_comment'></div>俾以发奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375270_comment'></div>假之捕盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375270_comment'></div>幸无容刃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375270_comment'></div>以及焚巢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375270_comment'></div>旋带银章。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375270_comment'></div>俄分竹使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375270_comment'></div>隼旟楚峡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375270_comment'></div>出以分忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375270_comment'></div>熊轼郧城。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375270_comment'></div>忽然通贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375270_comment'></div>岂意复踰五岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375270_comment'></div>更授再麾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375270_comment'></div>中间叨相青宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375270_comment'></div>忝司缇骑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375270_comment'></div>才通<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_59_1375270", 1375270, "Clauses/59/Comments/0")'>闺籍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375270_comment'></div>又处藩条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375270_comment'></div>越井朝台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375270_comment'></div>备经艰险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375270_comment'></div>贪泉浈水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375270_comment'></div>益励平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375270_comment'></div>是甘马革之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375270_comment'></div>常惧武皮之诮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375270_comment'></div>及圣造远流南极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375270_comment'></div>许拱北辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375270_comment'></div>黄犊留官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375270_comment'></div>胡床挂柱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375270_comment'></div>如生羽翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375270_comment'></div>若出婴罗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375270_comment'></div>誓以归彼冗员。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375270_comment'></div>处之散地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375270_comment'></div>俄以朝那阙守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375270_comment'></div>昆壤须人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375270_comment'></div>一去阙庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375270_comment'></div>五罹寒燠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375270_comment'></div>远收麻垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375270_comment'></div>直取艾亭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1375270_comment'></div>求退为宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1375270_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下道冠百王。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1375270_comment'></div>功高三代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1375270_comment'></div>照临若日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1375270_comment'></div>覆露如天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1375270_comment'></div>况今国不乏人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1375270_comment'></div>时称多士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1375270_comment'></div>有才略在臣之右。<div id='poem_sentence_125_1375270_comment'></div>递临斯位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1375270_comment'></div>以之责效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1375270_comment'></div>谁曰不然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1375270_comment'></div>俾前达后生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1375270_comment'></div>皆无蔽滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1375270_comment'></div>由中及外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1375270_comment'></div>得以交相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1375270_comment'></div>成陛下适时之方。<div class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375642?labeling=true' target='_blank'>祭韩氏老姑文</a><span class='authorDate'>（839年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375642'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375642'>猗欤我家。世奉元德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375642_comment'></div>让弟受封。勤王赐国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375642_comment'></div>名芳彝鼎。勋盈史册。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375642_comment'></div>季孟国高。秦晋栾郤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375642_comment'></div>恭惟柔范。载禀渊塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375642_comment'></div>既作女师。乃为嫔则。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375642_comment'></div>颍水波清。梁园月明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375642_comment'></div>言旋百两。且拜双旌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375642_comment'></div>托侯令弟。配国名卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375642_comment'></div>入从述职。出辅专征。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375642_comment'></div>螽斯不妒。凤凰和鸣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375642_comment'></div>此时同庆。东郡分荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375642_comment'></div>使者责梁。公子专魏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375642_comment'></div>帝念元昆。人思仲氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375642_comment'></div>杖节赴敌。斩刍尽瘁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375642_comment'></div>无以家为。或从王事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375642_comment'></div>礼优内子。诗美夫人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375642_comment'></div>冕纮瑱紞。山蕨涧蘋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375642_comment'></div>子元罕见。冀缺如宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375642_comment'></div>绿衣有感。翟茀仍新。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375642_comment'></div>遽叹夜川。遄闻昼哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375642_comment'></div>原阡旧署。孟邻斯卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375642_comment'></div>閒居献寿。作赋之官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375642_comment'></div>弓裘望袭。菽水承欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375642_comment'></div>福善馀庆。好谦旧祉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375642_comment'></div>复自良人。集于之子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375642_comment'></div>孰不忧悲。何兹达识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375642_comment'></div>乃克先知。同易箦以就正。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375642_comment'></div>如买棺而指期。苟有所累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375642_comment'></div>安能及斯。道远轘辕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375642_comment'></div>风凄灌薄。积蔼茫茫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375642_comment'></div>行烟漠漠。某等诚深<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_41_1375642", -----title
满城
-----detail
<div class='label1' id='533085e4871d4f43aae02e1bf7b3d4ed_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("533085e4871d4f43aae02e1bf7b3d4ed");'><span id='533085e4871d4f43aae02e1bf7b3d4ed_link' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375491' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375491?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为李贻孙上李相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年4月）</span><span
