class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375491_comment'></div>谨斋沐裁诚。著于启事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375491_comment'></div>跪授仆者。上献于司徒相国叔父閤下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375491_comment'></div>某伏远墙藩。亟踰年籥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375491_comment'></div>抱徽音于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1375491", 1375491, "Clauses/8/Comments/0")'>故器</span>。虽赏逐时迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375491_comment'></div>窃馀润于奥云。亦情由类至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375491_comment'></div>中阿弭节。末路增怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375491_comment'></div>沈吟易失之时。怅望难邀之会。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375491_comment'></div>石崇著引。徒愿思归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375491_comment'></div>殷浩裁书。其如慕义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375491_comment'></div>伏惟相公丹青元化。冠盖中州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375491_comment'></div>群生指南。命代先觉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375491_comment'></div>语姬朝之旧族。庄武惭颜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375491_comment'></div>叙汉代之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1375491", 1375491, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>名门</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1375491", 1375491, "Clauses/27/Comments/0")'>韦平</span>掩耀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375491_comment'></div>将邻三纪。克佐五君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375491_comment'></div>动著嘉猷。行留故事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375491_comment'></div>陶冶于无形之外。优游于不宰之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375491_comment'></div>始者主上以代邸承基。琅琊缵业。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375491_comment'></div>明发不寐。怀清庙之景灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375491_comment'></div>日晏忘飧。念苍生之定命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375491_comment'></div>爰徵元老。允在宾臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375491_comment'></div>五载于兹。六符斯炳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375491_comment'></div>顷单于故境。獯鬻遗疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375491_comment'></div>屡缘丧荒。亟致携贰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375491_comment'></div>夙沙自缚其主。冒顿忍射其亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375491_comment'></div>遂去北边。欲事南牧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375491_comment'></div>既赫斯而贻怒。乃密勿以陈谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375491_comment'></div>管氏将来。屡发新柴之井。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375491_comment'></div>留侯每入。便闻借箸之筹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375491_comment'></div>群帅受成。中枢独运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375491_comment'></div>前军露板。方事于羽驰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375491_comment'></div>清禁寿觞。旋闻于月捷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375491_comment'></div>仍其贵种。慕我华风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375491_comment'></div>或辨姓写诚。推诸右校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375491_comment'></div>或释兵伏义。列在周庐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375491_comment'></div>潞子离狄而春秋书。徐夷朝周而大雅咏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375491_comment'></div>其馀麇惊鸟散。风去雨还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375491_comment'></div>亘绝幕以销魂。委穷沙而丧胆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375491_comment'></div>胡琴公主。巳出于襜褴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375491_comment'></div>毳幕天骄。行遗其湩酪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375491_comment'></div>向若非薛公料敌先陈三策。充国为学尽通四夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375491_comment'></div>则何以雪高庙称臣之羞。全肃宗复京之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375491_comment'></div>此庙战之功一也。惟彼参伐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375491_comment'></div>实兴皇家。天汉美名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375491_comment'></div>方之尚陋。舂陵王气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375491_comment'></div>比此非多。而物众藏奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375491_comment'></div>地宽长孽。敢起在行之众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375491_comment'></div>因兴逐帅之谋。遂使起义堂边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375491_comment'></div>台臣夙驾。晋阳宫下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375491_comment'></div>逆竖宵奔。翻势将冀于连鸡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375491_comment'></div>勇斗尚同于困兽。讵知长算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375491_comment'></div>已出奇兵。金仆灵鉟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375491_comment'></div>靡留于旬朔。箯舆贯木。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375491_comment'></div>已集于都街。此庙战之功二也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375491_comment'></div>潞寇不惩两竖之凶。徒恃三军之力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375491_comment'></div>干我王略。据其父封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375491_comment'></div>袁熙因累叶之资。卫朔拒大君之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375491_comment'></div>人将自弃。鬼得而诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375491_comment'></div>蛙觉井宽。蚁言树大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375491_comment'></div>招延轻险。曾微吴国之钱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375491_comment'></div>藏匿罪亡。又乏江陵之粟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375491_comment'></div>所谋者河朔遗事。所恃者岩险偷生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375491_comment'></div>今则赵魏俱攻。燕齐并入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375491_comment'></div>奉规于帷幕。遵命于指踪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375491_comment'></div>亚夫拒吴。惊东南而备西北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375491_comment'></div>韩信击魏。舣临晋而渡夏阳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375491_comment'></div>百道无飞走之虞。一缕见倾危之势。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375491_comment'></div>计其反接。当不踰时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375491_comment'></div>是则陈曲逆之六奇。翻成屑屑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375491_comment'></div>葛武侯之八阵。更觉区区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375491_comment'></div>此庙战之功三也。三寇殄灭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375491_comment'></div>万方率同。将荡海腾区。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375491_comment'></div>夷山拓宇。高待泥金之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375491_comment'></div>雄专瘗玉之辞。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_73_1375491", 1375491, "Clauses/147/Comments/0")'>烟阁</span>传形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375491_comment'></div>革车就国。尽人臣之极分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375491_comment'></div>焕今古之高名。况又奉以嘉声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375491_comment'></div>谐兹国检。斗文赐糗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375491_comment'></div>远箴醉饱之徒。晏子朝衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375491_comment'></div>横励轻肥之俗。比周息虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375491_comment'></div>孤介归仁。绍续勋家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375491_comment'></div>扶持旧族。罔容私谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375491_comment'></div>皆事公言。景风至而庆赏先行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375491_comment'></div>仲吕协而贤良必遂。岂直杜伯山之令子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375491_comment'></div>大邑传家。陶彭泽之孤孙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375491_comment'></div>西曹受署。重以心游书囿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375491_comment'></div>思托文林。提枹于绝艺之场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375491_comment'></div>班扬扫地。鞠旅于无前之敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375491_comment'></div>江鲍舆尸。故矫枉则黄冶之赋兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375491_comment'></div>游道则知止之篇作。辞穷体物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375491_comment'></div>律变登高。文星留伏于笔间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375491_comment'></div>䌽凤翱翔于梦里。此固谈扬绝意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375491_comment'></div>仿效何阶。若某者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375491_comment'></div>徒预宗盟。早尘清鉴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375491_comment'></div>而行藏迁贸。岐路差池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375491_comment'></div>今将抽实吐诚。推心<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_94_1375491", 1375491, "Clauses/189/Comments/0")'>叙款</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375491_comment'></div>缄犹未写。词已失烦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375491_comment'></div>某爰自弱龄。实标孤操。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375491_comment'></div>寒郊映雪。暑草搜萤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375491_comment'></div>虽有谢于天姿。或无惭于力学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375491_comment'></div>庾持奇字。信未皆通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375491_comment'></div>敬礼小文。颇常留意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375491_comment'></div>太和中。敢扬微抱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375491_comment'></div>窃献短章。方候明诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375491_comment'></div>忽蒙复命。荆州一纸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375491_comment'></div>河东百金。叨延月旦之评。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1375491_comment'></div>长积竹林之恋。竟以事将愿背。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1375491_comment'></div>蹇与身期。离索每多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1375491_comment'></div>交攀莫遂。武陵被病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1375491_comment'></div>洛表求医。未及上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1375491_comment'></div>先蒙受代。肩舆而至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1375491_comment'></div>杜门以居。蓬藋荒凉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1375491_comment'></div>风霜迅厉。今巳稍痊美疢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1375491_comment'></div>获托休辰。殷钧体羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1375491_comment'></div>尚能为郡。马卿疾罢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1375491_comment'></div>犹可言文。退无井臼之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1375491_comment'></div>进乏交朋之助。是以徘徊轩幄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1375491_comment'></div>托附缄封。冀陈蔡之及门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1375491_comment'></div>庶江黄之列会。敢渝孤直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1375491_comment'></div>仰累清光。东浪惊年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1375491_comment'></div>西飙结欷。矢心佩赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1375491_comment'></div>毕命衔辉。道阻且跻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1375491_comment'></div>书不尽意。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_121_1375491", 1375491, "Clauses/243/Comments/0")'>金楹</span>假荫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1375491_comment'></div>望同相贺之禽。珠岸回光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1375491_comment'></div>庶及不枯之草。明悬肝胆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1375491_comment'></div>唯所炉锤。干冒尊严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1375491_comment'></div>伏用兢灼。谨启。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375604_comment'></div>果成飘注。以救惔焚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375604_comment'></div>敢吝斯牲。用报嘉种。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375604_comment'></div>神其永通灵感。长懋元功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375604_comment'></div>导楚子之馀波。霈晋国之膏雨。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375631_comment'></div>皇极流辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375631_comment'></div>自严君以交辟延荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375631_comment'></div>仲父以立朝衍庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375631_comment'></div>叔父虽礼疏五服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375631_comment'></div>而义协一家。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1375479_comment'></div>因藉时来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375479_comment'></div>伏值相公顾以外藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375479_comment'></div>夙通<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1375479", 1375479, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>襟契</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375479_comment'></div>悯羊昙之未立。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375479_comment'></div>早托谢家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375479_comment'></div>怜康伯之无归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375479_comment'></div>常依王氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375479_comment'></div>拔于幽滞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375479_comment'></div>处以周行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375479_comment'></div>遂俾南宪中台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375479_comment'></div>屡承阙乏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375479_comment'></div>内庭西掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375479_comment'></div>比辱升迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375479_comment'></div>迈越时流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375479_comment'></div>尘污中旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375479_comment'></div>恩渥非次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375479_comment'></div>性分难移。<div id='poem_sentence_25_1375479_comment'></div>竟使惧因福过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375479_comment'></div>疾以忧成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375479_comment'></div>外虽全人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375479_comment'></div>中抱美疢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375479_comment'></div>常愿青蒲沥恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375479_comment'></div>紫殿披诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375479_comment'></div>进退未闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375479_comment'></div>过累仍积。<div id='poem_sentence_35_1375479_comment'></div>寻欲窃候休旬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375479_comment'></div>伏拜萧屏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375479_comment'></div>谢昔年之朝奖。<div id='poem_sentence_45_1375479_comment'></div>绛台北控。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375479_comment'></div>有元戎大集之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375479_comment'></div>郑国东临。<div id='poem_sentence_50_1375479_comment'></div>事属供须。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375479_comment'></div>岂斯择材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375479_comment'></div>皆在非据。<div id='poem_sentence_55_1375479_comment'></div>颁宣诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375479_comment'></div>祗惕庙画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375479_comment'></div>虽无咎悔。<div id='poem_sentence_60_1375479_comment'></div>六州向化。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375479_comment'></div>灵台偃伯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375479_comment'></div>衢室归尊。<div id='poem_sentence_65_1375479_comment'></div>而郑之为地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375479_comment'></div>右临梁苑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375479_comment'></div>左倚成皋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1375479_comment'></div>固以动心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1375479_comment'></div>如蒙曲鉴深情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1375479_comment'></div>猥从志愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1375479_comment'></div>置之他所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1375479_comment'></div>以遂其愚。<div id='poem_sentence_122_1375479_comment'></div>虽居邻佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1375479_comment'></div>亦委缉绥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1375479_comment'></div>获安病躬。<div id='poem_sentence_127_1375479_comment'></div>抚养疲羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1375479_comment'></div>积以岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1375479_comment'></div>少裨尘路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1375479_comment'></div>伏惟试赐恩照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1375479_comment'></div>围减带缓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1375479_comment'></div>发稀弁倾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1375479_comment'></div>窅然向风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1375479_comment'></div>目极心往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1375479_comment'></div>下情无任攀恋感激惶惧之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_136_1375479_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375640' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375640' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375640?labeling=true' target='_blank'>重祭外舅司徒公文</a><span class='authorDate'>（844年8月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375640")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375640_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375640'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375640'>呜呼哀哉。人之生也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375640_comment'></div>变而往耶。人之逝也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375640_comment'></div>变而来耶。冥寞之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375640_comment'></div>杳惚之内。虚变而有气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375640_comment'></div>气变而有形。形变而有生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375640_comment'></div>今将还生于形。归形于气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375640_comment'></div>漠然其不识。浩然其无端。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375640_comment'></div>则虽有忧喜悲欢。而亦勿能措于其间矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375640_comment'></div>苟或以变而之有。变而之无。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375640_comment'></div>若朝昏之相交。若春夏之相易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375640_comment'></div>则四时见代。尚动于情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375640_comment'></div>岂百生莫追。遂可无恨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375640_comment'></div>倘或去此。亦孰贵于最灵哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375640_comment'></div>呜呼。公之世冑勋华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375640_comment'></div>职官扬历。并已托于寄奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375640_comment'></div>备在前文。今所以重具酒牢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375640_comment'></div>载形翰墨。盖意有所未尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375640_comment'></div>痛有所难忘。以公之平生恩知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375640_comment'></div>曩昔顾盼。属纩之夕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375640_comment'></div>不得闻启手之言。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_19_1375640", 1375640, "Clauses/39/Comments/0")'>祖庭</span>之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375640_comment'></div>不得在执绋之列。终哀且痛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375640_comment'></div>其可道耶。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375640_comment'></div>七十之年。人谁不及。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375640_comment'></div>三公之位。人谁不登。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375640_comment'></div>何数月之间。不及从心之岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375640_comment'></div>闻天有恸。方登论道之司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375640_comment'></div>时泰命屯。才长运否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375640_comment'></div>为善何益。彼苍难知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375640_comment'></div>昔泽怪既明。告敖释桓公之病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375640_comment'></div>阴德未报。夏侯知丙吉不亡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375640_comment'></div>何昔有其传。今无其證。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375640_comment'></div>岂人言之不当。将天道之或欺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375640_comment'></div>虽北海悬定薨期。长沙前觉灾至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375640_comment'></div>偃如巨室。去若归人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375640_comment'></div>处顺不忧。得正之喜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375640_comment'></div>在公之德斯盛。在物之痛何言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375640_comment'></div>矧乎再轸虑居。屡垂理命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375640_comment'></div>简子将战之誓。惟止桐棺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375640_comment'></div>晏婴送死之文。宁思石椁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375640_comment'></div>素车朴马。疏巾弊帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375640_comment'></div>成一代之清规。扬百年之休问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375640_comment'></div>所谓有始有卒。高明令终。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375640_comment'></div>呜呼。往在泾川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375640_comment'></div>始受殊遇。绸缪之迹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375640_comment'></div>岂无他人。樽空花朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375640_comment'></div>灯尽夜室。忘名器于贵贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375640_comment'></div>去形迹于尊卑。语皇王致理之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375640_comment'></div>考圣哲行藏之旨。每有论次。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375640_comment'></div>必蒙褒称。及移秩农卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375640_comment'></div>分忧旧许。羁牵少暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375640_comment'></div>陪奉多违。迹疏意通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375640_comment'></div>期赊道密。纻衣缟带。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375640_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1375640", 1375640, "Clauses/104/Comments/0")'>雅贶</span>或比于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1375640", 1375640, "Clauses/104/Comments/1")'>侨吴</span>。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_52_1375640", 1375640, "Clauses/105/Comments/0")'>荆钗布裙</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375640_comment'></div>高义每符于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1375640", 1375640, "Clauses/106/Comments/0")'>梁孟</span>。今则已矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375640_comment'></div>安可赎乎。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375640_comment'></div>千里归涂。东门故第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375640_comment'></div>数尺素帛。一炉香烟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375640_comment'></div>耿宾从之云归。俨盘筵而不御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375640_comment'></div>小君多恙。诸孤善丧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375640_comment'></div>登堂辄啼。下马先哭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375640_comment'></div>含怀旧极。抚事新伤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375640_comment'></div>植玉求归。已轻于旧日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375640_comment'></div>泣珠报惠。宁尽于兹辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375640_comment'></div>况邢氏吾姨。萧门仲妹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375640_comment'></div>爱深犹女。恩切仁兄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375640_comment'></div>抚嫠纬以增摧。阖孀闺而永恸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375640_comment'></div>草荄土梗。旁助酸辛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375640_comment'></div>高鸟深鱼。遥添怨咽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375640_comment'></div>呜呼。精神何往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375640_comment'></div>形气安归。苟才能有所未伸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375640_comment'></div>勋庸有所未极。则其强气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375640_comment'></div>宜有异闻。玉骨化于钟山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375640_comment'></div>楸柏实于裘氏。惊愚骇俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375640_comment'></div>伫有闻焉。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375640_comment'></div>姜氏怀安之规。既闻之矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375640_comment'></div>毕万名数之庆。可称也哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375640_comment'></div>箧有遗经。匣藏传剑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375640_comment'></div>积兹馀庆。必有扬名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375640_comment'></div>愚方遁迹丘园。游心坟素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375640_comment'></div>前耕后饷。并食易衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375640_comment'></div>不忮不求。道诚有在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375640_comment'></div>自媒自衒。病或未能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375640_comment'></div>虽吕范以久贫。幸冶长之无罪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375640_comment'></div>昔公爱女。今愚病妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375640_comment'></div>内动肺肝。外挥血泪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375640_comment'></div>得仲尼三尺之喙。论意无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375640_comment'></div>尽文通五色之毫。书情莫既。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375640_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。公其鉴之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375640_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_88_1375640_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='fdbb289b5a994ebb98a39c0000755cff_label'><a id='poem_sentence_0_1375481_comment'></div>伏以秉大钧者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375481_comment'></div>以物得其所为先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375481_comment'></div>执大化者。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1375481_comment'></div>在明命官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375481_comment'></div>使轻重合宜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375481_comment'></div>大小有裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375481_comment'></div>偶叨承平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375481_comment'></div>谬登华显。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375481_comment'></div>前贤攸重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375481_comment'></div>一麾出守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375481_comment'></div>昔人所荣。<div id='poem_sentence_25_1375481_comment'></div>况又此州管叔旧国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375481_comment'></div>帝鸿遗墟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375481_comment'></div>接彼㠂峣。<div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375626'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375626'>伏惟灵佐商宣业。朝薛传规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375626_comment'></div>门峥层构。堂嶪崇基。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375626_comment'></div>玉生蓝岫。芝产铜池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375626_comment'></div>梧高伫凤。莲馥停龟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375626_comment'></div>有美令人。再称清劭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375626_comment'></div>训在诗书。乐惟名教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375626_comment'></div>王谢标格。曹刘才调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375626_comment'></div>清如濯热之风。明若观朝之燎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375626_comment'></div>灵台委鉴。虚室融和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375626_comment'></div>秋水望。春台上多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375626_comment'></div>乡塾掉鞅。文林厉戈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375626_comment'></div>砚横河汉。纸落烟波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375626_comment'></div>泽宫狸首。棘场杨叶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375626_comment'></div>箭去星惭。弓悬月怯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375626_comment'></div>两书上第。五辟名公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375626_comment'></div>马卿赋雪。陈琳愈风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375626_comment'></div>平台竹苑。淮山桂丛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375626_comment'></div>营分细柳。幕染芙蓉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375626_comment'></div>显备台僚。荣从宪秩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375626_comment'></div>冠峨铁劲。衣明绣密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375626_comment'></div>霜下简端。风生落笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375626_comment'></div>庭夜乌回。天秋隼疾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375626_comment'></div>帝念充职。任于谏垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375626_comment'></div>依违绝想。从容敢言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375626_comment'></div>攀槛而空留迹在。削稿而不见书存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375626_comment'></div>女史护衣。大官供食。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375626_comment'></div>伏奏多可。分曹著绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375626_comment'></div>帐煖锦丽。闱明粉白。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375626_comment'></div>既题柱以如田。亦偿金而类直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375626_comment'></div>汉荣出牧。晋议州兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375626_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_30_1375626", 1375626, "Clauses/60/Comments/0")'>廉裤</span>歌送。刘钱赠行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375626_comment'></div>济南之诛巨猾。扬州之试诸生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375626_comment'></div>虎去江静。珠来岸明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375626_comment'></div>神岂好谦。天宁秩礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375626_comment'></div>蠹华国之明品。丧士林之模楷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375626_comment'></div>使为善者夺气。求仁者解体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375626_comment'></div>已不驻乎卿云。竟何窥于伏济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375626_comment'></div>长洲树古。茂苑山春。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375626_comment'></div>橘税既集。茶征是亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375626_comment'></div>鹢度霅而去远。鹄下亭而唳频。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375626_comment'></div>翟虏氛兴。殷楹梦起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375626_comment'></div>帐入飞鹏。床惊斗蚁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375626_comment'></div>郑元知数。阮瞻无鬼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375626_comment'></div>终自膏肓。傅于骨髓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375626_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。丹霄万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375626_comment'></div>建木千寻。坦坦清路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375626_comment'></div>曈曈翠阴。三袭台迥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375626_comment'></div>九重禁深。中悬旒扆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375626_comment'></div>下集华簪。无非东箭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375626_comment'></div>尽是南金。或扶倾作栋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375626_comment'></div>或望旱为霖。显允明公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375626_comment'></div>宜膺百福。夜暗神昧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375626_comment'></div>天长景促。青女变霜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375626_comment'></div>羲和纳旭。悄随掌以销玑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375626_comment'></div>慨周闲之丧騄。永惟清族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375626_comment'></div>本富才人。有弟则陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375626_comment'></div>无兄不荀。<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_56_1375626", 1375626, "Clauses/113/Comments/0")'>原鸰</span>奕奕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375626_comment'></div>沼雁驯驯。珩奇动楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375626_comment'></div>璧贵倾秦。永矣彼苍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375626_comment'></div>胡然人事。但续椿寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375626_comment'></div>徒高<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_60_1375626", 1375626, "Clauses/120/Comments/0")'>鹤位</span>。摧压光价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375626_comment'></div>掩沦声味。颍不浊而殄灌宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375626_comment'></div>淮未绝而倾王氏。某因承中外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375626_comment'></div>获奉恩知。通孔李道德之旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375626_comment'></div>兼卢刘姻戚之私。铸颜有契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375626_comment'></div>全赵为期。静龙门之风水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375626_comment'></div>铲羊肠之崄巇。空欲铭恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375626_comment'></div>何酬树德。庇孤根于高援。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375626_comment'></div>许嘉姻于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_68_1375626", 1375626, "Clauses/136/Comments/0")'>弱植</span>。将欢宋子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375626_comment'></div>俄放湘南。绶黄楚徼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375626_comment'></div>须白昭潭。归止未卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375626_comment'></div>弃予是甘。许靖之悲方极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375626_comment'></div>王粲之忧不堪。犹辱重言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375626_comment'></div>将敦故约。玉无改行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375626_comment'></div>金不如诺。勖大义于幽沈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375626_comment'></div>轸遐心于漂泊。使者尚在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375626_comment'></div>凶书已来。雁足空远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375626_comment'></div>鱼肠不回。泪和峡雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375626_comment'></div>哭振巴雷。孰浇枯鲋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375626_comment'></div>谁热寒灰。今则言去彬江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375626_comment'></div>当移澧浦。稍脱疑网。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375626_comment'></div>犹罹罪罟。念申恸以无期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375626_comment'></div>岂沈冤之可吐。呜呼哀哉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375626_comment'></div>执绋路阻。佳城望赊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375626_comment'></div>凌空乏翼。上汉无槎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375626_comment'></div>或期他日。式返中华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375626_comment'></div>认杨公之石鸟。抚周苞之辟邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375626_comment'></div>况良冶规存。遗经业在。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375626_comment'></div>臧孙有后。魏万必大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375626_comment'></div>敢期陋质。终托馀光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375626_comment'></div>韦平之绍续无望。秦晋之婚姻岂忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375626_comment'></div>絮酒无几。生刍是将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375626_comment'></div>辞多失次。泪数无行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375626_comment'></div>冀桂旌之不远。降兰佩之馀芳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375626_comment'></div>呜呼哀哉。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375424_comment'></div>下情不任结恋之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1375424_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=844&endYear=845')">844-845年</a>　闲居永乐，有诗。作品：幽居冬暮。四年冬以退居蒲之永乐渴然有农夫望岁之志，遂作忆雪又作残雪诗各一百言以寄情于游旧。喜雪。题小柏。正月十五夜闻京有灯，恨不得观。赋得月照冰池。<div id='poem_28915' class='_poem'><div id='poem_sentence_8_29075'></div><div id='poem_sentence_8_29075_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年1月</a>　闲居永乐，有文。作品：为河南卢尹贺上尊号表。<div id='poem_1375283' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375283' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375283?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为河南卢尹贺上尊号表</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375283")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375283_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375283'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375283'>臣某言。臣得本道进奏院状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375283_comment'></div>知宰臣某等奉上尊号。以光洪休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375283_comment'></div>耀列圣之睿图。表三宫之义训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375283_comment'></div>凡在生物。孰不欢心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375283_comment'></div>臣某中贺。臣闻善言天者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375283_comment'></div>必推功于广覆。善言日者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375283_comment'></div>必咏德于大明。然后物仰元穹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375283_comment'></div>人知景曜。皇王拟象。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375283_comment'></div>今古同规。伏惟仁圣文武章天成功神德明道大孝皇帝陛下体天垂荫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375283_comment'></div>法日流辉。宏上德以缵戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375283_comment'></div>启下武而膺运。顷从临御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375283_comment'></div>旋致治平。雨块风条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375283_comment'></div>时推顺适。苗螟叶蟘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375283_comment'></div>坐致销亡。是以银瓮石碑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375283_comment'></div>非烟浪井。神而告瑞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375283_comment'></div>史不绝书。且獯鬻为灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375283_comment'></div>周秦乏策。金行火运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375283_comment'></div>不绝于侵陵。瀚海阴山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375283_comment'></div>几渝于约誓。而敢乘衰运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375283_comment'></div>来犯昌朝。陛下乃赫以天威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375283_comment'></div>授之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_20_1375283", 1375283, "Clauses/40/Comments/0")'>宏略</span>。一伐而单于仅免。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375283_comment'></div>三鼓而贵主来还。灭大邦之仇雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375283_comment'></div>摅累圣之忿愤。及晋阳逐帅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375283_comment'></div>代马新羁。陛下又浚发宸襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375283_comment'></div>委诸庙画。浃辰而前军就路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375283_comment'></div>踰月而元恶膏砧。静丰沛之<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1375283", 1375283, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>遗疆</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375283_comment'></div>举陶唐之故俗。蕞尔潞子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375283_comment'></div>复生孽童。脱缞冀恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375283_comment'></div>上柩拒诏。据九折之险。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375283_comment'></div>有五州之人。薮泽逋逃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375283_comment'></div>粪土租税。陛下又远扬神断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375283_comment'></div>深诏徂征。合镇魏之强藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375283_comment'></div>出韩彭之锐将。夷其巢窟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375283_comment'></div>去彼根株。清明皇之旧宫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375283_comment'></div>复金桥之故地。曾非旷岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375283_comment'></div>集此丕功。固巳至化潜融。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375283_comment'></div>事光于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_36_1375283", 1375283, "Clauses/72/Comments/0")'>玉版</span>。元机独运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375283_comment'></div>理溢于瑶编。况又志切希夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375283_comment'></div>道存冲漠。慕遗踪于姑射。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375283_comment'></div>载动尧心。思顺请于崆峒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375283_comment'></div>欲劳轩拜。远扬圣祖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375283_comment'></div>载伫神孙。俾异法皆祛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375283_comment'></div>多门就掩。麟殿正元元之座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375283_comment'></div>凤书招黄老之徒。将以休有万龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375283_comment'></div>临兹兆众。使咸践寿昌之域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375283_comment'></div>俱游富庶之乡。巍乎焕乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375283_comment'></div>盛矣美矣。故得人祇协欲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375283_comment'></div>华夏均怀。愿加尊显之称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375283_comment'></div>以报财成之美。宰臣等果能陈大义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375283_comment'></div>允建鸿名。伊尹暨汤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375283_comment'></div>咸有一德。咎繇谟禹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375283_comment'></div>克缵九功。述尽善于王猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375283_comment'></div>标具美于帝箓。南山称寿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375283_comment'></div>北辰降光。永终无极之年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375283_comment'></div>长奉上清之号。臣幸丁昌运。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375283_comment'></div>方守洛京。空深恋阙之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375283_comment'></div>不在称觞之列。举头见日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375283_comment'></div>虽悲千里之遥。侧管窥天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375283_comment'></div>且庆百年之幸。无任徘徊望阙蹈舞踊跃之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375283_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_59_1375283_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=845&endYear=845')">845年</a>　闲居永乐，有诗。作品：赋得桃李无言。永乐县所居一草一木无非自栽，今春悉已芳茂因书即事一章。<div id='poem_29076' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_29076' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/29076?labeling=true' target='_blank'>赋得桃李无言</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_29076")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>五言排律</div></div><div id='poem_title_29076_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_29076'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_29076'>夭桃花正发，秾李蕊方繁。<div id='poem_sentence_0_29076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_29076'>应候非争艳，成蹊不在言。<div id='poem_sentence_1_29076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_29076'>静中霞暗吐，香处雪潜翻。<div id='poem_sentence_2_29076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_29076'>得意摇风态，含情泣露痕。<div id='poem_sentence_3_29076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_29076'>芬芳光上苑，寂默委中园。<div id='poem_sentence_4_29076_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_29076'>赤白徒自许，幽芳谁与论。<div class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_29044' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/29044?labeling=true' target='_blank'>永乐县所居一草一木无非自栽今春悉已芳茂因书即事一章</a><span class='authorDate'>（845年）</span><span class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375520_comment'></div>尝多违远。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375520_comment'></div>风波结恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375520_comment'></div>皋壤衔诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375520_comment'></div>始邂逅于江津。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375520_comment'></div>又差池于门宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375520_comment'></div>递蒙厚赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375520_comment'></div>以重离忧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375520_comment'></div>文革锦茵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375520_comment'></div>终成虚饰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375520_comment'></div>杯杓匕箸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375520_comment'></div>谁与为欢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375520_comment'></div>孤烛扁舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375520_comment'></div>寒更永夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375520_comment'></div>回肠延首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375520_comment'></div>书不尽言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375520_comment'></div>伏计亦赐信察。</div><div id='poem_sentence_20_1375520_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_28833' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28833' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_1_28833", 28833, "Clauses/3/Comments/0")'>邓橘</span>未全黄。<div id='poem_sentence_1_28833_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' 江陵

id='poem_sentence_1_1375398_comment'></div>十三大学士学同九流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375398_comment'></div>文穷三变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375398_comment'></div>果解殊选。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375398_comment'></div>允用当仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375398_comment'></div>千载兴怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375398_comment'></div>一时定法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375398_comment'></div>使马迁死且不朽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375398_comment'></div>犹畏后生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375398_comment'></div>若王隐魂而可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375398_comment'></div>必惭非法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375398_comment'></div>凡厥儒学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375398_comment'></div>以为光荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375398_comment'></div>况某尝被恩知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375398_comment'></div>曾蒙讲教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375398_comment'></div>唯望精闻变例。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375398_comment'></div>窃见先经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375398_comment'></div>虽类偃商。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375398_comment'></div>终一辞而不措。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375398_comment'></div>庶同公谷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375398_comment'></div>许二传以兼行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375398_comment'></div>伏计清光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375398_comment'></div>必赐念记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375398_comment'></div>方之遐峤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375398_comment'></div>临上孤舟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375398_comment'></div>仰望玉音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375398_comment'></div>俯佩金诺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375398_comment'></div>下情不任攀贺结恋之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_28_1375398_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div><div class='label1' id='71a90158eddb4329984c452217f63d18_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("71a90158eddb4329984c452217f63d18");'><span id='71a90158eddb4329984c452217f63d18_link' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375504'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375504_comment'></div>日者庆属中兴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375504_comment'></div>运推常武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375504_comment'></div>仰窥金版。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375504_comment'></div>遐考瑶图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375504_comment'></div>顺祖之孝思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375504_comment'></div>丹青曾闵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375504_comment'></div>宪皇之功烈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375504_comment'></div>刀机彭韦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375504_comment'></div>圣上初九潜泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375504_comment'></div>以后稷岐嶷为小慧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375504_comment'></div>故人莫得知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375504_comment'></div>以汉皇云物为下祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375504_comment'></div>故神无所豫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375504_comment'></div>洎陟元后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375504_comment'></div>往执灵鉟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375504_comment'></div>正星辰之分野。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375504_comment'></div>今调镂鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375504_comment'></div>犹日月之得天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375504_comment'></div>昔轩后师臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375504_comment'></div>成王畏相。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375504_comment'></div>殷奉伊尹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375504_comment'></div>则谓之元圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375504_comment'></div>周事吕尚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375504_comment'></div>则命为太公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375504_comment'></div>此王者之所以尊贤杰而不以为疑也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375504_comment'></div>至于姬旦金縢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375504_comment'></div>不与燕召同列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375504_comment'></div>仲尼<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_34_1375504", 1375504, id='poem_sentence_38_1375504_comment'></div>上下交感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375504_comment'></div>人祇协从。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375504_comment'></div>是我后夷奸秉哲之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375504_comment'></div>实閤下宰物匡时之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375504_comment'></div>清庙系心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375504_comment'></div>苍生延首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375504_comment'></div>允也无间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375504_comment'></div>乐哉惟时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375504_comment'></div>某早奉辉光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375504_comment'></div>常蒙咳唾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375504_comment'></div>牛心致誉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375504_comment'></div>麈尾交谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375504_comment'></div>而契阔十年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375504_comment'></div>流离万里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375504_comment'></div>扶风歌则刘琨抱膝。<div class='inline' href='/Writing/1375568?labeling=true' target='_blank'>樊南甲集序</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年9月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375568")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375568_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375568'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375568'>樊南生十六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375568_comment'></div>能著才论圣论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375568_comment'></div>以古文出诸公间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375568_comment'></div>后联为郓相国华太守所怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375568_comment'></div>居门下时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375568_comment'></div>敕定奏记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375568_comment'></div>始通今体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375568_comment'></div>后又两为秘省房中官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375568_comment'></div>恣展古集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375568_comment'></div>往往<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_9_1375568", 1375568, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>咽噱</span>于任范徐庾之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375568_comment'></div>有请作文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375568_comment'></div>或时得好对切事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375568_comment'></div>声势物景。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375568_comment'></div>哀上浮壮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375568_comment'></div>能感动人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375568_comment'></div>十年京师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375568_comment'></div>寒且饿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375568_comment'></div>人或目曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375568_comment'></div>韩文杜诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375568_comment'></div>彭阳章檄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375568_comment'></div>樊南穷冻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375568_comment'></div>人或知之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375568_comment'></div>仲弟圣仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375568_comment'></div>特善古文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375568_comment'></div>居会昌中进士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375568_comment'></div>为第一二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375568_comment'></div>常表以今体规我。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375568_comment'></div>而未为能休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375568_comment'></div>大中元年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375568_comment'></div>被奏入岭当表记。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375568_comment'></div>所为亦多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375568_comment'></div>冬如南郡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375568_comment'></div>舟中忽复括其所藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375568_comment'></div>火燹墨污。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375568_comment'></div>半有坠落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375568_comment'></div>因削笔衡山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375568_comment'></div>洗砚湘江。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375568_comment'></div>以类相等色得四百三十三件。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375568_comment'></div>作二十卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375568_comment'></div>唤曰樊南四六。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375568_comment'></div>四六之名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375568_comment'></div>六博格五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375568_comment'></div>四数六甲之取也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375568_comment'></div>未足矜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375568_comment'></div>十月十二日夜月明序。</div><div id='poem_sentence_44_1375568_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=847&endYear=847')">847年</a>　自桂林奉使赴江陵途次作。作品：江村题壁。自桂林奉使江陵途中感怀寄献尚书。<div id='poem_28851' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28851' class='poemTitle ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=847&endYear=847')">847年5月</a>　五月初，随桂管经略使郑亚抵达桂州。<br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=847&endYear=847')">847年</a>　在桂管经略使郑亚幕。作品：献侍郎钜鹿公启。为荥阳公上李太尉状。为荥阳公谢除卢副使等官状。为桂州卢副使谢聘钱启。为荥阳公与昭义李仆射状。为荥阳公桂州举人自代状。为荥阳公与汴州卢仆射状。为荥阳公谢集贤韦相公状。为荥阳公上河中崔相公状一。为荥阳公上河中崔相公状二。为荥阳公上西川崔相公状。为荥阳公上荆南郑相公状一。为荥阳公上淮南李相公状。为荥阳公与浙西李尚书状。为荥阳公与京兆李尹状。为荥阳公与河南崔尹状。为荥阳公与容州韦中丞状。为中丞荥阳公赴桂州长乐驿谢敕设馔状。为中丞荥阳公谢借飞龙马送至府界状。上度支卢侍郎状。上汉南卢尚书状。为荥阳公谢荆南郑相公状。为荥阳公上集贤韦相公状一。为荥阳公上弘文崔相公状一。为荥阳公上史馆白相公状一。为荥阳公上门下李相公状一。五月十五夜忆往岁秋与彻师同宿。<div id='poem_1375518' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375518' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375518?labeling=true' target='_blank'>献侍郎钜鹿公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375518")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375518_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375518'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375518'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375518_comment'></div>今月某日舍弟新及第进士羲叟处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375518_comment'></div>伏见侍郎所制春闱放榜后寄呈在朝同年兼简新及第诸先辈五言四韵诗一首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375518_comment'></div>夫元黄备采者绣之用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375518_comment'></div>清越为乐者玉之奇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375518_comment'></div>固以虑合元机。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375518_comment'></div>运清俗累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375518_comment'></div>陟降于四始之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375518_comment'></div>优游于六义之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375518_comment'></div>窃计前时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375518_comment'></div>承荣内署。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375518_comment'></div>柏台侍宴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375518_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1375518", 1375518, "Clauses/12/Comments/0")'>熊馆</span>从畋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375518_comment'></div>式以风骚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375518_comment'></div>仰陪天籁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375518_comment'></div>动沛中之旧老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375518_comment'></div>骇汾水之佳人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375518_comment'></div>非首义于论思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375518_comment'></div>实终篇于润色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375518_comment'></div>光传乐录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375518_comment'></div>道焕诗家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375518_comment'></div>况属词之工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375518_comment'></div>言志为最。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375518_comment'></div>自鲁毛兆轨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375518_comment'></div>苏李扬声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375518_comment'></div>代有遗音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375518_comment'></div>时无绝响。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375518_comment'></div>虽古今异制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375518_comment'></div>而律吕同归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375518_comment'></div>我朝以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375518_comment'></div>此道尤盛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375518_comment'></div>皆陷于偏巧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375518_comment'></div>罕或兼材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375518_comment'></div>枕石漱流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375518_comment'></div>则尚于枯槁寂寥之句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375518_comment'></div>攀鳞附翼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375518_comment'></div>则先于骄奢艳佚之篇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375377_comment'></div>宣武兵多。大梁地要。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375377_comment'></div>承言今昔。常继风流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375377_comment'></div>某厚蒙恩知。倍深倚望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375377_comment'></div>即以今月七日赴任。续更有状。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375348_comment'></div>徒勤万里之肺肝。愧乏十围之腰腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375348_comment'></div>仰从台衮。来饰藩垣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375352_comment'></div>尝扇仁风。式访颠毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375352_comment'></div>兼询憩树。吏皆攀辕之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375352_comment'></div>民皆遮道之人。绵以岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375352_comment'></div>深在肌骨。何武以兖州之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375352_comment'></div>黄霸以颍川之能。或入作尹京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375352_comment'></div>或登为国相。向若非相公清门重德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375352_comment'></div>士范词宗。则安能侔兖颍之佳声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375352_comment'></div>兼何黄之盛拜。况运当惟睿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375352_comment'></div>听属虚襟。仰赞治平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375352_comment'></div>固在期月。伏惟善保尊体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375352_comment'></div>以副沃心。某实乏异能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375352_comment'></div>叨当问俗。未识褰帷之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375352_comment'></div>何酬大冶之恩。唯当务以躬亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375352_comment'></div>蠲其疾瘼。烦宣诏旨。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375368_comment'></div>实属长君。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375368_comment'></div>优游虽纵于宗臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375368_comment'></div>融冶必资于宰匠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375368_comment'></div>窃计明台衢室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375368_comment'></div>已悬梦思。<div </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375378")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375378_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375314'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375314'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375314_comment'></div>今月某日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375314_comment'></div>中使某奉宣进止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375314_comment'></div>就长乐驿赐臣及将吏等设馔者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375314_comment'></div>将承藩寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375314_comment'></div>尚忝朝恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375314_comment'></div>络绎八珍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375314_comment'></div>芬芳九酝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375314_comment'></div>臣阶缘薄伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375314_comment'></div>尘辱修涂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375314_comment'></div>扬执戟之读书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375314_comment'></div>虽无非圣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375314_comment'></div>董大中之对策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375314_comment'></div>何补清时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375314_comment'></div>忽委廉车。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375314_comment'></div>乍离闺籍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375314_comment'></div>诚欣列土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375314_comment'></div>实耿辞天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375314_comment'></div>然犹食指告祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375314_comment'></div>朵颐有庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375314_comment'></div>爰于近驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375314_comment'></div>式降贵臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375314_comment'></div>酒自尧樽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375314_comment'></div>馔分殷鼎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375314_comment'></div>下沾将校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375314_comment'></div>旁耀路岐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375314_comment'></div>况臣平生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375314_comment'></div>本实孤贱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375314_comment'></div>怀书奉役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375314_comment'></div>久无黔突之谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375314_comment'></div>入国展仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375314_comment'></div>且懵殽烝之礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375314_comment'></div>饱期满腹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375314_comment'></div>醉更忧心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375314_comment'></div>终虞负乘之灾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375314_comment'></div>无报云天之施。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375314_comment'></div>臣与将吏等无任望阙感恩结恋屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_36_1375314_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375312' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375312' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375312?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为中丞荥阳公谢借飞龙马送至府界状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375312")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375312_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375312'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375312'>右。中使某奉宣恩旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375312_comment'></div>以臣赴任。特借飞龙马一匹并鞭辔等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375312_comment'></div>送至京兆府界者。臣谬奉恩荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375312_comment'></div>出叨廉问。岂期蹇步。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375312_comment'></div>深轸皇慈。特命内臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375312_comment'></div>俾腾上驷。梁悬蜀镫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375312_comment'></div>几覆吴鞍。每多曳练之疑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375312_comment'></div>不假著鞭之力。倏踰秦甸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375312_comment'></div>将复周闲。照地回光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375312_comment'></div>瞻天送影。长亭欲别。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375312_comment'></div>未期东道而来。双阙尚嘶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375312_comment'></div>愿附北风之思。无任感恩恋阙雪涕屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375312_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1375312_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375416' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375416' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375416?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上度支卢侍郎状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375416'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375416'>某行己及邓州。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375416_comment'></div>回望门阑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375416_comment'></div>如隔霄汉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375416_comment'></div>感知佩德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375416_comment'></div>不任血诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375416_comment'></div>某揣摩莫闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375416_comment'></div>疏拙有素。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375416_comment'></div>侍郎奖其薄伎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375416_comment'></div>夙降重言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375416_comment'></div>而时亨命屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375416_comment'></div>道泰身否。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375416_comment'></div>属兹淹踬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375416_comment'></div>不副提携。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375416_comment'></div>今者万里衔诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375416_comment'></div>一身奉役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375416_comment'></div>湖岭重复。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375416_comment'></div>骨肉支离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375416_comment'></div>交广之叹袁忠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375416_comment'></div>荆蛮之悲王粲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375416_comment'></div>思人抚事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375416_comment'></div>古亦犹今。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375416_comment'></div>惟当幽祷鬼神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375416_comment'></div>明祈日月。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375416_comment'></div>伏愿荣从司计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375416_comment'></div>入赞大猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375416_comment'></div>鼓长楫以济时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375416_comment'></div>运洪钧而播物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375416_comment'></div>则某必冀言还上国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375416_comment'></div>来拜恩门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375416_comment'></div>一吐汉相之茵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375416_comment'></div>一握周公之发。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375416_comment'></div>斯愿毕矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375416_comment'></div>伏惟图之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375416_comment'></div>伏计亦赐念察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375416_comment'></div>薛郎先辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375416_comment'></div>早敦分好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375416_comment'></div>实慕风规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375416_comment'></div>是敢托以缄题。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375416_comment'></div>致之几案。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375416_comment'></div>就有心恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375416_comment'></div>资其口陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375416_comment'></div>攀恋之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375416_comment'></div>输罄无地。</div><div id='poem_sentence_42_1375416_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375413' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375413' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375413?labeling=true' target='_blank'>上汉南卢尚书状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375413")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375413_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375413'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375413'>某顷以声迹幽沈。音辉悬邈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375413_comment'></div>空灭许都之刺。竟乖梁苑之游。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375413_comment'></div>于服义而徒深。顾归仁而尚阻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375413_comment'></div>今幸假涂奥壤。赴召遐蕃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375413_comment'></div>越贾生赋鵩之乡。过王子登楼之地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375413_comment'></div>岂期此际。获奉馀恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375413_comment'></div>而又询刘苑之世亲。问栾却之官族。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375413_comment'></div>优其通旧。降以清谈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375413_comment'></div>言念古人。重难兄事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375413_comment'></div>季布始拜于袁盎。萧何近下于周昌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375413_comment'></div>将用比方。彼有寥落。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375413_comment'></div>徒迫于祇役。尝抱沈疴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375413_comment'></div>空思韦曜之茶。莫及孔融之酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375413_comment'></div>遂不得仰沾美禄。一中圣人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375413_comment'></div>歌山简倒载之欢。暗定国益明之量。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375413_comment'></div>草戚上道。徘徊乐乡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375413_comment'></div>况蒙卫以武夫。假之骏马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375413_comment'></div>前腾郢路。却望汉皋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375413_comment'></div>俯缘逐逐之姿。翻阻迟迟之恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375413_comment'></div>封笺写邈。下笔难休。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375413_comment'></div>尚书三兄镇静上游。仪刑群后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375413_comment'></div>平南让勇。征北推能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375413_comment'></div>固当已注宸襟。即归台席。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375413_comment'></div>夫岁星降气。嵩岳生神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375413_comment'></div>苟鼎饪之可逃。则天爵而何寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375413_comment'></div>伏惟特以苍生为虑也。某材诚漏薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375413_comment'></div>志实辛勤。九考匪迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375413_comment'></div>三冬益苦。引锥刺股。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375413_comment'></div>虽谢于昔时。用瓜镇心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375413_comment'></div>不惭于前辈。倘得返身湖岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375413_comment'></div>归道门墙。粗依鸣益之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375413_comment'></div>以奉陶镕之赐。则尚可濡毫抒艺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375413_comment'></div>杀竹贡能。记录咎繇之谟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375413_comment'></div>注解傅岩之命。庶于此日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375413_comment'></div>不后他人。伏惟始终识察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375413_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1375413_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375366' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375366' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375366?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公谢荆南郑相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375366")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375366_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375366'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375366'>伏蒙仁恩。赐及银器绫纱茶药等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375366_comment'></div>某虽征遐峤。亦守小藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375366_comment'></div>就道巳备资粮。到镇粗有俸入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375366_comment'></div>实无阙乏。可轸恩怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375366_comment'></div>方幸经途。得遂拜觐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375366_comment'></div>禀同姓异殊之礼。展小国事大之仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375366_comment'></div>宴好频仍。言教恳至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375366_comment'></div>长途方即。厚赐仍加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375366_comment'></div>俯稽推让之诚。益重违离之恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375366_comment'></div>谨依荣示别教捧领讫。下情云云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375366_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1375366_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375351' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375351' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375351?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公上集贤韦相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375351")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375351_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375351'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375351'>伏见制书。伏承加集贤殿大学士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375351_comment'></div>恩极台阶。荣兼秘殿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375351_comment'></div>通凤池于册府。擢鸡树于书林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375351_comment'></div>中外具瞻。遐迩增慰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375351_comment'></div>相公黄中禀气。素尚资仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375351_comment'></div>片玉一枝。巳光于昔日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375351_comment'></div>前筹五鼎。果庆于兹辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375351_comment'></div>况又高步瀛洲。领官仙掖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375351_comment'></div>伫见亡书必复。坠简重编。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375351_comment'></div>使三千之徒。并受其义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375351_comment'></div>俾百家之说。各有所安。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375351_comment'></div>芟剪繁芜。整缀差谬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375351_comment'></div>某早承重奖。今守遐藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375351_comment'></div>虽荣廉问之权。实羡校雠之吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375351_comment'></div>仰瞻门闼。俯抱肺肝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375351_comment'></div>陈贺末由。伏深感恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375351_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1375351_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375359' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375359' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375359?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公上史馆白相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375359")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375359_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375359'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375359'>某行役以今月二十八日达潭州讫。轻帆直渡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375359_comment'></div>长楫横飞。仰承金铉之恩辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375359_comment'></div>幸免石邮之留滞。但以素无勋效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375359_comment'></div>谬奉宠荣。俯忧揽辔之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375359_comment'></div>有辱洪炉之赐。然亦欲简惠以临杂俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375359_comment'></div>诚明以待远人。禀王符曲豉之规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375359_comment'></div>略王霸米盐之政。使疲羸措手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375359_comment'></div>顽梗革心。伏见恩制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375359_comment'></div>伏承相公因缘新座。恳让兼荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375359_comment'></div>仰读纶言。实光鼎味。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375359_comment'></div>凡在生植。孰不欢呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375359_comment'></div>昔齐氏主盟。亦分三鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375359_comment'></div>晋人兴让。遂立五军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375359_comment'></div>彼皆列国之僚。尚焕素臣之史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375359_comment'></div>岂若相公显夫睿哲。克致升平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375359_comment'></div>当注意于作相之时。尽同心于官僚之事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375359_comment'></div>况典册之任。古今所难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375359_comment'></div>系百代之观瞻。垂一王之楷法。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375359_comment'></div>固在专修凡例。谨授诸儒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375359_comment'></div>则兽殿删仪。瀛洲集论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375359_comment'></div>校其轻重。良有等夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375359_comment'></div>将令能业其官。必在各司其局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375359_comment'></div>某早蒙荣顾。遥奉休声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375359_comment'></div>徒勤仗节之心。未有望尘之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375359_comment'></div>抃贺之外。结恋伏增。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375359_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1375359_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375375' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375375' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375375?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公上通义崔相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375375")'>李商隐</a></span><br id='poem_sentence_0_1375375'>门下。相公出镇坤维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375375_comment'></div>相公进扶宸极。某窃寻前史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375375_comment'></div>仰考昌时。必有上台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375375_comment'></div>号曰当国。姬姓则鲁周公居君牙君陈之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375375_comment'></div>汉室则萧相国在张良韩信之先。专吐嘉猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375375_comment'></div>独融明命。伏惟相公克怀懿德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375375_comment'></div>允遇休期。一自燮调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375375_comment'></div>屡彰勋伐。耻君不及于尧舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375375_comment'></div>远过前人。举贤不避于亲雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375375_comment'></div>深符直道。果兹优宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375375_comment'></div>首在注怀。外耀国华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375375_comment'></div>内荣官族。凤池浴日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375375_comment'></div>聊均润于同人。鸡树侵云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375375_comment'></div>忆分阴于游子。旷百千岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375375_comment'></div>无三四人。凡在含灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375375_comment'></div>敢不从化。况某早蒙恩顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375375_comment'></div>今获驱驰。伏限颁条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375375_comment'></div>莫由陈贺。槛猿绊骥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375375_comment'></div>敢叹于拘留。邱室膺门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375375_comment'></div>实悬于诚抱。抃贺攀恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375375_comment'></div>不任下情。伏惟俯赐恩察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375375_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1375375_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_28802' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28802' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_4_28802_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=847&endYear=847')">847年</a>　初至桂林描绘殊乡形胜、风俗。<div id='poem_28953' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_28953' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/28953?labeling=true' target='_blank'>桂林</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_28953_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_28953'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_28953'>城窄山将压，江宽地共浮。<div id='poem_sentence_2_28953'>神护青枫岸，龙移白石湫。<div id='poem_sentence_2_28953_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_28953'>殊乡竟何祷，箫鼓不曾休。<div id='poem_sentence_3_28953_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_28953'></div><div id='poem_sentence_4_28953_comment'></div></div><div class='poemComment' id='poem_comment_28953'><a href='javascript: ShowPoemComment(28953)'>评注</a><span class='inlineComment4'>（点击查看或隐藏评注）</span></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=847&endYear=847')">847年</a>　在桂管经略使郑亚幕。作品：为荥阳公赴桂州在道换进贺端午银状。为荥阳公上史馆白相公状二。为中丞荥阳公赴桂州至湖南敕书慰谕表。为荥阳公上衡州牛相公状。为荥阳公至湖南贺听政表。为荥阳公进贺寿昌节银零陵香麖靴竹靴状。为荥阳公桂州谢上表。为中丞荥阳公桂州上后上中书门下状。为荥阳公上集贤韦相公状二。为荥阳公上弘文崔相公状二。为荥阳公上史馆白相公状三。为荥阳公上门下李相公状二。为荥阳公与度支卢侍郎状。为荥阳公与魏中丞状。为中丞荥阳公桂州赛城隍神文。为荥阳公端午谢赐物状。为荥阳公论安南行营将士月粮状。为荥阳公贺幽州破奚寇表。为荥阳公贺幽州破奚寇上中书状。为荥阳公贺幽州张相公状。为荥阳公奉慰积庆太后上谥表。为荥阳公与裴卢孔杨韦诸郡守状。为荥阳公举王克明等充县令主簿状。为荥阳公桂州署防御等官牒。为荥阳公桂管补逐要等官牒。为荥阳公贺太尉王司徒启。为荥阳公上浙西郑尚书启。为荥阳公上陈许高尚书启。为荥阳公黄箓斋文。为荥阳公上集贤韦相公状三。为荥阳公上弘文崔相公状三。为荥阳公贺牛相公状。为荥阳公与度支周侍郎状。为荥阳公上门下李相公状三。为荥阳公上西川李相公状。为荥阳公上通义崔相公状。为荥阳公上仆射崔相公状一。赛舜庙文。赛越王神文。赛北源神文。赛灵川县城隍神文。赛荔浦县城隍神文。赛永福县城隍神文。赛曾山苏山神文。赛白石神文。赛龙蟠山神文。赛阳朔县名山文。赛海阳神文。赛尧山庙文。赛古榄神文。为中丞荥阳公祭全义县伏波神文。为中丞荥阳公赛理定县城隍神文。赛兰麻神文。赛侯山神文。赛建山神文。赛石明府神文。赛莫神文。为中丞荥阳公祭桂州城隍神祝文。为荥阳公奏请不叙录将士状。为荥阳公请不叙将士上中书状。为荥阳公贺老人星见表。为荥阳公上仆射崔相公状二。为荥阳公祭吕商州文。为荥阳公祭长安杨郎中文。为荥阳公与魏博何相公启。为荥阳公上李太尉状。太尉卫公会昌一品集序附郑亚改本。为荥阳公谢赐冬衣状。为荥阳公进贺冬银等状。为荥阳公进贺正银状。为荥阳公上白相公杜相公崔相公韦相公凤翔崔相公贺正启。深树见一颗樱桃尚在。晚晴。<div id='poem_sentence_24_1375359_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_25_1375359_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375276' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375276' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375276?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为中丞荥阳公赴桂州至湖南敕书慰谕表</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年5月8日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375276")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375276_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375276'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375276'>臣某言。今月八日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375276_comment'></div>宣告使某官某至湖南观察府。赍赐臣敕书一通。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375276_comment'></div>并慰谕臣所部将吏僧道耆老等。乾文昭锡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375276_comment'></div>兑泽旁流。虽闻讣以衔哀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375276_comment'></div>亦感恩而窃忭。臣某中谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375276_comment'></div>臣伏闻积庆太后爰初遘疾。皇帝陛下即不视朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375276_comment'></div>虑切宸襟。时连煇暑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375276_comment'></div>载想大庭之养。实悬万国之心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375276_comment'></div>乃运属归真。书留具位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375276_comment'></div>陛下又能咨宰辅酌中之请。禀圣贤推远之怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375276_comment'></div>始率义以致忧。终据经而顺变。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375276_comment'></div>获情理兼修之旨。成古今莫易之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375276_comment'></div>伏读纶言。实荣藩守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375276_comment'></div>伏以时逢积水。行滞长沙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375276_comment'></div>拥皂盖而久留。载青旌而莫济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375276_comment'></div>未获宣传童艾。号召蛮夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375276_comment'></div>谨具当时宣示所将兵吏及迎候将校讫。唯冀下车巳后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375276_comment'></div>食蘖自规。仰凭垂露之文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375276_comment'></div>粗守宣风之职。臣与将吏等无任感恩望阙屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375276_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1375276_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375374' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375374' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_1_1375277_comment'></div>月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375277_comment'></div>宰臣某等恳悃上言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375277_comment'></div>请从听断。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1375277_comment'></div>普天率土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375277_comment'></div>莫不庆幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375277_comment'></div>臣某中谢。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1375277_comment'></div>礼贵酌情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375277_comment'></div>踰情则礼废。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375277_comment'></div>苟非至德。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1375277_comment'></div>圣猷允塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375277_comment'></div>日兄禀义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375277_comment'></div>邱㛐延恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375277_comment'></div>始自爽和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375277_comment'></div>遂停庶政。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375277_comment'></div>寝园将祔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375277_comment'></div>丧纪既闻于约礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375277_comment'></div>克奉巳布于成规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375277_comment'></div>遵大臣陈义之方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375277_comment'></div>得王者自家之化。<div
