id='poem_sentence_1_1375317_comment'></div>开农皇降圣之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375317_comment'></div>南顿嘉禾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375317_comment'></div>茂汉后诞祥之日。<div showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375278?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公桂州谢上表</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年6月9日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375278_comment'></div>惧旷宣风之寄。柔辔载扬于永路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375278_comment'></div>轻舠利济于大川。即以今月九日到任上讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375278_comment'></div>臣某中谢。臣系承儒训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375278_comment'></div>生属昌期。初挂弁髦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375278_comment'></div>即亲筐箧。嘉树无忘于封殖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375278_comment'></div>青毡不落于寇偷。再擢词科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375278_comment'></div>一登册府。徂迁岁律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375278_comment'></div>浮泛军装。忽彯华缨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375278_comment'></div>俄列通籍。极望郎于南省。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375278_comment'></div>备给事于左曹。中间帖掌台纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375278_comment'></div>分修国史。旋值孽童拒诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375278_comment'></div>狂虏乱华。副中宪以急宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375278_comment'></div>佐维城而遥护。督晋氏迁延之役。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375278_comment'></div>绝戎人侦逻之奸。敢伐善以<span class='link' id='poem_sentence_6_1375349_comment'></div>方积惧于贪叨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375349_comment'></div>岂暇怀于启处。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375349_comment'></div>当道适临遐徼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375349_comment'></div>匪务先声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375349_comment'></div>实行素志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375349_comment'></div>其于脂膏有戒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375349_comment'></div>冰蘖自规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375349_comment'></div>不唯禀以庙谋。<div id='poem_sentence_21_1375349_comment'></div>用副恩怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375349_comment'></div>苟渝斯言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375349_comment'></div>是不能享。<div id='poem_sentence_26_1375349_comment'></div>仰望台庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375349_comment'></div>敢阶开閤之宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375349_comment'></div>唯羡吐茵之吏。<div id='poem_title_1375352' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375352?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公上宏文崔相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1375352_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375352'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375352'>某行役以今月二十八日达潭州讫。波恬风止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375352_comment'></div>帆驶舟轻。远承殷楫之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375352_comment'></div>利济熊湘之水。况兹乐土。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375352_comment'></div>尝扇仁风。式访颠毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375352_comment'></div>兼询憩树。吏皆攀辕之士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375352_comment'></div>民皆遮道之人。绵以岁时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375352_comment'></div>深在肌骨。何武以兖州之政。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375352_comment'></div>黄霸以颍川之能。或入作尹京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375352_comment'></div>或登为国相。向若非相公清门重德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375352_comment'></div>士范词宗。则安能侔兖颍之佳声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375352_comment'></div>兼何黄之盛拜。况运当惟睿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375352_comment'></div>听属虚襟。仰赞治平。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375352_comment'></div>固在期月。伏惟善保尊体。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375352_comment'></div>以副沃心。某实乏异能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375352_comment'></div>叨当问俗。未识褰帷之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375352_comment'></div>何酬大冶之恩。唯当务以躬亲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375352_comment'></div>蠲其疾瘼。烦宣诏旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375352_comment'></div>咨禀庙谟。冀免尤违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375352_comment'></div>庶可避辟。伏惟远赐恩察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375352_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1375352_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375362' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375362' class='poemTitle class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375362_comment'></div>谬忝恩荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375362_comment'></div>虽曰小藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375362_comment'></div>且兼杂俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375362_comment'></div>虑物斯至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375362_comment'></div>抚躬不任。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1375362_comment'></div>至止之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375362_comment'></div>务扇仁风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375362_comment'></div>苟或满假为心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375362_comment'></div>堕偷在念。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375362_comment'></div>岂为显责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375362_comment'></div>当逭幽诛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375362_comment'></div>伏计亦赐信察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375362_comment'></div>南郡旬时。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1375362_comment'></div>实亚沧溟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375362_comment'></div>未济之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375362_comment'></div>临深是惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375362_comment'></div>及扬帆鼓枻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375362_comment'></div>则浪静风和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375362_comment'></div>不吟行路之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375362_comment'></div>乃仗济川之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375362_comment'></div>傥闻见之下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375362_comment'></div>指教所存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375362_comment'></div>苟可轻其悔尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375379_comment'></div>职重赋舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375379_comment'></div>俗参夷獠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375379_comment'></div>务便宜于五岭。<div showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375382?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公与魏中丞状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375382'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375382'>某以九月九日到任上讫。映带溪洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375382_comment'></div>错杂蛮夷。刚卤石田。<div id='poem_1375598' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375598' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375598?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为中丞荥阳公桂州赛城隍神文</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375598")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375598_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375598'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375598'>惟大中元年岁次丁卯六月甲午朔十四日丁未。都防御观察处置等使桂州刺史兼御史中丞郑某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375598_comment'></div>谨遣登仕郎守功曹参军陆佚。以庶羞之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375598_comment'></div>祭于城隍之神。夫大邑聚人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375598_comment'></div>通都设屏。将英雄走集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375598_comment'></div>必假高深。不惟倚仗风云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375598_comment'></div>兼用翕张神鬼。某初蒙朝奖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375598_comment'></div>来佩藩符。既御寇于西原。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375598_comment'></div>亦观风于南国。始维画鹢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375598_comment'></div>将下伏熊。属楚雨蔽空。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375598_comment'></div>湘云塞望。晦我中军之鼓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375598_comment'></div>湿予下濑之师。遂以诚祈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375598_comment'></div>果蒙神应。速如激矢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375598_comment'></div>势等却河。及兹报荐之期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375598_comment'></div>敢怠馨香之礼。神其干霄作峻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375598_comment'></div>习坎为防。合烽橹以保民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375598_comment'></div>导川涂而流恶。使言言坚垒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375598_comment'></div>侔地道以无疆。活活深沟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375598_comment'></div>如井德之不改。勿违孔祷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375598_comment'></div>以作神羞。尚飨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375598_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1375598_comment'></div></div></div><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375313'>右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375313_comment'></div>中使某至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375313_comment'></div>奉宣恩旨。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1375313_comment'></div>银器二事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375313_comment'></div>大将衣三副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375313_comment'></div>并赐臣手诏一通者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375313_comment'></div>日著汉仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375313_comment'></div>彼艾人远具于岁时。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375313_comment'></div>颇流诸校。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375313_comment'></div>鞠躬被宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375313_comment'></div>全踰锡带之荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375313_comment'></div>睹物传辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375313_comment'></div>实动请缨之思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375313_comment'></div>唯当仰成帝力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375313_comment'></div>粗举藩条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375313_comment'></div>誓相率于明时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375313_comment'></div>庶同登于寿域。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375313_comment'></div>臣与大将等无任望阙感恩抃舞屏营之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_52_1375313_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375309' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375309' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375309?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公论安南行营将士月粮状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375309")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375309_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375309'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375309'>使当道先准诏发遣行安南行营将士五百人。其月粮钱米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375309_comment'></div>并当道自般运供送者。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375309_comment'></div>臣当道系敕额兵数只一千五百人。内一千人散于西原防遏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375309_comment'></div>三百人扭在邕管行营。入界内分捉津桥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375309_comment'></div>专知镇戌。计其抽用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375309_comment'></div>略无孑遗。至于坚守城池。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375309_comment'></div>备御仓库。供丞职掌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375309_comment'></div>传递文书。并是当使方圆衣粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375309_comment'></div>招收驱使。其安南行营将士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375309_comment'></div>皆是敕额外人。又当管去安南三千馀里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375309_comment'></div>去年五月十五日发遣。八月二十日至海门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375309_comment'></div>遭恶风漂溺官健一十三人。沉失器械一千五百馀事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375309_comment'></div>其年十二月六日。差纲某等般送酱菜钱米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375309_comment'></div>今年五月八日至鸟雷。又遭风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375309_comment'></div>打损船三只。沉失米五百馀石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375309_comment'></div>见钱九十贯。其月十八日至昆崙滩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375309_comment'></div>又遭风。损船一只。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375309_comment'></div>沉失米一百五十石。至今姜士贽等尚未报到安南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375309_comment'></div>臣到任巳来。为日虽浅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375309_comment'></div>悬军在远。经费为虞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375309_comment'></div>窃检寻见在行营将士等。从去年六月巳后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375309_comment'></div>至今年六月巳前。从发赴安南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375309_comment'></div>用夫船程粮及船米赏设。并每月酱菜等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375309_comment'></div>一年约用钱六千二百六十馀贯。米面等七千四百三十馀石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375309_comment'></div>大数虽破上供。馀用悉资当府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375309_comment'></div>不唯匮。且以<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_25_1375309", 1375309, "Clauses/51/Comments/0")'>遐遥</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375309_comment'></div>有搬滩过海之劳。多巨浪风之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375309_comment'></div>须资便信。动失程期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375309_comment'></div>臣忝守戎行。不胜忧结。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375309_comment'></div>伏以裴元裕既开边隙。又乏武经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375309_comment'></div>抽三道之见兵。备一方之致寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375309_comment'></div>曾无戎捷。徒曜军容。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375309_comment'></div>昔者淮阴驱市井之人。尚能破敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375309_comment'></div>晋伯假纪纲之仆。亦不常留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375309_comment'></div>苟元裕能均食散金。绝甘分少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375309_comment'></div>便可收功于故校。岂资别立于新家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375309_comment'></div>侧闻容广守臣。亦欲飞章上请。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375309_comment'></div>臣缘乍到。未敢抗论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375309_comment'></div>巳牒韦廑李玭。并牒元裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375309_comment'></div>请详物理。续具奏闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375309_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下道迈羲勋。盛加华夏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375309_comment'></div>南蛮以兹脆弱。宜慕声猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375309_comment'></div>伏乞特诏元裕。使广布仁声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375309_comment'></div>远扬朝旨。无邀功以生事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375309_comment'></div>勿耗国以进兵。庶令此境之人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375309_comment'></div>无拥思乡之念。唯兹裁照。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375309_comment'></div>实属皇明。今前纲姜士贽等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375309_comment'></div>沉失至多。迟留未达。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375309_comment'></div>复须遣使。以续见粮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375309_comment'></div>虽欲无言。惧不集事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375309_comment'></div>傥未蒙恩允。特赐抽还。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375309_comment'></div>则长庆二年安南有奏请借便当军粮米五千石。经略使王承业请一二年内劝课输填。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375309_comment'></div>频有文符。并未支送。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375309_comment'></div>伏乞天恩悯其州乡阙乏。哀以海路漂沦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375309_comment'></div>且新<span class='inlineComment2'>（疑）</span>安南并还欠米。庶行营将士等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375309_comment'></div>得存宿饱。无乏晨炊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375309_comment'></div>臣所守藩方。粗获通济。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375309_comment'></div>谨录奏闻。伏听敕旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375309_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_58_1375309_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375279' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375279' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375279?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公贺幽州破奚寇表</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375279")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375279_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375279'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375279'>臣某言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375279_comment'></div>臣得本道进奏官某状报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375279_comment'></div>某月日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375279_comment'></div>幽州节度使张仲武奏破奚北部落及诸山奚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375279_comment'></div>除旧奚王匿舍朗所管外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375279_comment'></div>杀戮首领丁壮老幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375279_comment'></div>并杀戮羊牛焚烧车帐器械等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375279_comment'></div>计二十万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375279_comment'></div>剌史巳下面皮一百具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375279_comment'></div>耳二百只。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375279_comment'></div>奚车五百乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375279_comment'></div>羊一万口。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375279_comment'></div>牛一千五百头者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375279_comment'></div>天声远叠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375279_comment'></div>庙略遐宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375279_comment'></div>白虏获于宁台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375279_comment'></div>赤夷浮于燕路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375279_comment'></div>臣某中贺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375279_comment'></div>臣窃窥旧史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375279_comment'></div>逖听前朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375279_comment'></div>有天子忧边。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375279_comment'></div>清宵辍寐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375279_comment'></div>将军出塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375279_comment'></div>白首言归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375279_comment'></div>至乃或胜或奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375279_comment'></div>一彼一此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375279_comment'></div>竟困塞郊之柝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375279_comment'></div>那停绝漠之烽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375279_comment'></div>犹欲叙烈旂常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375279_comment'></div>告功祧庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375279_comment'></div>用其暂胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375279_comment'></div>谓曰难能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375279_comment'></div>况幽朔巨都。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375279_comment'></div>全燕重地。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375279_comment'></div>荐臻奚寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375279_comment'></div>猾乱华人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375279_comment'></div>田豫之护鲜卑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375279_comment'></div>莫能深入。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375279_comment'></div>祭彤之军辽水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375279_comment'></div>惟遣相攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375279_comment'></div>近岁以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375279_comment'></div>为患滋甚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375279_comment'></div>走单于侦逻之路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375279_comment'></div>怀驹支漏泄之奸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375279_comment'></div>张仲武重感国恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375279_comment'></div>习知边事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375279_comment'></div>同三师而肄楚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375279_comment'></div>侔五饵以间戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375279_comment'></div>乘其嚣惰之时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375279_comment'></div>俄得剪除之便。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375279_comment'></div>燕犀密挂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375279_comment'></div>冀马潜羁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375279_comment'></div>超距投石者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375279_comment'></div>动过千群。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375279_comment'></div>戟手科头者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375279_comment'></div>略踰万计。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375279_comment'></div>坎三鼓而河流自却。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375279_comment'></div>声六校而屋瓦皆飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375279_comment'></div>自是鸮惧丧林。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375279_comment'></div>兔忙迷穴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375279_comment'></div>无舟掬指。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375279_comment'></div>有地僵尸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375279_comment'></div>未惊紫陌之乌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375279_comment'></div>前军巳蹙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375279_comment'></div>不唳淮山之鹤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375279_comment'></div>后队仍穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375279_comment'></div>遂分袁尚之头颅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375279_comment'></div>仍裂蚩尤之肩髀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375279_comment'></div>穹庐落烬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375279_comment'></div>同甲扬灰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375279_comment'></div>山积云屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375279_comment'></div>大收其车乘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375279_comment'></div>角羸耳湿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375279_comment'></div>尽获其牛羊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375279_comment'></div>柳水载澄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375279_comment'></div>桑河无事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375279_comment'></div>爰施吉语。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375279_comment'></div>入解皇威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375279_comment'></div>此皆皇帝陛下功格上元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375279_comment'></div>运膺下武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375279_comment'></div>授兹成算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375279_comment'></div>于彼当仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375279_comment'></div>震肃九围。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375279_comment'></div>欢呼万国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375279_comment'></div>昔艰难云始。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375279_comment'></div>胡尘首起于卢龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375279_comment'></div>今开泰有期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375279_comment'></div>汉将先清于鹿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375279_comment'></div>人谋允若。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375279_comment'></div>灵贶昭然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375279_comment'></div>固巳上庆祖宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375279_comment'></div>下光编策。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375279_comment'></div>录图洪范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375279_comment'></div>竞三古之殊尤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375279_comment'></div>玉检金泥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375279_comment'></div>有百神之灵祐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375279_comment'></div>臣虽当防遏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375279_comment'></div>不介边陲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375279_comment'></div>空增气于懦夫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375279_comment'></div>实叨荣于下将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375279_comment'></div>日围千里。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375279_comment'></div>天盖九重。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375279_comment'></div>奉一月之捷书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375279_comment'></div>唯知抃蹈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375279_comment'></div>献万年之寿酒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1375279_comment'></div>尚隔班行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1375279_comment'></div>念风水于遐藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1375279_comment'></div>寄梦寐于宣室。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1375279_comment'></div>无任望阙结恋之至。</div><div id='poem_sentence_108_1375279_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375346' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375346' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375346?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公贺幽州破奚寇上中书状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375346")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375346_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375346'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375346'>右。得进奏院状报。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375346_comment'></div>幽州张相公大破奚寇。斩馘剌史巳下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375346_comment'></div>并焚烧驱获车帐器械牛羊等。伏以近岁以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375346_comment'></div>北番微扰。奚寇恣其狗盗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375346_comment'></div>颇复鸱张。相公钩格传能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375346_comment'></div>崆峒禀气。克扬戎略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375346_comment'></div>式靖邦雠。姑用火攻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375346_comment'></div>未加汤沃。剌睢盱之面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375346_comment'></div>贯聋瞆之耳。帐幕如扫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375346_comment'></div>干矛尽熸。聚轮毂于戌楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375346_comment'></div>出羊牛于塞草。此皆相公授其军令。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375346_comment'></div>雄此边声。愿崇九伐之威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375346_comment'></div>且举一隅而示。昔越平吴国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375346_comment'></div>实立贺台。楚胜晋军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375346_comment'></div>将为京观。固不可铭山示绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375346_comment'></div>画阁传勋。尽良相之庙谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375346_comment'></div>岂将军之天幸。某谬蒙任使。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375346_comment'></div>窃庆剪除。伏恨守藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375346_comment'></div>阙陪贺列。无任抃跃攀恋之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375346_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_19_1375346_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375369' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375369' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375369?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公贺幽州张相公状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375369")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375369_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375369'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375369'>得本道进奏院状报。相公亲鼓上军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375369_comment'></div>大破奚寇。威加元朔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375369_comment'></div>庆动紫宸。凡在生灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375369_comment'></div>莫不欣快。伏以北边诸虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375369_comment'></div>最强者奚。车帐既杂于华风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375369_comment'></div>弓戟颇窥于汉制。马牛衔尾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375369_comment'></div>羔骆交蹄。朝廷常压以雄军。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375369_comment'></div>处之重将。访于耆旧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375369_comment'></div>不绝侵渔。相公太白传精。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375369_comment'></div>雷泉禀气。黄公授略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375369_comment'></div>元女与符。綦连四弓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375369_comment'></div>常推其百胜。兰子七剑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375369_comment'></div>不顾于万人。建牙旗而草树分形。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375369_comment'></div>横雕戈而烟云敛气。而又以功勋任已。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375369_comment'></div>感激事君。每雪涕以论兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375369_comment'></div>愿风驱而扫寇。永言异类。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375369_comment'></div>曾不畏威。或兽抟于桑河。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375369_comment'></div>或鸱张于辽水。彼专其暴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375369_comment'></div>我务于仁。彼轻进以易奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375369_comment'></div>我薄威而养锐。待人百其勇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375369_comment'></div>士一其心。然后分命骁雄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375369_comment'></div>尅期讨伐。珍国见贼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375369_comment'></div>唯惧其少。韩信用士。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375369_comment'></div>每办于多。一麾而大野朝昏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375369_comment'></div>再鼓而穷荒昼赤。朱旗丧斧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375369_comment'></div>逸马迷轮。耳尽贯而无所伏听。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375369_comment'></div>面皆夷而不容泥首。熸焚殆尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375369_comment'></div>孳息全空。向若非动有成谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375369_comment'></div>举无遗算。以庙堂之决胜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375369_comment'></div>佐沙漠之横行。则何以致此一朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375369_comment'></div>平其积患。昔汉时骁将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375369_comment'></div>多以后期。周室虎臣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375369_comment'></div>唯称薄伐。比于今日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375369_comment'></div>讵可同年。某尝读兵书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375369_comment'></div>误兼文律。马援聚米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375369_comment'></div>曾或留心。奚反持矛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375369_comment'></div>未至无力。远廉岭表。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375369_comment'></div>遐仰边功。阙申贺于行台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375369_comment'></div>空抒怀于尺牍。执笔抚剑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375369_comment'></div>欣慕无任。伏惟俯赐照察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375369_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_40_1375369_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375280' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375280' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375280?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公奉慰积庆太后上谥表</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年6月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375280'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375280'>臣某言。臣得礼部牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375280_comment'></div>奉六月二日敕。大行积庆太后册上尊号曰贞献皇后者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375280_comment'></div>庆属尧门。谥遵周道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375280_comment'></div>兔罝考义。茧馆流辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375280_comment'></div>臣某中谢。臣闻刑于寡妻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375280_comment'></div>文王之令德。怨及邱㛐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375280_comment'></div>汉后之深非。诗传所存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375280_comment'></div>褒贬斯在。伏惟皇帝陛下用周典训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375280_comment'></div>涤汉瑕疵。报皇后友爱之仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375280_comment'></div>如文宗引进之念。积庆太后始蒙敬养。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375280_comment'></div>终受崇名。掩沙麓以传祥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375280_comment'></div>轶河洲而抒美。天长地久。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375280_comment'></div>式崇清庙之尊彝。万岁千秋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375280_comment'></div>永慰光陵之床帐。天下臣子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375280_comment'></div>不胜感抃。限以守藩江岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375280_comment'></div>不获奉慰阙庭。无任惶恐屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375280_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_16_1375280_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_1_1375384_comment'></div>大人盛名典郡。硕画佐时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375384_comment'></div>将以俯历州乡。深求疾瘼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375384_comment'></div>然后入膺宠命。以副具瞻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375384_comment'></div>不唯卑诚。实在公议。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375308'>以前件状如前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375308_comment'></div>伏以臣所部控联溪洞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375308_comment'></div>参错蛮髦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375308_comment'></div>水接重湖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375308_comment'></div>山当五岭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375308_comment'></div>纵有天官注拟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375308_comment'></div>多缘地理幽遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375308_comment'></div>或不出上京。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375308_comment'></div>巳发徒劳之叹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375308_comment'></div>或暂来属邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375308_comment'></div>即闻归去之辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375308_comment'></div>既经久而不谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375308_comment'></div>亦柔良而曷寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375308_comment'></div>臣谬膺<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1375308", 1375308, class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375308_comment'></div>虽寓遐陬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375308_comment'></div>久从试吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375308_comment'></div>假之铜墨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375308_comment'></div>有意于鸣琴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375308_comment'></div>委以簿书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375308_comment'></div>不羞其栖棘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375308_comment'></div>既闻绩用。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375308_comment'></div>合有甄升。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375308_comment'></div>一则复远俗之凋残。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375308_comment'></div>一则轻微臣之忧责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375308_comment'></div>苟事因请托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375308_comment'></div>迹涉贪残。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375457'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375457'>近者党项侵扰西道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375457_comment'></div>崛强北边。<div class='inline' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375455'>不审近日诸况何若。第高标令范。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375455_comment'></div>早映朝端。惠露仁风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375455_comment'></div>载光藩寄。况地雄东海。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375455_comment'></div>郡控南徐。当皇心妙简之难。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375455_comment'></div>是国用取资之地。斯焉假道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375455_comment'></div>以副具瞻。况忝亢宗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375455_comment'></div>允俟嘉会。此方且多杂俗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375455_comment'></div>又异奥区。但馀江山。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375455_comment'></div>记在方志。然将以比西州东府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375455_comment'></div>白下朱方。则亦辽豕为惭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375455_comment'></div>空属池塘之思。馀并附某乙口述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375455_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1375455_comment'></div></div></div><div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375456_comment'></div>殊祥取贵于龟龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375456_comment'></div>大乐受钧于金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375456_comment'></div>以秩宗典礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375456_comment'></div>以司马总戎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375456_comment'></div>况颍水遗封。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375456_comment'></div>许田奥壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375456_comment'></div>巩洛亘其后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375456_comment'></div>宛叶居其前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375456_comment'></div>版籍则方城之外人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375456_comment'></div>幕府则淮阳之劲卒。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1375587_comment'></div>有无名之璞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375587_comment'></div>不可雕锼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375587_comment'></div>开众妙之门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375587_comment'></div>未尝关揵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375587_comment'></div>达人大观。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375587_comment'></div>上士勤行。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375587_comment'></div>始有胥连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375587_comment'></div>爰交尊陆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375587_comment'></div>皆禀混成之教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375587_comment'></div>以凝悬解之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375587_comment'></div>及至化渐漓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375587_comment'></div>真元稍散。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375587_comment'></div>七十神虎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375587_comment'></div>穷蹈籍之姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375587_comment'></div>九百毒龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375587_comment'></div>恣贪残之患。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375587_comment'></div>乃复吴宫合石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375587_comment'></div>王屋流珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375587_comment'></div>方班万国之朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375587_comment'></div>始定百灵之位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375587_comment'></div>大之则笼罗八极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375587_comment'></div>居蒂芥之微。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375587_comment'></div>小之则陶冶一身。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375587_comment'></div>后天地而老。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375587_comment'></div>上维皇屋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375587_comment'></div>下及蒸人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375587_comment'></div>莫不受炼朱陵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375587_comment'></div>施功酆部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375587_comment'></div>故五腊二直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375587_comment'></div>八节三元。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375587_comment'></div>咸开忏拔之科。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375587_comment'></div>用显修崇之旨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375587_comment'></div>臣某幸生昭代。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375587_comment'></div>素禀元风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375587_comment'></div>每秋水凝情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375587_comment'></div>春台写望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375587_comment'></div>畅灵襟而抽思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375587_comment'></div>若振羽毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375587_comment'></div>动元籥以开怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375587_comment'></div>如餐沆瀣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375587_comment'></div>因循官牒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375587_comment'></div>渐染君恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375587_comment'></div>既乖紫气之占。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1375351_comment'></div>相公黄中禀气。素尚资仁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375351_comment'></div>片玉一枝。巳光于昔日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375351_comment'></div>前筹五鼎。果庆于兹辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375351_comment'></div>况又高步瀛洲。领官仙掖。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375344_comment'></div>矧又秩贰夏官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375344_comment'></div>任毗司马。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375344_comment'></div>不闻釐务。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375344_comment'></div>倚之为相。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375375'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375375'>门下。相公出镇坤维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375375_comment'></div>相公进扶宸极。某窃寻前史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375375_comment'></div>仰考昌时。必有上台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375375_comment'></div>号曰当国。姬姓则鲁周公居君牙君陈之上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375375_comment'></div>汉室则萧相国在张良韩信之先。专吐嘉猷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375375_comment'></div>独融明命。伏惟相公克怀懿德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375375_comment'></div>允遇休期。一自燮调。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375375_comment'></div>屡彰勋伐。耻君不及于尧舜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375375_comment'></div>远过前人。举贤不避于亲雠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375375_comment'></div>深符直道。果兹优宠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375375_comment'></div>首在注怀。外耀国华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375375_comment'></div>内荣官族。凤池浴日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375375_comment'></div>聊均润于同人。鸡树侵云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375375_comment'></div>忆分阴于游子。旷百千岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375375_comment'></div>无三四人。凡在含灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375375_comment'></div>敢不从化。况某早蒙恩顾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375375_comment'></div>今获驱驰。伏限颁条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375375_comment'></div>莫由陈贺。槛猿绊骥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375375_comment'></div>敢叹于拘留。邱室膺门。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375375_comment'></div>实悬于诚抱。抃贺攀恋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375375_comment'></div>不任下情。伏惟俯赐恩察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375375_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_21_1375375_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_1375614_comment'></div>李标朱仲。亦茂前经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375614_comment'></div>昨者瘅暑为灾。油云不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375614_comment'></div>使宋生抒赋。始悦于雄风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375614_comment'></div>高氏读书。忽惊于暴雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375614_comment'></div>化太甚旱。为大有年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375614_comment'></div>将见助于欢康。敢忘怀于昭赛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375614_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_11_1375614_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375597' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375597' class='poemTitle class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375597'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375597'>年月日。观察处置使兼御史中丞郑某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375597_comment'></div>谨遣全义县令韦必复。以酒牢之奠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375597_comment'></div>昭赛于汉伏波将军新息侯马公。越城旧疆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375597_comment'></div>汉将遗庙。一派湘水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375597_comment'></div>万重楚山。比颍川袁氏之台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375597_comment'></div>悲同异日。方汝水周公之渡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375597_comment'></div>感极当时。呜呼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375597_comment'></div>昔也投隙建功。因时立志。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375597_comment'></div>隗将军坐谈西伯。弃去无归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375597_comment'></div>梁伯孙自降王姬。虽来不起。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375597_comment'></div>以若画之眉宇。开聚米之山川。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375597_comment'></div>扶风里中。讵守钱而为虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375597_comment'></div>德阳殿下。宁相马以推工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375597_comment'></div>怅望阙西。趋驰陇右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375597_comment'></div>事嫂冠戴。诫侄书成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375597_comment'></div>龙伯高之故人。出言有所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375597_comment'></div>公孙述之刺客。相待何轻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375597_comment'></div>鸢泊启行。蛮溪请往。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375597_comment'></div>铜留铸柱。革誓裹尸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375597_comment'></div>男儿自立边功。壮士犹羞病死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375597_comment'></div>漓湘之浒。祠宇依然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375597_comment'></div>岂独文宣之陵。不生刺草。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375597_comment'></div>更若武侯之垄。仍有深松。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375597_comment'></div>向我来思。停车展敬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375597_comment'></div>一樽有奠。五马忘归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375597_comment'></div>及申望岁之祈。又辱有秋之泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375597_comment'></div>云兴柱础。电绕墙藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375597_comment'></div>何烦玉女之投壶。方闻<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_27_1375597", 1375597, "Clauses/55/Comments/0")'>天笑</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375597_comment'></div>不待樵人之取箭。已见风回。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375597_comment'></div>敢忘黍稷之馨。用报京坻之赐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375597_comment'></div>属以时非行县。不获躬诣灵坛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375597_comment'></div>词托烟波。意传天壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375597_comment'></div>既谢三时之降。兼论千载之交。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375597_comment'></div>勿负至诚。以孤元契。<div class='inline' class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375600'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375600'>维大中元年岁次丁卯八月甲午朔二十七日庚申。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375600_comment'></div>桂州管内都防御观察处置等使正议大夫使持节桂州诸军事守桂州刺史兼御史中丞上柱国赐紫金鱼袋郑某。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375600_comment'></div>谨遣直官摄功曹参军文林郎守阳朔县令庄敬质。<div class='inline' id='poem_1375310' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375310' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375310?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公奏请不叙录将士状</a><span class='authorDate'>（847年8月21日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375310")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375310_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375310'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375310'>使当道将士及管内昭贺等州军士共二千一百二十六人。准去年五月五日制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375310_comment'></div>叙勋阶使司去。今年四月二十五日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375310_comment'></div>具将士姓名及甲授年月日申省讫。右。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375310_comment'></div>臣当道将士等。远当戎寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375310_comment'></div>式控遐陬。乘解愠之和。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375310_comment'></div>宁亲矢石。望拱辰之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375310_comment'></div>实隔烟波。近者朝廷奄靖北方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375310_comment'></div>惟荒东道。当阴山之哭虏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375310_comment'></div>靡效纤埃。及天井之摧凶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375310_comment'></div>不横寸草。徒以皇帝陛下非烟结彩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375310_comment'></div>瀼露流光。向明才及于凤楼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375310_comment'></div>布泽远沾于蛮徼。固合同成国庆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375310_comment'></div>共禀朝荣。伏以当管近无丰年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375310_comment'></div>亦经小水。海上有分屯之卒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375310_comment'></div>邕南有未返之师。歉冗食于居人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375310_comment'></div>困裹粮于戎士。臣初叨廉问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375310_comment'></div>方切拊循。虽拾缀升阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375310_comment'></div>各思受宠。而濡毫执简。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375310_comment'></div>无以为资。仰虑后期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375310_comment'></div>敢忘积惧。伏见比者诸道有物力未足者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375310_comment'></div>圣恩洪贷。许且权未叙录。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375310_comment'></div>窃缘往例。冒此上陈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375310_comment'></div>伏冀天慈曲垂矜许。臣与将士等无任感激冒昧战越之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375310_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_23_1375310_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375347' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375347' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375347?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375347'>右。某当管将士本一千五百人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375347_comment'></div>有北境两度行营。有西京十镇防戌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375347_comment'></div>既部伍皆更招收。数额则转增加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375347_comment'></div>粮料不经申破。留州自备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375347_comment'></div>累政相成。况近年不甚登穰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375347_comment'></div>亦经水涝。挐舟负弩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375347_comment'></div>尚叹于征途。稆谷神蚕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375347_comment'></div>未丰于下舍。今纵仰承渥泽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375347_comment'></div>合进勋阶。将徵简礼之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375347_comment'></div>尽有囊装之许。虽祁寒暑雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375347_comment'></div>小民不识于天时。而露冕褰帷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375347_comment'></div>长吏合宣其人愿。辄以具状奏闻讫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375347_comment'></div>伏乞相公俯推近例。许且权停。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375347_comment'></div>干冒尊严。无任战灼之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375347_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_14_1375347_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375275' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375275' class='poemTitle id='poem_sentence_1_1375275_comment'></div>司天监李景亮奏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375275_comment'></div>八月六日寅时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375275_comment'></div>老人星见于南极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375275_comment'></div>其色黄明润大者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375275_comment'></div>圣惟合德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375275_comment'></div>昊穹凝命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375275_comment'></div>曜为经而宿为纬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375275_comment'></div>则有常名。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1375275_comment'></div>未若候时而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375275_comment'></div>有道则彰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375275_comment'></div>居五福之先。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375275_comment'></div>在三辰之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375275_comment'></div>伏惟皇帝陛下昭明老契。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375275_comment'></div>仰考元符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375275_comment'></div>乃有深意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375275_comment'></div>自南耀彩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375452_comment'></div>邺都奥壤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375452_comment'></div>汉相威名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_263_1375566_comment'></div>坑卒四十一万。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_264_1375566_comment'></div>齐桓公受胙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_265_1375566_comment'></div>立功一十二国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_266_1375566_comment'></div>今真将军为时而出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_267_1375566_comment'></div>贤诸侯代不乏人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_268_1375566_comment'></div>况其俗产代地之名驹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_269_1375566_comment'></div>富管涔之良璞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_270_1375566_comment'></div>有抱树辞荣之节。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_271_1375566_comment'></div>有漆身报德之风邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_272_1375566_comment'></div>蹑足以谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_273_1375566_comment'></div>屈指而定。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_274_1375566_comment'></div>谢安之围棋尚劫。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_275_1375566_comment'></div>曹参之饮酒正酣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_276_1375566_comment'></div>适有军书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_277_1375566_comment'></div>果闻戎捷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_278_1375566_comment'></div>牛邯谢众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_279_1375566_comment'></div>丕豹出奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_280_1375566_comment'></div>乐毅不归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_281_1375566_comment'></div>邹阳巳去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_282_1375566_comment'></div>砥磨周钺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_283_1375566_comment'></div>水淬郑刀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_284_1375566_comment'></div>万里来袁尚之头颅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_285_1375566_comment'></div>二冢葬蚩尤之肩髀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_286_1375566_comment'></div>何其纂立大效。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_287_1375566_comment'></div>树建嘉绩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_288_1375566_comment'></div>若是之速与。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_289_1375566_comment'></div>宗英可汗既畏王威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_290_1375566_comment'></div>遂闻请吏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_291_1375566_comment'></div>留犁径路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_292_1375566_comment'></div>对潼酪以知羞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_293_1375566_comment'></div>毳幕毡裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_294_1375566_comment'></div>望衣冠而有慕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_295_1375566_comment'></div>大毕伯士之允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_296_1375566_comment'></div>呼韩单于之师。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_297_1375566_comment'></div>或执玉而朝灵囿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_298_1375566_comment'></div>或解辫而拜甘泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_299_1375566_comment'></div>并垂于册书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_300_1375566_comment'></div>光彼明命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_301_1375566_comment'></div>百王共贯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_302_1375566_comment'></div>三代同规。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_303_1375566_comment'></div>公于是奉命有讨北狄之诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_304_1375566_comment'></div>伐上党之制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_305_1375566_comment'></div>谕回鹘之命五。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_306_1375566_comment'></div>慰坚昆之书四。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_307_1375566_comment'></div>每牙管既拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_308_1375566_comment'></div>芝泥将乾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_309_1375566_comment'></div>上辄曰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_310_1375566_comment'></div>尔有独断。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_311_1375566_comment'></div>朕无疑谋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_312_1375566_comment'></div>固俟沃心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_313_1375566_comment'></div>可不假手。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_314_1375566_comment'></div>公亦分阴可就。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_315_1375566_comment'></div>落简如飞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_316_1375566_comment'></div>故每有急宣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_317_1375566_comment'></div>关于密画。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_318_1375566_comment'></div>内庭外制。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_319_1375566_comment'></div>皆不与闻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_320_1375566_comment'></div>此又岂可与美洞箫而讽于后庭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_321_1375566_comment'></div>闻子虚而嗟不同世者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_322_1375566_comment'></div>论功而校德邪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_323_1375566_comment'></div>其有势切疾雷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_324_1375566_comment'></div>机难终日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_325_1375566_comment'></div>属宣室未召。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_326_1375566_comment'></div>武帐不开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_327_1375566_comment'></div>公莫暇昌言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_328_1375566_comment'></div>且陈密疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_329_1375566_comment'></div>贾太傅之忧国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_330_1375566_comment'></div>固动深诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_331_1375566_comment'></div>山吏部之论兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_332_1375566_comment'></div>讵因夙习。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_333_1375566_comment'></div>凡所奏御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_334_1375566_comment'></div>罕或依违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_335_1375566_comment'></div>及武宗下武重光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_336_1375566_comment'></div>崇名再易。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_337_1375566_comment'></div>公又观图东序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_338_1375566_comment'></div>按牒西昆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_339_1375566_comment'></div>率亿兆归心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_340_1375566_comment'></div>列公卿定议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_341_1375566_comment'></div>以一十四字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_342_1375566_comment'></div>垂百千万年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_343_1375566_comment'></div>藻缛辞华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_344_1375566_comment'></div>铺舒名实。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_345_1375566_comment'></div>秦晋于玉检瑶绳之内。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_346_1375566_comment'></div>平勃于绿畴谗鼎之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_347_1375566_comment'></div>方将命礼官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_348_1375566_comment'></div>召儒者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_349_1375566_comment'></div>访匡衡后土之议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_350_1375566_comment'></div>采公玉明堂之图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_351_1375566_comment'></div>考肆觐之礼于梁生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_352_1375566_comment'></div>取封禅之书于犬子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_353_1375566_comment'></div>尽皇王之盛事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_354_1375566_comment'></div>极臣子之殊功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_355_1375566_comment'></div>而轩鼎将成。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_356_1375566_comment'></div>禹书就掩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_357_1375566_comment'></div>然犹进先尝之药。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_358_1375566_comment'></div>献高手之医。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_359_1375566_comment'></div>藏周旦请代之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_360_1375566_comment'></div>追汉宣易名之义。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_361_1375566_comment'></div>作为大诰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_362_1375566_comment'></div>祈于昊天。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_363_1375566_comment'></div>始终一朝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_364_1375566_comment'></div>绍续九德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_365_1375566_comment'></div>其功伐也既如彼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_366_1375566_comment'></div>其制作也又如此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_367_1375566_comment'></div>故合诏诰奏议碑赞等。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_368_1375566_comment'></div>凡一帙一十五卷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_369_1375566_comment'></div>辄署曰会昌一品集云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_370_1375566_comment'></div>纪年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_371_1375566_comment'></div>追圣德也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_372_1375566_comment'></div>书位。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_373_1375566_comment'></div>旌官业也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_374_1375566_comment'></div>不言制集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_375_1375566_comment'></div>崇论道也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_376_1375566_comment'></div>惟公字文饶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_377_1375566_comment'></div>姓李氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_378_1375566_comment'></div>赵郡人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_379_1375566_comment'></div>盖大昴中邱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_380_1375566_comment'></div>有风雨翕张之气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_381_1375566_comment'></div>丛台高邑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_382_1375566_comment'></div>有山河隐轸之灵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_383_1375566_comment'></div>萃于直躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_384_1375566_comment'></div>庆是全德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_385_1375566_comment'></div>许靖廊庙之器。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_386_1375566_comment'></div>黄宪师表之姿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_387_1375566_comment'></div>何晏神仙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_388_1375566_comment'></div>叔夜龙凤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_389_1375566_comment'></div>宋玉閒丽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_390_1375566_comment'></div>王衍白皙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_391_1375566_comment'></div>马援之眉宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_392_1375566_comment'></div>卢植之音声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_393_1375566_comment'></div>此其妙水镜而为言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_394_1375566_comment'></div>托丹青而为裕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_395_1375566_comment'></div>至于好礼不倦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_396_1375566_comment'></div>用和为贵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_397_1375566_comment'></div>敬一人而取悦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_398_1375566_comment'></div>谦三位而无咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_399_1375566_comment'></div>意以默识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_400_1375566_comment'></div>确乎寡辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_401_1375566_comment'></div>车匠胡奴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_402_1375566_comment'></div>罔迷于半面。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_403_1375566_comment'></div>背碑覆局。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_404_1375566_comment'></div>无俟于专心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_405_1375566_comment'></div>聿成俭训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_406_1375566_comment'></div>不有长物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_407_1375566_comment'></div>昔犹卑官。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_408_1375566_comment'></div>端坐心斋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_409_1375566_comment'></div>江革分谢朓之旧襦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_410_1375566_comment'></div>便为卧具。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_411_1375566_comment'></div>周正得袁宪之谈柄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_412_1375566_comment'></div>常在讲筵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_413_1375566_comment'></div>五车自娱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_414_1375566_comment'></div>三箧能识。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_415_1375566_comment'></div>丽则孔门之赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_416_1375566_comment'></div>清新邺下之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_417_1375566_comment'></div>重以多能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_418_1375566_comment'></div>推于小学。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_419_1375566_comment'></div>王子敬之隶法遒媚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_420_1375566_comment'></div>皇休明之草势沉著。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_421_1375566_comment'></div>异时相逼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_422_1375566_comment'></div>当代罕俦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_423_1375566_comment'></div>不妄过人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_424_1375566_comment'></div>慎于取友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_425_1375566_comment'></div>与李杜齐名者少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_426_1375566_comment'></div>愿侨札交贶者稀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_427_1375566_comment'></div>故能应是昌时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_428_1375566_comment'></div>媚于天子。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_429_1375566_comment'></div>宪章皇极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_430_1375566_comment'></div>燮理元穹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_432_1375566_comment'></div>粉饰国史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_433_1375566_comment'></div>侔帝典之灏灏噩噩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_439_1375566_comment'></div>无颍阳之善田。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_440_1375566_comment'></div>乏好畤之巨产。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_441_1375566_comment'></div>何曾之食既去。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_452_1375566_comment'></div>每事先帝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_453_1375566_comment'></div>虽诡词望利。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_457_1375566_comment'></div>代天之言既集。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_458_1375566_comment'></div>蟠地之乐难忘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_459_1375566_comment'></div>盖属才华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_460_1375566_comment'></div>用为序引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_461_1375566_comment'></div>以邹衍之迂怪。<div id='poem_sentence_464_1375566_comment'></div>何所措辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_465_1375566_comment'></div>五岭幽遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_466_1375566_comment'></div>八桂森爽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_467_1375566_comment'></div>莫逢博约。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_468_1375566_comment'></div>宁遇切磋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_469_1375566_comment'></div>处无价之场。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_470_1375566_comment'></div>率然占玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_471_1375566_comment'></div>登不枯之岸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_472_1375566_comment'></div>粗尔论珠。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_473_1375566_comment'></div>虽常有意焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_1375311' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375311' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375311?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公谢赐冬衣状</a><span class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375311'>右。中使某至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375311_comment'></div>奉宣恩旨。赐臣冬衣一副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375311_comment'></div>大将衣四副。兼赐臣手诏一通者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375311_comment'></div>八行帝语。窅降于重霄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375311_comment'></div>一袭天衣。俯回于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_4_1375311", 1375311, "Clauses/9/Comments/0")'>穷节</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375311_comment'></div>臣当时准诏给散讫。臣叨蒙重寄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375311_comment'></div>适控遐陬。地虽五镇之冲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375311_comment'></div>气得四时之正。每元冥应律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375311_comment'></div>颛顼司辰。当二日之凿冰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375311_comment'></div>则殊豳野。及两楹之飞雪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375311_comment'></div>无异朔山。重以賨布少温。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375311_comment'></div>蛮绵乏暖。方求丽密。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375311_comment'></div>以御严凝。岂望司服颁衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375311_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_13_1375311", 1375311, "Clauses/26/Comments/0")'>贵臣</span>传诏。绫裁飞鹄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375311_comment'></div>絮裛仙蚕。白分椒壁之光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375311_comment'></div>紫夺兰牙之色。巳均下将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375311_comment'></div>仍逮连营。晏子狐裘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375311_comment'></div>故弊何彰于国俭。王恭鹤氅。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375311_comment'></div>风流不自于君恩。被服有辉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375311_comment'></div>负戴无力。谨当上宣殊渥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375311_comment'></div>下拊多寒。均大袑于琅琊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375311_comment'></div>变无襦于蜀郡。粗令康泰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375311_comment'></div>以塞贪叨。臣与大将等无任望阙感恩抃舞屏营之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_28954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_28954'>村小犬相护，沙平僧独归。<div id='poem_sentence_2_28954_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_28954_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=847&endYear=847')">847年9月</a>　在桂管经略使郑亚幕。作品：为荥阳公上荆南郑相公状二。<br /></div><div class='label1' id='94a4b98bbb8b4789965056d2efe8c6eb_label'><a href='javascript: DetailSwitch("94a4b98bbb8b4789965056d2efe8c6eb");'><span id='94a4b98bbb8b4789965056d2efe8c6eb_link' class='switch'>—</span></a><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=848&endYear=848')">848年</a>，37岁</div><div id='94a4b98bbb8b4789965056d2efe8c6eb' class='detail'><span style='margin: 0 0.5em; color: gray;'>▪</span>正月，自江陵归桂林。作品：为荥阳公贺白相公加刑部尚书启。为荥阳公贺韦相公加礼部尚书启。为荥阳公贺崔相公转户部尚书启。为荥阳公上宣州裴尚书启。为荥阳公与浙东杨大夫启。为荥阳公上马侍郎启。为荥阳公与三司使大理卢卿启。为荥阳公与前浙东杨大夫启。凤。题鹅。即日。北楼。思归。<div id='poem_1375453' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375453' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375453?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公贺白相公加刑部尚书启</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375453")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375453_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375453'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375453'>相公克佐昌期。允符俊德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375453_comment'></div>耀握中之至宝。高价难酬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375453_comment'></div>纵堂上之奇兵。善师无敌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375453_comment'></div>述成徽册。导降恩波。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375453_comment'></div>由中秘书。兼大司寇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375453_comment'></div>罗含吞凤。追佳梦于当年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375453_comment'></div>少皞爽鸠。集芳尘于此日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375453_comment'></div>百蛮仰化。九县畏威。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375453_comment'></div>某早奉陶甄。谬当藩服。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375453_comment'></div>虽深抃贺。未卜趋承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375453_comment'></div>遵吕刑而但戒守官。望鲁酒而必期尽醉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375453_comment'></div>抃跃瞻恋。不任下情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375453_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1375453_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375458' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375458' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375458?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公贺韦相公加礼部尚书启</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375458")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375458_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375458'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375458'>相公祥金淬刃。群玉排峰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375458_comment'></div>乐和而穴凤来仪。气正而路牛无喘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375458_comment'></div>归美既彰于天载。懋官旋践于春卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375458_comment'></div>周官则日谐万人。虞书则日典三礼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375458_comment'></div>苟非全气。孰赞昌期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375458_comment'></div>系万国之悬诚。加一人之德色。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375458_comment'></div>某早蒙恩异。今创辞离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375458_comment'></div>兰省春深。伏谒尚遥于八座。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375458_comment'></div>桂林夜静。仰占唯见于三台。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375458_comment'></div>抃贺末由。恋结空极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375458_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_10_1375458_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375454' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375454' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375454?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公上宣州裴尚书启</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375454")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375454_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375454'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375454'>近巳有状。不审诸况比复何如。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375454_comment'></div>待诏汉廷。但成老大。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375454_comment'></div>留欢湘浦。暂复清狂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375454_comment'></div>思如昨辰。又巳改岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375454_comment'></div>以公美之才之望。固令早还廊庙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375454_comment'></div>速泰寰区。而辜负明时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375454_comment'></div>优游外地。岂是徐公多风亭月观之好。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375454_comment'></div>为复孟守专生天成佛之求。幸当审君子之行藏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375454_comment'></div>同丈夫之忧乐。乃故人之深望也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375454_comment'></div>李处士艺术深博。议论纵横。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375454_comment'></div>敢曰贤于仲尼。且虑失之子羽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375454_comment'></div>云于江沔。要有淹留。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375454_comment'></div>便假以节巡。托之好币。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375454_comment'></div>十一月初离此。讫末由披尽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375454_comment'></div>勤恋增诚。其他并付使人口述。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375454_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1375454_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375462' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375462' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375462?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公与前浙东杨大夫启</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375462")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375462_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375462'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375462'>近已遣押衙乔可方赍少信币聘谒。计程巳过衡湘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375462_comment'></div>方将遐仰清风。不谓先沾膏雨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375462_comment'></div>今月二十日。专使林押衙至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375462_comment'></div>缄词重叠。赠贶丰厚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375462_comment'></div>皆晋地之所生也。而秦不产一物焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375462_comment'></div>使乎方来。巳承徵诏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375462_comment'></div>下车投两。则致讴谣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375462_comment'></div>高浪顺风。难窥飞止。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375462_comment'></div>荣闻休畅。何乐如之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375462_comment'></div>某顷副宪纲。昧于官守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375462_comment'></div>早乖审克。久乃发扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375462_comment'></div>旧吏常僚。微有诬引。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375462_comment'></div>小藩远地。难自辨明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375462_comment'></div>若从文致之科。合用投荒之典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375462_comment'></div>尚蒙恩宥。获颁诏条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375462_comment'></div>省罪抚心。不任感惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375462_comment'></div>鄙人向学之后。操心有归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375462_comment'></div>至于率履公涂。承迎亲友。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375462_comment'></div>虽多乖时态。或不愧座铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375462_comment'></div>又用高明。常所照信。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375462_comment'></div>至于机微之会。用舍之间。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375462_comment'></div>既有命有时。亦何思何虑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375462_comment'></div>更将尚口。弥失处躬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375462_comment'></div>以今月二十三日南去。家无甚累。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375462_comment'></div>官忝古侯。外以劝课蛮夷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375462_comment'></div>内以训摩子弟。惟将悔过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375462_comment'></div>以立后图。邓禹之止望功曹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375462_comment'></div>赤也之愿为小相。古犹有是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375462_comment'></div>余独何人。不因遭值圣明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375462_comment'></div>阶缘叨窃。则修扬郡守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375462_comment'></div>乃山东书生祷祠之所求也。负责虽惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375462_comment'></div>循涯则惊。多谢故人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375462_comment'></div>慎加颐保。腾凌紫闼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375462_comment'></div>步武青云。时因南风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375462_comment'></div>不至遐弃。厚幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375462_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_35_1375462_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375459' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375459' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375459?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为荥阳公上马侍郎启</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375459")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375459_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375459'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375459'>蒙恩左迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375459_comment'></div>不任感惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375459_comment'></div>某谬居职守。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375459_comment'></div>实昧官常。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375459_comment'></div>不能刺矢穷辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375459_comment'></div>钧金就直。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375459_comment'></div>屡移时序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375459_comment'></div>竟致纷披。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375459_comment'></div>故府李相公案吏之初。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375459_comment'></div>具狱来上。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375459_comment'></div>某久为宾佐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375459_comment'></div>方副台纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375459_comment'></div>若其间必有阿私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375459_comment'></div>则先事固当请托。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375459_comment'></div>实无一字。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375459_comment'></div>难诳九泉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375459_comment'></div>崔监察是湖南李相公门生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375459_comment'></div>是某所拜杂端日御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375459_comment'></div>远差推事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375459_comment'></div>既无所嘱求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375459_comment'></div>近欲叫冤岂遽能止遏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375459_comment'></div>不知何怨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375459_comment'></div>乃尔相穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375459_comment'></div>容易操心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375459_comment'></div>加诬唱首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375459_comment'></div>门生之分。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375459_comment'></div>尚或若斯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375459_comment'></div>常僚之情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375459_comment'></div>固无足算。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375459_comment'></div>九重邃邈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375459_comment'></div>五岭幽遐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375459_comment'></div>若从彼书辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375459_comment'></div>信其文致。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375459_comment'></div>即处于严谴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375459_comment'></div>未曰当辜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375459_comment'></div>直遇侍郎察以疏芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375459_comment'></div>知非侮鬻。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375459_comment'></div>照奸吏之推过。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375459_comment'></div>略崔子之枝辞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375459_comment'></div>特念远藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375459_comment'></div>获用宽典。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375459_comment'></div>才移廉部。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375459_comment'></div>尚处颁条。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375459_comment'></div>实繄如烛之明。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375459_comment'></div>敢不知风所自。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375459_comment'></div>末由谒谢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375459_comment'></div>空抱<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_46_1375459", 1375459, "Clauses/46/Comments/0")'>款诚</span>。</div><div target='_blank'>为荥阳公与三司使大理卢卿启</a><span class='authorDate'>（848年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375461")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375461_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375461'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375461'>蒙恩左迁。不任感惧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375461_comment'></div>某顷以疏拙。谬副纪纲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375461_comment'></div>不能辨军府之献囚。折王庭之坐狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375461_comment'></div>将踰五载。终辱三司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375461_comment'></div>过实巳招。咎将谁执。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375461_comment'></div>故府李相公知旧之分。与道为徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375461_comment'></div>戎幕宾筵。虽则深蒙奖拔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375461_comment'></div>事踪画迹。实非曲有指挥。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375461_comment'></div>逝者难诬。言之罔愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375461_comment'></div>且崔监察元藻是湖南李相公首科门生。是其所荐御史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375461_comment'></div>将赴淮海。私间尚不嘱求。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375461_comment'></div>及还京师。公共岂能遏塞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375461_comment'></div>昨蒙辨引。稍近加诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375461_comment'></div>座主既不免于款中。杂端固无逃于笔下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375461_comment'></div>乘时幸远。背惠加诬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375461_comment'></div>既置对之莫由。岂自明之有望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375461_comment'></div>若据其證逮。按彼词连。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375461_comment'></div>则处以严科。无所逃责。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375461_comment'></div>犹赖九天知其乖运伏念。非欲固用深文。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375461_comment'></div>不从锻鍊之科。得在平反之数。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375461_comment'></div>揣心知幸。感分增荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375461_comment'></div>拜谢末由。惶恋无极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375461_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_22_1375461_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_29087' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_29087' class='poemTitle -----title
奉节

襄阳
