id='poem_sentence_85_1375569_comment'></div>应求备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375569_comment'></div>卒不足以为名。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375569_comment'></div>直欲以塞本胜多爱我之意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375569_comment'></div>遂书其首。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375569_comment'></div>是夕大中七年十一月十日夜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375569_comment'></div>火尽灯暗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375569_comment'></div>前无鬼鸟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375569_comment'></div>一如大中元年十月十二日夜时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375569_comment'></div>书罢永明不成寐。</div><div id='poem_sentence_94_1375569_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=854&endYear=854')">854年1月1日</a>　在梓幕。作品：剑州重阳亭铭并序。<div id='poem_1375571' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375571' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375571?labeling=true' target='_blank'>剑州重阳亭铭</a><span class='authorDate'>（854年1月1日）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375571")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'>四言诗</div></div><div id='poem_title_1375571_comment'></div><div class='titleComment' id='poem_preface_1375571'>陪臣未尝屡睹天子宫阙。矧得舞殿陛下耶。然下国伏地读甲乙丙丁诏书。亦有以识天子理意。尺度尧舜。不差毫撮于绝远。人意尤在。不然者。安得用江陵令。使上水六千里。挽大小虎牙滟滪黄牛险。以治普安。□令既为侯。讲天子意。三年大理。田讼断休。市贾平。狱户屈膝。落民不识胥吏。四方宾颇来。系马靡牛□树肤不生。乃大铲险道。绲石见土。其平可容考工车四轨。建为南北亭。以经劳饯。又亭东山。号曰重阳。以醉风日。南北经贳。若出平郡。无有噫□□三年民恐即去。遮观□□请留□□东山实在亭下。侯蒋氏。名侑。文曰。</div><div id='poem_preface_1375571_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375571'><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375571'>仁之为道，隆磊英杰。<div id='poem_sentence_0_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_1375571'>天简其劳，羡以事物。<div id='poem_sentence_1_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_1375571'>为君之□□蒋是□撮取不穷，如武有库。<div id='poem_sentence_2_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_3_1375571'>蒋之有世，以仁为归。<div id='poem_sentence_3_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_1375571'>伯氏之宜，仲氏之思。<div id='poem_sentence_4_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_1375571'>厥弟承之，绳而不纨。<div id='poem_sentence_5_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_1375571'>以令为侯，天子之德。<div id='poem_sentence_6_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_1375571'>汝侯为理，剑有盈昃。<div id='poem_sentence_7_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_1375571'>君南臣北，父坐子伏。<div id='poem_sentence_8_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_1375571'>饮牛沤菅，田讼以直。<div id='poem_sentence_9_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_1375571'>市正狱清，谒归告休。<div id='poem_sentence_10_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_1375571'>朝雨滂沱，湿其帩头。<div id='poem_sentence_11_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_1375571'>民乐以康，愿有显庸。<div id='poem_sentence_12_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_1375571'>侯作南亭，北亭是双。<div id='poem_sentence_13_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_1375571'>至于东山，乃三其功。<div id='poem_sentence_14_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_1375571'>摧险为夷，大石是扛。<div id='poem_sentence_15_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_1375571'>亦既三年，民走乞留。<div id='poem_sentence_16_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_1375571'>伯氏南梁，重弓二矛。<div id='poem_sentence_17_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_1375571'>古有鲁卫，惟我之曹。<div id='poem_sentence_18_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_1375571'>惟仁之归，有世在下。<div id='poem_sentence_19_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_1375571'>其摅其超，尾马鬣马。<div id='poem_sentence_20_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_1375571'>惟蒋之融，由唐庞嘏。<div "Clauses/45/Comments/0")'>粗且</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_22_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_1375571'>唐大中八年九月一日，太学博士河南李商隐撰。<div id='poem_sentence_23_1375571_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_1375571'></div><div id='poem_sentence_24_1375571_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=854&endYear=855')">854-855年</a>　在梓州柳仲郢幕。作品：细雨成咏献尚书河东公。即日（一岁林花即日休）寓兴。巴江柳。柳（曾逐东风拂舞筵）柳（柳映江潭底有情）柳下暗记。忆梅。天涯。无题（万里风波一叶舟）有怀在蒙飞卿。闻著明凶问哭寄飞卿。江上忆严五广休。酬崔八早梅有赠兼示之作。题白石莲华寄楚公。咏三学山。题僧壁。明禅师院酬从兄见寄。春深脱衣。妓席暗记送同年独孤云之武昌。饮席戏赠同舍。饮席代官妓赠两从事。为举人上翰林萧侍郎启。梓州罢吟寄同舍。蜀桐。<div id='poem_note_29110_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_1375498' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375498' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375498?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为举人上翰林萧侍郎启</a><span class='authorDate'>（854年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375498")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375498_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375498'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375498'>某启。某闻师旷之琴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375498_comment'></div>不鼓之则无以召元鹤。杨羲之石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375498_comment'></div>不用之即无以聘应龙。物既有之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375498_comment'></div>言亦犹是。伏惟侍郎学士絪缊降秀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375498_comment'></div>翕辟资华。天上比方。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375498_comment'></div>但有文星粗尔。人间拟议。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375498_comment'></div>未将太华为然。爰自妙龄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375498_comment'></div>遂肩名辈。当时人物。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375498_comment'></div>何戢惟效于褚公。迩日风流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375498_comment'></div>杜乂难方于卫玠。加以宏成与石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375498_comment'></div>郭璞传毫。涣水倘来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375498_comment'></div>皆逢藻缋。荆峰若至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375498_comment'></div>只有璆琳。合沓缣缃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375498_comment'></div>纵横笔砚。三都作序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375498_comment'></div>不劳皇甫士安。万乘为寮。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375498_comment'></div>只有东方曼倩。况从近岁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375498_comment'></div>且有外虞。傅介子在楼兰国中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375498_comment'></div>奇功未就。班仲升于玉门关外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375498_comment'></div>报命犹赊。虽太平之业巳隆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375498_comment'></div>而震耀之威尚作。侍郎又绸缪武帐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375498_comment'></div>密勿皇图。九天九地之兵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375498_comment'></div>宁因旧学。七纵七擒之术。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375498_comment'></div>固已元通。用视草之工。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375498_comment'></div>解按剑之怒。手为天马。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375498_comment'></div>心绘国图。九重之中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375498_comment'></div>暂烦前箸。万里之外。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375498_comment'></div>辄散衡车。位诚在于论思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375498_comment'></div>功已参于镇抚。图书之府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375498_comment'></div>鼎鼐之司。伊咎悬遗恨之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375498_comment'></div>夔说贮妨贤之愧。载惟后命。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375498_comment'></div>夫岂踰时。抑某又闻之。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375498_comment'></div>昔管仲经邦。宾客有二。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375498_comment'></div>周公待士。吐握皆三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375498_comment'></div>丙丞相之车茵。宁弹醉客。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375498_comment'></div>平津侯之宾馆。不碍布衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375498_comment'></div>并脂粉简编。冠缨图史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375498_comment'></div>后之披卷。皆若升堂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375498_comment'></div>侍郎美誉旁流。高节弥折。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375498_comment'></div>担簦者成市。蹑蹻者如云。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375498_comment'></div>此乃前贤后贤。不殊轨辙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375498_comment'></div>往哲来哲。非异门墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375498_comment'></div>纵燕有黄金之台。齐为碣石之馆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375498_comment'></div>料其栋宇。必巳荒芜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375498_comment'></div>若某者。陋若左思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375498_comment'></div>丑同王粲。须眉不及于崔炎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375498_comment'></div>腰腹无预于郑元。若值庭兰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375498_comment'></div>固多惭德。如逢岩电。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375498_comment'></div>不望齐名。重以惠劣祢生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375498_comment'></div>专非董氏。殊颜回之易铸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375498_comment'></div>若宰我之难雕。徒欲万卷咸披。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375498_comment'></div>且乏五行俱下。叨从岁赋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375498_comment'></div>勉致文编。户户酱瓿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375498_comment'></div>唯闻见辱。人人齑臼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375498_comment'></div>不肯留题。再困于<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_53_1375498", 1375498, "Clauses/107/Comments/0")'>鱼登</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375498_comment'></div>一惭于雁序<span class='inlineComment2'>（其长兄两举及第）</span>。然天付直气。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375498_comment'></div>家传义方。虽在颛蒙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375498_comment'></div>不苟述作。广绝交之论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375498_comment'></div>抑有旨焉。移太常之书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375498_comment'></div>非无为也。顷者曾干<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_58_1375498", 1375498, "Clauses/117/Comments/0")'>阍侍</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375498_comment'></div>获拜堂皇。既容纳之有加。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375498_comment'></div>遂希望之滋甚。尔后以毛伤垣弹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375498_comment'></div>鳞损任钩。拔刺不迁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375498_comment'></div>噞喁无暇。既乖受教。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375498_comment'></div>便以经时。今孝秀爰来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375498_comment'></div>风霜已积。秦人屡出。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375498_comment'></div>自欲焚舟。楚卒数奔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375498_comment'></div>谁教拔旆。是以更持鱼目。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375498_comment'></div>当<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_67_1375498", 1375498, "Clauses/134/Comments/0")'>夜肆</span>以沽诸。复挈豚蹄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375498_comment'></div>祝天时之未已。义诚多愧。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375498_comment'></div>志亦可怜。倘蒙犹枉铅华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375498_comment'></div>更施丹雘。俾其<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_70_1375498", 1375498, "Clauses/141/Comments/0")'>恩地</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375498_comment'></div>不在他门。虽不及采椽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375498_comment'></div>备枝梧于大厦。亦庶乎稊米。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375498_comment'></div>增流衍于神仓。与夫九九之能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375498_comment'></div>犹或万万相远。诚深词切。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375498_comment'></div>声急响烦。仰郭泰之龟龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375498_comment'></div>望仲尼之日月。濡毫伏纸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375498_comment'></div>亿万常心。干冒尊严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375498_comment'></div>伏用战灼。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375498_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_79_1375498_comment'></div></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_28751'>枉教紫凤无栖处，斲作秋琴弹坏<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作广）</span>陵。<div id='poem_sentence_1_28751_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_28751'></div><div id='poem_sentence_2_28751_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=855&endYear=855')">855年</a>　十一月随仲郢返京。作品：为某先辈献集贤相公启。为京兆公乞留泸州刺史洗宗礼状。<div id='poem_1375496' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375496' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375496?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为某先辈献集贤相公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（855年11月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375496")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375496_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375496'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375496'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375496_comment'></div>某窃睹贞观朝书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375496_comment'></div>伏见文皇帝因梦吹尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375496_comment'></div>方求风后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375496_comment'></div>于畋问卜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375496_comment'></div>始载磻溪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375496_comment'></div>事伟于王图。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375496_comment'></div>道光于帝载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375496_comment'></div>下惟敷衽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375496_comment'></div>上则虚襟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375496_comment'></div>缠绵图纬之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375496_comment'></div>窈窕天人之际。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375496_comment'></div>崇基立极。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375496_comment'></div>四足虽断于神鳌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375496_comment'></div>开物成功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375496_comment'></div>七窍仍沾于混沌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375496_comment'></div>禹羞乘辇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375496_comment'></div>舜耻弹琴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375496_comment'></div>白乌已见于将雏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375496_comment'></div>朱草仍闻于滞穗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375496_comment'></div>共工蚩尤之辈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375496_comment'></div>与贰负同拘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375496_comment'></div>豕韦晋耳之徒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375496_comment'></div>与七驺共御。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375496_comment'></div>是以今上以贻谋负扆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375496_comment'></div>相公以馀庆持衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375496_comment'></div>用十一德之资。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375496_comment'></div>赞七百年之祚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375496_comment'></div>古犹今也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375496_comment'></div>仁岂远乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375496_comment'></div>伏惟相公日观同光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375496_comment'></div>天球并价。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375496_comment'></div>扬锋<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_32_1375496", 1375496, "Clauses/32/Comments/0")'>露锷</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375496_comment'></div>则武库常开。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375496_comment'></div>散藻摛华。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375496_comment'></div>则文星镇见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375496_comment'></div>一言悟主。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375496_comment'></div>三接承恩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375496_comment'></div>季孟伊繇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375496_comment'></div>友朋萧邴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375496_comment'></div>汉皇发论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375496_comment'></div>十万常愧于淮阴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375496_comment'></div>齐后推诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375496_comment'></div>一二皆归于仲父。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375496_comment'></div>百度既已贞矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375496_comment'></div>九流又复清焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375496_comment'></div>墙东灶北。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375496_comment'></div>隐沦者咸欲呈材。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375496_comment'></div>猿饮鸟言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375496_comment'></div>僻陋者皆思入贡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375496_comment'></div>庄生献臂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375496_comment'></div>杨子拔毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375496_comment'></div>三百篇之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375496_comment'></div>更无讽刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375496_comment'></div>二百年之史。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375496_comment'></div>永绝讥嫌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375496_comment'></div>斯乃百代可知。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375496_comment'></div>一言以蔽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375496_comment'></div>岂立锥侧管。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375496_comment'></div>可折齿寻环。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375496_comment'></div>巍乎焕乎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375496_comment'></div>盛矣美矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375496_comment'></div>若某者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375496_comment'></div>剖心寡窍。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375496_comment'></div>对面多墙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375496_comment'></div>小比焦螟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375496_comment'></div>敢矜巢窟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375496_comment'></div>微同触氏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375496_comment'></div>宁务战争。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375496_comment'></div>徒以簪绂承家。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375496_comment'></div>阶庭受训。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_70_1375496_comment'></div>堂中得桂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_71_1375496_comment'></div>已有前叨。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_72_1375496_comment'></div>幕下开莲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375496_comment'></div>仍当后忝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375496_comment'></div>所宜括囊无咎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375496_comment'></div>䌽服为荣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375496_comment'></div>绝方朔之上书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375496_comment'></div>罢祢衡之投刺。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375496_comment'></div>直以措心贤路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375496_comment'></div>誓志昌时。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375496_comment'></div>既慕义无穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375496_comment'></div>思有道则见。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375496_comment'></div>伏惟相公雾能蔚豹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375496_comment'></div>雷可烧龙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375496_comment'></div>为百氏之指南。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375496_comment'></div>作九州之木铎。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375496_comment'></div>任安彦国。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375496_comment'></div>巳在于厩中。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375496_comment'></div>扬子马卿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375496_comment'></div>并归于门下。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375496_comment'></div>而犹渴饥未副。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375496_comment'></div>影响无宁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375496_comment'></div>请客者不解衾裯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375496_comment'></div>当关者空存皮骨。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375496_comment'></div>冀张华之倒屣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375496_comment'></div>以升堂客众。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375496_comment'></div>拥彗人多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375496_comment'></div>苟无鬷蔑之言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375496_comment'></div>难佐仲宣之陋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375496_comment'></div>今辄以常所著文若干首上献。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375496_comment'></div>伏惟少回岩电。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1375496_comment'></div>微驻台星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1375496_comment'></div>固无望于讨论。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1375496_comment'></div>庶或观于指趣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1375496_comment'></div>傥萧稂可刈。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1375496_comment'></div>管蒯无遗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1375496_comment'></div>蒙文宣一字之褒。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1375496_comment'></div>得元晏三都之序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1375496_comment'></div>便若神巫去厉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1375496_comment'></div>司命添年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1375496_comment'></div>祷祝之诚。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1375496_comment'></div>造次于是。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1375496_comment'></div>门遥阊阖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1375496_comment'></div>路隔瀛洲。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1375496_comment'></div>于人世存思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1375496_comment'></div>空移气序。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1375496_comment'></div>以尘中仰望。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1375496_comment'></div>未见端倪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1375496_comment'></div>希陪上士之流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1375496_comment'></div>终预群仙之末。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1375496_comment'></div>祈恩望德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1375496_comment'></div>乃百斯生。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1375496_comment'></div>干冒威严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1375496_comment'></div>下情无任惶惧感激之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1375496_comment'></div>谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_128_1375496_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375295' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375295' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375295?labeling=true' target='_blank'>为京兆公乞留泸州剌史洗宗礼状</a><span class='authorDate'>（855年）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span class='inlineComment1'> 唐 · </span><a href='javascript: ShowPoemAuthorProfile(16489, "唐", "李商隐", "poem_title_1375295")'>李商隐</a></span><br /><div class='titleIndent'></div></div><div id='poem_title_1375295_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375295'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375295'>臣得当管泸州官吏百姓李继等及泸州所管五县百姓张思忠等并羁縻州土剌史韦文赏等状称。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375295_comment'></div>前件官到任巳来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375295_comment'></div>励精为理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375295_comment'></div>多方以苏疲病。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375295_comment'></div>况郡连戎僰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375295_comment'></div>地接巴黔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375295_comment'></div>作业多仰于茗茶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375295_comment'></div>务本不同于秀麦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375295_comment'></div>宗礼<span class='inlineComment2'>（阙十二字）</span>貊之邦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375295_comment'></div>粗识囷仓之积。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375295_comment'></div>伏冀宸严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375295_comment'></div>俯哀县道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375295_comment'></div>特许量留宗礼更一二年。</div><div id='poem_sentence_12_1375295_comment'></div></div></div><br /></div>
-----end

成都

class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375509'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375509'>商隐启。两日前于张评事处伏睹手笔。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375509_comment'></div>兼评事传指意。于乐籍中赐一人。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375509_comment'></div>以备纫补。某悼伤以来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375509_comment'></div>光阴未几。梧桐半死。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375509_comment'></div>方有述哀。灵光独存。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375509_comment'></div>且兼多病。眷言息允。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375509_comment'></div>不暇提携。或小于叔夜之男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375509_comment'></div>或幼于伯喈之女。检庾信荀娘之启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375509_comment'></div>常有酸辛。咏陶潜通子之诗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375509_comment'></div>每嗟漂泊。所赖因依德宇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375509_comment'></div>驰骤府庭。方思效命旌旄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375509_comment'></div>不敢载怀乡土。锦茵<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_11_1375509", 1375509, "Clauses/23/Comments/0")'>象榻</span>。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375509_comment'></div><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_12_1375509", 1375509, "Clauses/24/Comments/0")'>石馆</span>金台。入则陪奉光尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375509_comment'></div>更敦夙契。自安衰薄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375509_comment'></div>微得端倪。至于南国妖姬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375509_comment'></div>丛台<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_17_1375509", 1375509, "Clauses/34/Comments/0")'>妙妓</span>。虽有涉于篇什。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375509_comment'></div>实不接于风流。况张懿仙本是无双。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375509_comment'></div>曾来独立。既从上将。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375509_comment'></div>又托英寮。汲县勒铭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375509_comment'></div>方依崔瑗。汉庭曳履。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375509_comment'></div>犹忆郑崇。宁复河里飞星。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375509_comment'></div>云间堕月。窥西家之宋玉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375509_comment'></div>恨东舍之王昌。诚出恩私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375509_comment'></div>非所宜称。伏惟克从至愿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375509_comment'></div>赐寝前言。使国人尽保展禽。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375509_comment'></div>酒肆不疑阮籍。则恩优之理。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375509_comment'></div>何以加焉。干冒尊严。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375509_comment'></div>伏用惶灼。谨启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375509_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_30_1375509_comment'></div></div></div><div id='poem_1375445' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375445' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375445?labeling=true' class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375445'>姚熊顷时斗殴。偶在坤维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375445_comment'></div>阿安未容决平。遽诣风宪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375445_comment'></div>当道频奉台牒。令差从事往推。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375445_comment'></div>去就之间。殊为未适。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375445_comment'></div>顾惟敝府。托近贵藩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375445_comment'></div>虽蒙与国之恩。犹在附庸之列。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375445_comment'></div>仰遵教指。尚惧尤违。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375445_comment'></div>敢遣宾僚。往专刑狱。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375445_comment'></div>自奉台牒。夙夜兢惶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375445_comment'></div>今谨差节度判官李商隐侍御往。以今月十八日离此。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375445_comment'></div>某素无材效。早沐恩怜。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375445_comment'></div>获接仁风。实为天幸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375445_comment'></div>颇希终始。以奉恩光。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375445_comment'></div>事大之心。朝暾是誓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375445_comment'></div>其他并附李侍御口述。伏为照察。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375445_comment'></div></div><div id='poem_sentence_15_1375445_comment'></div></div></div><br /><a href="javascript: ViewDetail('scope=&author=&beginYear=852&endYear=852')">852年</a>　谒见杜悰求提携。作品：献相国京兆公启二。五言述德抒情诗一首四十韵，献上杜七兄仆射。今月二日不自量度辄以诗一首四十韵干渎尊严。<div id='poem_1375503' class='_poem'><div id='poem_title_1375503' class='poemTitle showDetail'><a href='/Writing/1375503?labeling=true' target='_blank'>献相国京兆公启</a><span class='authorDate'>（852年1月）</span><span class='poemAuthor'><span id='poem_title_1375503_comment'></div><div class='poemContent' id='poem_content_1375503'><div class='articleSentence' id='poem_sentence_0_1375503'>某启。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_0_1375503_comment'></div>昔师旷荐音。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_1_1375503_comment'></div>元鹤下舞。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_2_1375503_comment'></div>后夔作乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_3_1375503_comment'></div>丹凤来仪。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_4_1375503_comment'></div>是则师旷之丝桐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_5_1375503_comment'></div>以元鹤知妙。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_6_1375503_comment'></div>后夔之金石。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_7_1375503_comment'></div>以丹凤彰能。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_8_1375503_comment'></div>然而师旷之前。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_9_1375503_comment'></div>抚徽轸者不少。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_10_1375503_comment'></div>后夔之后。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_11_1375503_comment'></div>谐律吕者至多。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_12_1375503_comment'></div>曾不闻元鹤每来。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_13_1375503_comment'></div>丹凤常至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_14_1375503_comment'></div>岂鸣皋藻质。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_15_1375503_comment'></div>或有所私。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_16_1375503_comment'></div>巢阁灵心。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_17_1375503_comment'></div>不能无党。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_18_1375503_comment'></div>以今虑古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_19_1375503_comment'></div>愚窃疑焉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_20_1375503_comment'></div>伏惟相公正始敦风。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_21_1375503_comment'></div>中和执德。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_22_1375503_comment'></div>卫玠谈道。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_23_1375503_comment'></div>当海内之风流。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_24_1375503_comment'></div>张华聚书。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_25_1375503_comment'></div>见天下之奇秘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_26_1375503_comment'></div>自顷出持戎律。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_27_1375503_comment'></div>入践台司。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_28_1375503_comment'></div>暗合孙吴。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_29_1375503_comment'></div>乃山涛馀力。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_30_1375503_comment'></div>自比管乐。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_31_1375503_comment'></div>亦孔明戏言。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_32_1375503_comment'></div>斯皆尽纪朝经。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_33_1375503_comment'></div>全操乐职。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_34_1375503_comment'></div>虽鲁庭更仆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_35_1375503_comment'></div>魏馆易衣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_36_1375503_comment'></div>欲尽揄扬。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_37_1375503_comment'></div>终成漏略。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_38_1375503_comment'></div>而复调元气之暇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_39_1375503_comment'></div>居外相之馀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_40_1375503_comment'></div>偃仰缣缃。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_41_1375503_comment'></div>留连章句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_42_1375503_comment'></div>亦师旷之元鹤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_43_1375503_comment'></div>后夔之丹凤不疑矣。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_44_1375503_comment'></div>若某者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_45_1375503_comment'></div>幼常刻苦。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_46_1375503_comment'></div>长实流离。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_47_1375503_comment'></div>乡举三年。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_48_1375503_comment'></div>才沾下第。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_49_1375503_comment'></div>宦游十载。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_50_1375503_comment'></div>未过上农。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_51_1375503_comment'></div>顾筐箧以生尘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_52_1375503_comment'></div>念机关而将蠹。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_53_1375503_comment'></div>其或绮霞牵思。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_54_1375503_comment'></div>圭月当情。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_55_1375503_comment'></div>乌鹊绕枝。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_56_1375503_comment'></div>芙蓉出水。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_57_1375503_comment'></div>平子四愁之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_58_1375503_comment'></div>休文八咏之辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_59_1375503_comment'></div>纵时有斐然。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_60_1375503_comment'></div>终乖作者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_61_1375503_comment'></div>去前月二十四日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_62_1375503_comment'></div>误干英眄。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_63_1375503_comment'></div>辄露微才。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_64_1375503_comment'></div>八十首之寓怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_65_1375503_comment'></div>幽情罕备。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_66_1375503_comment'></div>三十篇之拟古。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_67_1375503_comment'></div>商较全疏。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_68_1375503_comment'></div>过丰隆以操槌。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_69_1375503_comment'></div>对西子以窥镜。<div class='inline' class='inline' id='poem_sentence_73_1375503_comment'></div>丹青不足。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_74_1375503_comment'></div>亟挥柔翰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_75_1375503_comment'></div>屡赞神锋。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_76_1375503_comment'></div>讵成褒德之词。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_77_1375503_comment'></div>自是抒情之日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_78_1375503_comment'></div>言无万一。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_79_1375503_comment'></div>读有再三。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_80_1375503_comment'></div>不谓恕以萧稂。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_81_1375503_comment'></div>加之金雘。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_82_1375503_comment'></div>频开庄驿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_83_1375503_comment'></div>累泛融尊。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_84_1375503_comment'></div>揖西园之上宾。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_85_1375503_comment'></div>必称佳句。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_86_1375503_comment'></div>携东山之妙妓。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_87_1375503_comment'></div>或配新声。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_88_1375503_comment'></div>是以疑元鹤之有私意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_89_1375503_comment'></div>丹凤之犹党者。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_90_1375503_comment'></div>盖在此也。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_91_1375503_comment'></div>始荣攀奉。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_92_1375503_comment'></div>俄叹艰屯。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_93_1375503_comment'></div>以乐广之清羸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_94_1375503_comment'></div>披扬雄之瘨眩。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_95_1375503_comment'></div>遥烦攻疗。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_96_1375503_comment'></div>旋旷趋承。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_97_1375503_comment'></div>游梁苑以无期。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_98_1375503_comment'></div>窜漳滨而有日。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_99_1375503_comment'></div>矧以游丁鳏孑。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_100_1375503_comment'></div>不忍羁孤。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_101_1375503_comment'></div>期既迫于从公。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_102_1375503_comment'></div>力遂乖于携幼。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_103_1375503_comment'></div>安仁挥涕。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_104_1375503_comment'></div>奉倩伤神。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_105_1375503_comment'></div>男小于嵇康之男。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_106_1375503_comment'></div>女幼于蔡邕之女。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_107_1375503_comment'></div>每蒙顾问。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_108_1375503_comment'></div>必降咨嗟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_109_1375503_comment'></div>抚身世以知归。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_110_1375503_comment'></div>望门墙而益恳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_111_1375503_comment'></div>当今允推常武。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_112_1375503_comment'></div>将庆休辰。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_113_1375503_comment'></div>轩后之忆先鸿。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_114_1375503_comment'></div>殷帝之思盘说。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_115_1375503_comment'></div>详观天意。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_116_1375503_comment'></div>取在坤维。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_117_1375503_comment'></div>弼光宅之功。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_118_1375503_comment'></div>议置器之所。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_119_1375503_comment'></div>载求列辟。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_120_1375503_comment'></div>谁取抗衡。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_121_1375503_comment'></div>愚此际傥必辨杯蛇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_122_1375503_comment'></div>不惊床蚁。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_123_1375503_comment'></div>尚冀从下执事。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_124_1375503_comment'></div>为太平民。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_125_1375503_comment'></div>望谢傅之蒲葵。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_126_1375503_comment'></div>咏召公之棠树。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_127_1375503_comment'></div>恭惟慎调寝膳。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_128_1375503_comment'></div>克副人祇。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_129_1375503_comment'></div>伏恐本府巳有追符。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_130_1375503_comment'></div>即日径须上路。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_131_1375503_comment'></div>倚大夏之节杖。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_132_1375503_comment'></div>入彭泽之篮舆。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_133_1375503_comment'></div>不复拾级宾阶。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_134_1375503_comment'></div>致辞公府。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_135_1375503_comment'></div>故欲仰青田之叙感。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_136_1375503_comment'></div>瞻丹穴以兴怀。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_137_1375503_comment'></div>秃逸少之鹿毛。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_138_1375503_comment'></div>书情莫竭。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_139_1375503_comment'></div>尽休明之茧纸。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_140_1375503_comment'></div>写恋难穷。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_141_1375503_comment'></div>企望旌幢。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_142_1375503_comment'></div>无任陨泪感激之至。<div class='inline' id='poem_sentence_143_1375503_comment'></div>谨启。</div><div id='poem_sentence_144_1375503_comment'></div></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_1_29086'>四时当首夏，八节应条风。<div id='poem_sentence_1_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_2_29086'>涤濯临清济，巉岩倚碧嵩。<div "poem_sentence_3_29086")'>鲍壶冰</span>皎洁，王佩玉丁东<sup class='reference inlineComment2'>⑴</sup>。<div id='poem_sentence_3_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_4_29086'>处剧<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10471, "poem_sentence_4_29086")'>张京兆</span>，通经戴侍中。<div id='poem_sentence_4_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_5_29086'>将星临迥夜，卿月丽<span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_5_29086", 29086, "Clauses/11/Comments/0")'>层穹</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_5_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_6_29086'>下令销秦盗，高谈破宋聋。<div id='poem_sentence_6_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_7_29086'>含霜太山竹，拂雾峄阳桐。<div id='poem_sentence_7_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_8_29086'>乐道乾知退，当官蹇匪躬。<div id='poem_sentence_8_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_9_29086'>服箱<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(7020, "poem_sentence_9_29086")'>青海马</span>，入兆<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(867, "poem_sentence_9_29086")'>渭川熊</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_9_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_10_29086'>固是符真宰，徒劳让化工。<div id='poem_sentence_10_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_11_29086'>凤池春潋艳，鸡树晓曈昽。<div id='poem_sentence_11_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_12_29086'>愿守三章约，还期<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作期尝）</span>九译通。<div id='poem_sentence_12_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_13_29086'>薰琴调大舜，宝瑟和神农。<div id='poem_sentence_13_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_14_29086'>慷慨资元老，周旋值<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作直）</span>狡童。<div id='poem_sentence_14_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_15_29086'>仲尼羞问阵，魏绛喜和戎。<div id='poem_sentence_15_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_16_29086'>款款将除蠹，孜孜欲达聪。<div id='poem_sentence_16_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_17_29086'>所求因渭浊，安肯与雷同。<div id='poem_sentence_17_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_18_29086'>物议将调鼎，君恩忽赐弓。<div id='poem_sentence_18_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_19_29086'>开吴相上下，全蜀占西东。<div id='poem_sentence_19_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_20_29086'>锐卒鱼悬饵，豪胥鸟在笼。<div id='poem_sentence_20_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_21_29086'>疲民呼杜母，邻国仰<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(9652, "poem_sentence_21_29086")'>羊公</span>。<div id='poem_sentence_21_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_22_29086'>置驿推东道，安禅合北宗。<div id='poem_sentence_22_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_23_29086'>嘉宾增重价，上士悟真空。<div id='poem_sentence_23_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_24_29086'>扇举遮王导，樽开见孔融。<div id='poem_sentence_24_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_25_29086'>烟飞愁舞罢，尘定<span class='inlineComment2'>（一作起）</span>惜歌终。<div id='poem_sentence_25_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_26_29086'>岸柳兼池绿，园花映烛红。<div id='poem_sentence_26_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_27_29086'>未曾<span class='link' onclick='ShowAllusionComment(10794, "poem_sentence_27_29086")'>周顗醉</span>，转觉季之恭。<div id='poem_sentence_27_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_28_29086'><span class='link' onclick='ShowWordComment("poem_sentence_28_29086", 29086, "Clauses/56/Comments/0")'>系滞</span>喧人望，便蕃属圣衷。<div id='poem_sentence_28_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_29_29086'>天书何日降，庭燎几时烘。<div id='poem_sentence_29_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_30_29086'>早岁乖投刺，今晨幸发蒙。<div id='poem_sentence_30_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_31_29086'>远途哀跛鳖，薄艺奖雕虫。<div id='poem_sentence_31_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_32_29086'>故事曾尊隗，前修有荐雄。<div id='poem_sentence_32_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_33_29086'>终须烦刻画，聊拟更磨砻。<div id='poem_sentence_33_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_34_29086'>蛮岭晴留雪，巴江晚带枫。<div id='poem_sentence_34_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_35_29086'>营巢怜越燕，裂帛待燕鸿。<div id='poem_sentence_35_29086_comment'></div></div><div class='poemSentence' id='poem_sentence_36_29086'>自苦诚先檗，长飘不后蓬。<div
